space: The apartment : In the living room, a full view on the Sacre Coeur and also on a big public garden with no one in front to see you. The bedroom is on the courtyard side, very quiet, with a single bed 90 cm large. There is a sofa that you can turn into a 140 cm large double bed in the living room which is also quiet and is equiped with a TV. So 3 persons can sleep with 2 together on the sofa. The kitchen has a oven and a big refrigerator, a washing machine. There is a smalll bathroom with shower and separated toilet.
description: Fully furnished charming 2 rooms apartment with wooden floor overviewing the Sacré Cœur and a big public garden. Very friendly neighborhood full of shops and public transportation. Come to live the real experience of Montmartre ! The apartment : In the living room, a full view on the Sacre Coeur and also on a big public garden with no one in front to see you. The bedroom is on the courtyard side, very quiet, with a single bed 90 cm large. There is a sofa that you can turn into a 140 cm large double bed in the living room which is also quiet and is equiped with a TV. So 3 persons can sleep with 2 together on the sofa. The kitchen has a oven and a big refrigerator, a washing machine. There is a smalll bathroom with shower and separated toilet. The entire apartment will be at your disposal. An agent will wait for the travelers upon their arrival in the apartment to let them in and show them around. At the end of your stay, the agent will come to meet you and see that everything is in orde
transit: Various public transport nearby : 3 subway lines 5 minutes walking distance  (Jules Joffrin Ligne 12, Saint-Ouen L13, Marcadet L4...), lots of buses, you can go to the center of Paris or to the main touristic attractions and train stations in 20 minutes. Flea market 15 minutes walking from the apartment.

space: Located in the heart of the 9th district, this beautiful apartment has been decorated with an eye for detail, featuring well chosen art work and contemporary furniture.  On the 3rd floor (with elevator), typical of Haussmannian architecture, with its elegant wooden floor, high ceilings, mouldings, large fireplaces, big windows, it comprises a lobby, a bright living room with 2 comfortable double sofa beds, a dining table and chairs, a bedroom with a double bed and spacious closets, a fully equipped kitchen, a brand new bathroom with a big shower, a separate wc/powder room. Despite being located in one of the bobo hotspots of the city, it's very quiet at night, as the flat is overlooking a beautiful private courtyard and not the street. The nearest Metro station (Notre-Dame-de-Lorette) is only 2 minutes away. Almost every tourist site can be reached walking (assuming you enjoy walking a bit). Bikes (Vélib) can be easily rented in the street for a few euros a day. You can park nearby (le
description: This modern, fully furnished and carefully decorated 67 sqm apartment accommodates up to 5 people in a bedroom and a double living-room.  Located in the trendy Rue des Martyrs, it's close to many tourist attractions and a short walk from Gare du Nord. Despite being located in one of the bobo hotspots of the city, it's very quiet at night, as the flat is overlooking a beautiful private courtyard and not the street. Th
transit: Taxi : Please let me know if you need to be picked-up at the airport, I negotiated a flat rate with Armand for up to 5 people.  It's barely more expensive than the train and saves you time and hassle. Ask me about it! Armand can also pick you up upon departure and drop you to any airport and train station. The nearest Metro station (Notre-Dame-de-Lorette) is 2 minutes away. The Gare du Nord (Eurostar; for trains from England, Germany, Belgium and Holland) is only a 10/15 minute walk away. The Gare de l'Est (Luxembourg and Germany) is a 10 minute taxi ride away (or a 20 minute walk away). The Gare de Lyon (Switzerland and Italy) is 30 minutes away by subway. The Gare Montparnasse (Spain) is 20/25 minutes away by subway (and direct to Notre-Dame-de-Lorette, the nearest Metro station). The Roissy/Charles de Gaulle airport is a 45 mn taxi ride (60/85 euros, according to time and traffic) or 1h train ride away (direct to Gare du Nord, RER C, 12 euros/person). The Orly airport is a 45 mn tax
access: Guests have access to the whole apartment. Closets are available in the bedroom. Free wifi and 300 foreign tv channels.
interaction: I make every effort to welcome all my guests in person on arrival. During the length of each guest's stay, I can be contacted by phone, text messages and mail and will always be happy to answers to any questions or requests in French, English, German, Spanish or Portuguese.
house_rules: The fewer the rules, the better the stay!  However try to keep the apartment as clean and tidy as you found it and respect the neighbours' quietness. I try to be as flexible as possible regarding arrival and departure time!  However a good organization between us beforehand is vital to make everybody happy. Paris is a big city and of course there are scams that target tourists. While none of my guests have experienced any problems and the neighbourhood is safe, please take reasonable precautions for your security. DO NOT let anyone enter the apartment even if they claim the right to do so (for example for electricity or from any alleged authorities) without contacting me first. I will always be glad to help you out if you have any questions during your stay and will answer in French, English, German or Spanish. You trust me...and I trust you!...
host_about:
After university studies (and a degree in marketing), I always found time to travel extensively and for long periods of time. 
I realised then how one appreciates to find a place where you feel at home, live as locals do; a place where you can enjoy breakfast with your choice of music in the background, where you can shop the local food stores and cook a beautiful diner for everybody; Well, even better if this place costs you roughly half what a hotel would cost you (for a fifth of the space)! 
I love literature and art, which probably reflects in the modern decoration and the many books on the bookshelves.
Travelling in many parts of the world made me quite laid back I guess; I just expect my guests to have a wonderful time in Paris and just want to come back as soon as possible....

space: Located in the historic heart of PARIS, a few minutes’ walk from the Odeon and Cluny la Sorbonne Metro stations and Luxembourg (RER)    You will discover the Notre Dame Cathedral, the quays of the Seine, the Quartier Latin and its small restaurants, the Pantheon, the Louvre Museum, the Cluny Museum, the Rue Moufetard and its nightlife, the Jardin du Luxembourg and its children's theater. The EIFFEL tower and other interesting places are less than 30 minutes away via public transport.  And, above all, you will be able to immerse yourself into a true, authentic Paris and live a fabulous adventure! Numerous shops, supermarkets, bakeries, restaurants, bistros, theaters, and banks can be found near the apartment: a true city life… The apartment was recently renovated by an architect and is located on the 7th and last floor  (7th, with elevator).  Its decoration is contemporary, but welcoming; its design is very complete, and it has: A 2-people bed, a 2-people sofa bed, a mezzanine bed for 1

house_rules: FRENCH/ 1-Cet appartement est non fumeur.  2-La tranquilité des habitants et le respect du voisinage sont primordiaux. Le bruit est interdit de 22h à 8h le matin.  3-L'organisation de soirées, la prostitution et l'usage de drogues sont interdits dans nos locaux et les parties communes. 4-Le WIFI est à disposition pour un usage légal. Le téléchargement illégal est interdit.   5-La capacité d'acceuil maximale est de 4 personnes. 6-Les animaux propres et non bruyants sont autorisés. Toute fois les locataires sont responsables des dommages que leur animal pourrait causer. 7-Les locataires s'engagent à nous informer de toute dégradation et à régler les frais de remise en état. 8-Ne pas manipuler les volets roulants lorsqu'ils sont au soleil. 9- Arrivée entre 14h et 20h. Départ avant midi. Le non respect de ce règlement entraînerait votre départ sans remboursement et vous expose à des poursuites.
host_about: Je vous propose un logement confortable et bien situé lors de vos séjours touristiques à Paris.

Clear, calm and bright, it has more of a complete equipment (dishes, towels). Convenient for 2 persons, the apartment can accommodate up to 4 people (sofa bed in the lounge). It is available for very short stays or longer periods. host_about:
Bonjour,
Parisien par hasard,  je vis à Montmartre depuis 35 ans sans jamais en être parti. C'est comme cela que je suis devenu un vrai parisien, amoureux de ma ville et plus particulièrement de cette parenthèse enchantée qu'est Montmartre, qui bien que touristique, n'en demeure pas moins l'un des lieux de vie préféré des Parisiens.
Bienvenue au village !

space: Available for rent, a house full of charm ( capacity 8 people ) with garden in Paris, just steps from Montparnasse in a very cool street. The house has four bedrooms, a spacious living room full of books and with a fireplace and piano, two bathrooms each with bath AND shower, toilet on each floor (so 3 separate WC), laundry. The four rooms include : two bedrooms with a double bed, a bedroom with two bunk beds and a room with a sofa bed in a real bed. Linens and towels are provided upon request. The kitchen contains a dishwasher, two oven, microwave, cutlery, dishes, a washing machine (washing machine), a refrigerator and a freezer. All in a very quiet street, in a quarter bustling with commercial activities. There are several supermarkets and a daily outdoor market on Wednesdays and Sundays. At 400 meters, the underground stations Plaisance and Alesia lead you straight into Montparnasse, St Germain des Prés, The Invalides, the Champs-Elysées or Châtelet and Les Halles. That's two metro

host_about: Hello everybody, I am Christophe. We are a little family from Paris : my wife Emmanuelle, myself, and our two boys. We like travel, and discover different cultures. Both boys have been to Bilingual schools and are already mastering three languages ! Personnaly, I love reading and arts. I also follow some sports like football, rugby, tennis. I play tennis and we also love skiing (our favorite is in the Swiss Alps small villages). I speak French, English, Spanish, German and Italian. I will make sure that you have an unforgettable experience in Paris in our completely renovated house in a very calm street surrounded by animated places. Have a lovely stay in La Ville Lumière.

space: The apartment has 65m2 and is on a first floor with elevator. It's ideal for a couple, a family or a group of friends staying in Paris for studies, a project, or as a first landing place for a relocation project. The flat has: Two rooms, one living-room, kitchen and a bathroom with shower, plus separate WC. The apartment has been refurbished during spring 2003, and it holds the perfect equipment: TV, Hi-Fi, dishwasher, washing machine, dryer, central heating, with radiators in all the rooms, towel-heater, refrigerator, vitro-ceramic, micro-waves oven, coffee-machine, toaster, orange squeezer, hair-dryer, 1 queen size bed in the main room (160x200) + big drawers, 1 sofa-bed queen size in the second room, and a sofa-bed size large in the living-room (140x190). Central heating and hot water through gas heater. No AC (not normally necessary as Paris normally does not get too warm in summer). Lovely apartment in a turn of the 19th-20th century building. It's located in a popular neighbourho

access: Todo el apartamento es de uso exclusivo. El edificio dispone de un local para las basuras.
house_rules: Las llaves se entregan en persona por recepcionista. Check-in a partir de 15h15. Suplemento nocturno 30 a 50€ Ese apartamento tiene para sus propietarios un valor sentimental importante. Se alquila únicamente a familias, ejecutivos, parejas que lo utilicen para su descanso, siendo prohibidos cualquier fiesta o comportamiento inadecuado. Además, consideren que en ese edificio, vive gente. Hay niños pequeños y personas mayores. Por ello no se admite ruido, ni en la escalera, ni en el apartamento.  Por favor, SI NO ESTAN DISPUESTOS A RESPETAR ESTAS CONDICIONES, NO ALQUILEN EL PISO. En caso de no respetar esas reglas, se tomarán las medidas pertinentes.
host_about: Más de 15 años alquilando apartamentos para cortas estancias. Y con mucho éxito. Contacta conmigo

space: Located at the foot of Sacre Coeur in Montmartre known, this apartment of 70 square meters, offers a clear view in decoration and design vintage style New York, fully equipped. The apartment "Charming loft in Montmartre" is composed of 2 bedrooms, one with double bed for 2 persons and a single bed with one person ... a lot of charm and comfort, a lounge with TV connected cable and TNT, audio and video equipment, a dining room with a table for 8 people, a fully equipped kitchen (utensils, crockery, oven, large fridge, dishwasher ...) the bathroom has a shower, bath, toilet and washing machine and dryer. You will find near many bars, restaurants, cafes, bistros, theaters and centers theaters, art museums, monuments tourist market of the chapel, the red windmill, windmill and the Church of sacred Heart. Metro station (lines M2 and M4) is within walking distance.

space: " In a typical Parisian Passage, on the ground floor of a 5 story building this renovated, charming studio apartment 22 m2 (215 sf) welcomes you with its little common courtyard, its classy decoration and the comfort of all its equipment: bathroom with window, spa shower, towel heater and washing machine. A beautiful red leather sofa-bed opens up and closes quickly and with no efforts, with sheets, covers and pillows on. There is a "secretaire" desk for your computer, a large guard-robe/closet , mini foyer with a red chinese console. The kitchen, although small, is fully equipped: dishwasher, elctric oven and induction stoves, microwave oven, fridge/freezer, mixer, blender, coffee makers, toaster. interaction: We are at your disposal for help and information you should need as we live not far from the apartment.
house_rules: Dear guest,  1) my  studio is a non smoking one but  you can smoke in the little  courtyard  of the building just in the back of the apartment. there are  chairs and a little table with an  ashtray.  2) Thank you for being as descreet  as possible by not leaveng buts on the ground and emptying ashtray after use.  3) you are in a small building with very nice and friendly  people; do not hesitate to be friendly with them when you see them 4) kindly  remove your hair from the shower water evacuation hose and throw them in the basket near the sink (not  in the  WC) 5) Thank you in advance for lowering or putting  off lights, stoves,  water heatings when not necessary en when you go out.
host_about:
I am an Italian woman, living in Paris since 1984. I am retired from my last job as sales director for a branch of the Paris European HQ of an American Company.
I travelled a lot in my professional and private life. I commute often between France and Italy, mainly  to Milan and Biella, where other members  of my family are living. In summer, we stay on the East coast of Calabria, where we also have a beautiful family apartment to rent. I enjoy art, go to the Opera and theater,  listen to music. I love travelling and meeting people.

host_about:
Après des études de gestion hôtelière en Suisse et une expérience professionnelle à l'étranger et à Paris je gère depuis plusieurs années  des appartements dans les beaux quartiers touristiques de Paris.
Grande voyageuse et utilisatrice de belles locations à travers le monde, je suis consciente de l'attente et exigence attendue de mes futurs hôtes et tente de leur donner le meilleurs service.
Je serai très heureuse de vous faire partager les bons tuyaux et endroits typiquement parisiens et de vous donner l'envie d'aimer cette magnifique ville.

space: Welcome to the 5th floor of a traditional Parisian 19th century building !  The apartment has an antique woodenfloor, two marble fire places with giant mirrors and typically decorated ceilings. You will experience the traditionnal French way of life but with all modern amenities !  When spring comes, you will also enjoy having breakfast for two on the balcony over looking the parisians roofs ! No elevator but great balcony !!! It's worth the extra effort :)  The bedroom is sundrenched straight in the morning and you get access directly to the balcony from the large windows. It has a study area with a little desk and a wireless Internet access. In the bedroom you will find : - a dressing to put your clothes  - a queen size bed  - a typical Parisian marble fire place  - a set of speakers to plug your iPod Enter the bathroom and you will instantly feel on holidays. It has a large italian style shower with turquoise blue mosaic tiles and a beautiful teck wooden floor. The bathroom has also

transit: Gare du Nord and then walking down on rue La Fayette until the metro stop Poissonnière (it takes around 7minutes) or you take a taxi from gare du nord (3 minutes) or you take the metro (ligne 4 and then ligne 7) or I can come to pick you up at Gare du Nord.
interaction: I usually exchange emails and airbnb messages before hand but we can also have a chat on the phone or on facetime. Also a very useful tool is (Hidden by Airbnb) as I use it most of the time with my guests to communicate once they are in Paris !
house_rules: No smoking inside No pet allowed 2 people only Non fumeur à l'intérieur Pas d'animaux autorisés dans l'appartement 2 personnes uniquement
host_about:
Web Entrepreneur as a job and Photographer as a hobby, I love traveling and meeting new people. I lived in Sydney for a few years and miss its beautiful beaches :) I also lived in London and Barcelona and enjoyed their cultural vibes. 
When I'm in France, (which is the case most of the time unfortunately) I also love hanging around my city, Paris, and discover new places, trying new bars or restaurants and enjoy good food !

I'll be delighted to welcome you to my apartment and give you all the best addresses Paris has to offer !
See you soon !

space: Appartement de 46m2, il est composé d'une chambre à coucher, d'un salon et d'une cuisine. 15 mn du centre ville en transports publics et 5 mn du cimetière Père-Lachaise.  Il se trouve entre le métro Avron et Alexandre Dumas (2mn à pied) ligne 2. Non loin de Ménilmontant ou vous pouvez vous rendre aux différents spectacles de la Bellevilloise et la Maroquinerie... Concernant l'appartement et ses équipements :  Les équipements de la cuisine : gazinière, machines à laver la vaisselle et le linge, frigidaire, cafetière + ustensible de cuisine. Salon : canapés clic-clac, TV+internet wifi, et un coin salle à manger. Chambre : un lit pour 2 personne, une armoire.  Salle de bain avec baignoire à angle. Les draps et les serviettes de bain sont fournis. Chauffage central.  Appartement bien situé pour les déplacements de visites touristiques... à Paris et Disneyland...   A vous de voir!

Salon : canapés clic-clac, TV+internet wifi, et un coin salle à manger. Chambre : un lit pour 2 personne, une armoire.  Salle de bain avec baignoire à angle. Les draps et les serviettes de bain sont fournis. Chauffage central.  Appartement bien situé pour les déplacements de visites touristiques... à Paris et Disneyland...   A vous de voir!

space: We've renovated a sweet and spacious Paris apartment in a great area by the canal. There's kitsch wallpaper, surround sound Blu-ray, free wi-fi and a lot more so that your stay will be as comfortable as possible! The apartment sleeps up to four people, making it a great choice if you're travelling as a family or with relatives. A baby bed is also available All the details, rates, availability and secure online booking are on our website: (URL HIDDEN) We are two individuals (not a faceless agency) who love Paris and are happy to share our passion with others! We have just two apartments to rent in the city, and we've put our heart and soul into both of them! Hopefully, our care and attention to detail can be felt, and we hope to be able to welcome you to our Canal Apartment in Paris sometime soon! In the living room: - flatscreen Panasonic TV - Panasonic surround sound Blu-ray/DVD/CD system - iPod dock - cable TV with English-language channels - free broadband wi-fi access (bring your o
description: We've put a lot of love into making our apartment feel like home, and our neighbourhood is a great base for chilling out, enjoying great bars and restaurants or travelling around town (the direct train to the airport is two metro stops away). We have just two apartments to rent in the city, and we've put our heart and soul into both of them! Hopefully, our care and attention to detail can be felt, and we hope to be able to w
house_rules: No smoking (not even at the window please). Guests are asked to respect the peace and tranquility of the building. Don't use the washing machine before 8am or after 8pm! (One guest did a machine at 6am one Sunday morning and the neighbours weren't pleased at all).
host_about:
Hi, I'm Jason!

I'm English, but have lived in Paris for twenty years now, and still love the city.

I'm a bit of a geek - love my Mac, my surround sound Blu-ray system, etc. but also like photography, swim a bit and have a ridiculously large collection of CD and vinyl (some of which you'll find in the apartment!). Much of it hasn't aged very well :-(

I work from home and love it - the time goes so quickly!

And after having worked in hotels many years ago, I was almost surprised to enjoy looking after our guests - I thought it might become repetitive and boring, but every person is different, and we're lucky enough to have so really adorable people come to stay, so it's a joy to rent the apartment! If I didn't love it, I wouldn't do it.

I also especially like sharing my love of Paris with people. Having lived here so long, there are loads of great places we go that you might not pick up on from a guide book, and our area is full of funky bars and restaurants. We're happy to share our insider knowledge. Just ask :-)

space: Big and beautiful 6 rooms apartment (180 s.m.) in XIX century style, romantic, with wooden floor, fireplaces, wall decorations, nice, double living room with grand piano and 4 rooms, in a very well situated Paris district.  2 of 4 rooms are our offices and each of two other rooms has a double bed: one real, king size bed and a very comfortable double sofa bed. The apartment is entire yours of course during your stay. There is one bathroom with a king size bath and separate toilets. The kitchen is very well furnished.  We are in the 8th district of Paris. There are many cinemas, theatres, bars, restaurants, a billard club… in our district, but also the artists area Montmartre is near by!   About 10 bus and 2 subway lignes are a very good way to visit everywhere. We are also only 20 minutes from each railway station. There is also a possibility to rent a room with double bed: 99€ / night. Our place is a journey to the very romantic XIX Century age! Enjoy!
description: Beautiful 6 rooms apartment with wooden floors, mouldings, fireplaces and a big living-dining room with a Steinway grand piano. Very well situated in a uplifting and very practical to visit district of Paris. Just a few steps from the metro station! access: The whole apartment
interaction: Nous pouvons vous recomander de bons restaurants et des endroits intéressants à visiter.
house_rules: C'est un appartement de charme, très bien entretenu, non-fumeur. Il est important de faire attention au piano (ne rien poser dessus) et au parquet qui est un parquet d'origine, de respecter la tranquillité des autres habitants de l'immeuble et la propreté des lieux. Pas de talons aiguilles sur le parquet s.v.p. Nous n'acceptons pas de soirées.
host_about:
Compositeur de métier (musique de film, musique de concert)  j'adore la musique, mais aussi le cinéma, les voyages, la littérature, l'écriture, la photographie, la danse, l'art et les animaux!

Nous aimons vivre comme les habitants des pays que nous visitons et non pas comme des touristes. Sensible au bruit, je n'arrive pas à me reposer dans les hôtels.

space: Ideally located in the heart of the Marais, this is an apartment of 50 m2, flooded with sunlight and calm, without vis-à-vis, surrounded by a balcony with a beautiful view over the rooftops of the Marais. It is situated at the 4th floor of a building without elevator but with wide stairs. The apartment is very clean and airy, very comfortable and you will not miss anything. Sheets, blankets and towels are provided.  The apartment sleeps 4 adults (+ baby bed possible from 0 to 3 years) Around the apartment, there are great restaurants with lively terraces, beautiful flower-filled parks.  You are 3 minutes from the Place des Vosges, 5 minutes from the Seine, the Ile St Louis and Notre Dame Cathedral, 5 minutes from the Modern Art Centre Beaubourg Pompidou.  Many museums (Picasso, Carnavalet, Cognac Jay, Victor Hugo, Hunting ...) are nearby.  You are in a unique, highly sought after, and one of the most pleasant and central Paris.  You live among the finest 17th century mansions of the Ma

space: Nice studio in an charming historical house from XVI century, opening onto a sunny courtyard in the historic district of Saint Germain des Prés near the museum Louvre, the cathedral Notre Dame, Montparnasse and large stores of Galeries Lafayette. Close to the Seine, you reach the Ile de la Cité and can also ride a riverboat. You can also visit the Jardin du Luxembourg - the "Luco" (for short) - which is one of the most beautiful parks in Paris, famous for the cool shade of tall trees in the summer. All the pleasures of the famous Latin Quarter, with its famous museums, restaurants, bars, theaters, cinemas and bookshops. For the fashion addicts, you will find a Vintage shop very close to the flat, and all famous French brands in the area!  Fully equipped apartment including WiFi, with a separate kitchen and a bathroom with shower. Curtains are self made. Lively shopping area. Very accessible by subway: station Saint Germain des Prés, Mabillon. Bus, RER A, RER B. Do not hesitate to ask m
description: Enjoy your stay in the historical heard of Paris, very close to the Ile de la Cité, Notre Dame de Paris, river Seine, all the bars, shops and museums ! For the fashion addicts, you will find a Vintage shop very close to the flat, and all famous French brands in the area!  Fully equipped apartment including WiFi, with a separate kitchen and a bathroom with shower. Curtai
transit: Le quartier est central: stations de métro Mabillon (ligne 10) et Saint Germain des Prés (ligne 4), proximité de la station centrale du Châtelet (accès au RER pour sortir de Paris).
access: Connexion WiFi, épicerie de base fournie dans la cuisine, shampoing, savon, liste des bonnes adresses du quartier, appartement sur cour et ensoleillé, dans un quartier plein de vie.
interaction: J'habite un étage en-dessous de l'appartement loué, donc je suis disponible le soir et le week-end en cas de besoin. Je suis prête à accompagner mes hôtes jusqu'aux magasins du quartier (boulangerie, supermarché de quartier) pour leur faciliter la vie.
house_rules: Dépôt de garantie 100 euros. Ménage et location du linge de lit et de toilette sans supplément de prix. Accès WiFi disponible en haut débit (ADSL).  Appartement non fumeur de préférence. Thé, café, épicerie de base fournis dans la cuisine. Informations sur le quartier et adresses utiles (restaurants, musées, autres) fournies. Prière de trier les déchets et de descendre les poubelles au local poubelle (rez-de-chaussée de l'immeuble): papier, plastique recyclable dans la poubelle à couvercle jaune, déchets ménagers dans la poubelle à couvercle vert, bouteilles et bocaux en verre à déposer dans le bac dans la rue Princesse.
host_about: J'ai longtemps vécu à Moscou (Russie), je suis auteure d'une biographie romancée "Parlez-moi d'amour - une Française dans la terreur stalinienne". J'ai trois enfants.

space: Typically Parisian with it's wooden floors and plaster mould ceilings, our40 m2 apartment consists of one bedroom, a living room, a fully equiped kitchen and a bath room with a bath tub. It is situated on the 3rd floor of a Parisian building, without an elevator. The bedroom opens on a calm courtyard with a 1m60 wide comfortable double bed. The living room is a very pleasant space with a large bookshelf, comfortable sofa, and a window full of green plants, the perfect spot to chill out after a long walk in Paris. Despite it's small size the bathroom has a small bathtub and shower. The kitchen is fully equipped with an oven, gas burners, microwave oven, a large refrigerator and freezer, washing machine. The flat can cater for 2 people in the bedroom, a japanese futon bed can be made available in the living room for two extra people. If you have a young child or a baby, we can also supply a children's bed (with side protection bars) and a high chair. Please let us know if you have any sp
description: Extremely pleasant typically Parisian 2 roomed flat situated in a central and charming area near the St Martin Canal. transit: Very close by foot to Gare du Nord and Gare de l'Est (10 minute walk). From both Parisian airports the RER B takes you to Gare du Nord. The closest metro station is Louis Blanc which is a 2minute walk from the flat. Many buses are available nearby.
access: The whole apartment is available, except one room that will be locked in order to hold the belongings that we will have vacanted in order to provide you with storage room.
interaction: We will not be around to let you in or show you around. However a trustworthy friend will be on hand to help you settle in.
house_rules: We wish you to feel at home in our apartment, please make sure you treat our space in the same way as you would treat your own. We have very pleasant neighbours, please treat them with respect and make sure you play your music at a reasonable level. Unfortunately one of us is allergic, so we cannot accept any pets of any sort, and smoking is not allowed. La cigarette non plus.

space: Calm and light studio apartment in Rue Mouffetard with exposed timber beams in charming historic building from 17th century. State of the art appliances, high speed internet connection, wireless, TV, telephone with free calls to all French mobiles and fixed lines and all landlines internationally. Fully self contained with extensive kitchen equipment. Charming 26m2 studio apartment in Rue Descartes, in the heart of the famous Rue Mouffetard Quarter. A calm and light haven on the 4th floor with views to France's most prestigious school Lycee Henri IV and the Pantheon on one side and the Parisian roofs of the peaceful courtyard on the other side, this studio exudes the charm of historical Paris with its exposed timber beams and fireplace.  Newly renovated in January 2011, the "Studio Descartes" apartment features state of the art amenities including wall mounted flat screen TV with Ipod/Iphone dock and cable Panasonic TV including international channels, high speed internet and wireless,
description: Charming & cozy Studio with historic timber beams & open fire in the heart of the Latin Quarter, Rue Mouffetard area is a sanctuary due to its quite position amongst the lively restaurant scene downstairs. host_about: Tea is a German/Finnish entrepreneur and business executive based both in Brisbane/Australia and Paris. Tea runs an international language service company and is a keen traveller herself having lived in Spain (Granada) before her move to Down Under in 1997. Paris and her studio apartment is home  and her sanctuary due to its calm position. Tea speaks German, Finnish, English, Spanish and French and adores practicing her hobby language Italian. Tea will often welcome you herself if she is in Paris, otherwise Photographer Breff will welcome you and take care of your stay.

Grande voyageuse, grande marcheuse, grande rêveuse... J'aime le cinéma, le théâtre, la littérature et la photographie.

J'aime savoir les gens chez eux, chez moi.

space: THE APARTMENT You will stay in a quiet and zen 26 m2 appartement on the 4th floor of a little building in the famous Rive Gauche of Paris (14th district of Paris). It is great for one person and it can accommodate two persons.  It's a safe neighbourhood and a very quiet street. You will be alone in the apartment during your stay. There is 1 main room, 1 kitchen, 1 bathroom (with a shower) and separated toilets from the bathroom but of course it's inside my apartment. There is no vis-a-vis (window facing the "petite ceinture", the old train belt around Paris, it means it's quiet : you can see trees and the yard of the building). You can live with the window open to hear the birds sing, it's really unasual in Paris ! The decoration of the apartment is modern and zen (grey walls, bamboo parqueted, a futon sofa/bed). You can have a free WIFI access if you bring your computer, netbook, Ipad or smartphone. I've changed recently for optical fiber and it is really faster than a classical ADSL/
description: Welcome into my apartment in the left bank of Paris. Located in a nice area of Paris, it will be a quiet and zen place to be for your stay in this beautiful city. I live there for 10 years and will be happy to give you the keys of the city :-) THE APARTMENT You will stay in a quiet and zen 26 m2 appartement on the 4th floor of a little building in the famous Rive Gauche of Paris (14th district of Paris). It is great for one person and it can accommodate two persons.  It's a safe neighbourhood and a very quiet street. You will be alone in the apartment during your stay. There is 1 main room, 1 kitchen, 1 bathroom (with a shower) and separated toilets from the bathroom but of course it's inside my apartment. You can live with the window open to hear the birds sing, it's really unasual in Paris ! The decoration of the apartment
transit: PUBLIC TRANSPORTS You can take the bus 58 to go to Chatelet in the Didot street (2 minutes walking). The nearest metro station are Alesia (on line 4, direct to Gare du Nord and practical to go to Montmartre) or Plaisance (on line 13, direct to Champs Elysées). Both are around 8 minutes walking. The tramway station is Didot (5 minutes walking to come to the apartment) : very easy to go Porte d'Ivry (the Parisian Chinatown) or Porte de Versailles (the place of all professional exhibitions). The RER station is Denfert Rochereau on line B (direct to the 2 airports : Charles de Gaulle or Orly and direct to Gare du Nord). You can take the  from Denfert to Metro Alesia (line 4) (10 minutes walking to come to the apartment). It's easy to come from Beauvais airport too : shuffle from Beauvais aiport to porte Maillot then metro (line 1 and line 13). There are also Velib stations 5/8 minutes walking. HOW TO CONTACT ME ? Please send me a message before your reservation with your hour of arrival in
access: The guests will be able to use everything in my place, just like if they're at home.
interaction: I allways make the check in by myself because it is part of the original Airbnb spirit. It is also very important for me to meet my guests and give them informations about my place and of course about Paris :-)
house_rules: This is a non smoking apartment. Be careful with the bamboo ground : no high heels please :-) No party in the apartment, this is a quiet building.
host_about:
Hello, I'm Cathy from Paris !

I'm used to make home exchange and to travel with Airbnb so I've decided to become an Airbnb host few months ago.
I like to meet new people and to help us to discover the city not like tourists but like real future parisian lovers :-)

Hablo espanol tambien si usted prefiere.

Et français évidemment ;-)

space: Dans le centre de Paris. 2 minutes de Beaubourg. Métro direct de l'aéroport. Dans une rue piétonne dans un bâtiment du 19ème siècle avec une cour Un grand salon avec télévision, téléphone et internet avec un canapé-lit pour 2 dans le salon de la rue, un bar cuisine entièrement équipée avec micro-ondes machine à laver. Salle de bains séparée avec baignoire et WC, et une chambre séparée avec un grand lit double sur la cour. Un lit bébé est également à votre disposition. Beaubourg musée comme un voisin: Vous êtes juste dans le centre de Paris dans une rue piétonne, avec ses bars et restaurants tout autour. Expérience celui où vous mangez dans le noir. . Deux minutes que vous pouvez faire vos courses et l'épicerie ... Pour plus d'attrait culturel de Beaubourg musée est pas plus de deux minutes, mais la distance à 10 minutes de marche du musée du Louvre est ... Vous marchez un peu plus et vous avez atteint la rive gauche avec Notre Dame et Saint-Michel.

space: 40 square meters cozy chic apartment in a XVIIIth building in the Paris' quiet 16th arrondissement. Sunny apartment with a nice view on the Seine with a balcony. 1 room ( king size bed for 2), 1 living room, kitchen and bathroom, with internet access and wifi.  Close to Trocadero and Eiffel Tower area, nearby subway, RER, and bus station as well as butcher, boulangerie, and food market... The market is taken place close to my appartment every saturday and sunday.

My flat is 20mn close to Eiffel Tower,  10mns walk from Bois de Boulogne,  and close to Fondation Louis Vuitton, perfect place for art lover. 40 square meters cozy chic apartment in a XVIIIth building in the Paris' quiet 16th arrondissement. Close to Trocadero and Eiffel Tower area, nearby subway, RER, and bus station as well as butcher, boulangerie, and food market... transit: Métro Exelmans (line 9) is 5 minutes by walk of the appartment. Garigliano station of RER C  is also 5 minutes by walk of the appartment.
house_rules: Smoking is allowed inside the apartment but only in the living room space and of course on the balcony .  No fire allowed in the fireplace. Be kind and nice with the building concierge, her name is Christina, and the building residents.
host_about:
A people person, Parisian now for 10 years, i am working in PR and media communication in Paris.
I lived in Dublin and Montreal before.
I am very curious, about people, about culture, about world economics and politics...
I love music, and motorbikes. I own my Suzie, a nice custom Suzuki Van Van.
I am interested in design, photography, cinema, litterature, gastronomy and history. 
Best places in the world for me? Tel Aviv, Rio de Janeiro, New York, London, Berlin, Barcelona. My next travel spots on my TO GO list? 
Would love to go to Argentina, Portugal, and Toscany...

You can also use my piano if you feel like playing (there is a silent mode with headset when it's too late for our neighbours).  Looking for neat and responsible guests who will treat our home with the utmost of care and respect.
host_about:
Fabien and I are in our very late thirties :) 
We are world travelers, urban, non smokers, open minded, very active. Interested by arts, culture, gastronomy, fine wines. We are friendly, clean and responsible.

More about Bertrand : 
I am a seasoned marketing & digital expert, owner  and co-founder of WHERE IS MY MAT. 
39 years old. Yoga addict, easy going, friendly & convivial, love meeting new people.
Been traveling / backpacking in +75 countries : US, Canada, South Africa, Brazil, Argentina, Chili, Bolivia, Almost all EU, Saint Marteen, Israel, Jordan, Syria, New Caledonia, The Philippines, India, Indonesia, Thailand, Morocco, Tunisia, Hong Kong, Australia, Armenia, Georgia, etc.

transit: Transport public: entre Strasbourg Saint Denis, Réaumur Sébastopol et Arts et métiers, sur les lignes 3, 4, 8, 9 et 11.  Direct vers les gares St Lazare (ligne 3), gares de l'est, du Nord et Montparnasse (ligne 4).   A 2 stations des Halles et des connexions au RER A & B. Accès à l'aéroport CDG par la Gare du Nord (ligne 4), et Orly par le RER B ou C aux Halles.  Station Vélib a 20 metres.
access: Le propriétaire de l'appartement ne donne pas accès à la bibliothèque de l'appartement. Celle-ci sera fermée aux voyageurs qui s'engagent à ne pas l'ouvrir ou l'utiliser.
interaction: Un accueil et présentation du logement sera organisée à l'arrivée.
house_rules: Si vous souhaitez utiliser le canapé lit, cela rentre dans le tarif "personne supplémentaire". Il faut donc mentionner 5 personnes dans le logement.  Une des pièces de mon appartement n'est pas mise à disposition, et je demande aux voyageurs de s'engager à ne pas y entrer. Par ailleurs, je demande aux voyageurs de faire attention à ne pas faire de bruit dans les parties communes après 22 heures.
host_about: Mother of three, I live in Paris, France. I speak French, English and a little bit of Spanish. I traveled a lot and I lived 15 years as an expatriate in Asia and Spain. As such I developed a very high sense of adaptability to others cultures, and I love to help as much as I can tourists coming to Paris.

space: Our flat is the best deal for your trip in Paris!  It's  well located, in a nice and peacefull area, tipical of the paris life style, with nice shops, market (on sunday) and bars just tow minutes away walking. Near the Gare le Lyon train station, and the place de la Nation. It's also at the junction of the underground  lines 2 and 9: you will be close to the most famous areas and momnuments of Paris and at only 15 minutes of one of the best spot to go out, the Oberkampf area. After a day in Paris you will be back in our charming, quiet, clean and comfortable flat, to relax or get ready to go out for a crazy  night in the most beautiful and romantic city in the world!

space: Quiet flat to rent ! Perfectly located in the Oberkampf/Parmentier district, 5 minutes walk to the metro connection line 5-3-11.  By subway : only 5 minutes from Bastille, 15 minutes from Notre Dame, 20 minutes from Montmartre  With a floor area of 42m2, the flat offers 1 double bed + 2 additional beds in the living room on comfortable couch. Encloses full quality furniture as equiped kitchen, internet access, washing machine, television etc. The 11th Arrondissement of Paris is home to two quite different but equally blossoming centers of Parisian nightlife. The streets just northwest of Place de Bastille are full of little bars which attract a mix of young suburban Parisians, ex-pats, and foreigners. Many have a Latin-American theme. space: In the heart of Le Marais, next door to Picasso Museum, this exceptional duplex penthouse is located in an historical  mansion house, from the XVII th century,  whose ceiling adorned with a painted fresco and its monumental staircase are classified as historical monument.  The building, partly  turned into a private and modern residence with private courtyard, gardens, ponds and fountains, intercom and 24/7 concierge. Totally quiet place, in  the heart of Paris.  An elevator will take you to the apartment. Found on the top and fifth floor of the building, this 64SQM artist atelier, with natural light, has just been totally renewed. The apartment is sunny as it features several large windows and even three small terraces with a southwestern view. It has   the character and the authenticity of the heart of Paris. Conceived like a charming and comfortable Junior Suite, this duplex apartment  includes two levels connected by an internal staircase.  At the lower level :  - A large living ro
description: Exceptional duplex Penthouse, totally renovated next door to Picasso Museum, ideally located in Le Marais between Place des Vosges and Rue de Bretagne, in a very safe and -generally- noiseless residence (day concierge and night watchman ).  There is an elevator, (after few stairs), terraces, great view, and very High speed wifi internet access for free. interaction: - I personally welcome my guests in the apartment. I show them a couple of things about the apartment, answering their questions and give them the keys. - We communicate regularly by e-mailing. For some of my guests whose it is their first time in Paris,  I make sure that they have every information they may need : the best adresses in the Marais, restaurants, cab etc.
house_rules: - Please remember that you are staying in a private apartment in a residential building. Do not make noise, music, from 23:00. - Smoking : Allowed on the terraces only, not in the apartment. -  Please respect the peace and quiet of others residents. -  No party
host_about: ...Hello! I am Michaèle and I 'll be happy to welcome you in this beautiful place, in the most charming district of Paris, the lovely Marais. If you enjoy being in the heart of the city, but sleeping in a noiseless and safe place, this is the place.  If you have a novel to write, a painter to be discovered, a restaurant to be tested, this is the right location. Afterward, if you just feel like drinking a glass of Bordeaux on the quiet terrace and have a look at the beautiful parisian sky, this is the place to be, since..."Paris is always a good idea".

space: Newly renovated, spacious flat in a beautiful typical Parisian  late 19th century building consisting of: 1 large living/dining room, balcony, 1 bedroom, bathroom (shower, WC), kitchen. The apartment has 57 square meters. Fully furnished and equipped:  TV, internet, washing machine, dish-washer. Sunny, south-west orientation, calm, little traffic in the street, no vis-à-vis. Located not far from Montparnasse area, close to Institut Pasteur, restaurants, cafés, shops in vicinity, a typical Parisian veg. market twice a week right across. Metro line 12 Pasteur or Volontaires, bus 95 and 88.  Would be convenient for one person or a couple looking for a pleasant and peaceful place during their stay (1 to 6 months ideally, but length negotiable. Ideal for expatriates).  Rent varies between 1500 and 1800 according to length of stay. Occupancy 3, exceptionally 1-2 months.

The metro line 12, Pasteur et Volontaire, just 10 minutes aaway, operates regularly. The bus line 95  in the next street leads directly to the center, line 88 leads directly to Denfert Rocherau within 15 minutes.

space: Come and spend relaxing Parisian moments in a beautiful and comfortable 3 bedroom duplex apartment in an original house located in magical settings (former convent in a cobble-stoned street creating a village style atmosphere in the trendy area of the 20th arrondissement, nearby the Père Lachaise cemetery). Ideal for 1 or 2 families (as the children's room can fit up to 4 kids or teenagers), this very quiet and large apartment (2 levels of 70 square meters each) also has a in-door terrace opening onto a secured balcony (with a table & chairs making it possible to enjoy the fresh air) overlooking the garden & paved courtyard shared with the other families living opposite. There are many outdoor games (such as football, golf, badminton...) and facilities (picnic mat, sun chair...) made available to guests. When you enter the apartment, you will discover a very large double living/dining room area and a design bar separating the semi-open fully-equipped modern kitchen (dish washer, micro-

Come and spend relaxing Parisian moments in a beautiful and comfortable 3 bedroom duplex apartment in an original house located in magical settings (former convent in a cobble-stoned street creating a village style atmosphere in the trendy area of the 20th arrondissement, nearby the Père Lachaise cemetery). When you enter the apartment, you will discover a very large double living/dining r
transit: There are 3 metro stations located at 7 minutes walk: Gambetta or Porte de Bagnolet on line 3, Maraîchers on line 9 and Alexandre Dumas on line 2. The closest public transport (2/3 minutes walk) are buses (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and the T3b tram. All this information is easily available on the RATP website. If you come by car, the closest public parking open 24 hours a day 7 days a week, very safe and cheap, is located in the parallel street named Rue du Clos (details available on-line). There are also 3 very close-by Velib' bike stations as well as two Autolib' stations (on Rue des Pyrénées & Rue de Bagnolet).
access: The rental concerns the whole of the house, entirely privatised.
interaction: I remain available via phone, (Hidden by Airbnb) , text or email, whatssap, iMessage, FaceTime... at any time before or during your stay for any questions you may have.
house_rules: A comprehensive and detailed booklet about the households hints and appliances is provided to guests upon arrival, along with a map of Paris and other useful documents. When it is wet outside, we usually take our shoes off just in front on the covered entrance at the top of the outside staircase... It is unfortunately not possible to organise festive events  with numerous guests nor parties with loud music and dancing, but friendly gatherings are of course possible.
host_about:
Welcoming, friendly and open-minded person, thanks to an international globe-trotting lifestyle! 
I'm very sociable and love to provide my guests with any helpful information. I look forward to welcoming you in my cosy home and making your stay as enjoyable as possible...

space: 5 minutes walk from the subway and two buses in a quiet street and a quiet and safe district.  You will be a 15 minutes walk from Montmartre 15 minutes from department stores and the Champs Elysees in Paris.  You will appreciate the comfort of the apartment and quiet of the room which is on the back.  A second bedroom with a sofa bed for two persons is available for guests.  You can do your shopping to make a meal at home in the nearby shops on the avenue of St. Ouen. Enjoy your trip in Paris

space: Appartment in Paris, 18th arrondissement. Furnished and fully equipped. Second Floor. Wooden floor, white walls. Living room with sofa (convertible into a comfortable double bed), table, desk, TV screen with DVD player, Wifi, library, electric heater. Bedroom with double bed (good quality futon) and cupboard, back room with washing machine, hangers. Bathroom with shower (hot water, good pressure), toilets, mirror, heater. Kitchen with microwave, oven, fridge, hotplates and a dishwasher.  Very confortable, quiet, luminosity, colorful decoration. in a quiet deadend street with parking spots. Very nice and welcoming neighborhood with lots of cafés, bars, restaurants, boutiques, grocerystores, fresh markets... Metro stations, bus stops and taxi lines nearby. 10 minutes walking distance from Parisian landmark Montmartre and Saint Ouen famous flee market. Reasonnable price !

Si vous venez de l'aéroport Orly, prenez l'Orlyval puis le RER B jusqu'à Gare du Nord puis le métro ligne 4.  Bus : (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
access: Vous avez accès à tout le logement. Beaucoup de mes affaires sont dans le placard penderie du fond de la chambre, mais vous pouvez y accéder pour la machine à laver le linge.
house_rules: Retirez vos chaussures dans l'appartement.  Take off your shoes in the flat.  Merci de bien entretenir l'appartement pendant votre séjour et de me prévenir tout de suite si quelque chose est cassé. Thank you for taking good care of the apartment and please leave it clean.  If something gets broken, please let me know as soon as possible. NE PAS LAVER LE SOL.  DO NOT WASH THE FLOOR.

host_about: Bonjour, Je  travaille  dans  le domaine du Marketing- relationnel  sur l international donc  l  enrichissement d apprendre et l ouverture d autres cultures   s ouvre a moi tous les jours .C est  un plaisir quotidien  donc je ne pourrais plus  m en passer.A l appartement j ai  l'habitude d'accueillir de nombreuses personnes venant de  France et de l'étranger  et le problème de langage  ne se pose pas quand t on aime communiquer. Je connais très bien Paris.. J'ai plein de bonnes idées pour vos sorties,et des conseils pour découvrir la  plus belle ville Paris.. A très bientôt!.

space: Very typical Montmartre apartment, with 3 bedrooms, sleeps up to 6 people, 2 bathrooms with bath, shower and toilet, (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) sq.ft), fully equipped kitchen, Internet (high-speed).  Children friendly. Not smoking. It's a charming, full of light and very calm 3 floors flat for a family who wants to live in the typical Parisian artist area. It's located in Montmartre, in a quiet street, within three minutes walk to the Abbesses and Pigalle hip areas and public transportation.  On the 3th floor you will find an open working space, two bedrooms and a bathroom with toilet, bath, shower and washing machine. On the 4th floor there is the living room with a fireplace and a dining room, kitchen and another bathroom also with toilet, bath and shower. On the 5th floor there is a bedroom under the roof with a beautiful view on the Eiffel-tour and the Montmartre area.  The flat has been recently completely renovated. Also available: telephone, stereo / hifi, central heating,

space: Pretty, sunny, one-bedroom apartment, 54m2,  just below Montmartre, in an authentic part of central Paris, with balcony, view of rooftops, wooden floors, fireplace, and an elevator. There is a typical small kitchen, a living room with an extendable dining table, separate WC and bathroom and a study. Bedroom with double bed. Its a stone's throw from the the rue des Martyrs shopping street and a short walk to the Friday street market at Avenue Trudaine, and on to Montmartre, Abbesses, the Moulin Rouge, etc. The department stores Galeries Lafayette and Printemps, and the Paris Opera, are all in walking distance, too.  I'm looking to rent it for a minimum of one month at a time or for 5 days at a time during August.   Though the listing says Pigalle, that is a bit misleading since the Pigalle area is 2 metro stops away, with the St Georges and the Martyrs areas in between.  There are 3 metro lines and numerous buses close by - the 85 stops at the bottom of the street and takes you across t
description: Sunny 1 bedroom, balcony apartment that comfortably fits two, with an airy, authentically Parisian feel. Available for minimum stays of 3 days, it's near the colourful Martyrs shopping street and a short walk to Montmartre, yet free of its crowds. You'll have easy access around town, with a choice of 3 metros & a bus to the Louvre and Luxembourg gardens. In summer, enjoy an aperitif on the balcony in the afternoon sun. Pretty, sunny, one-bedroom apartment, 54m2,  just below Montmartre, in an authentic part of central Paris, with balcony, view of rooftops, wooden floors, fireplace, and an elevator. There is a typical small kitchen, a living room with an extendable dining table, separate WC and bathroom and a study. Bedroom with double bed. Its a stone's throw from the the rue des Martyrs shopping street and a short walk to the Friday street market at Avenue Trudaine, and on to Montmartre, Abbesses, the Moulin Rouge, etc. The department stores Galeries Lafayette and Printemps, and the Pa
transit: Close to my place there are 3 metro stations and tons of buses so it's very convenient for getting around. You have a choice of metro line 12, line 7 and line 2. My place is also 3 bus stops from Gare du Nord (take bus 26, 42, 43), or a 15 minute walk, while the 85 bus stops in the next street and takes you directly to the Louvre, Saint Michel and the Luxembourg gardens.
interaction: It's easiest to stay in touch by email if I'm travelling, but you will have my mobile number too.
house_rules: If daytime arrival is a problem, in some circurmstances I may be able to organise to leave you a key, but its best if you can arrive before 7pm if possible. No smoking inside (sorry!) though it's ok on the balcony. Please secure the bedroom shutters -- either open or closed -- when you leave. Please take just the sheets and the top pillowcases off the bed at the end of your stay, and throw away any food you haven't used from the fridge. Please open the window in the WC to air the bathroom after taking a shower. Please be gentle with the double doors that open onto the balcony in the living room - one side is a bit stiff but opens ok if you are patient with it! If it proves tricky to close, just lift slightly at the same time. Thanks! There is a key for taking the garbage downstairs if you want to empty the bin. Fyi a cleaner comes once a week. Have a nice stay!
host_about:
I've been living in France for 12 years now and this is a great arrondissement -  I hope you love it as much as i do. I am stlll discovering new things in it as new businesses arrive - like the shop that only sells products related to honey. Its practical and peaceful, with the energy of the city and its indefinable Frenchness right at your fingertips.  

The concert venues in the old music halls that dot the boulevard between Anvers and the Moulin Rouge, for instance, are just a stone's throw away, and if you are a guitar fan i think i counted 14 guitar stores along the rue Victor Masse/rue de Douai.

I'm a writer and journalist and have lived in a few other countries where hospitality is an art form, so I hope you find everything you need to make you feel that this is your home away from home.

house_rules: Normal check-in time is between 14:00 PM - 21:00 PM.  If you want to check-in outside of these hours, please contact us. host_about:
Voyages dans de nombreux pays :  Asie, Amérique, Afrique,ainsi que la plupart des pays d'Europe
Amour de la nature, des randonnées.
Très sensible à l'écologie  ( très grande utilisation de produits biologiques, du commerce équitable.........), 
Dans mes voyages le contact avec la population locale étant très important,  j'aimerais offrir aux personnes qui choisissent de séjourner chez moi un accueil chaleureux et l'envie de revenir en France.
(La curiosité, le respect,  l'ouverture aux autres sont des qualités essentielles pour voyager mais aussi  et surtout pour recevoir).
Passionnée de littérature étrangère,surtout américaine.

space: Very bright and lovely flat on the 5th floor of a "haussmannien" building, with an elevator. It's a typical parisian flat with a chimney, parquet...  There's a living room with the chimney, a sofa and a corner where you can eat (with a table).  In the bedroom, there's 2 beds .  The kitchen is equipped (toaster, cupboards, etc.)  Toilets are separated. The flat is 5 minutes away from the subway (métro la Chapelle line 2 and Max Dormoy 12) and 2 minutes away by walk from the gare du Nord, in a working-class residential neighborhood.  It's 2 stations away from the Sacré Coeur and 1 station away for the “canal saint martin”, the very relaxing canal and its fashion but relaxing cafés. You will find a lot of nice places to hang out (restaurants, bars, pub, movie theater, concert hall, theatre) and to shop around, the market of le marché de l'Olive where you wan buy french cheese, wine, bread.... If you have any questions, feel free to ask me!

space: Great loft located in the 1st arrondissement, métro station Etienne Marcel / Les Halles This wonderful home is ideal for families visiting over a week-end or a longer vacations in the French Capital. We live in the very heart of Paris, the location is perfect to discover Paris by foot as it is near Le Louvre, Châtelet, Beaubourg, Ile de la Cité (Notre Dame) and le Marais, one of the oldest district of Paris, with a lot of nice boutiques, restaurants, bars and cafes. We are in a very animated and central disctrict but yet our flat is very quiet. Hopefully you will love this flat as much as we do, with its exposed beams, a beautiful view over Paris rooftops (you can see Notre Dame, Tour Saint Jacques and Le Panthéon). one important detail: it's 6th floor and there is no elevator, but the climb is actually not that difficult :) Fully furnished, the kitchen has a microwave, an oven. As for the bathroom, it includes a bathtub. The bedroom is similar to a mezzanine with a double bed in it.
description: Beautiful loft in an old Parisian building with stunning view over Paris rooftops. Located in the 1st arrondissement, you'll be in walking distance of most tourist attractions and we will do all we can to make you feel like home ! We wish you a very pleasant stay and hope you'll fell at home in our place !!
host_about: Welcome to Paris! I hope that our wonderful and really well located home will help you enjoy the French Capitale whether you visit with your family or on business. Please do not hesitate to contact me should you have any questions prior to your arrival.

space: Charming parisien appartement in a typical ART DÉCO building. Fully equiped, calm and full of light. Traditional parquet high ceiling and nice view. Elevator and a CONCIERGE / GARDIEN living in the building. Perfect location at the area of JOURDAIN. A bohemian neigberhood with nice little cafés, shops and restaurants, weekly markets with fresh produce and local goods. 2 minutes walk from the métro station JOURDAIN on ligne 11 that will get you to the center of Paris (Châtelet station) in 10 minutes.  Two magnificent parcs, five minutes walk from the appartement: parc des BUTTES CHAUMONT and PARC DE BELLEVILLE from which you get one of the most beautiful vieus of all Paris. Can be good for children. The appartement has been reacently all renewd. You can enjoy to separet badrooms and a brand new bathroom and kitchen.
description: Charming parisien appartement in a typical ART DÉCO building. Fully equiped, calm and full of light. Traditional parquet high ceiling and nice view. Elevator and a CONCIERGE / GARDIEN living in the building. Perfect location at the area of JOURDAIN. A bohemian neigberhood with nice little cafés, shops and restaurants, weekly markets with fresh produce and local goods. 2 minutes walk from the métro station JOURDAIN on ligne 11 that will get you to the center of Paris (Châtelet station) in 10 minutes.  Two magnificent parcs, five minutes walk from the appartement: parc des BUTTES CHAUMONT and PARC DE BELLEVILLE from which you get one of the most beautiful vieus of all Paris. Can be good for children. The appartement has been reacently all renewd. You can enjoy to separet badrooms and a brand new bathroom and kitchen.
transit: Our apartment is tow minutes walk from metro station JOURDAIN, on ligne 11. It will get you to Châtelet, the very heart of Paris in just 10min. Trains are running every 2 or 3min. If you take a look at the Paris metro map, you will see that ligne 11 has many connections to other useful lignes that will take you easily to any place in the city. For example ligne 2 straight to the Champs Elysées, ligne four to the west bank... You can also use a convenient bus, number 26. There is a stop named JOURDAIN just one minute walk from our place at "rue des Pyrénées". Now, don't forget Paris is not such a big city... In my opinion the best way to discover it is by walking. For example, it will take you just 30min walk from our place to the famous art museum Centre George Pompidou. Paris can actually be crossed by foot in one hour from north to south, and in tow hours walk from east to west. Finally the is a bike renting station just down the street.
access: You can use and enjoy the whole apartment.
interaction: We do live in our apartment and take care of it daily to make it nice and cosy for us.  So we hope it will be also for you, a real home. If you are looking for an anonymous professional Airbnb apartment, this is not the wright place... For us, the spirit of leting our home is to get in touch with people and share with them this beautiful place we are so lucky to have. We made many nice meeting with interesting people all around the world. When we travel, we are mostly hosted by Airbnb getting to discover that way to the real local ways of living in our destinations.
house_rules: First of all, please leav the appartement as clean as you have found it. Keep the wooden floor in the bathroom dray at all times. Keep the wood around the kitchen sink dray at all times. Do not cut food or any other thing on the wood in the kitchen, please use a planche to do so! At winter, if you open the window, please dont forgent to close the hiting. Plesse clean up the filter in the bath every time you use it. Ower lovely cat's name is Réglisse. He will apreciate your caring. Please feed him morning and evening. Keep your luggege close in a close roome.  If you stay for more than 3 nights, please kleen up his toilets. You can contact ower lovely concièrge: Martha Hurtado for any mater concerning the appartement.  See you soon, Elinoar.
host_about:
Contemporary dance artist. Teaching dance and Feldenkrais methode.
Love musique (jazz, classical, world, contemporary) and art of all forms.
Like beauty in people, places, things and... cities.
Loves to travel and descover other cultures.
Speaking Hebrew, French and English.
Hope to learn some more langueges in the future...

space: One of the best spots in Paris, next to Canal Saint Martin & Place de la Republique.  This is a lively, SHARED-ROOM basis, duplex LOFT (OPEN SPACE) with access to the rooftop.  There used to be a few guests on the house at the same time. Now I am taking it easier, but it may happen that there are other guests on the house during your stay. Depending on the period, my loft is great to meet people from all over the world. Probably not the right fit if you're a grown up or you're looking for a hotel room, sorry! : P Please also abstain from reserving if you snore. All the guests deserve a good night sleep, and the apartment is an open space loft after all. The whole apartment can host a total of 5 people (myself included). But I usually only take 1 or 2 guests at a time. As there is a bed, a futon and a sofa, I have different listings where you can reserve each spot. Here a heaven for the laid back, easy going folks only : ) I myself work in Art Direction for a company during the week, an

house_rules: - IF YOU SNORE, PLEASE DO NOT BOOK THIS APARTMENT. AS IT IS ALL SHARED ROOMS, THE OTHER GUESTS DESERVE A GOOD NIGHT SLEEP AS MUCH AS YOU DO : ) - PLEASE WASH THE DISHES AND COOKING TOOLS AFTER YOU EAT & CLEAN THE KITCHEN SURFACES YOU USE. - SAME APPLIES TO OTHER AREAS OF THE HOUSE. DISCLAIMER: THERE IS A 5 EURO PENALIZATION IF YOU DON'T CLEAN AFTER YOURSELF WHEN USING THE KITCHEN, SINKS, SHOWER OR TOILET. I CLEAN THE HOUSE REGULARLY, BUT I'M NOT HERE TO CLEAN AFTER YOU. NEITHER ARE MY OTHER GUESTS. - REMEMBER IN FRANCE AIRBNB IS NOT SEEN WITH GOOD EYES, SO IF YOU TALK TO ANY NEIGHBOURS IT'S BETTER TO ALWAYS SAY YOU ARE A FRIEND OF MINE INSTEAD OF A GUEST FROM AIRBNB. - SMOKING IS ONLY ALOWED OUTSIDE OF THE APARTMENT. - BRING YOUR OWN TOWELS PLEASE. - NO PARTIES ALOWED. space: The flat is all open like a loft and has a living and dining space, open kitchen, half open bathroom, and one bedroom (with a bed 160x200). The kitchen is perfectly equipped, there is air condition and heating (electronical reversible clim), wifi and flat TV in bedroom and living room. Important to mention: the place is quiet! The flat is located in the heart of Paris, 2nd district or arrondissement, between the main sightseeings (20 minutes walking maximum away from Centre Georges Pompidou, Notre Dame, Louvre, Marais).  We are also close to Montorgueil (5 minutes walking), which is the current trendiest place to be, with its pedestrian area (markets and french bakeries), trendy shops and bars like Costes Etienne Marcel that has its famous and trendy gay parties every second sunday. Near the flat, you can catch a metro easily. Around us, we have 4 subway lines (3,4,8,9). host_about:
Deux garçons. L'un travaille dans l'administration pour le premier ministre et est responsable d'un service chargé de réaliser des études sur la délinquance. L'autre travaille dans les relations publiques (tourisme, design, etc.).

Nous vivons à Paris, dans cet appartement, depuis 9 ans et nous sommes ensemble depuis 13 ans maintenant !! 

Depuis un an, nous avons un chien adorable, un Flat Coated Retriever, qui s'appelle Nyssa et qui aime gambader et nager.

Nous voyageons beaucoup tous les deux (50 pays déjà faits !) ou avec des amis et nous aimons sortir le week-end en Europe ou dans la campagne française.

- - -

Two guys. One work in administration for the Prime minister. The other work in PR (tourisme, design, etc.).

We live in Paris, in this appartment, since 9 years and we are together since 13 years now !! Since one year we have an adorable dog, a Flat Coated Retrriver, call Nyssa.

We travel a lot alone (50 states done !) or with friends and we like go out the week-end in Europe or in the french countryside.

space: Nice flat of 58m2 very well situated in Paris, near to the Daumesnil Place, with all commodities (metros 6, 14 and 8, bus 87, 29, 64..etc, supermarkets, etc.). Nice and one of the biggest markets in Paris twice a week on the bulevard. The flat is very luminous. Near to : Bercy, Cour Saint-Emilion (opened on Sundays), pelouses de Reuilly, Lac Daumesnil (Vincennes, following the "coulée verte") to have rest or sport time. The flat (2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 1 big kitchen, 1 lounge, 1 toilet) is totally equiped : TV, fridge, microwave, oven, washing and dry machine, dishwasher, Internet, telephone... We now have an elevator ! The WC are in a separated room. If you will need some specific stuff, please let us know. We let you some informations on the district and on Paris and we will be near to you to help you if you need ! Let us know is you need more informations!
description: We are offering a sublet of a nice flat very well situated in Paris, near to the Daumesnil Place, with all commodities (metros 6, 14 and 8, bus 87, 29, supermarkets, restaurants..etc).  Nice flat of 58m2 very well situated in Paris, near to the Daumesnil Place, with all commodities (metros 6, 14 and 8, bus 87, 29, 64..etc, supermarkets, etc.). Nice and one of the biggest markets in Paris twice a week on the bulevard. The flat is very luminous. Near to : Bercy, Cour Saint-Emilion (opened on Sundays), pelouses de Reuilly, Lac Daumesnil (Vincennes, following the "coulée verte") to have rest or sport time. The flat (2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 1 big kitchen, 1 lounge, 1 toilet) is totally equiped : TV, fridge, microwave, oven, washing and dry machine, dishwasher, Internet, telephone... We now have an elevator ! The WC are in a separated room. If you will need some specific stuff, please let us know. We let you some informations on the district and on Paris and we will be near to you to help yo
transit: Metros : Daumesnil (6 and 8), Dugommier (6), Bercy (14) Buses : line (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  Taxis near Place Daumesnil and Dugommier There are various "Velib's stations too 4 Velib stations (public bicycles)
access: Internet, telephone, washing, cooking
interaction: I greet the guests, show the flat, remind the rules and give the information they need about the district and the city. I'm easily reachable !
house_rules: Calm during the night, and in the friendly The flat is a non smoking one (but there is a place at the lobby  of the building where you can smoke). International calls are possible with some conditions depending of country called.
host_about:
I'm a PhD OWNER at the Unviersity Paris 3 - Sorbonne Nouvelle. I'm 31 years old and I Like travelling, discovering other cultures and people. We had a little boy last year, that is why we could not honnor the demands of hosting we had. Now we are ready to walcome you!
Contact me to get more information if you need some !

The Owners live in the building and can help if necessary.

space: Superb 2-rooms apartment, 50 m² (538 sqft), in the heart of the young and “Bobo” 10th Paris’ district, typically Parisian place, situated close to all commodities and close-by the famous and beautiful Canal Saint Martin, where Parisians gather to enjoy picnics or drinks, the Republique’s place, with its famous statue and shops, and the Bastille’s place, known for its Opera, hip bars, restaurants and nightclubs. ***About the apartment*** It’s very quiet because surrounded by nice building’s courtyards with respectful neighbors (so rare in Paris !!). The building owns an elevator, an entry phone and a caretaker. Within the flat, you are going to live in a sunny and lovely place, simply decorated by travels’ souvenirs. - A living room and a bedroom (you can comfortably sleep until 4 persons = 1 bed and 1 sofa bed) - A fully equipped kitchen (fridge and deep-freeze, oven, micro wave, dishwasher, washing machine, Nespresso machine, 4 gaz hotplates and 2 sinks) - In the living room, there ar

transit: The apartment has many different transports around with 7 metro and 8 bus lines of less than 10 min walking for the farthest. An important Vélib' station (public bicycles) is in the same street. There are only 5 cars parks in the street and a private car park. You can reach the flat by public transport from airports, but it's about 1:00 for Roissy Charles de Gaulle and 1:30 for Orly. You can as well easily find a taxi.
access: Guests have access to the whole apartment with all commodities (separated toilets and bathroom, cooking ustensils, wash powder for dishwasher and washing machine, generous breakfast...).
interaction: We stay at your disposal before, during and after your stay, by phone, texts, e-mails. We don't share the flat with you but we do our best to answer you or come to see you as fast as possible if necessary.
house_rules: - It's totally forbidden and impossible to use the apartment chimneys. - Don't jump on beds. - Lot of furnitures are in old wood, so please to put cold or hot stuffs (glass, mug, plates, wet umbrellas...). Trays and table mats are at your disposal.
host_about:
Hello ! 

As host we are mum and daughter having a real pleasure to welcome you in our house ! 

We love traveling a lot and sharing with others.

We offer you to live in my apartment very well located in Paris => close to the beautiful Canal Saint Martin. It will be a pleasure to help you to enjoy Paris the most !

Looking forward to meetting you soon !

space: Our flat is located on the fifth & sixth floors of a six-floor century old building. There's no lift, only stairs, but that's easy exercise (a flat-sitter will welcome you and help out with the luggage). It's a duplex of 70m2 (750 sq ft) with three bedrooms, one bathroom (with bath tub and shower), one toilet, a kitchen, dining space and living room.  The flat sleeps 6 adults. -The Kids room has bunk beds (90x190cm each).  -The Parents room has a 160x200cm bed.  -The Guest room/Play room has twin beds (80x190cm each, foam mattresses). We'll provide clean sheets and towels for all guests.  We also have a fireplace for winter nights and a balcony for summer wine-sipping evenings enjoying the sunset! Families are welcome! We'll have all the equipment ready upon request, and the toys too...
description: Bonjour! We are a family of 4 & proud Airbnb SuperHosts. Welcome to our nest! It's available here when we go out of town. It's spacious and functional. Our neighborhood is the richest and most colorful in Paris: from the Sacre Cœur to the flea markets in minutes. Come in, take a look! Our flat is located on the fifth & sixth floors of a six-floor century old building. There's no lift, only stairs, but that's easy exercise (a flat-sitter will welcome you and help out with the luggage). It's a duplex of 70m2 (750 sq ft) with three bedrooms, one bathroom (with bath tub and shower), one toilet, a kitchen, dining space and living room.  The flat sleeps 6 adults. -The Kids room has bunk beds (90x190cm each).  -The Parents room has a 160x200cm bed.  -The Guest room/Play room has twin beds (80x190cm each, foam mattresses). We'll provide clean sheets and towels for all guests.  We also have a fireplace for winter nights and a balcony for summer wine-sipping evenings enjoying the sunset! Familie
transit: Just a few locks away there are 3 metro stops (12-jules joffrin / 4-pte de clignancourt / 13-guy moquet) and 7 bus lines that can take you anywhere in Paris, including Gare du Nord, Gare de l'Est, Saint-Lazare and Montparnasse, the Eiffel Tower, Champs Elysées, Musée du Louvre, and many more...!  We're also easy to find by cab from both airports since we're close to the 'periphérique'.
access: Guests will have access to the whole flat, all kitchen equipment (dishes, coffee machine, kettle, dishwasher, microwave...), washing machine, high speed wifi... We do not have a TV but if need be we can provide guest with credentials to watch French TV on your computer. You will also have access to an iron, plug adaptors, a scale, and a hair dryer. We usually try and leave enough for a first breakfast : tea, coffee, chocolate, jam and cereals.
interaction: We are French, and my wife and I speak English (she's a translator) and understand Spanish and Italian. We are happy to answer all questions before booking and provide all the instructions and tips to 'navigate' from any airport/station to our place. Check-ins and check-outs are made easy for you, we have nice neighbors who are always willing to help out! You can reach us easily at all times by phone, text or email.
house_rules: We have moved around too and know how a travel schedule is not always easy to stick to. So we try and make arrangements that fit your plans but then we expect guests to be reachable at all times, especially around check-in time. Obviously we expect guests to respect the neighbors and the appartment (no pets nor smoking).
host_about: We're a family of 4 proud Parisians ! I'm from Nice and my wife is from Paris. Our son Cassius was born here in 2013 and his baby sister in September 2015. We love to meet new people and Airbnb is the perfect medium !

space: 35m²  (378sqf) Authentic & cosy apartment (entire) with great sun light exposure for up to 4 guests located in the Montmartre area, a typical Parisian location known worldwide. The flat is on the 6th floor with no elevator. It is very welled served by Public Transportations, offering a wide range of choices to travel all over Paris within just 1 Metro journey: - at 1' walk: Metro line 2-Barbes Rochechouart (it goes direct to: Champs Elysées, Pigalle, Nation, Belleville) - at 1' walk: Metro line 4-Barbes Rochechouart (it brings you directly to: Marais, Pompidou Center, Notredame de Paris, Hotel de Ville, Quartier Latin, Luxembourg Gardens, Pantheon, Le Halles, Chatelet) - at 10' walk: Metro line 5-Gare du Nord (direct to Bastille and Place d'Italie) - at 6' walk: RER B Train-Gare du Nord (this line connects directly, with no changes, the 2 main airports: Charles de Gaulle and Orly airport, Luxenbourg Gardens) - at 6' walk: RER C Train-Gare du Nord (direct to Gare de Lyon train station,
