space: Charming 2-story private house in heart of Paris. French doors of living room open onto your own garden courtyard. Ideal for outdoor brunch, afternoon splashing, and long summer evenings.  The house is very comfortable and family-friendly. We have many movies, books, maps, toys and games. We provide free wireless internet and laundry facilities. The house sleeps up to 7, has 3-4 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms. Smoking is not allowed inside the property. Just off colorful pedestrian market street (Daguerre), bustling with restaurants, shops and stands. Within a 5 minute walk is the Mairie (town hall), a swimming pool, a library, cinemas and parks. 20 minute walk to Luxembourg Garden and Parc Montsouris, 10 minute walk to theaters and cinemas of Montparnasse.  At Denfert-Rochereau metro/RER stop: RER B goes directly to CDG and Orly airports, metro lines 4 and 6 provide easy access to most parts of Paris (Disneyland, the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame, the Seine, the Louvre, the Arc de Triomphe, Lu

space: Je loue mon studio de 20 mètres carrés situé près de la Place d'Italie dans le treizième arrondissement. Lit 2 places très confortable. Nombreux supermarchés et commerce également a proximité ainsi qu'un centre commercial sur la Place d'Italie. Immeuble très tranquille et rue peu bruyante. space: I am a professionnal photographer, I work mainly in studio and I share my time between Paris and New York; My loft is both my living and working space. When I am out of Paris, I list my place on AirBnB. My place is a spacious  loft of 1300 sqft, with a private courtyard, located on the ground floor of a 19th century industrial building,  in the 11th arrondissement, in a very quiet residential condominium. Minimalist, it has a large living space with an opened kitchen, a master bedroom with its private bathroom, a sleeping area on a mezzanine with it’s own shower room below the mezzanine;  my loft can accommodate 3 to 4 people in total (2 people in the bedroom, 1-2 persons on the mezzanine) ; It is fully equipped  : dishwasher, washing machine, TV, Wi-Fi, Also provided: sheets, duvets, pillows, towels, soap, shampoo, etc. The building is equipped with security code. The phone calls from the landline, to France (landline and mobile), to Europe (landline), and to the U.S. & Canada (landli

transit: The area is well served by public transportation, (subway, bus etc ...) The loft is two minutes away from the subway station Faidherbe-Chaligny (line 8), where you also can find a Velib station.
house_rules: - The loft is part of a quiet condominium,  "Parties" are not allowed. - Smoking is tolerated in the private courtyard ONLY. - If you are planning a stay with your pet, please contact me with details.

Durant les périodes où je ne suis pas à Paris, je mets mon loft à disposition sur AirBnB. ; je parle anglais, français et italien.

space: The space organization (two bedrooms and two bathrooms), the functionality and its location in the hearth of Paris are some of the many reasons for loving it.
description: Located in one of the oldest parisian streets (it already existed in the 14th century), this apartment is part of a 18th century building which has been recently renovated with particular attention to the charme that the original stones and wooden beams have nowadays. The space organization (two bedrooms and two bathrooms), the functionality and its location in the hearth of Paris are some of the many reasons for loving it. The whole apartment My friends and I will be at your disposal during your stay. The ancient Paris, few narrow streets that risked to be destroyed during the last century by the urbanist governmental plans. Few steps from Notre Dame, close to Pantheon, not far from the Marais, Louvre museum, Luxembourg gardens, this area is in the middle of everything but in the meantime has its own character, with good restaurants, a nice market and the university world of the fifth arrondissement very close.
access: The whole apartment
interaction: My friends and I will be at your disposal during your stay.
house_rules: Electricity is invoiced separately according to real consumption. A deposit will be required at the check-in for the utilities. Bed linen and towels are provided. Late arrivals (after 8 pm) will be invoiced 50 euros to be paid cash at the check-in.
host_about:
Hello! Myself, together with my friend Stefano, we manage apartments in Paris on behalf of some other friends who are not living in this wonderful city.
We look forward to have you as a guest in one of our apartments and we'll do all our best to make you feel comfortable like at home!

space: The apartment, 28 sq.m., includes a room with a sofa-bed (2persons), bar, chair, shelves, kitchenette fully equipped with cooking plates, fridge, micro waves, coffee maker, toaster, dishes. The bedroom comes with a two spaces bed. A bathroom with bathtub, toilets. INTERNET ADSL , television, DVD, hi-fi, vacuum-cleaner, hairdryer. The neighborhood is lively and very charming, touristy as well as authentic, bohemian and bourgeois, from small quiet streets with hidden typical Parisian cafés and restaurants to famous places like Amelie’s café “Les Deux Moulins” (in the street of the flat), Moulin Rouge, Sacre Coeur (the white church) with panoramic view, Place du Tertre ( the artists place), the Dali museum, Pigalle’s night-life… You’ll find traditional artisan shops next to fashion boutiques, young creators, art galleries.. Every weekend a big area (including rue Cauchois), becomes pedestrian, rue Lepic is transformed into a lovely market with fresh quality products, outdoor cafés, street

host_about:
Bonjour,
je rentre tout juste d'un voyage en Australie et c'est là bas que j'ai entendu parler de Airbnb, d'où ma décision de m'y inscrire a mon retour.
Je trouve le concept très sympa et beneficiant d'un charmant appartement en plein coeur de Montmartre, j'ai voulu en faire profiter. Je suis un jeune prof des écoles en banlieue parisienne qui aime ce qu'il fait, sort à beaucoup de concerts (il y a plein de salles de concert à deux pas de l'appart') et se passionne pour la vie et l'histoire de son quartier.

space: We love our big, beautiful Parisian apartment and we have a little extra space that we'd like to share with travelers looking for an authentic experience of the city. We have been living in the city for over ten years and you can ask us anything about Paris! In our home we have two separate bedroom areas, each with their own shower or bath. The whole apartment is strictly non-smoking. YOUR ROOM The guest bedroom has a shower and fold-out sofabed made for two. We provide sheets and towels for your stay.   We use this third bedroom as an office, so if we are there, we may need to use the room while you're off visiting the sights!  On our side of the apartment we have two bedrooms and a bathroom.  We do go away frequently, so sometimes the whole apartment is available. Check with us to see if that is a possibility.  THE COMMON AREA THAT WE SHARE Living area with kitchen :  Between these two bedroom areas is a spacious living room with a fully-equipped, open kitchen. Here you'll find every

space: A sweet 25m2 studio in the heart of the Montmartre district, with a great view (8th floor) and a cosy terrace you'll appreciate in summer.  The neighbourhood is filled with pastry and bakery shops (I'll tell you the best), cafés, restaurants. The neighborhood is full of life and the apartment comes with 2 electric plates, a microwave, a private bathroom and bathtub inside the apartment, a flat screen TV (with USB support) and Unlimited Wi-fi. Neighbourhoods : _Walking : For vintage lovers - 10 mn walk to the very known flea market of Paris "Puces de Clignancourt) (the biggest of Europe, open friday to monday) - 10 mn walk from Sacré Coeur Montmartre (see the picts of the flat).

(Website hidden by Airbnb)  _Bus 31 : 30 mn to L'Arc de Triomphe/Champs Elysées... _Velib : Downstairs! Bikes to rent, provided by la Ville de Paris.
house_rules: I'll just ask you to respect the place i live in, so what to say ? Don't break, don't rob, don't soil. If unfortunately you break something, I will ask you to replace it if it is possible or to give me the money back.  The place to throw the garbage is located on the left of the exit of the building. I'll ask you to put it in.
host_about:
I'm a 32 years old parisian woman. I speak french (of course), spanish and my english is good enough. 
My friends say about me I'm funny and friendly... I hope so ! :)

But what is sure is that I like to travel and meet new people, that's why, It would be my pleasure to help you to discover my great neighbourhood and Paris, good restaurants or places to chill out, advices about wine (i'm very fond of about red wine, I come from Bordeaux...).

Welcome to Paris !

space: This 56m2 2 room apartment is located in the best location of the 16th arrondissement of Paris, one of the most prestigious neighborhoods. The quiet and safe neighborhood and it is ideal for a family of 4 or a professional on the move. The building is secure and the guardian speaks 4 languages if needed. Many shops, restaurants and bars. You can walk to the Place du Trocadero or leave the city for nature with the Bois de Boulogne 3 minutes walk. The living room is very spacious and bright, with a fully equipped American kitchen for those who wish to cook. I provide free corn flakes, bread, coffee, spices, jams, oil, milk and alcohols too! The sofa is convertible into a bed for two people, in addition to the large bed which is in a large room. I provide the blankets, sheets and towels. space: Recently renovated and furnished 1-bedroom is yours for a short-period stay! The apartment consists of a fully-equipped open kitchen (oven, fridge, 4-stove burner), a living room (flat screen tv, couch, coffee table, hidden bar), compact bathroom, and cozy bedroom (bed, storage space). There's also a washing machine for your clothes! Located on the first floor (2nd floor American), this apartment can fit 4 comfortably, with a 140x200cm queen-sized bed and a fold-out red couch for 2! The neighborhood is hip and cultural, with Pere Lachaise just at the foot of the street, and cool bars like Fleche d'or and Mama Shelter just a couple a minutes away.  Every Sunday, there are two markets filled with locals just a minute away at the Rue de la Reunion roundabout and Alexandre Dumas.  Conveniently located 2 stations from Nation, everything is a short metro trip away: Bastille in 20 min Chatelet in 20-25 min Champs Elysees in 35 min Eiffel Tower in 40 min This light-filled 1-bedroom can be your

space: This awesome and completely furnished studio near Champs Elysées is at the 3rd floor of a secured building with concierge and digicode  It's 30m² (322 square feet), very luminous and  functionnal, this is the perfect place to have vacation in Paris, 200 meters from Champs Elysées and "The triangle d'or" you'll be around the best places in Paris! This sudio has a king sized bed, a desk, a living room with an american kitchen, a nice bathroom and toilets, a blacony, actually it's like an hotel room! I'm happy to make you enjoy Paris in the most popular area when I'm not occupying the apartment. Equipment: -A flat screen cable television and a high speed connection are at your disposal. -The american kitchen is fully equipped with a fridge,a microwave ,heating plates; a toaster,a dishwasher - All dishes you need are also at your disposal. -The Bathroom with a bath, a shower, WC, a washing machine and a towel heating -A balcony will let you enjoy the sun drinking a tee or a coffee ;) -TV

transit: There are multiple way of coming from both airport Orly and Roissy, but according to me, the best public transportation way is Les cars Airfrance :  (Website hidden by Airbnb)  It is economic and leads you very near the apartment at Etoile (Arc de Triumph). The link below shows you the way from the bus stop to the apartment  If you prefer to take a cab, I would suggest Uber or the official taxi that are waiting for customers at the exit of the airport. Metros near the apartment :  Georges V Saint Philippe du Roule Metro map : (Website hidden by Airbnb)
house_rules: Hi everyone,The studio is very clean and very functionnal, I just expect you to be respectfull of it and of the neighboors.You'll be abble to cook, make cofee and wash your dishes and your clothes, again cleaness is expected.You'll be like at home so behave in consequence, you'll have a perfect stay!One last thing, I'll ask for ID for nonverificated profile.Hope to have you as my guest in the studio.Thanks Pierre
host_about:
Hi everyonne,

I am Pierre,  I'm 27 years old and I live in Paris for 9 years now. I've been travelling a lot, to work, the studies or pleasure - I love to discover new culture and habits.

I've been traveling to almost all Europe and I've been living in Spain and USA for a while.

I know how hard is to get into a new city or a new culture. That's why I am very pleased to share my tips and good places I know here in Paris.

I love Music and especially live music, there is always a gig in Paris that you can enjoy. When i've got time I love going to cinema, theater and watch sports - I never stop moving into new places (restaurants, clubs & art galery).  

See you soon!

space: The apartment is the home of a trilingual (English/French/Danish) family with three children. We love our place, and we are willing to share our knowledge of our great neighbourhood.  If we are travelling ourselves, a local English and French speaking person is living nearby and will be welcoming you and offer assistance, if needed, during your stay. The apartment is fully equipped for 7 persons and is ideal for a family. It is split in two levels and occupies the ground floor and first floor. The ground floor consists of a spacious open living/dining/kitchen area, one double bedroom and one bathroom with toilet. The first floor contains two double bedrooms, one single bedroom and one bathroom with separated toilet.  The apartment is heated by gas central heating. GROUND FLOOR  The entry and the living/dining/kitchen area has a treated concrete floor. Living area: corner sofa, Broadband Internet Access and WiFi, stereo, piano, built-in cupboard, shelves and wardrobe. Dining area: Dinin

access: Transport: Metro Ménilmontant (line 2), Saint-Maur or Parmentier (line 3) and bus 96.
interaction: My husband and I will usually be checking you in and out, otherwise we are using the Bnbsitter service, where a local French and English speaking person will take care of this. If I am away with my family, while you are renting our home, I am always reachable on my phone or through the Airbnb message board.
house_rules: CHECK IN Please, let us know as soon as possible, when you expect to arrive, so we can set up a meeting. Usually, check in takes place some time after 2:00PM on the first rental day. During the check in, we (or a local person) will show you around in the apartment and make sure all is working well. We will sign an ingoing inventory (of fixtures) including an inventory list together to check you in formally. -------------------------------- CHECK OUT Please, let us know as soon as possible, when you expect to leave, so we can set up a meeting. Usually, check out takes place some time before noon on the last rental day. For the check out we expect to find the place in the same condition as you found it, which means thoroughly cleaned and your belongings packed away. If you prefer we can arrange for a cleaning woman to come, this costs 80 EUR. Let us know, so we can arrange this in time.  You do not need to wash linen, just take it off and put all in a pile with the towels. We will then t
host_about:
Hi, 
Originally from Denmark, I have lived in Paris since 2000. I have a French husband and three boys. Paris is a fantastic city to live in, and I love my neighborhood and French culture.

I was educated as an architect, now I work with digital design. Besides, I am renting out two studios situated on the 1st floor above our own place. We live in a long typical Parisian courtyard, where residents live side by side with small business, mostly architects, designers and artists.

I have over fifteen years of experience in renting short term, and so far it has been a great experience. I enjoy meeting people from all over the world and sharing my knowledge of the local area as well as Paris in general. 

I look forward to welcoming you in Paris.
Best regards,
Eva

space: One of the best spots in Paris, next to Canal Saint Martin & Place de la Republique.  This is a lively, SHARED-ROOM basis, duplex LOFT (OPEN SPACE) with access to the rooftop.  There used to be a few guests on the house at the same time. Now I am taking it easier, but it may happen that there are other guests on the house during your stay. Depending on the period, my loft is great to meet people from all over the world. Probably not the right fit if you're a grown up or you're looking for a hotel room, sorry! : P Please also abstain from reserving if you snore. All the guests deserve a good night sleep, and the apartment is an open space loft after all. The whole apartment can host a total of 5 people (myself included). But I usually only take 1 or 2 guests at a time. As there is a bed, a futon and a sofa, I have different listings where you can reserve each spot. house_rules: - IF YOU SNORE, PLEASE DO NOT BOOK THIS APARTMENT. AS IT IS ALL SHARED ROOMS, THE OTHER GUESTS DESERVE A GOOD NIGHT SLEEP AS MUCH AS YOU DO : ) - PLEASE WASH THE DISHES AND COOKING TOOLS AFTER YOU EAT & CLEAN THE KITCHEN SURFACES YOU USE. - SAME APPLIES TO OTHER AREAS OF THE HOUSE. PLEASE MAKE SURE TO CLEAN AFTER YOURSELF ONCE YOU HAVE FINISHED USING THE SINK, WC, SHOWER, ETC. - REMEMBER IN FRANCE AIRBNB IS NOT SEEN WITH GOOD EYES, SO IF YOU TALK TO ANY NEIGHBOURS IT'S BETTER TO ALWAYS SAY YOU ARE A FRIEND OF MINE INSTEAD OF A GUEST FROM AIRBNB. - SMOKING IS ONLY ALOWED OUTSIDE OF THE APARTMENT. - BRING YOUR OWN TOWELS PLEASE. - NO PARTIES ALOWED. UNLESS YOU WANT THE NEIGHBOURS TO CALL THE POLICE ON YOU. HAHA! SORRY, THEY ARE BITCHES : ) EXTRA RULES (IN CASE I'M TRAVELLING DURING YOUR RESERVATION): - NO VISITS OR SLEEPOVERS ALOWED. - PLEASE BE MINDFUL WITH OTHER GUESTS (NO LOUD MUSIC, KEEP YOUR BELONGINGS TIDY AND CLEAN AFTER YOURSELF, RESPECT THE SLEEPING HOURS OF OTHER GUESTS) - IN C
host_about:
Paris based Creative Director and Photographer.
Formerly into Publishing.

Love to meet travellers from all over world and give them the little secrets of the most unknown Paris : )

space: This flat of 28m2 is situated in the lie saint louis in the heart of paris. The studio is fully equipped one double bed, american kitchen, toilets, shower ( wifi, TV, washing machine, fridge...). On the third floor the flat is very calm, ideal for a week in paris. The apartment is near to all the main touristic attractions and perfectly reachable by public transportation - metro pont marie ligne 7 or ligne 1 saint paul -.
description: Fully 320 ftm furnished studio 18th century building located in the Ile saint louis.  Double-sized bed, large  windows. Open kitchen - fridge, washing machine TV, wifi, free calls, sofa bed, tub,shower. Fully renovated. This flat of 28m2 is situated in the lie saint louis in the heart of paris. The studio is fully equipped one double bed, american kitchen, toilets, shower ( wifi, TV, washing machine, fridge...). On the third floor the flat is very calm, ideal for a week in paris. The apartment is near to all the main touristic attractions and perfectly reachable by public transportation - metro pont marie ligne 7 or ligne 1 saint paul -. Le Marais - Notre Dame - Hôtel de Ville in Ile Saint-Louis, Paris. Crossing the island  from northwest to southeast, this mostly residential street is situated in one of the  most beautiful Parisian neighborhoods. Along it, there are numerous little shops, cozy  crêperies, and restaurants, often in vaulted cellars, which creates an attractive setting
transit: Most of metro and red lines are passing nearby buses train
host_about:
Hello
My name is Herve i'm from Paris. If you'd like to spend a week in Paris in my studio flat in the Ile saint louis for a week,  don't hesitate to contact me. It would be a pleasure for me to help you to discover this city.

space: Beautiful city house, loft like and roomy with skylights and high ceilings on 2 levels, 70 sq. meters, hidden away on a secret flowered courtyard. 2 real bedrooms equipped with queen size beds, 1 bathroom with a full bath and shower, separate WC, a large living room, dining room and a fully equipped cooks kitchen with garden courtyard.  Situated in a lively Parisian neighborhood in the north end of the 14th with parks, butchers, bakers and small businesses, just steps from Montparnasse this the perfect way to integrate yourself into Paris. The Metro directly across the street (No 13/Pernety) will wisk you to the Champs Elysees and the sites of Paris or you can walk and explore the many hidden gems of the "village pernety", and montparnasse. space: Sun-drenched one bedroom apartment (50 m²) ideally located in the very center of Paris (3rd district) and right across the street from the historic Conservatoire des Arts et Metiers. The Centre Pompidou, the trendy Marais neighborhood, and the Montorgueil open-air food market are a mere 3 minutes away from the apartment. The apartment is located in a very nice, charming and quiet street with amazing French restaurants such as l'Ami Louis etc.  The apartment is located on the 5th floor in a typical Parisian walk-up building and can accommodate up to 4 guests. It is a very nice typical Parisian apartment with exposed beams in the living room in which can also be found the open kitchen. The living room is equipped with a nice and very comfortable couch, a huge flat screen. The dining table will seat up to 8 guests comfortably. The kitchen is fully equipped with top-of-the-line appliances: a full-size refrigerator/freezer, oven, cook-top, microwave, and everything you will need to cook. Th

space: (For any questions, you can contact me by the link "contact host" at the end of this page) This is bright 1-room (12m²) apartment, located in Paris’ 16th district in a very quiet area next to the Trocadéro and Eiffel Tower. Perfect for 2 people, the apartment is on the 3rd floor with elevator, intercom and security guard. It features a kitchen area with a fridge, an electric range and kitchenware. It also includes a sofa bed, bedding materials (pillows, blanket), towels, as well as space for storage, WiFi internet connection and HD TV. house_rules: KITCHEN: -Please wash the dishes, let the sink and the wood plan clean. BATHROOM: -Please let the shower and the sink clean and the trash basket empty. -Please leave the door of the bathroom open after showering to avoid humidity. -Please do not put any paper in the toilet, even the toilet paper, use the trash. The apartment is available for 2 people maximum (extra kids or extra infants after 2 people are not allowed).

space: 55 square meters (600 square feet) , 6th floor with a small lift, kitchen+ dining place, shower room (very large shower) , separate toilets, one bedroom with a double bed  (140x190 cm) , large living-room with sleeping sofa. This is my main flat. It is fully equipped : washing machine with a dryer (which can be used only for resistant and small clothes),  dishwasher, oven +microwave, induction hob. There is a computer in the living room with a large screen to watch DVDs or the TV (several French and international channels are available), wifi and unlimited access to the Internet. You can give free phone calls to French landlines and to several foreign countries. The piano can be used only during the day (not at night because the neighbours want to be quiet...) Nice and central location in Paris, between  Montmartre and Opera, close to buses and several subway stations, shops everywhere in the surroundings. You will get a lot of light in this flat located on the last floor of a small an

transit: The flat is very close to Gare du Nord station (10-15 minutes by foot) where all RER B trains coming from Paris airports stop.  You need only 5 minutes walk to reach one of 3 subway lines close to home (Anvers station on line 2, Cadet station on line 7, Notre-Dame-de-Lorette station on line 12). The bus no 85 stops in front of the building and drives you directely to the Louvre Museum, the Seine River, the quartier Latin, the Luxembourg Garden. The Bus no 42 stops 3 minutes away down the street and drives you directly to Concorde, The Champs-Elysées, The Eiffel Tower. A lot of other bus stops are very close (buses no (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) stop at less than 5 minutes walk) Their are available bikes (Velib station) and cars (Autolib station) 1 minute walk from home. And public parkings lots if necessary at 5 minutes  (Parking Saint Georges rue Clauzel or Vinci Park Anvers)
access: Guests have access to all the equipments, kitchen tools, computer, hair-dryer, etc. User-guides are available for the guests once arrived and welcomed.
house_rules: L'immeuble est très calme, et je demande à mes invités de respecter le calme des voisins, en ne jouant jamais du piano entre 7h du soir et 9 h du matin, et aussi en mettant des chaussons pour marcher dans l'appartement (je laisse des chaussons de différentes tailles). Pour la même raison, je préfère ne pas recevoir de jeunes enfants et je demande aux voyageurs qui ont réservé mon appartement de ne recevoir leurs amis que durant la journée.
host_about:
I've been living in this flat in central Paris since more than 30 years ago. My 3 children were born there. They went first to school in the same street, rue Rodier, then in the neighborhood. When they became students and were still living with me, I reorganized the rather large flat to get spaces for each of us. Now I welcome guests now and then. 
I'm a scientist, travelling a lot, either abroad (I worked in Ivory Coast, in South Africa, in Morocco) or in France, going rather often to the countryside South-West of France to visit my family.

space: Spacious and Sunny 3Br in the very heart of Paris "Le MARAIS". Ideally located between La Bastille, Place des Vosges, Musée Picasso and Beaubourg (Pompidou Center). The flat is on the 3rd Floor (no elevator), its 1000 sq ft  enjoy every sun exposure, and pleasant view. One double bed (140X190 cm) in the main bedroom,  two adult single bed (90X200 cm) in each child's room, each with temporary bed (also 90 x 200cm stored underneath. Linen and towels are provided.  If you like to cook, you will enjoy the quite large kitchen (where you could have breakfast (cause sun is in the kitchen in the morning), with woven, cooker, micro-wave woven, steamer, toaster, nespresso-maker, dish-washer.   The table in the living room is extensible so you can easily be 12 on table. Wifi access. (you will find the code inside the apartment.) In winter the flat is well heaten : there is an individual heating in each room, you can adjust it as you wish. Please feel free to ask for any question. Welcome!

host_about:
Hello I'm François.

My flat is so sunny, I'm so sunny in my flat!
I'm a designer, and I was born and had always been living in Paris, Le Marais.

I live in Paris with my son, 10 and my daughter, 7, in this place we like so much.

When we leave Paris for vacations, I'm glad to propose my place for your enjoyable stay in Paris.

space: Great 2 big bedrooms appartment in Paris, 1  duble sofabed (total 4places in bed +2 in sofabed)  in lovely  and elegant area in Paris.Lightly, calm and silent. In 1 minute: backery, food shops (2 big, 1 little at the stepdoor) chocolate shop, fresh market twice a week in front, subway and buses.  In 3 minutes: Pharmacy, Printemps gallery shops, and lot's of little boutiques, public bicycles, public electric cars. In 5 minutes subway (line 1, 2, 6, 9, RER A), 2 supermarkets. In 10 minutes Bastille, St Paul (Marais) Hotel de Ville. In 40 minutes: airports, Disneyland Paris (direct line) IN 45 minutes Orly and CDG Airport Direct bus to Bastille,Odéon, St Germain de Près. Direct line to Ryanair/ Beauvais Airport shuttle Doorleady. Very good for holyday, for couple needing calm ans space, friends  or family , for studing, working and rest! Please contact me for any other information

I am respecting the planet in every way I can: I ask to  respect and pay attention to the correct use of electricity, gas (no heating in the night),hot water (just for the real needs) washing machine (complete machine) and detergent as you were in your house, don't smoke inside the flat, and you mantein this lovely place clean as you find it. space: Placed in an old typical parisian street and building, little appartment for 2, 32m2 very confortable and pleasant. The appartment has:a kitchen full equiped,a little bathroom, livingroom equiped and 1 bedroom. The appartment is very quiet, not noisy thanks to the situation and the neighbourhood. Very closed to the appartment you'll find the famous Parc montsouris, wich is one of the most beautiful parc of Paris well-known for his lake, and big green space to have pique-nique! Transportation is really close too: you have tramway 3, RER B , bus station and subway line 4 will permit you to be in the center in Paris in 15 minutes only. Please contact me in private message if you need more information.

space: My room is about 10m2, nice and cute, with a window on the small yard of the building getting a lot of light in the day. People like to stay in it, and tell it has good vibes ! The other room of the flat is bigger, about 15m2. It is more of a living-room but i think of it as an adjustable space. The bed is still nice : it is a real futon that can be converted into a sofa. This room has a window on a rather calm since small and one-way street. IMPORTANT : if this room is rented, it is clear that i don't use it anymore as the living-room of the flat on the period of the renting : it becomes the bedroom of the person who stays in it ! The flat is in a very calm building, and the area is great : everything for your convenience around (post office in the same street, and around : shops, bars, swimming-pools, Park Buttes-Chaumont 2mn from the place). You are 10-15mn from the centre of Paris, where you will find Centre Pompidou, art galleries, swimming-pools, shopping malls and stores...

Square violet where you can relax and enjoy the sun! To resume, a lovely, safe place/neighborhood with plenty of things to do in a very central location!

house_rules: Vous disposez d un studio avec un lit double, kitchenette équipée d un frigo, plaques de cuisson, four électrique et machine à café. Salle de bain avec douche, lavabo et toilettes séparées. Je vous recevrai à votre arrivée pour pouvoir vous donner les indications nécessaires concernant votre séjour et pouvoir faire connaissance. Vous disposez de la kitchenette pour cuisiner vos repas. Un trousseau de clef vous sera remis à votre arrivée. Je vous fournis les draps et serviettes si vous n avez pas amené les vôtres. Le studio à louer peut accueillir un maximum de 2 personnes. Je n autorise pas de visites d autres personnes lors de votre séjour. Le studio est en excellent état et j attends de vous que vous en preniez soin comme si vous étiez chez vous! ( poubelles à jeter, plaques de cuisson et machine à café  à bien  éteindre, vaisselle et entretien quotidien habituel).
host_about:
Bonjour,
Je travaille dans le domaine de l hôtellerie de luxe et aime beaucoup recevoir. 
Je suis très sociable et c est un plaisir pour moi de mettre à disposition mon appartement, que j adore, en plein cœur de Paris. J aime beaucoup me balader dans mon quartier, profiter des nombreux cafés et restaurants et marches et c est avec plaisir que je donnerai à mes futurs convives mes bonnes adresses!!
À bientôt !
Astrid

space: This very nice apartment, recently renovated, is located in an historical building of the ancient Marais district, in rue des Ecouffes.  The space, 25 sqm, has been organized to have different areas and to offer the best comfort to the guests. Getting in, you can recognize an entrance with an hanger for the jackets and a closet for the shoes. The kitchen is fully equipped (microwave, dishwasher, washing machine, extractor, vitro ceramic, refrigerator, coffee machine, etc.) and there is also a dining table-bar suitable for 4 guests.  The stair going up to the sleeping loft makes the separation between the kitchen and the living room and hosts a useful cupboard underneath The living room is equipped with a coffee table, a sofa which could become a very comfortable single bed, several closets and a TV (cable channels). The floor is real wood. Two windows face on an internal court with a green tree and make the environment extremely bright. The sleeping loft (low ceiling) offers a comforta

host_about:
Hello! Myself, together with my friend Stefano, we manage apartments in Paris on behalf of some other friends who are not living in this wonderful city.
We look forward to have you as a guest in one of our apartments and we'll do all our best to make you feel comfortable like at home!

space: Gorgeous 3 room apartment of 66 square feet, located in a typical Parisian neighbourhood, Village jourdain, in upper Belleville. Calm yet lively, proximity to numerous shops as well as the Buttes Chaumont Parc (right up the street), 8 minutes walk to the Jourdain subway station. It’s the ideal location for deplacement in Paris. The apartment Itself is charming,very well exposed to the sun in the south  and quite spacious, It has 2 bedrooms, and a very spacious living room with an open kitchen, bathrooms with a bathtub and shower. *** Comfortable  apartment, decorated with taste and simplicity by architects, perfect to discover Paris with your family*** Wifi, TV, DVD player, washing machine, dish washer, Oven, bathtub and shower.

space: Recently renovated 1-bedroom apartment in a very comfortable high-rise building, full of light and with an incredible view over the East of Paris.  To sleep, there is 1 comfortable bed in the bedroom (120 cm wide, for 1 large or 2 small people) and 1 also comfortable, new convertible couch in the living room (120cm wide). The apartment has good wi-fi access included, as well as all the necessary home appliances (stove, oven, washing machine and dishwasher). In the neighborhood, there's every convenience nearby : a big supermarket, a boulangerie... and plenty of restaurants and bars around the nearby Place d'Italie. And finally, to move around : just down the block is the metro station "Chevaleret" on line 6, from which you can easliy reach all of Paris.

space: In heart of the 14th arrondissement, on a avenue leading to Montparnasse, a family apartment of 100 square meters. This flat is composed of:  - A big lightful leaving room, typical XIXth century style with chimney and balcony,  - Two child rooms, with baby beds,  - One parental room with double bed,  - A fully equiped kitchen (Nespresso, oven,...)  - A bathroom,  - Separate toilets. The neighborhood is very lively and family, with many restaurants, food shops (best butcher in Paris a few hundred meters), green spaces, public transport.  This is an ideal base for visiting Paris, and particularly the left bank.  Located 5 minutes from the Rue Daguerre, with permanent market and pedestrian streets and 10 minutes from Denfert Rochereau. space: Big 1 bedroom (1200 square feet), very clean, very big living room, large bathroom, large kitchen, 2 TVs, near Champs Elysees and Avenue Matignon White & spaceful apartment, decorated with tasteful art. Perfect apartment to host but to also relax.  The bedroom is also very spaceful with an extremely comfortable bed and a tv.  The bathroom has its own shower and bathtub.  The kitchen has a washing machine for clothes and one for dishes.  The living room is equiped of huge closet space to store your belongings.  The apartment is situated in the heart of Paris. Right next to Les Champs Elysée, but also very close to Le Grand Palais & la Concorde.  The neighborhood is always lively, and also close to main Parisian social spots.

space: 30 m2 large studio light in a very nice area, 10 minutes walk from the Place de la Bastille and 10 minutes from the Republic Square, in close proximity of the "marais" and "Ile saint Louis". The flat  includes an entrance, a kitchen with electric hob, oven, fridge, freezer, toaster and washing machine laundry. A large bright room with a double bed and a sofa, bathroom with bath and dressing room.  View of the tree-lined street. Very good bakery just opposite. Wifi Internet  The studio is located on the 4th floor in a building with elevator. The metro is at the foot of the building. Metro: Saint Ambrose, line 9 Metro: Richard Lenoir, line 5 Many restaurants and shops are at 5 minutes walk. Many nearby attractions: - Le Marais  (Place des Vosges is beautiful!) - Canal Saint Martin - Place de la Bastille - Place de la République - cemetery Père Lachaise

space: Hello,Je suis comédienne et j'habite un F3 de 75m2 dans le 20 ème.Je reçois beaucoup de monde pour partager l'appartementL'appartement se situe dans une résidence des année 60 très bien entretenue... D'ailleurs la décoration de l'appartement s'est adaptée !!il fait 75m2: l'endroit est très lumineux et il y a du parquet au sol. il se compose d'un grand salon, deux chambres avec balcon et grandes baies vitrées. Une salle de bain avec baignoire, toilette indépendant.Une cuisine fonctionnelle avec un lave linge, lave vaisselle et des plaques de cuisson au gaz.   Il se situe entre les stations de métro, Jourdain, Ménilmontant et Gambetta. L'arrêt de bus Pyrénée-Ménilmontant en bas déserre le 26 et le 96.Il y a le marché le dimanche matin en bas de l'immeuble, un carrefour market en dessous. Il y a également internet. Nous sommes à côté du cimetière Père (URL HIDDEN) chambre est meublée, lit double et sans affaires personnelles.A+Charlotte

space: Hello !  We welcome you in our charming, typically parisian little 40 square meter flat. It has :  - a nice living-room with dining table, couch, big window, full of light and sunny in the afternoon & evening, giving out on a balcony, ideal for a sunny nap or an « aperitif » with stunning sunsets.  - a double bedroom with great queen-size bed (160x200), writing table, balcony, big window - a second bedroom w/ single bed / study giving soutg - a little standing kitchen all equiped (gaz, micro-wave, little oven)  - a tiny but functional bathroom (shower, sink, miror) - separate WC  - corridor.  The flat is quite small but very nice, quiet and charming, very well located. Beware, 5th floor with no elevator, which explains our fairly low price. space: Beautiful and luminous duplex in the heart of Paris : paris (11th), close to "Le Marais", Oberkampf, Bastille. This is a place with a lot of bars and restaurants, in the center of Paris, in a quiet private lane. Our apartment is delightful, a real arty but homely Parisian flat. It has 3 bedrooms (1 big size bed and 2 one place beds), internet and phone call free with freebox, piano. There are kids toys, DVDs for all the family and a lot of books for readers ! space: The flat contains all that you may need during your stay in Paris: a living-room, a bed-room, a bathroom and a fully-equiped kitchen. One of the most remarquable thing of this flat is the fact that it is really calm. It is located on one of the most crowded street of the area, but it is far from the street so you'll hear nothing at night and will be able to rest after a long day/night in Paris. Located close to the "Bastille" (5mn walking distance), you'll find all the mains metro and bus lines of paris that will allow you to reach the main touristic places directly: Eiffel Tower, Champs Elysées, Notre-Dame... The area is full of shops, bars, restaurant, and even a nice typical french market where you'll be able to find all the typical french product. I'll be glad to give you some advice regarding your stay in Paris, whatever you may want to do in the city of Love ! Note: towels and bed sheets are included
description: This flat is perfectly located, 5mn from Bastille square. It is very quiet and will fit perfectly for a couple or a group up to four persons. Many transportations very close and an area full of nice places to discover. transit: 1h from both parisian airport, I'll provide with the details if necessary.
access: The flat is at the 5th floor without any elevator. The stories aren't especially high, but it's good to know !
interaction: I'll be there to welcome you and give you the keys. I'll also be reachable during your whole stay for any question about the accomodation or more generally about Paris.
house_rules: Il n'y a pas de règle particulière à respecter dans cet appartement, seulement le respect des objets en place et de rendre l'appartement dans l'état où vous l'aurez trouvé. Un certain nombre d'objets personnels seront toujours en place lors de votre séjours mais des emplacements particuliers vous seront réservés afin d'y ranger vos affaires.
host_about:
I like travelling, discovering new culture, enjoying local food and local places!

Staying in a flat rather than in an hostel is a good way to feel more like...a local !

space: Welcome to Paris ! space: Idealy located, just near the metro Station Goncourt and 5 minutes walking from the central station Republique, the appartement is in a quiet street, downtown Paris. You could enjoye the night life of Oberkampf district or the beautiful Canal St Martin and join directely most of metro lines by walking 5 minutes.   It's a typical 1 bedroom studio in the old parisien style offering all the comfort of a renew flat. The living room is spacious and bright. It includes a dinner space and a sofa space with a flat screen TV and free wifi. The bathroom offers a shower and a washing machin for long stays. The kitchen is small but carries full range of standard facilities : frigde, caffee machine, crockery, cooktop,...) The bedroom includes a double bed and a quiet view on the building yard. Enjoye the pictures and feel at home : ) Marie
description: If you want to enjoye typical parisian life, while I'm traveling out of town, you've found the perfect place. I just renovated my place a few weeks ago, and you'll enjoye a little typical old style but brand new apartment ! Idealy located, just near the metro Station Goncourt and 5 minutes walking from the central station Republique, the appartement is in a quiet street, downtown Paris. You could enjoye the night life of Oberkampf district or the beautiful Canal St Martin and join directely most of metro lines by walking 5 minutes.   It's a typical 1 bedroom studio in the old parisien style offering all the comfort of a renew flat. The living room is spacious and bright. It includes a dinner space and a sofa space with a flat screen TV and free wifi. The bathroom offers a shower and a washing machin for long stays. The kitchen is small but carries full range of standard facilities : frigde, caffee machine, crockery, cooktop,...) The bedroom includes a double bed and a quiet view on the
transit: 1 minute walk from Métro station GONCOURT (line 11) 5 min walk from metro station REPUBLIQUE (lines : 3, 5, 8 and 9)
interaction: By e-mail and phone if you need anything, don't hesitate to contact me ! I do have (Hidden by Airbnb) if needed.
house_rules: Welcome ! Don't hesitate to water my flowers and plants if it's sunny : )
host_about:
Hi all !

I'm Marie, I work in an adversting agency in Paris and I try to use all my holiday time to escape this beautiful city in order to discover other great places. This year I've been to Istambul and Brasil and I'm loolking forward a tour in India : )

I realy like the concept of AirBnB to travel around and meet local people . I'll do my best to make you feel at home in my appartment.
I've been leaving in Paris for 4 years (I come from South of France), and I'll be happy to share my good tips in town with you !

space: Welcome in this beautiful and sunny flat (75 sq meters and 6 large windows) at the foot of Montmartre hill, 5 mn walking from Sacré Coeur Church. We have 2 bedrooms: in the parent's bedroom there is one bed for 2 people and 1 baby bed in the kid bedroom. Regarding the other sleeping commodities we have one sofa (1 person) in the living room and  2 additonnal single mattresses if needed. The kitchen is bright and big enough to have lunch in it. It is fully equiped (oven, hot plates, washing machine, dish washer, toaster, kettle, coffee machine, iron). One thing to know: the apartment is at the 4th floor and there is no elevator. But the stairs are very spacious and not so hard to climb ;-) 1 living room, with TV, DVD, internet WIFI in the whole flat.  1 bathroom with bath and toilets.  4th floor (no elevator).

space: Sleeps 4/5 (2 bedrooms) Authentic renovated artist Loft in rez de chaussée and mezzanine : 75 square meters and 35 square meters of garden terrace in a private allée with birds and trees. Children welcome. Very quiet and bright because of plate glass window and roof window. Garden, barbecue, outdoor furniture, shower. American kitchen and fireplace. Fridge, freezer, oven, microwave oven, washing machine, clothes dryer, dish machine, coffee machine, cooking ustensils, toaster, iron and board. double sofabed (real bed), Large Sony TV and dvd,dining table. Bedroom 1 with a double bed, dressing, top view on the living room (curtains) Bedroom 2 with a simple bed and extra bed top view on the garden. Busy shopping district, near famous flea market "Les Puces de Vanves". Location information : the location is very pleasant to

host_about:
Hello, I am Aurore, 38 years old. I work as a fashion designer for my own brand "Lilei".
So I really like clothes, fabrics and colors, retro fashion and decoration.
The nature make me feel good but I need the city' s energy.
I have a daughter, Siam, 9 years old, very happy and funny girl.
I enjoy a lot the place I live, a little green paradise in Paris

space: Lovely place to enjoy your visit in Paris !This is a charming studio of 25 square meters located in central & safe neighborhood Nation area. The studio has  kitchen & bathroom. You will find few cosy bars & restaurants between Nation and Bastille area (15 min walk). There are few supermarkets near the apartment. Moreover, you can reach main tourist attractions for less than 15 minutes by metro 1, 2, 6, 9 or RER A(Louvre, Notre Dame, Pere Lachaise, etc...). Two minutes walking from metro station Nation. The apartment is on a 5th floor & is very quiet & sunny with an elevator. It's entirely equipped & furnished (wireless internet, Nespresso machine, fridge, oven, cooker, iron...). Feel free to contact me if you have any questions. I will be glad to help and advice you. :-)
description: As my guests usually say, my apartment is perfectly located and tastefully decorated.  Calm and cosy, near metro and every accommodation. Moreover, you can reach main tourist attractions for less than 15 minutes by metro 1, 2, 6, 9 or RER A(Louvre, Notre Dame, Pere Lachaise, etc...). Two minutes walking from metro station Nation. The apartment is on a 5th floor & is very quiet & sunny with an elevator. It's entirely equipped & furnished (wireless internet, Nespresso machine, fridge, oven, cooker, iron...). Feel free to contact me if you have any questions. I will be glad to help and advice you. :-) All the apartment ! Interaction by mail or phone a
transit: Public transportation in the neighbourhood is just perfect ! And the neighbourhood is safe, I never had to worry about getting home late nights.
access: All the apartment !
interaction: Interaction by mail or phone at your convenience !
house_rules: There is only one rule : Nothing except toilet paper should be thrown in to the toilets !  A little note regarding the shower : If you are a bit large person it might be a problem for you to get in, please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any doubt.  Kitchen is fully equipped and for coffee lovers, you have at your disposal a Nespresso machine. What Else ? :)

space: Tiny but beautiful space with Eiffel tower as the only think you see through the window! Eiffel tower is literally 3 minutes away, metro, buses and shops are all around. You will have to love it! Completely equipped: single bed, fridge, cooker, microwave, shower...  The room is on the 5th floor of a nice Paris building, without lift. Champs de Mars, Eiffel tower, Trocadero - everything is just minutes away. It is ideally positioned, whether you are in Paris for work or for leisure!  The neighborhood is full of small (and not so small) restaurants and cafes, French, Italian, Chinese, Japanese, Indian, and so on. The famous Champs de Mars is just behind the building - seconds away. Eiffel tower is 3 minutes away, and completely visible from the room window. All shops are minutes away, some of them open until midnight or later. Many bus stops are around, leading you to other fun Paris places, like Montmartre, le Marais, and so on. The neariest metro station, only 5 minutes away, is Ecole

space: A few steps away from Notre Dame, right in the heart of the Saint-Michel district, our apartment will become the starting point of your journey in our lovely capital. You can come as a couple, with family or friends and find everything you need in the apartment for a comfortable stay: - Spacious apartment of 45 m2 - 3rd floor with elevator - 1 bedroom with double bed - 1 Living room with convertible double bed (mattress of high quality) - 1 Bathroom with bath - Separate toilets - Fully equipped kitchen (dishwasher, oven...) DISTRICT You will find in the neighborhood dozens of restaurants, bars and shops within 2 minutes walk, ideal for bringing back souvenirs, spending a fun night or eating a good chocolate croissant on the terrace before a day of ballads. METRO:  - Saint Michel (RER B): Access to the CDG airport - Saint Michel (L4): Access to Chatelet - Saint Michel (RER C) : Access to Eiffel Tower, Musée d'Orsay, Invalides  - Cluny La Sorbonne (L10) WALKING DISTANCES  Notre-Dame 2min

host_about:
After several experiences as an Airbnb host in NYC and delightful meetings as a guest all over the world, I now welcome people in my new apartment located in the heart of Paris. 
 
As hosts, my wife and I will always make sure our guests find a nice and clean apartment when they come in. We will prepare you a booklet including instructions for the house and a map of the commodities  of the neighborhood. 
As guests, we are always respectful of hosts, making sure to be on time and keeping apartments clean.

space: Spacious apt of 120 m2 on the top floor, with elevator and Balcony along Canal Saint-Martin. Two bedrooms: one queen size bed, one single bed Easy access from both Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports. NB: Not available for any kind of reception (dinner, cocktail, birthday party, etc...).
description: A spacious and luminous apt of 120 m2 on the top floor, with elevator and Balcony along Canal Saint-Martin. NB: Not available for any kind of reception (dinner, cocktail, birthday party, etc...). Spacious apt of 120 m2 on the top floor, with elevator and Balcony along Canal Saint-Martin. Two bedrooms: one queen size bed, one single bed Easy access from both Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports. NB: Not available for any kind of reception (dinner, cocktail, birthday party, etc...). Double living room, one kitchen, one bathroom, one toilet, one library. Restaurant, shops, organic markets, bookstores, contemporary art galleries, playgrounds and parks, bike renting. Lots of vegetarians, vegan restaurants in this area, juice bar... The Canal Saint-Martin neighborhood is nestled between Gare du Nord and République in Northeastern Paris, in the 10th arrondissement. It is one of the most picturesque spots the city has to offer. On Sundays, two streets running parallel to the canal, Quai de Valm
transit: Metro : République Walk to most places but here are our Metro stations:  *Jacques Bonsergent (6-minute walk; line 5)  *République (10-minute walk; lines 1, 3, 5, 8, and 11)  *Château-Landon (7-minute walk; line 7)  *Gare de l'Est (6-minute walk; lines 4, 5, and 7)  *Gare du Nord (15-minute walk; RER B (Website hidden by Airbnb) lines 2, 4 & 5) Easy access from both Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports.
access: Double living room, one kitchen, one bathroom, one toilet, one library.
house_rules: No pets, no smoking

space: Discover the charm of the real Paris ! Come live in a quiet 2 bedrooms, beautiful, sunny, located in a pedestrian and lively in the heart of Paris . You sound like a typical Parisian atmosphere and comfort , fully renovated there one year. The long balcony you can see the pretty rooftops of Paris and the sky. The apartment is ideally located for visiting Paris , 20 minutes from all the attractions by metro. You can even go for a romantic walk and reach the banks of the Seine on foot in 10 minutes. Close to the street Montorgueil , a pedestrian street with cafes and market. In the district of Châtelet , which is the heart of Paris . On foot you can visit Notre Dame , Centre Pompidou or the Louvre. The Seine and its bridges are beautiful to throw away. You will find here everything you need within walking distance : restaurants, shopping ( clothing, food ) , museums , bars and cafes for a night out .
description: Typically Parisian apartment, in heart of Paris,  with 2 rooms, ideal for 1 couple.  Enjoy its promiscuity with all modes of transport to get you easily on places you visit. transit: Metro: Line 4 - Etienne Marcel, Châtelet les Halles or Reaumur Sebastopol, Line 3 - Trail or Reaumur Sebastopol  RER: RER A, B and D - Châtelet les Halles and RER C - Saint Michel 15 minutes  SNCF transportation: Gare du Nord to 15 min, Saint-Lazare station at 20 min, 20 min to Gare Montparnasse, Gare de Lyon 20 minutes and Gare de l'Est 15 min.  AIRPORT: CDG-Roissy and Orly 50 minutes to 1 hour  Various bus.  You are 5 min walk from the metro and RER: Châtelet Les Halles
access: NON SMOKING APARTMENT  - TV  - Internet access (no computer available, but wifi code available)  - Dishwasher  - Washing machine  - Shower  - Bed 2 places  - Lift  - Courses for bikes  - Four  - Kettle  - Balcony facing south  - Fan -Sheets And shower towels available - Supermarkets 2 min walk  - Subway and RER Châtelet Les Halles 5 min walk
house_rules: - Non smoking apartment! - No animals accepted. - Prohibition of organizing parties. I hope that the apartment is left as you found it. That is to say, a minimum tidy and with a little vacuuming when you leave (as I will explain in the guide that is available in your apartment). For this is the apartment where I live, so take care of him.
host_about:
Je suis une authentique parisienne, née en Inde.
Je suis une chouette nana, pleine de vie et d'envie !
Curieuse, bienveillante, serviable et ouverte aux autres.
J'adore voyager et découvrir de nouvelles cultures.

space: A gem for lovers visiting Paris, this apartment is ideally situated at the foot of Montmartre and undoubtedly seduces you by its luxury and comfort! Completely renovated (June 2012), it will offer all the conveniences expected to make your stay more enjoyable. Location: The apartment is located in a quiet street in the 9th arrondissement (district), metro Anvers just at the foot of Montmartre. From the street, you can admire the majestic Sacre Coeur that stands before you. The 9th arrondissement is one of the most pleasant arrondissements to stroll in Paris (Rue des Martyr ...) where you can find the Opera Garnier, the Boulevard Haussmann with its department stores ("Galeries Lafayette", "The Printemps"), Hotel Drouot ... You are 20 minutes walk from the center of Paris, Les Halles, Hôtel de Ville, the Centre Georges Pompidou, the Louvre, not to mention the banks of the Seine ... You are also a few metro stops from the Champs Elysees and Arc de Triomphe. In short you have easy access t

house_rules: *To be as flexible as possible, you can drop off your baggages at the apartment at 10:30 am, after previous guests departure. You will be able to come back at  1 pm or later once the cleaning is done. (1 pm is not an obligation, just the minimal hour. You can come back at the apartment, after leave your luggages the morning, when you want !) *L'horaire minimal d'arrivée est généralement fixé à 13h, le temps nécessaire pour le ménage et la préparation de l'appartement pour votre séjour. Toutefois, si vous le souhaitez, vous pouvez passer à l'appartement déposer vos bagages fermés à partir de 10h30, et revenir soit autour de 13h, soit plus tard, à l'heure que vous souhaitez, en fonction de votre emploi du temps.

space: Oberkampf - Père Lachaise - Bastille areas. Close to the small shops of the rue St Maur (bakeries, pharmacies) and situated at walking distance (10 mn) from Bastille and the Oberkampf street (restaurants, cafes).  70m2 appartement with typical Parisian style situated on a quiet street on a lovely park.  Refined decoration with antique furniture, wooden floor, moulures, boiseries, nice balcony where you can have dinner or a drink! Double living-room with a piano, bathroom with tub, 1 room with a doublebed 160*200, a 2nd one with a double bed 140*200, separate kitchen.  Fully-equiped: washing machine, dish-washer, micro-wave oven, Led flat screen TV , wi-fi internet . Families with children are welcome!  2 junior beds, 1 baby cradle, baby care items are at your disposal upon request (changing table,bottle-warmer...). Amenities : for a stay exceeding 2 weeks, and upon request, we can run your small errands in advance for you (coffee, breakfast, baby diapers..).  Secured building with digi

host_about:
Je suis mariée, maman de 3 petits bouts de 4, 2 ans et 2 mois. J'aime la musique classique, l'opéra en particulier et les brocantes... notre appartement recèle d'ailleurs d'objets chinés ! 
Mon mari et moi mettons un point d'honneur à ce que les voyageurs se sentent bien chez nous. Thé, café, de quoi faire un bon petit déjeuner, et listes des bonnes adresses du quartier à votre disposition dans l'appartement !

I am married, mother of 3 children, I love classical music, opera in particular and antiques... My husband and me are doing our best to offer our guests the most pleasant experience in Paris! Tea, coffee, list of our best addresses in the neighbourhood at your disposal upon arrival !

space: Located on the Right bank, very close to Trocadero and rue de Passy ( market street), close to the main attraction of Paris ( Eiffel Tower, Musée de l'Homme, Art Moderne museum), close to public transport (Metro Tocadero- Passy et bus line). Comfortable apartment with a large living room and 2 bedrooms (2 double beds) overlooking a beautifull garden. Well equiped kitchen with all machines. TV, Phone and Internet. This is a very comfortable apartment due to its central and safe location and its practical lay out and amenities.

house_rules: Le jour de l'arrivée nous vous accueillerons directement à l'appartement , c'est pourquoi il est essentiel que vous nous communiquiez le plus tôt possible votre heure d'arrivée à Paris , en cas d'arrivée tardive il peut vous etre demandé 50 €  S'il vous plait soyez calme et respectueux du voisinage. En cas d'appartement laissé sale, nous vous demanderons des frais supplémentaire de 50 € HT  The day of your arrival, you will be met directly at the apartment, So it's very important to let us know well in advance at what time you plan to arrive in Paris.In case of late arrival, it could be rquested an extra fee: 50 € Please be quiet and respectful to neighborough and leave the place as clean as possible ( we will charge you 50 € HT if you leave a dirty apartment).

space: Good location, comfortable and ENTIRELY EQUIPED. LOCATION: Our apartment is located in the lively neighborhood of the Avenue d’Italie: great outdoor market twice a week right on our doorstep; a large variety of shops and businesses of all kinds, Chinatown at 200 meters (600 feet) of our building with the best Asian restaurants in town. Ideally located for public transportation to go anywhere in Paris: right next to the subway station Tolbiac (line 7), bus line 47 and tramway number 3. You’ll have no problem going to the Latin Quarter, Luxembourg Park and Pantheon (15 minutes away), or to any main visiting attraction like the Louvres (20 minutes away).  APARTMENT:  Our spacious three-room apartment (65 square meters, 700 square feet) is double-oriented, light seeps into our apartment at any hour of the day. We’re the flat on the last floor of the building, which guarantees calm and tranquility. The flat has a large living room: extendable table (4 to 8 people), big leather corner couch

house_rules: Produits : Les produits alimentaires, de toilette ou de nettoyage sont laissés à votre disposition.  DVD- livres : Dans la mesure où nous avons une large bibliothèque et dvdthèque, il est tout à fait naturel que vous puissiez lire un livre ou regarder un film sur notre projecteur. Nous vous demandons seulement 1° d'en prendre grand soin 2° de les ranger à leur place après utilisation (ils sont classés) 3° de ne pas les utiliser hors de l'appartement. Vêtements : nous vous faisons confiance pour ne pas utiliser les affaires que nous devons laisser dans certains placards durant votre séjour. Entretient : nous prenons en charge le nettoyage de l'appartement entre les visiteurs, mais nous demandons tout de même de prendre soin aux choses, de ne pas laisser l'appartement trop sale ou en désordre.
host_about:
We are a parisian family with a little girl. We used to live in New York but we are now completely in love with Paris and it's charms. Amongst all the things we adore doing, like going to the movies and visiting the many parisian museums, we also particularly enjoy eating "macarons" at Ladurée near the Opera, wandering about the Quartier Latin's libraries, having a drink in the evening near Montmartre or simply a nice walk on the Seine's river banks.
We love to travel and are thrilled to welcome travelers in our flat. We are particularly careful in keeping clean and confortable for we know how much it counts.



Nous sommes tous les deux étudiants en Master à la Sorbonne, en philosophie et en cinéma. Nous avons tous les deux vécus de nombreuses années à New York mais sommes complètement amoureux de Paris et de ses charmes. Parmi les choses que nous préférons faire, outre le cinéma et les nombreux musées, il y a se ballader en amoureux sur quais de la Seine, aller manger des macarons chez Ladurée près le l'Opéra, flâner dans les librairies du quartier latin ou aller prendre un verre le soir près de Montmartre. 
Nous adorons voyager mais sommes aussi très enthousiastes à l'idée d'accueillir des gens chez nous. Nous sommes très attentif à la propreté car il nous importe par dessus-tout que nos invités se sentent parfaitement à l'aise.

space: 110m ² apartment nicely decorated, wooden floor, carpet. High quality comfort. Very bright.  Two bedrooms with double beds silent, a bathroom with bath, linen and home towels available. A large living room and a terrace vegetated south of 20m ². 5th floor with elevator, overlooking Paris: Montparnasse Tower, Opera, Eiffel Tower ...  Beautiful renovated kitchen (fridge, freezer, hob, oven, washing machine dishwasher). Laundry washing machine. Broadband, wifi. Large screen TV with cable subscription and Canal +. Gas heating.  Right in the heart of the rue des Martyrs, next to Hotel Amour, many shopkeepers (bakeries, greengrocers, Fishmongers, butchers, caterers, wine, delicatessens ...) near, close to good restaurants (Pantruche, Les Affranchis, Canaillel).  A 15 minutes walk from the department stores and the Sacré Coeur.  5 minutes from Saint-Georges Metro and walk to the bus stop No. 67.  Pleasure to receive you very soon :)

space: Modern apartment, bright, spacious 48m2 to rent for a minimum of 6 month in Paris at the foot of Subway Couronnes  in the popular Ménilmontant/Belleville. 15 min by subway City Hall, close to the Pere Lachaise and the place of Republic. It consists of a bedroom with double, a fully equipped kitchen (oven, washing machine, fridge etc ...), a lighty living-room with modular sofa (2 places) Internet access, a bathroom and WC. All utilities,sheets and towels included Underground parking All shops, restaurants and theaters. availability: from the 19th november 2012 Thank you to contact me by email. Best regards

transit: L'appartement est doté d'un parking sous-terrain directement relié à l'appartement avec un ascenseur. La ligne 2 du métro à 50 m traverse Paris d'est en ouest, et il suffit de marcher 5 mn pour prendre la ligne 11 qui arrive en plein centre de Paris en 10mn! Le bus 96 au pied de la maison traverse Paris vers le sud jusqu'à la Gare Montparnasse. Des vélibs sont à disposition sur le boulevard. Sinon tout se fait à pied ! Prenez le temps de marcher !
access: Tout l'appartement est accessible aux voyageurs.  Bienvenue chez moi et merci de respecter mon matériel !
interaction: Une amie s'occupera de l'accueil. Je suis joignable à tous moments par téléphone ou email.

space: Flat 32 m2, perfect for a couple, a family or friends, full of light, in a perfect state, 2 places bed + one convertible couch (2 places), one bathroom with a bath + wash machine, one fully equiped kitchen. The flat at the second floor of a building with elevators is located at the heart of a very attractive location : close to the canal Saint Martin, the amazing parc des Buttes Chaumont and the parc de la Vilette where there are many rooms to listen music and many activities for children. It's very lovely to walk around the neighbourhood. There are also numerous bars, restaurants, venues and cinemas. close to the metro : -Louis Blanc (line 7) -Colonel Fabien (line 2) -Jaures (line 2 and 5) -the flat is totaly renovated and fully equiped. Very pleasant for a short or long stay in Paris.

host_about:
Bonjour,
comme vous, j'adore voyager et il m'arrive très souvent de quitter Paris, pour un week-end ou plusieurs semaines. Je suis très enthousiaste à l'idée de pouvoir faire profiter d'autres voyageurs de mon appartement, un petit havre de paix au coeur d'un des quartiers les plus animés de la capitale !!!
Au plaisir d'échanger avec vous !
A bientôt,
Géraldine

space: Beautiful apartment located in the heart of Aligre neighborhood and its market and 5 minutes from the Place de la Bastille and Gare de Lyon, the apartment is the ideal starting point to discover Paris. Covering an area of 73 m2, located on the 2nd floor with elevator, quiet street, the apartment consists of three large rooms with balconies, a bathroom and a kitchen. The living room has a sofa that converts into a bed 2 places, flat screen TV and a table on which up to 6 people can eat. The first bedroom has a very comfortable bed for 2 people (new bedding), a wardrobe where you can store your belongings and a desk. The second bedroom consists of baby bed, changing table, dresser, where you can also store your belongings and a nice bench to read stories. The bathroom has a bathtub, a washing machine, a dryer, a shelf with towels. The sink is topped by a cabinet with mirrors. Towels, sheets and blankets needed during your stay are provided. If you want to iron your clothes, a table and a

Prière de veiller à la propreté et d'être discret au sein des parties communes de l'immeuble pour la tranquillité des voisins. Après 22h, la loi française exige que les bruits excessifs s'arrêtent (musique forte...). Cause de rétention de la caution : disparition et/ou dégradation des équipements de l'appartement.

French 34 years old graphic designer living in Paris. 
Love drawing, cooking, and traveling.

space: Outstanding two floors apartment of 120 sqm with terraces overlooking the Seine and facing south.  Art déco style. Modern furnitures. 2 bedrooms with terrace (double bed), 2 bathrooms, lounge, dining room. very well equipped kitchen. Comfortable. Wifi. parking. Subway, bus and RER nearby. A 10 minute walk from the Eiffel Tower and Trocadero. Near the rue de Passy (shops, food and shopping) At the bottom of the building, bus 72 takes you into the historic center of Paris along the Seine (Palais de Tokyo, Grand Palais, the Concorde, the Louvre, Orsay, Notre Dame, le Marais).

host_about:
Je vis dans cette appartement depuis 34 ans. Mon mari et mes trois enfants - qui ne vivent plus ici maintenant - l'adorent ! La vue sur la Tour Eiffel est à couper le souffle et la situation de l'appartement est idéale ! J’ai travaillé dans la mode... Et j'adore Paris !

I have lived in this appartement for  34 years. My husband and my three children, who don't live here anymore, love it very much! The view is breathtaking and the location is ultimate! I worked in fashion  and I love Paris !

space: This is a 2 room's flat, next to Voltaire place, very close to Bastille and "Le Marais" (10 minutes by walking). There is a bedroom (2 places) and a lounge with sofa-bed (2 more places), which make it a 4 places flat. There is also a kitchen with all equipments (cooker, fridge and washing machine) and a bathroom with shower and sink. Separate toilets. This is  a very nice neighborhood with many shops and restaurants. You will enjoy the quiet of the flat which is located close to Oberkampf street and its many bars if you fancy a bit of animation. There is a subway station at Voltaire place and a lot of bus lines which leed to many places in Paris downtown (such as Châtelet, Louvre, Bastille, République, Champs de Mars, etc).

host_about: Camille est comédienne, Joseph est musicien. Nous sommes marié depuis 5 ans, vivons dans cet appartement depuis plus de deux ans et on y est vraiment bien ! Le salon et la chambre sont très sympas et lumineux. le quartier de la Mairie du XIe est charmant.  Enfin, c'est un point de chute très central dans Paris. Très bien desservi par le métro et les bus. notre voisin le plus célèbre s'appelle Jim Morrison!

space: This amazing Triplex apartment is located right in the heart of one the liveliest neighborhood of Paris: the Marais-Montorgueil. Famous for its bustling streets, cafés and fashion designers boutiques, it is the best way to feel the Parisian spirit. This beautiful apartment is located on the 3rd floor of a Parisian building, directly accessible by the elevator, and it faces south. The 7 rooms, including 6 spacious bedrooms, are divided between two floors. They all have a refined and clean style. The entrance opens up on a small entrance, directly opened on the large and bright living room. This beautiful living room can accommodate up to 12 people. A large fireplace gives a warm feeling to the atmosphere. The fully-equipped kitchen, opened on a beautiful dining room below glass roof provides a direct access to the large terrace. interaction: L’agence est ouverte tous les jours de la semaine et joignable de 9h à 22h. Notre équipe sera à votre écoute/disposition dès votre arrivée jusqu’à votre départ. Vous pouvez nous contacter directement au +(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).
host_about:
Nous sommes spécialisées dans la location d’appartements meublés à Paris pour du court terme (à partir de deux nuits) ou du long terme. 

 Nous proposons 60 locations touristiques dans tous Paris et développons notre activité en travaillant aux cotés d’entreprises et autre clientèle en mobilité pour de la moyenne et longue durée et ainsi trouver la meilleure location pour leurs collaborateurs, junior, exécutant ou de luxe.

Fondé en 1998, on ne comptait à nos débuts qu’une petite vingtaine d’appartements. 

La société a pris une réelle impulsion en 2000.
 Nous gérons aujourd’hui plus de 400 appartements, répartis dans tous les quartiers de la capitale. 

L’entreprise compte une dizaine de salariés. Cosmopolite, cette équipe dynamique veille au confort et à la satisfaction des clients, leur réservant un accueil et des services personnalisés. L’agence dispose de spacieux locaux, ayant pignon sur rue, dans le quartier animé de Montorgueil, situé au cœur de la capitale. 

Le sens de l’histoire s’oriente vers une sélectivité accrue quant au standing et à l’emplacement des logements proposés, tout en préservant la diversité des ambiances et des styles qui font la typicité des différents quartiers de la capitale.

space: This lovely duplex is set in the ultimate location in Paris, on the top floor (with elevator) of a listed 17th century townhouse, three minutes walk from the Seine. 180 sq Meters (1950 sq ft), four bedrooms all with queen size beds, two bathrooms and all the amenities expected in a modern luxury apartment (optical fiber internet, use of only organic detergents and soap for the linens). The location is possibly the last quiet and unspoilt block in central Paris (village st Paul), and yet you have access to three different metro lines a few minutes away. As you can see from the photographs, this is a home, it is not designed for the sole purpose to rent. (Not a single bolt from Ikea.) I limit the number of tenants and require a minimum length of stay because this place is more like a country house than a shelter, albeit a luxurious one... The building is extremely secure since a full time concierge lives in the building. If you like light, the sun and to sleep with windows open and wake

space: Welcome to Poissonniers Bonheur !  This 325 ft2 studio contains a bed for two. It's fully equipped with internet wifi, washing machine, shower, hair drier, clean sheets and towels, TV, DVD and an iMac. The kitchenette is open and is equipped with a multi-function microwave, fridge, coffee maker (Nespresso), electric kettle, toaster and all cooking utensils necessary.  The living-room part is very friendly with a big sofa, where 2 more people can also sleep. The apartment is very luminous; specially during summer because it's situated at the 3rd floor of the building. It is ideally located : - 10 minutes to Montmartre by walk - very close to the metro Marcadet-Poissonniers with 2 convenient lines (4 and 12) : you can directly join the center within 15 minutes (Chatelet, Opéra, Concorde, Gare du Nord Gare de l'Est, etc.). description: Welcome in this studio apartment : it would be yours for some days ! You will enjoy Montmartre which really right nearby and public transportation (at the foot of my buiding) will bring you easily all over Paris, the city of light ! Welcome to Poissonniers Bonheur !  This 325 ft2 studio contains a bed for two. It's fully equipped with internet wifi, washing machine, shower, hair drier, clean sheets and towels, TV, DVD and an iMac. The kitchenette is open and is equipped with a multi-function microwave, fridge, coffee maker (Nespresso), electric kettle, toaster and all cooking utensils necessary.  The living-room part is very friendly with a big sofa, where 2 more people can also sleep. The apartment is very luminous; specially during summer because it's situated at the 3rd floor of the building. It is ideally located : - 10 minutes to Montmartre by walk - very close to the metro Marcadet-Poissonniers with 2 convenient lines (4 and 12) : you can directly join the center within 15 minute
transit: The flat is at 3 metro stations of Gare du Nord where arrive international trains as Eurostar and Thalys and suburb trains that go to airport Roissy Charles de Gaulle.
access: You will be at my home when I travel, so you'll access at my entire place.
interaction: I like having a chat with my guests : we will discuss by email and if it's possible, i'll welcome you. Otherwise, a friend of mine will give you the keys !  If you tell me what you expect from your visit, I can find some good tips for you, staying reachable by email or (Hidden by Airbnb) .
host_about:
I was born in Paris, so I know a lot about that city that I'm in love with ! So I can help you discover some good places. I like a lot my neighborhood, where there is some very nices places at a few walk.
I'm doing statistics for french government and I like a lot music, cinema, TV shows, reading and travel.

Can't wait to talk to you !

Main room is spacious with charming inclined roof, very high at its top. It has Internet wifi, a TV and a DVD player.

host_about:
Hi, I am 29 years old, and I work for artistic and cultural education, in high schools with teenagers. 
I love to go the theatre, I see a lot of shows of dance and drama every years. I love the parisian cultural life, and also I love to travel.
When I travel, I usually find acomodation via Airbnb or couchsurfing, or I am hosted by friends. I think the most beautiful thing when you travel is the people you meet, and to try to get how local life can be. 
I don't spend too much time at home, so I enjoy even more the calm moments in this cosy nest ! 

Bonjour, j'ai 29 ans et je travaille dans le milieu de l'éducation artistique artistique et culturelle auprès de lycéens.
J'adore aller au théâtre, je vois de nombreux spectacles de danse et de théâtre. J'aime la vie culturelle parisienne, et j'adore aussi voyager. lors de mes récents voyages, je me suis logée soit grâce airbnb, soit couchsurfing, ou bien chez des amis/connaissances. Je trouve que la plus belle chose lorsqu'on voyage, ceux sont les rencontres et de ressentir ce que peut être la vie locale!
Je ne passe donc pas beaucoup de temps à la maison, et j'apprécie d'autant plus les moments de calme dans mon petit nid !

space: Fully equipped, light and cozy 40m ² apt in the gorgeous neighbourhood of Montmartre. Located in an old typical Hausmann-style building, in a charming area 2 min. walking distance to the Lamarck metro station and 5 minutes from the Sacré Coeur. Close to great little bistrots, bars, lovely cafés, supermarkets, convenience stores, small theaters and plenty of shops.  The apartment has a small balcony, a big bedroom with a large window facing a courtyard (san vis-a-vis), a spacious kitchen and lots of sunlight. The living room includes a sofabed and dining area, the bedroom has a confortable double bed and large wardrobe. The kitchen is fully equipped - electric stove, electric oven, washing machine, fridge, utensils, plates, pots etc. Bed linen and towels provided. Wireless internet. Many artists had studios or worked in Montmartre such as Modigliani, Monet, Mondrian and Van Gogh. It is a vibrant and trendy yet traditional neighborhood, with breath-taking views of Paris and many secret s

space: DESCRIPTION : Beautiful two-room apartment 5mn by foot from Le moulin Rouge and Montmartre available for short-term rent. This 60m2 (645 square foot). third floor flat, accessible with the elevator, is made up of a luminous salon and a bedroom. The comfortable salon comes ready to welcome guest with a comfortable couch and two armchairs. A nice bar were you can enjoy a talk with a glass of red wine separates the open kitchen from the living room. Fully-equiped open kitchen including an oven, fridge, burners,etc. Exposed south, the salon's window opens up to beautiful courtyard with trees which make you feel as if you were in the countryside. The bedroom, offers a full-size bed from which you can admire the view on the trees. Also a  TV only for DVD view. The full-bathroom offers a nice bathtub with a shower, two sink and toilet. Other ammenities include high speed internet, soundsystem were you can link your iPod/iPhone. Washing machine and dryer in one. SECURITY: - Security Code entra
