space: Hi there! Our 55 sq. meters flat is on the 3rd floor (with elevator), in a typical parisian building. It is spacious, well organised, furnished and fully equiped (High speed internet, Wi-Fi, complementary international phone calls to Europe/US/Canada - landlines only please - sound system, computer with large screen, washing machine, kettle, micro wave, etc... Please just note that we DO NOT have a television (as we never watch it ;) Electricity, sheets and towels are included. There is one double bed and one single bed (mezzanine). One more single bed uppon request. You can enjoy lovely walks or bike rides to the hip Canal St.Martin (5 min. walk), the mythical Père Lachaise cemetery (10 min walk), the hip Marais district (15 min walk) or the artsy Beaubourg neighborhood (20 min walk)… Your stay in our flat should bring you a genuine feel of what this wonderful city has to offer. space: This is a bed room with private toilets and shower, separated from the rest of the apartment by two doors. The  apartment is include in a luxury stone building very close to subway stations of lines 8, 5, and 1, which allow you to be very quickly in all the places of Paris, and in approximately 45 mn Roissy and Orly airports , you are 200 m of the « place desVosges », at the heart of Paris, in the historic district of the « Marais », with its very numerous restaurants livened up all year long, and by the shopping street of the « Francs Bourgeois », with its numerous shops, This district contains numerous museums (Carnavalet, Picasso, Victor Hugo's house …) and you can quickly go on foot on « Notre-Dame », « l’Ile de la Cite » and the banks of the Seine. The location is very quiet, calm, and close to all amenities (fashion shops, restaurants, museums,...) space: One of the most unusual streets of Paris ! A quiet apartment in a village atmosphere in the heart of Paris! A few meters from Nation but in a quiet "village", enjoy the quiet neighborhood and the nearby metro (line 1, 2, 6, 9 and RER!) Near the Père Lachaise cemetery. Two-room apartment of 40 square meters. One bedroom with double bed and a sofa / bed in the lounge. Located on the second floor, the apartment is very sunny and particularly quiet. High speed internet available free Wifi.

space: Beau 2 pièces de 28m² comprenant internet, TV, Dyson (ventilateur/fan) , Nespresso, réfrigérateur, plaques de cuisson, four combiné micro-onde, grille-pain... L'appartement est situé au 5 ème étage sans ascenseur avec vue sur cour et rue donc très lumineux et calme. L'appartement est à 1 min du métro Voltaire(9) ou 5 min de Bastille.(lignes 1, 5 ou 8), la place des Vosges et le Marais sont à 10-15min à pieds. A côté, la ligne de bus n°69 dessert le centre de Paris (Hotel de ville / Rivoli / Musée du Louvre / Musée d'Orsay / Les Invalides) + la zone de la tour Eiffel. (Champs de Mars) Que ce soit la gare du Nord/Est ou gare de Lyon/Austerlitz, vous avez des bus directs jusque devant l'appartement. (46/56) (61) Toutes les commodités sont au coin de la rue, boulangerie, supermarché, épicier, pharmacie, laverie. Station Vélib (vélo) en bas de l'immeuble. Le quartier regroupe plusieurs bons restaurants . Le jeudi & le dimanche, vous pourrez aller à pieds en 5 min au grand marché de Bastille
description: Superbe appartement idéalement placé dans Paris. Vous pourrez faire beaucoup de choses à pieds comme aller dans le Marais, à République à Bastille ou au Père Lachaise. Les bus et métro sont directs pour les Champs-Elysées, la Tour Eiffel ou le Louvre ! Mais également depuis la gare du Nord/Est ou gare de Lyon/Austerlitz jusque devant l'appartement. ( j'aime mes voisins ! ) Je suis non-fumeuse donc pensez vraiment à fumer à la fenêtre de la cuisine si c'est le cas. Pas de recommandations spécifiques... Ah si ! Faites-vous plaisir à Paris et pour n'importe quelles questions (sur l'appartement, où sortir, où manger ) n'hésitez pas à me contacter !

space: If you are looking for a charming and quiet, yet central place to explore Paris highlights and take a deep dive into its hypest places: don't look further! 116m2, on two courtyards: extra calm, spacious and cosy, our flat has been recently fully renovated providing extra comfort and charm. Satellite tv, wifi and books at your disposal to enjoy in between your Paris explorations. A fully equiped kitchen, where you will enjoy preparing a delicious meal or sharing a drink. Bathroom with large and comfortable bathtub and separate shower in contemporary style. In the  hype and upcoming neighbourhood of Faubourg Saint Denis, where you will find within less than 5 min walk a unique combination of fine grocery stores, fancy bars and restaurants as well as an amazing diversity of exotic food. Super conveniently located: 100 yards away from Strasbourg Saint Denis metro station (line 4, 8 and 9) 10 min walk from canal saint martin 20 min walk from Opera and Galeries Lafayettes 20 min walk from Le

transit: The metro station 'Strasbourg Saint Denis' is less than 5 minutes walk from our place and gives access to three different metro lines.

house_rules: Never close the apartment door from inside. It locks automatically. No party is allowed inside the apartment. You will enjoy its quietness, please make sure you keep it quiet for our neighbors too. Please always take your shoes off in the entrance in order not to disturb neighbors with cracking wooden floor noises. Please do not use the fireplace. Make sure you turn the heating system to minimum level before leaving (left button on the heating system in the backroom inside the bathroom). In the kitchen, be careful to not leave any stagnant water behind the sink as it would damage quickly the wood. For the rest: ENJOY!
host_about: I have two kids and I love to travel the world.  Do not hesitate to ask me for advices about Normandy to make sure you enjoy it to the full.

space: Perfectly located in Jussieu, in the very heart of the Latin Quarter (rue des Boulangers), central Paris 5th arrondissement. Typical parisian flat with beautiful exposed wood beams. In less than 5 minutes walking you can be at: Jardin des Plantes, Arènes de Lutèce, Panthéon, la Sorbonne, Rue Mouffetard, Mosquée de Paris, Institut du Monde Arabe, Saint Louis island and Cité island... Many cafés, restaurants, cinemas, theaters... But also supermarkets, post office, pharmacy, bakeries... - Located in a beautiful little street covered with cobblestones, less than 100 meters from Jussieu subway station - The building entrance is secured by digital lock - 3rd floor, no lift - Very quiet, nice view on a private courtyard with trees, open outlook - Decorated with taste, charming flat, exposed wood beams - Internet by Wifi, cable TV with a large choice of channels - Ideal for 2 persons, possible for a couple with two children - Surface area: 19 square meters Description: - Main room with one do

space: This unique apartment is located in the old part of Paris, facing Ile Saint-Louis and with a view of the Notre-Dame Cathedral.  Around it, you Will find the Pantheon, bouquinists, the Marais, Pont de la Tournelle where everybody seems to want to become immortal by locking their padlock to the bridge.  This apartment is also very practical, uncluttered, 750 square feet of old wooden floors and tiles, with a lot of light and a balcony all around.  You will like to have breakfast or dinner looking at Notre Dame.  The amenities include double living, open kitchen, bathroom and a large  bedroom with huge closets and a good-size desk. The building is very well maintained and the door is totally secure. It is located on the fifth floor at the top of original and beautifully preserved stairs. The apartment is located in an area where old buildings are preserved, so this is Paris authentic and there is no elevator.  For you comings and goings, the apartment is no more than 50 yards from taxi-st

transit: From Roissy Charles-de-Gaulle airport, you can come with : - Taxi : around 50 euros - RER B (train) : 9,10 euros, around 30 minutes trip, until station «Saint-Michel / Notre Dame». Then continue by foot (5 minutes) until the apartment. - Roissy-Bus from Place de l’Opéra : around 1 hour, departure every 30 minutes. If you come with Eurostar from London (Gare du Nord) or from Gare de l’Est (Germany), to go to the house it will take you around 30 minutes with subway : - Take the subway Line 4 Direction «Porte d’Orléans» until «Odeon» - At Odeon change and take Line 10 Direction «Gare d’Austerlitz» for 2 stations until station «Maubert-Mutualité» - You are at 1 minute by foot of the apartment. If you don’t have too much luggages, you can leave subway (line 4) at Saint-Michel (exit «Cathédrale») and then walk until the apartment.
access: 2 cabinets for you and 2 cabinets for me (lock).
interaction: When you arrive, I will give you some advise on restaurants and shopping in Paris.
house_rules: The residents of this building are quiet and friendly people, they are proud of the beautiful wooden stairs. If possible, keep quiet when climbing stairs. The floor of the house is old. Please, help me to keep the beautiful floor by using the pretty slippers we offer you. No pets. No smoking in the apartment.
host_about:
I live in Paris forever.

I am a painter, also a portrait Painter in Montmartre since 10 years.

I love the united states. I worked there for two years through a project frescoes.

I will be happy to give you the keys of the romantic world of Paris.
For all occasions from simple to more sophisticated : The Honeymoons and Anniversaries and the best moments of your life.

You have in the apartment all the necessary information : cultural luxurious and gourmet.

Paris : Magician city where beauty and art combine beautifully.
I love the luxurious aspects of my city.


I prepare for you an information about Paris that I love.
I wait you with pleasure.
Christine 

PS : Please use my phone number only for text message, no call.

space: Hello and welcome to this  original one bedroom apartment with all modern conveniences.  This convenient, authentic home gives vibes of warmth and peace with its tones of cream and taupe along with added touches like the giant effiel tower mural to give you a sense of really being in paris!   complete with double bed, tv, internet, full kitchen (dish washer, washing machine, micro wave, hot plates, toaster, fridge), and lots of light afford you the chance to really live like a parisian. The nearest metro station is Victor Hugo on line 2 (direct access from Gare du Nord, if you come via Eurostar) and Boissière on line 6. The area is very safe and the building is secured with 2 digicodes.  5th floor, no elevator.  You will find lots of stores in the neighborhood (convenient stores open until 10pm and on Sunday morning) If you have any question, feel free to ask and I will come back to you as soon as possible.

space: Charmant duplex (90 m2) aux 3e et 4e étages sans ascenseur d'un immeuble ancien. Au pied du Père-Lachaise, à 5 minutes du métro Alexandre Dumas, 15 minutes en bus de Bastille, 15 minutes de Nation et de Ménilmontant. Quartier animé et sympathique (restaurants, bars, librairies, supermarchés, marchés dans la rue). Proche toutes commodités. 3ème : double séjour (tv, lecteur dvd, wifi, ordinateur), cuisine américaine équipée, toilettes, salle de bain, canapé lit 4ème :  petite chambre adulte (lit double), deux chambres enfants (2 lits simples et un matelas double sans sommier), un dressing, une salle de douche . Idéal famille avec deux ou trois enfants. Ne convient pas à un groupe d'amis adultes ni à plusieurs couples (pas assez de couchages adultes). J'habite l'appartement avec mes filles. Il n'est donc disponible que lors des vacances scolaires zone C. De plus, il ne présente donc pas l'aspect impeccable d'un logement hôtelier. La salle de bain a été refaite à neuf.
description: Charmant duplex (90 m2) aux 3e et 4e étages sans ascenseur d'un immeuble ancien. Au pied du Père-Lachaise, à 5 minutes du métro Alexandre Dumas, 15 minutes en bus de Bastille, 15 minutes de Nation et de Ménilmontant. Quartier animé et sympathique (restaurants, bars, librairies, supermarchés, marchés dans la rue). Proche toutes commodités. 3ème : double séjour (tv, lecteur dvd, wifi, ordinateur), cuisine américaine équipée, toilettes, salle de bain, canapé lit 4ème :  petite chambre adulte (lit double), deux chambres enfants (2 lits simples et un matelas double sans sommier), un dressing, une salle de douche . Idéal famille avec deux ou trois enfants. Ne convient pas à un groupe d'amis adultes ni à plusieurs couples (pas assez de couchages adultes). J'habite l'appartement avec mes filles. Il n'est donc disponible que lors des vacances scolaires zone C. De plus, il ne présente donc pas l'aspect impeccable d'un logement hôtelier. La salle de bain a été refaite à neuf. Métro Alexandre Duma
transit: Métro Alexandre Dumas Bus 76/26/64
house_rules: L'appartement est conçu pour une famille. Une petite chambre adulte (avec un lit double). Deux chambres enfants avec deux lits simples dans l'une et un matelas 2 place sans sommier dans l'autre  Canapé convertible dans le salon
host_about: Enseignante de Lettres.

space: All comfort : shower and bathtub, wash machine, dryer, dishwasher, hi-fi, piano, wi-fi, internet access and free long distance calls available in most countries. First products supply : shower gel, shampoo and soap ; dishwashing soap ; toilet paper... ; in the kitchen, oil, vinegar, spices, sugar. To replace when finished, thanks in advance ! Of course, sheets and towels are provided. . Large entrance with piano. 3 large rooms, one smaller, but all 4 opening on the balcony. 5 beddings : 1 master bedroom with King size bed ; one single room ; one room with Queen size bed. The single room has access through the bathroom and the balcony.
description: Close to Observatory’s gardens and Montparnasse, at the cross roads of the 13th and 14th districts, near the 5th and 6th districts (Luxembourg garden, Port-Royal), luminous and comfortable flat of 90 m2 with 4 rooms, overlooking a balcony filled with greenery, Southern exposure.  Located in an Haussmanien building with elevator. Direct access to the main Parisian train stations, Roissy airport, EuroDisney, Orly airport. A welcoming, sympathical and attentive host, speaking English. transit: Easy access to many spots in Paris and to airports and train stations : at 50 meters away from 2 underground stations : Saint-Jacques and Denfert-Rochereau (lines 4 and 6) and 1 train station :  Denfert-Rochereau (RER B, direct to Saint-Michel, Chatelet/Ile de la Cité : heading to Notre-Dame, North train Station and Roissy-Charles-de-Gaulle airport)  + 4 bus lines (38, 68, 88 and 216/Orlybus : direct to Orly airport). Direct access by underground, train or bus to Montparnasse train station, North train Station and East train Station. At a walking distance to a pedestrian street (Daguerre), many shops, restaurants, movies and art galleries in the area.
access: Full apartment
interaction: Please send a message with your dates and some information about yourself and your stay, and I will be happy to get back to you as soon as possible !
house_rules: Non-fumeurs de préférence, mais fumeurs acceptés si seulement sur le balcon (cendriers disponibles). Immeuble ancien sonore : faire attention au bruit pour respecter la tranquillité des voisins, donc se déchausser en entrant (pantoufles fournies) et impérativement après 22 heures ne pas faire de piano et baisser la musique et autre source sonore. Merci !   No-smokers prefered but smokers accepted if on the balcony (ashtrays provided). Old building with walls in stone and bricks, a bit sounding. That's why everyone is asked to remove his shoes after entering and not to play piano nor loud music after 10 pm. Thanks !
host_about:
Enjouée, vive, aimant la vie, j'ai de multiples centres d'intérêt intellectuels et artistiques, notamment la médecine, la peinture, le cinéma..., et je pratique la photographie contemplative et l'art floral japonais, ainsi que le jardinage sur mon grand balcon et à la campagne.
De formation universitaire (philosophie, sociologie, médecine, économie), j'ai effectué mon parcours professionnel d'abord dans l'audiovisuel (photo, cinéma, télévision), puis la presse et l'édition, notamment en communication médicale,  et je viens de diriger un projet sur la démarche qualité en matière de presse médicale.
Par ailleurs, j'ai également une formation en psychologie contemplative et en astro-homéopathie, et j'accompagne des personnes porteuses de maladies chroniques physiques et/ou psychiques.
Le maintien de la santé étant la base de l'existence, je pratique le chi qong, le tai chi et la méditation, ainsi que la natation de façon régulière... et je voyage assez fréquemment entre les Charentes, les Etats-Unis et l'Asie.
Ma devise dans la vie : vivre au présent de façon authentique, dans la bienveillance et le goût des autres !

This Paris vacation rental is a great place to stay! space: Spacious, colorful,modern and orginal 2 bedroom appartment in the back of a courtyard,9 windows with view on a  huge figtree, quiet and light.The appartment was recently entirely decorated by the onwer who is a colorist,ceramist and a decorator. The style is chic and arty, a mixture of the owners own work, paintings, ceramics,tables,rugs, vintage and design furniture. On the3rd floor with an elevator. An old building 1850 in the middle of the 9th arrondisement, the authentique part of a trendy area,right behindt the famous Folies Bergeres and the Palace.Surrounded by trendy delicous restaurants, foodstores, theaters, musihalls(New Morning,Olypmpia) 10 minutes walk form the rue des Martyres and the Gare du Nord(Thalys,Eurostar) 20 Minutes walk from the Seine, Jardin the Tuileris, Saint Germain des Pres. Les musees, Le louvre, le Musee d'Orsay,le Centre Pompidou, le Jeu de Paume. Between the Grands Boulevards,colse to the Opera et les Galeris Lafayettes. Metros Cadet et Grands Boulevards
description: Beautiful, big and calm, cosy  2 bedroom  appartment 10min from the Rue des Martyres and the Gare du Nord.Situated  in a lovely typical parisian area with the best trendy restaurants right in the  center of Paris. transit: Metro Cadet and Grand Boulevards. Several parkings in the neighbourhood. Garde du Nord and Gare de l'Est RER B and A Orly and Charles de Gaulle and VIllepinte!!
access: The guest will have access to the whole appartment except the laundryroom unless the stay is more then 5 days.If you are more then 2 people there will be a supplement to pay depending how many beds you need
interaction: A lot of interaction to make sure that the guests are comfortable and it also makes the situation more relaxing for everyone.
house_rules: The guest need to respect an appartment with very nice furniture and fragile ceramics and a very old wooden floor, so no shoes and no partying,no pets and smoking out of the window and small active kids might be a little risky

space: The apartment is in the heart of Paris, at the foot of Madeleine place, very close to Champs-Elysées, boulevard Haussmann (galeries Lafayette, Printemps), Garnier Opera and place Vendôme. It is very close to the main places of interest: the Louvre, the garden of the Tuileries, the most beautiful hotels in the Capital, Eiffel Tower, the Champs Elysees, the National Assembly, the fields of Mars, Trocadéro, the banks of the Seine... You can take advantage of a prestigious frame in a building of 1860 mixing a Parisian and modern style.  Brightly apartment with an exposure to south: slightly freshly during summer and warmth during winter.  The apartment has all modern comfort in an uncluttered style. Division of spaces : an entrance / room of 10m2. Space out corridor the day being transformed into private room harm; a big lounge / bar giving onto an open-plan kitchen with American refrigerator, city gas cooktop for a better control, a massive wooden space for the cut of food; a dressing roo

transit: Transport: at the foot of the building (subway lines 8, 14, 12) and at 300 meters main transport lines of the Capital passing by most of beautiful places (subway 9, 3, train RER A). Bus and taxi at the foot of the building.
house_rules: No pets admitted.  No celebrations. Clean up the apartment after your stay. Inventory will be done during check in and during check out. Only one key is left. If you lose it, we can ask a compensation. Broken/damaged objects = compensation For a better comfort, we recommend only two persons. A maximum of four is admitted.
host_about:
Hello! 

Essentials in my life: travels, good food, exciting job and enjoy a great book near the beach.
Our home: we wanted to share a part of our daily lives sharing/opening our home here, so you could enjoy it and feel like in yours.
 
You'll be very welcome.

I hope to see you soon! 
Marvin

space: We're a family of four (well six actually) but the youngest is studying abroad. We have a spacious 3-bedroom apartment (with period features) with views across the Rue de Rome to the "Square des Batignolles" park (over the suburban railway lines).  The Batignolles neighbourhood is only a stone's throw away and offers cafés, restaurants, boutiques, great baguette. The nearby Rue Lévis is famous for its daily market and its great fresh fruit and veg. No pets, no smokers please, sorry. Thanks for your understanding.
description: Great room to let for min. 1 week with friendly multinational family in lovely Haussmannian flat. Trendy Batignolles neighbourhood. Walking distance to Saint Lazare station + department stores. Good bed, desk, bookcase and wardrobe. Shared bathroom. We're a family of four (well six actually) but the youngest is studying abroad. We have a spacious 3-bedroom apartment (with period features) with views across the Rue de Rome to the "Square des Batignolles" park (over the suburban railway lines). The nearby Rue Lévis is famous for its daily market and its great fresh fruit and veg. No pets, no smokers please, sorry. Thanks for your understanding. The flat is located on the first floor. The room, shared bathroom and toilet are accessible from the hallway. Guests have access to a bathroom shared with our daughter (dedicated drawer), to the kitchen (with a dedicated shelf in f
transit: Good public transport: Metro ROME on line 2 and metro VILLIERS on line 3, buses 53 (to Saint Lazare and Opera), 31 (to Champs Elysées) and 30 (to Trocadero/Eiffel Tower)
access: The flat is located on the first floor. The room, shared bathroom and toilet are accessible from the hallway. Guests have access to a bathroom shared with our daughter (dedicated drawer), to the kitchen (with a dedicated shelf in fridge and cupboard) and to the living room.
interaction: We're of course very happy to give guidance if needed. We are however all pretty independent and appreciate respect of each other's space. Any questions, don't hesitate! We look forward to hearing from you.
house_rules: We respect each other's space and respect our neighbours, who are all pretty friendly. And we all try to keep the common areas, such as kitchen and bathroom, tidy and clean. Guests are welcome to use the washing machine and tumble dryer for their laundry, sheets and towels (provided) and to use the supplies provided to clean their room.

space: Charming studio in central Paris, close to the fountain St Michel in the heart of the Latin Quarter, completely renovated, located in the 5th arrondissement of Paris. This studio is located on the first floor of a Parisian building is elegantly decorated. It is 24 m2 with a capacity for 3 people. You'll find a double bed, a chair - bed, bathroom with shower, a kitchen (fridge and hob, dishwasher, washing machine). The floors are parquet. Linens and towels are provided, baby cot is provided.

En mettant à la disposition des touristes mes appartements et ceux de mes amis, appartements très bien situés, j'espère pouvoir partager ainsi ma passion avec ceux qui visitent Paris pour la première fois et aussi avec ceux qui reviennent pour revoir Paris. Soyez les bienvenus!

space: Charming apartment located in a quiet street, on the 6th floor by elevator, near the Place Victor Hugo, Paris 16, near the Arc de Triomphe. It is a 2 room apartment with a mezzanine with a true Parisian spirit, able to comfortably accommodate up to 6 people maximum. The nearby subway, shops and a very good bakery and market St-Didier, this apartment will make your stay in Paris more enjoyable!

space: This studio of 25 m² is located in a quiet street in the center of Paris, opposite the famous music hall "Folies Bergère", between the "Opera", Department Stores, Montmartre and the Covered Passages leading to the Royal Palace and the Louvre. It is located in a charming triplex Parisian nineteenth century building offering 3 air conditioned bedrooms. The decor is contemporary, it combines with taste the wood, brick and metal. It is ideal for travelers seeking privacy, tranquility, comfort The studio consists of a large bedroom, a shower room and private toilets. The House is also equipped with a kitchenette: sink, induction hob, microwave, utensils needed to prepare meals. Breakfast is included: Nespresso capsules, tea, chocolate, jam, orange juice Bio, bread, pastries ... It also offers all the latest technologies (flat screen TV, free WIFI), it also has a Nespresso coffee machine and kettle with a selection of teas and Nespresso capsules. Side bathroom, a walk-in shower, a hairdryer,

transit: The apartment is serviced within 5 minutes walk from 2 metro stations: Grands Boulevards (line 8 and 9) and Cadet (line 7) and many buses. A Velib station is 50 meters. To reach the apartment: - From Charles de Gaulle airport, take RER B to Gare du Nord station, then bus number 43 (towards Neuilly - Bagatelle) to the station "Maubeuge Rochechouart." - From Orly Airport: Take the RER C station "Invalid", then take the metro (line 8) to the "Grands Boulevards" station. - From Beauvais: Take the shuttle to Porte Maillot, then take the metro (line 1) to the station "Concorde" then (line 8) to the station "Grands Boulevards".   - From North Station: Bus 43 (Neuilly-Bagatelle direction) to Maubeuge Rochechouart - From East Train Station: Bus 32 to Hauteville - From Gare Montparnasse: Line 13 to Invalides and then line 8 to Grands Boulevards - From Gare de Lyon: Bus 20 to the "Poissonière-Bonne Nouvelle" Station Possibility of covered and secured parking Parking price: 20 euros / day, 120 eur
access: Please note that the entrance to the Guest House is on the 3rd floor of the building and access to the rooms on the 4th and 5th floor is through a charming 19th century spiral staircase designed by Gustave Eiffel ( Not recommended for people with mobility problems, see photos). We take care of your luggage during check-in and check-out.
interaction: We welcome our guests to the apartment to hand over the keys, explain the operation of the various devices (TV, internet, ...) and provide advice for visiting Paris (restaurants, tips of the neighborhood, etc. ..). Throughout your stay, we are at your disposal to listen to you, inform, advise and help you to spend a stay as pleasant as possible.
house_rules: The hours of arrival at the apartment agreed in advance by appointment: Arrival time from 1 pm Departure time before 10 am Breakfast from 8 am during the week- and 9 am during tne week-end. Opening hours Monday to Saturday from 9am to 7 pm If arriving outside of opening hours, an additional 25 euros will be requested. You can come and leave your luggage upon arrival or before your departure, during the opening hours of our office.
host_about:
Bonjour à tous !

J'espère avoir le plaisir de vous recevoir bientôt !

space: This real 1 bedroom apartment sits at 2 mins walking distance from Le Sacré-Coeur, in a Montmartre in a quiet street. 3 tiny floors easy to climb, I swear. It offers a double bed in the separated and a sofa convertible into a real bed (a cradle can be added) in the main room, so 4 people can live a good life here : fully equipped kitchen, Internet, TV, DVD.. but the interesting things stand obviously outside : churches, art galleries, old pavement at day time; straight to Pigalle, or a short metro trip to Bastille, Les Halles, St Germain at night...
description: This real 1 bedroom apartment sits at 2 mins walking distance from Le Sacré-Coeur, in a Montmartre in a quiet street. 3 tiny floors easy to climb, and you feel at home. space: A very sunny apartment, forth floor, living-room, equipped kitchen,a bedroom with cloth dressing . Tv,internet, close to Danrémont street and Abbesses street where you can find bakers, butchers, restaurants and supermarkets; 10 mn by foot from Montmartre . Subway : Lamarck- Caulincourt (line 12), 5mn by foot . At the far end of the street, bus no 95 to go to St lazare, Opéra, Louvres, Jardin des Tuileries and St Germain des Prés . You can rent a bike with "vélib" in the street . Montmartre is a typical parisian district perfect for a stay in Paris, quiet but also lively with a lot of restaurants in Marcadet, Danrémont and lamarck streets .  Charming Abbesses street is 10 mn by foot with cafés, outside bars, wonderful for shopping . You can get the funicular at the end of Abbesses street to climb up to Le Sacré-coeur and if you come down from Lepic street, then you get to Pigalle .

space: Voici mon home sweet home… Ce deux pièces de 50 m2 est situé au plein coeur du quartier vivant d'Oberkampf, entre le métro Parmentier (ligne 3, à 4mn) Ménilmontant (ligne 2, à 4mn), Oberkampf (ligne 9 et 5, à 10mn) et à 15mn à pied de République. Idéal pour un séjour entre amis, ou un jeune couple avec un bébé et un enfant. space: Luminious 2 rooms appartment (for 1 to 4 people) located at the 4th floor (without lift) of a beautiful and calm "haussmanien" building in the 18th district. Well arranged and fully equiped, the flat is both functional and charming with parquet and mouldings. Typically parisian! The sofa is a real double bed. The living room is equiped with a flat TV. Wifi is accessible anywhere in the appartment.  In the kitchen, there are :  - a big fridge - ceramic hobs - a micro wave - an electric oven All kitchen tools are at your disposal. Air dryer is at your disposal in the bathroom. Located 5 min walking from the metro station and several bus lines (84, 31), you will easily access the nicest Parisian spots : Arc de Triomphe, Champs Elysées, Sacré Coeur, Notre Dame de Paris... All convenience food stores are right down the street. Do not hesitate to contact me for any question, I'll be happy to answer. Cheers ! Yasmina & Thibault

space: Lovely apartment with antique wood floor located in the heart of old Paris next to metro StPaul (line 1), next to Carnavalet, Picasso museum, Maison européenne de la photographie, place des Vosges, Hotel de Ville, place de la Bastille. The neighbourhood is calm, but restaurants and bars are just 5mn walking from home. 3rd floor with elevator. The flat is composed of 2 bedrooms and the living-room.  The living-room and the largest bedroom overlook the street. The other bedroom has view on the courtyard, as well as the kitchen. The kitchen is fully furnished : washing machine, gas+electric oven, microwave oven, fridge. Bathroom, separated toilet. Electric heating in each room. WIFI, TV, landline phone, and a choice of various guide books to find all necessary informations and tips about the city!

space: In the area of OBERKAMPF and the french movie " les triplettes de Belleville", nice and cosy sunny apartment in the 4th floor very well located in the center of Paris. You will be very closed to the Marais, Canal St Martin, Père Lachaise cimetery and Bastille.There are some grocery store, shops, retaurants and pubs around the apartment. The place offers all the confort you need for a nice stay in Paris. PERFECT for a COUPLE. The apartement is divided into several rooms:  one living room, a dressing room, a cute and little bedroom under the roof ( so romantic for a couple), a bathroom with shower and toilet, a kitchen with a microwave oven.fridge... You will have some towels, sheets and free access to wifi. The subway line around the apartment are Parmentier ( line 3); Goncourt ( line 11), Republique ( line 3, 5, 8, 9, 11) You are most welcome in my sweet apartment and Marie will be pleased to meet you. Have a nice trip in Paris

space: Hello, We are a couple working in the cinema business and we have a 2 years old child. Our apartment is facing the famous Père Lachaise cemetery. It is 75sqm big, has 2 bedrooms (each 12sqm) and a large living room of 30 sqm. We are located at 1 minute walking distance from the subway station "Père Lachaise". Line 2 and 3 are available which means you are in 5 minutes in the center of Paris (Line 3 Station Sentier) or in Montmartre (Line 2 Station Anvers). We have one room with a king-size bed, a living room with a sofa bed and a couch in our child's room, hence there is room for 5 people + 1 little child. Our bathroom has a large bathtub and the kitchen is fully equiped : fridge, oven, dishwasher... A washing machine and tumble-dryer are also available. Wifi connection and a home cinema are also available! We are also 2mins walk from Gambetta, which is a very lively neighboorhood, full of nice restaurants, cinema and theater venues. Best regards, M & B

host_about:
Hello,
I am working in the cinema business and have a 6 years old child.
The apartment is facing the famous Père Lachaise cemetery. It is 75sqm, has 2 bedrooms (each 12sqm) and a large living room of 30 sqm.
It is located at 2 minutes walking distance from the subway station "Père Lachaise". Line 2 and 3 are available which means you are in 15 minutes in the center of Paris (Line 3 Station Sentier) or in Montmartre (Line 2 Station Anvers).
It has one room with a king-size bed, one room with a single bed which opens to a double bed, and a sofa bed for 2 in the living room, hence there is room for 6 people.
The bathroom has a large bathtub and the kitchen is fully equiped : fridge, oven, dishwasher... A washing machine and tumble-dryer are also available. Wifi connection and a home cinema are also available!
It is also 2mins walk from Gambetta, which is a very lively neighboorhood, full of nice restaurants (Fooding Guide!), cinema and theater venues.
Best regards,
Matthieu

space: What is really cool :  - excellent location (center Paris, République station, 5 métro lines). Easy from Charles de Gaulle or Orly airport, Gare du Nord, Gare de Lyon or Gare de l'Est.  - highly original decoration (like a boat). Unique ?    - old typical Parisian building fully renovated - what guests wrote about "Le Bateau".  - very young, safe - have a look at the "canal Saint-Martin" 2 min walk - very quiet, very good for working, very good for resting - comme un "cocon" - everything new inside - excellent bed - towels, sheets clean but not ironed  - excellent TV with Blue-ray reader,hair-dryer - wifi,  - ready for cooking (but you may prefer many restaurants around) - shower for 2 people (2 rain shower) - I am serious What is not so cool :  - not suitable for more than 2 - it is not a big apartment  (20 m2) - the 2 persons have to be in love  - access to the bed needs a foot on the chair - unfortunately not suitable for overweight and handicaped persons  - the 5 m corridor between

Smoking allowed, only in the kitchen

space: Lovely 32m2 apartment nestled between Montmartre stairs, near the Sacré Coeur and Rue Lepic. Located Rue des Trois Frères this apartment includes: -> a fully equiped kitchen -> a living-room with cable tv and sofas a little tired -> a comfortable bedroom with a queen size bed (TEDIBER) -> a small bathroom with a bathtub -> bed linens + bath towels With an elevator the apartment is very calm and situated in the heart of Montmartre is moments from grocery shops, bakery (the very same one that serves the Elysée), supermarkets, charming restaurants, little boutiques, Colignon shop, café des 2 moulins, rue Lepic, the Moulin Rouge, and the Sacré Coeur! You will appreciate the natural light filing of the flat the most of the day, and the decoration. Come on and enjoy Paris! Subway stations: Abbesses (line 12) or Anvers or Pigalle (line 12 and 2).

house_rules: It's forbidden to smoke in the flat It's forbidden to do party Respect of the place and of the neighbours IMPORTANT : If ever you lose keys, if ever you block them in the door, if ever you slam the door by forgetting keys inside, the expenses of serrurier or revision of key will be at your expense - Attention it can be very expensive, especially when the key is blocked inside the lock! - FEES OUT OF CAUTION -
host_about:
Je suis cameraman, j'adore le cinéma, les repas entre amis, lire un bouquin ou boire des verres avec mes amis sur les terrasses parisiennes, profiter de tout ce qu'offre Paris : expo, musée, salles de concerts, et architecture unique. 
J'ai vécu un an en Australie, un an au Canada, et voyagé dans divers pays : l'Europe biensûr, la Thaïlande, le Laos, le Cambodge, Hong-Kong, Macao, Indonésie, le Mexique, les Etats-Unis, l'Inde, îles Andaman, Egypte, Pérou, Bolivie, Brésil, Cuba, et la Jordanie, du coup je parle un peu anglais ;-)
L'idée de trouver un endroit chaleureux pour dormir lorsqu'on arrive d'un long voyage est le principal, après, c'est à nous de nous imprégner de la ville et de ses habitants, de découvrir et se perdre dans les rues! C'est à ce moment là que les choses deviennent intéressantes...

host_about:
Bonjour,
My name is delphine with my family we are owner of  PARIS SELECT
 de l'Europe, Paris.zerosixsixseptdixsept quatre vingt treize dix neuf,,
 APARTMENT IN PARIS we manage  few beautiful apartments in Paris very well situated, clean and very central.
My schedul are always checked you can book if I don't answer to your questions,it may be very late or I could be busy so don't hesitate to go ahead and book apartment .

See you soon in Paris 
au revoir

delphine

Washing machine, Wifi, cable TV. Quiet courtyard bedroom with bed either a single or double (opens up;)) and sofa in front room which turns into a large single bed (1m90 long), comfortable for sleeping but noisier than bedroom as overlooking a pedestrianised street - not too noisy if windows are closed, as located on the 4th floor. Small kitchen and bathroom (including - very mini - bathtub, probably the smallest in Paris ;)). Total 27 square metres, very well distributed, feels spacious for a small flat. Supermarket within 2 minutes' walking distance open daily until midnight. The area is full of restaurants, inexpensive and varied. Animated street and neighbourhood. No elevator. For spor

access: I  have not moved out all of my belongings from the flat so it will not be empty but I will leave sufficient space in the cupboards and hangers for you to spread out and feel at home:)
interaction: I am happy to give you advice on places to go out/eat/visit, and very reactive to any messages you may send me both before and during your stay. If I am not in Paris you will still be able to reach me via email and I will do my best to find a solution for you, if necessary via my relatives in Paris.
host_about:
I LOVE: acting, music, theatre, running trails, traveling, music, cinema, partying, family and friends:)
Food: I love Japanese food (ANY TYPE) but also like indulging on smelly french cheese I'm partly Greek, partly French and partly English and have lived in all three, plus in Mexico where I became passionate about Latin American culture. My dream is to travel to Argentina one day...!

I love staying in places which have a personal touch to them, and I do my best to keep my place as cosy and welcoming as possible for travelers:)!

My motto: CARPE DIEM!

space: Refined and sunny apartment of 24 square meters on the Left Bank, with design furniture and works of art. Very well situated in the historic center of Paris (at  5 minutes walking distance of River La Seine, Jardin des Plantes, Panthéon, Ile Saint-Louis, Arènes de Lutèce). Located on the third floor of an XVIIIth century building with a lovely arborized courtyard and lift. Completely renovated in July 2012 and fully equiped: washed machine, dishwasher, fridge with freezer compartment, microwave, vacuum cleaner,  iron, hairdryer, flat screen, internet, double bed (140 cm). Large bathroom with an italian shower and dressing. Large kitchen corner. Electric heating. Refined household linen and bath sheets. Books of art and guide books at disposal.Very well served by public transport (subway/lines 7 & 10: Jussieu, Cardinal Lemoine/ bus: (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)). Very good traditionnal French restaurants either in the building (Moissonnier),in the street (Au moulin à vent. Chez Henri) or very

transit: Excellente et multiple desserte en transports publics: - 7 lignes de bus : 63 (Gare de Lyon- 15 mn), 47 (Gare de l'Est- 30 mn), 89 (Gare du Montparnasse-20mn), 24 (Gare Saint-Lazarre-30 mn). - 2 lignes de métro:  7 (station Jussieu) et 10 (station Cardinal Lemoine et Jussieu) - Batobus à 200 m sur La Seine Accès aux aéroports: - Aéroport de Roissy Charles de Gaulle à 30-45 mn en taxi (prix fixe 55 euros bagages inclus) ou 1 bonne heure et demi avec  le train jusqu'à la Gare du Nord puis le métro avec un changement (Ligne 4 direction Porte d'Orléans jusqu'à Odéon  et Ligne 10 direction Mairie d'Ivry/Villejuif jusqu'à Cardinal Lemoine ou Jussieu).  - aéroport d'Orly à 25 mn en taxi (prix fixe 30 euros bagages inclus) ou 1h15 environ avec métro et Orly Rail.
interaction: A disposition des voyageurs pour conseiller et réserver un restaurant,  un taxi, suggérer des visites culturelles ou des adresses pour un shopping hors des sentiers battus  et bien sûr assister  en cas de problème de santé ou autre.

space: Our apartment is 54 sq. meters (700 sq. feet), suits 2 to 4 people (ideal for a couple and two people). It’s very sunny, with 5 windows including 3 overlooking a park, calm, 19th century building, parquet floor, 2 fireplaces, plants. We are on the first French floor of a 19th century Haussmann-style walk-up building equipped with a security system and an intercom. It has white walls, a parquet floor, 2.60m high ceilings, and windows overlooking a peaceful public garden and quiet street. There are many shops close by, and the apartment is near two different metro stations (lines 9 and 3). There is a little hall that has recessed shelves. Three windows draped with curtains brighten the double living room split by a charming archway. It is furnished with an antique dining table (8 pers.), small sofa and two chairs, two decorative fireplaces, a large wall mirror, a recessed closet, a stereo, and a telephone. A hammock is available. Separation by a thick curtain. High-speed Internet access

Good lighting, a window and a skylight north to south, with blackout blinds. 5th and last floor of an ancient 17th century building, small volume.
description: I rent a room of about 11m2 atypical attic under the roof, with a large bed 2 places. The room is on the floor of a small apartment with a kitchenette, a lounge and a small bathroom / shower. The kitchen is also common for scheduled breakfast. Charming small room (11m2) under the roofs of Paris. The room is quiet and silent, the bed is large (1.8mx1.9m). Accessible via a trapdoor, see pic. house_rules: L'appartement est partagé, en bas la cuisine, salle de bains et wc. En haut, la chambre en question avec son grand lit.  Elle dispose d'une fenêtre de toit et petite lucarne occultable. Il faut être soigneux avec le bois qui est omniprésent et sensible aux éponges humides etc. Fumeur possible - mais pas dans la chambre. Animaux accepté, si pas grande taille, à discuter, chats ou chiens...;-)
host_about:
Originaire de la région Bretagne et vivant à Paris depuis 2001, j'aime faire des rencontres par delà les frontières.
Je partage donc parfois mon petit chez moi.
Quand bien même si mon appartement ressemble davantage a un bungalow qu'a un appartement haussmannien! 
Grand gabarit, vous êtes prévenu!
Quant aux sportifs, bienvenu, il faut monter 5 petits étages!
J'aime la musique variété, le cinéma, l'économie et la politique...ainsi que l'automobile au sens large.
Je voyage seulement en UE, ou Maroc, mais espère avoir les moyens de visiter de plus lointain (Website hidden by Airbnb) le Brésil, Argentine, Uruguay, Cuba...lol
On peut rêver, c'est cela qui donne du courage !

space: Spacious by Parisian standards, this 645 sq ft/60m2 loft features an open floor plan and high ceilings. It is located on the 2nd floor (Europe & UK) or 3rd floor (America & Asia) of a debut of the century industrial type building, with a view to a calm and planted yard. It is very comfortable for 2 people, comfortable for 4, and a bit less comfortable for 6 people, as there is one double bed in the room and 2 double convertible beds in the living-room. The main room is composed of a lounge area, dining area, open kitchen, and office space. The south-facing wall of windows lets in plenty of  natural light, and the couches are arranged to take full advantage of both this and the flat-screen, Full HD TV with an Android TV box, allows access to international TV channels and internet content; both this and the general wifi are connected via optical fiber for optimal speed. The uncluttered desk space and two rolling office chairs are perfect if you’re in Paris for work, need a place for your
description: Unique industrial loft built in 1928 as a garment design/production workshop. Refurbished in a minimalist style, it retains historical features such as an expanse of multi-paned windows and exposed metal beams. Located in an interior courtyard, it is protected from street noise. Ideal for couples, families, and professionals alike! * Please respect the permanent residents of the building. Any incidents involving late noise or parties will result in a penalty fee being taken from the deposit. * Spacious by Parisian standards, this 645 sq ft/60m2 loft features an open floor plan and high ceilings. It is very comfortable for 2 people, comfortable for 4, and a bit less comfortable for 6 people, as there is one double bed in the room and 2 double convertible beds in the living-room. The main room is composed of a lounge area,
transit: The loft is near both the Sentier and Réaumur-Sebastopol metro stations. There are various public parking lots around. If you prefer to move more quickly than foot without the hassle of a car, there are numerous self-service bike rental stations nearby.
access: All of the flat is accessible.
house_rules: - NO LATE GATHERING OR PARTY ARE ALLOWED - IN CASE OF EXCESSIVE NOISE AT NIGHT, NEIGHBORHOOD DISTURBANCES OR PARTIES, THE RESERVATION WILL BE CANCELED, A PENALTY FROM THE DEPOSIT WILL BE TAKEN AND THE POLICE WILL BE ASKED TO ACT. - The neighborhood is really calm, so thanks to respect this tranquility: Limit the noise from 10pm, both in the apartment, in the courtyard as well as stairs. - The floor is noisy, so thank you to remove your shoes at night to minimize noise. - Occupancy is limited to the number of tenants provided when booking, either to sleep, for dinners, or for other gatherings. - This flat is non-smoking. - No pets are allowed.
host_about:
I am Raphael, a conscious entrepreneur, yogi, and meditator.
I work on digital projects to impact the world in a positive way.
I do that while traveling the world as a digital nomad.
I love discovering new places, surf, yoga, meditation.
Thanks in advance if you rent my flat, you will support me a lot in spreading awareness to the world!

space: The apartment is on the 1st floor, with elevator! The towels,shower gel, shampoo etc are all provided! Unlimited ultra-high speed wifi access is also included! The apartment is freshly renovated, and it's pretty big, 55 m2 is a very luxurious size for an apartment inside Paris, with a spacious living room and a separate big bedroom. The bed in the bedroom is double-sized, and I also have a double sized air bed for 2 extra people. The kitchen is equipped with an electric stove, oven, microwave, fridge, laundry machine AND dryer so you can save money if your clothes need to be washed! The bathroom is also separated from the toilet so you can bask in the bubbles and steam of the newly installed bathtub without having to worry about being disturbed! Bed linens, Blankets, Pillows, Towels and Kitchen utensils are also provided. And there's a cute little balcony! Yeah! host_about:
Hey my future guests, 

My name is Yuntao, I'm 32 years old. I work in a Finance company.
I am very open minded, easy going and laid back.

I'm curious and always excited about the world and life. I love reading, swimming, extreme sports, making friends and travelling. I have travelled to over 70 counties when I was a student. I guess I understand well your needs on the trip and I will try my best to make you feel home at my place. 

Feel free to send me an message if you're interested in my NEW apartment :)

All the best,
Yuntao

space: Mon B&B se situe dans le quartier branché de  Ménilmontant dans le XXème arrond. de Paris. De nombreux restaurants et salles de concert animent les environs. Le quartier est un lieu de vie très parisien, populaire et authentique.  Il s'agit d'un studio avec une entrée privée, une salle de bains privée, un bureau avec accès internet, un espace salon et une chambre avec un lit double (140x200). Bien que le quartier soit animé, on dort très bien au calme dans ce petit nid douillet.  Le petit-déjeuner est servi dans une très belle cuisine/salle à manger à l'heure qui vous conviendra. Etant cuisinière à mes heures perdus, j'aime plus que tout faire de plantureux petit-déjeuner avec des produits faits maison. Ce premier repas de la journée est un moment privilégié de rencontre et de convivialité. Les transports en commun permettent un accès direct à tous les monuments de Paris soit en bus, soit en métro. En bus, la Tour Eiffel et le centre de Paris sont à 20 minutes. En métro, vous serez à M

space: Loft (duplex) in Gambetta 70m2. 3 open floors. Ideal for Two people with a baby (a baby room downstairs since the 8th january:). Or its also perfect for a couple traveling in Paris on an honeymoon. 2 bathrooms One in the baby bedroom downstairs and an another one upstair. Wide Open kitchen.  Great light and open space.  Cosy with a little garden perfect for breakfast in the summer.   Close to metro line 3 line 2 and many buses.  5 min from père lachaise. Close to 'the Belleviloise'  (bar/concert/brunches), Maroquinerie an Mama Shelter bar. Its a very atypic place for Paris. It used to be a fashion factory and has a great cosy feel to it. We love our place and created a great nest.

space: Beautiful home of 60 m2 in the best place of Paris. This appartment has a really nice and big living room, a nice a spacious kitchen, a bathroom and and bedroom with a confortable big bed and a view on Paris, on the Sacré Coeur and the Moulin de la Galette. All the furnitures of the house are made in wood, industriel but cosy, typic but orned with contemporary art like street art. The appartment is very clean, class and spacious.  You will find all that you might need, from the clothes cleaning machine to great contemporary art book, Internet high speed, silence and good neighborhood. You will find around this place all touristic things like Sacré Coeur, house of Vincent Van Gogh, Dali Museum, Les Abbesses, le Moulin Rouge and much more. But not only, there are also the most trendy shop and bars in Paris, it's the equivalent of Le Marais but on a hill. The 9th arrondissement is also great to spend time, to hang out, it's 5 mn walk !  Good restaurants, trendy bars, concept stores, museu

space: My bright and modern studio offers everything you need for your vacations. The living room communicates onto an open fully equipped kitchen with a nice breakfast bar, while the bed is separated from the rest of the space by a bookshelf. You can get some work done while sitting at the desk in front of a large window. You will also find an elegant bathroom with a bathtub where you can truly indulge yourself. The building is located right on the bank of the Seine river (Quai de Montebello 75005 Paris), in one of the most typical and central areas of the city.
description: A wonderful and comfortable holiday awaits you in my apartment in Paris! My bright and modern studio offers everything you need for your vacations. The living room communicates onto an open fully equipped kitchen with a nice breakfast bar, while the bed is separated from the rest of the space by a bookshelf. You can get some work done while sitting at the desk in front of a large window. You will also find an elegant bathroom with a bathtub where you can truly indulge yourself. The building is located right on the bank of the Seine river (Quai de Montebello 75005 Paris), in one of the most typical and central areas of the city. The whole apartment! I will be pleased to give you tips and advices on the neighborhood. Also please feel free to ask for any specific needs that would make your trip unforgettable! This is truly a wonderful location in the City of Light. Your neighborhood, the Latin Quarter, is packed with bars, cafés, restaurants and shops, and it places you within easy walkin
transit: 3 minutes walk from main subway lines (1, 4, 10 and 11) and regional train station (RER Saint Michel-Notre Dame). 10 minutes from major attractions (the Louvre, Saint-Germain-des-Prés, Ile de la Cité & Ile Saint-Louis, Hôtel de Ville, the Pantheon...) 40 minutes by train direct from Roissy Charles de Gaulle airport.
access: The whole apartment!
interaction: I will be pleased to give you tips and advices on the neighborhood. Also please feel free to ask for any specific needs that would make your trip unforgettable!
house_rules: There is no specific rule other than enjoying yourselves. Make yourself at home and take care of the apartment just as if it was your own, and please pay extra attention to our lovely neighbors as it's a residential building. We know you'll be astonished by the apartment and the view when you get in, so you'll be allowed to yell a big "WOW" when you get in.
host_about: I live half of the time in New York after having spent most of my life in Paris. Come stay at my apartment in Paris while I'm not there, where you'll meet my family who've lived in the neighborhood for years too. I enjoy travelling using Airbnb to find hidden places, and meeting nice people from around the world.

space: Nous sommes une famille avec 2 enfants (8 ans et 11 ans), non fumeurs. Notre loft de 100m², situé en rez de chaussée d'un immeuble typique du 11ème, est très agréable, très calme et idéalement situé rue du Fg St Antoine.  A quelques minutes de Bastille et du Marais vous pourrez visiter le centre de Paris à pieds très facilement, faire du shopping le long du Faubourg et profiter de tous les bons restaurants et cafés typiques. Les métros les plus proches sont Ledru Rollin et Faidherbe Chaligny. L'appartement possède une cour privative de 25m² dans laquelle il est très agréable de manger et se reposer. Nous avons conçu cet appartement comme une maison de campagne. Vous vous y sentirez au calme tout en profitant de ce quartier extremement agréable et vivant. Le loft est composé de  -  2 chambres : 1 chambre pour adultes (avec un lit double de 160cm) et une chambre d'enfants  équipée de 2 lits superposés ( les lits superposés peuvent être utilisés par des enfants ou des adultes) - 2 salles

space: Lovely quiet flat in Montmartre, next to Sacré Coeur (150m), bright, double exposure. One dinning room with a large table and one living room with a sofa, two armchairs and a table. An open and equiped kitchen with gas cooktop, oven, dishwasher, food processor, lots of cooking books, washing machine, Nespresso, fridge and a deep freeze. One spacious bedroom with old style parquet and a double bed The sofa in the living room can also be opened as a double bed Nice and atypical bathroom with large shower and one sink. Separated toilet. 4th floor (no elevator) Enlivened neighbourhood with bars, restaurants, shops (very good baker just across the street!), markets Subway, Velib (free to use bikes) and buses next to the door: direct subway lines to the 4 train station, St Germain, Champs Elysées, île Saint-Louis...

You can shop, visit, take time at the terrace of a coffee shop that Parisians love so much. 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom and 1 separate washroom/WC 1 vast living room (35sqm / 380sqft) with open kitchen 1 washing machine / 1 dryer / 1 dish washer Nespresso coffee machine and toaster for your French breakfasts all furnished with exquisite taste at the Heart of Paris.

space: Welcome to Paris! Have a great time. Should you stay with us, we will do everything imaginable to facilitate your best stay possible, this is our promise to you. We have not yet had a guest who did not love the place. Large two bedrooms apartment 969 sq ft (90 m²) with two nice terraces quiet and not overlooked and with a private car park. It comfortably sleeps 5 to 7 guests.  Location, location, location. It is in the middle of the nicest areas of Paris, between 7th and 16th district, at a few minutes walking of the Eiffel Tower and Seine River. Very close the New Beaugrenelle Shopping Mall, to many fashion shops, varied restaurants, bars coffees, sport clubs and cinemas. And above all the apartment is particularly quiet.  Very modern Building and well protected, finished in 2001 with a Videophone & Interphone Systems, located on the garden floor. The two rooms, the living room and the kitchen overlook the two terraces that will let you take a good breakfast or dine leisurely getaway.

interaction: Communication, Communication, Communication. Please don't hesitate to call if you have any question, need to know something about the apartment or simply ask for any advice. At the check in time, we will be waiting for you at the apartment to hand over the keys and show you the facilities. Arrival / Departure:      * Check in time between 3 pm and 7 pm. Should you plan to arrive outside these hours, please let us know your estimated time of arrival so that we can find an arrangement.  * Check out time before 11am. Possibility to leave later whether there is no customer that day. Professional house cleaning/maintenance is usually performed between  11am-3pm.
house_rules: Here are 2 tips to keep a good relations with the neighbors and make a big difference in your quality of stay. 1. Say hello. A friendly smile and wave to a neighbor to create a pleasant atmosphere. 2. Turn your music down. This is a simple peacekeeper, tried and true.  The flat should be returned in its original condition and state of cleanliness. Smoking allowed only on terraces. Please, no smoking inside. Our neighbors are quiet and private, please be mindful of that, no parties allowed. Welcome to Paris! Have a great time. Should you stay with us, we will do everything imaginable to facilitate your best stay possible, this is our promise to you. We have not yet had a guest who did not love the place. Thanks,

space: Appartement en RDC - Sur cour - Très calme - Beaucoup de charme, décoration atypique incitant aux voyages, 52 m2 - Peut se louer opur un pour un couple avec un enfant jusqu’à 10/12 ans. Cuisine équipée ou l on peut manger, WC séparés, Salle de bains avec petite baignoire, grand salon, grande chambre avec dressing - WI FI - livres, CD, TV écran plat - Cheminée. Spécialiste du tourisme et en particulier français, je saurai vous donner toutes les informations nécessaires pour passer un agréable séjour à Paris et alentours. space: House on 3 levels, fully renovated by an architect, in a quiet setting and remote from Telegraph street. Ideal for couples and families with children.
description: A CHARMING TOWN HOUSE, WITH GARDEN AND PARKING, IN A PEACEFUL QUARTER OF PARIS ! House on 3 levels, fully renovated by an architect, in a quiet setting and remote from Telegraph street. Ideal for couples and families with children. Ground floor : living room and kitchen with direct access to the garden. 1st floor : two bedrooms, a bathroom with bath, and separate toilet. 2nd floor : a room, a dressing room and a second bathroom with shower. In the basement, laundry room (washing machine and dryer) and pantry. AV/IT equipment : Wi-Fi, Hi-fi, video projector. Complete equipment for children and babies : high chair, bed, changing table. Please beware : only one toilet, staircase a bit steep to climb to the second floor ! Parking space with security. The house is located on the heights of Ménilmontant, near the Pere-Lachaise Cemetery, Belleville and Buttes-Chaumont Park. In the heart of a lively area. Thanks to its elevation, Ménilmontant hill area offers beautiful views over Paris. Many s
transit: The metro is 2 minutes walk. Fast connection with the historical and tourist center of Paris (10 minutes to Republique, 15 minutes to Châtelet and Hôtel de Ville, by line 11). Bus 96 towards Saint-Michel, Saint Germain, Montparnasse. Convenient acccess by Highways A1, A3 and A4.

space: Very lovely apartment/loft. Ideal for a couple. One big room, with the bed separated by a glass wall (see pictures). Second floor in an old typical french building which used to be a hotel a long time ago. 34 meters squared (= 365 ft squared) It is situated in the wellknown "Cour des petites écuries" in the 10th which is very nice because it's an old pavement street with almost no cars, with trees, and restaurants. It's very very calm, except in the summer at night people stand out of the bars but there is double glazing on each window so you don't hear anything if you want to stay at home. It's a very eclectic and young neighborhood. Less than one minute walk from rue du Faubourg St Denis which is a a very animated street with a lot of food commerces, cafés and restaurants. It is less than 5 minutes walk from a lot of tube lines (L4, L8, L9, L7, L5) and a lot of buses. It is very close to Gare de L'est and Gare du Nord and 10 minutes walk from Canal St Martin.  The apartment has 4 win

I hope you will feel at home in my apartment and I look forward to meeting you!

The Montmartre house finally reopens its doors after a year of absence! I am delighted to welcome you again in our splendid house :) Six rooms: Four bedrooms, each with a bathroom/shower room and a toilet, a large living-dining room, equipped kitchen, laundry room. Ceiling high 13 ft., atelier-style. Living room/dining room featuring: hardwood flooring, fireplace, and large bay windows.  The room has a large table with eight chairs. interaction: I am almost always there as I live next door, so don't hesitate to ask in case of problems, or when you need help :)
house_rules: Les fêtes, réceptions, événements, cérémonies post ou pré mariages... sont interdites ! La maison est dans un passage privé au clame. Sinon, pas de véritable règle à part celle de profiter ! La maison est grande, au calme avec une terrasse sur le toit. Vous pouvez donc profiter à l'intérieur comme à l'extérieur. La maison est non fumeur mais vous avez 4 espaces pour fumer, donc un par étage : rdc : la cour anglaise privative, 1er étage : petit balcon, 2è étage : terrasse sur le toit, Sous-sol : terrasse privative. Tous les locataires que j'ai reçu ont toujours été très respectueux de la maison, je n'ai jamais rien eu d'abîmer ! Je crois que quand on se sent comme chez soi quelquepart, finalement on y apporte la même attention et la même délicatesse !
host_about: I m a happy mummy, I have a little child (almost 5 years old). I work at home, I rent my other house to travellers. I like this job because I meet new people, different cultures... I love Paris, I love Montmartre and I take a lot of pleasure introducing the neighbourhood and the city to my guests. I worked before on the internet as  specialist of ads and communication. I like cinema, theatres, concerts and pictures .... Paris is such a good city to enjoy all cultural things. We like to walk in mountains with my husband. I like sport too, I use to run and to swim ! But my favourite job is spending time with my little boy ;)

space: Carefully maintained, high-standard apartment located on a fourth floor of a 19th century Haussmanian building with a small but practical two people elevator. Apartment is situated between place de la Bastille, place de la Republique, the Père Lachaise Cemetery and only 15 minutes walk to the Marais district. The building lies in a central location, yet in a very quiet street in Paris’ 11th district. Renowned for its wooden furniture workshops and handicrafts school, the area boasts several nationally renowned restaurants, as well as a nightlife hotspot of Rue de Lappe. Traces of area’s vibrant rebellious history, its pre-revolutionary 18th century decadent lifestyle dotted with workmen’s bars can be easily spotted in a labyrinth of small alleys and narrow passages leading towards Place de la Bastille along rue de Charenton, rue de Faubourg Saint Antoine, rue de Charonne, and rue de la Roquette.  This neighborhood provides a bit out of ordinary yet genuine Parisian experience with its

space: Large loft with 2 terraces which can welcome 4 people. Enjoy a glass of wine or a cup of coffee on either of the 2 terraces of this nicely decorated loft apartment situated in the quiet 16th arrondissement of Paris.  A modern living area highlighted by bright colours includes a comfortable sofa bed. Find a snug double bed in a cosy living room which also features a large, mirrored wardrobe. The fully-equipped kitchen and dining area opens onto the terrace and is a nice place to prepare and eat meals. Relax after a long day in the corner tub placed in the bathroom.  Porte Dauphine Metro Station is just 300 metres away and directly serves the Arc de Triomphe monument, Moulin Rouge and Père Lachaise Cemetery. The Avenue Foch RER (Regional Express Network) Station lies within the same distance. Walk in 10 minutes to the iconic Eiffel Tower. Many high class shops, restaurants and bars are in close proximity.

space: ONLY AVAILABLE from JULY 1 - 23 A very small, yet cozy modern studio (14m2), located on the sixth floor (with an elevator), and includes a pull-out sofa-bed, bathroom/shower, and kitchenette (with a small fridge, stove plaques and a small oven). The place gets GREAT sunlight, and there'll be space for you to hang your clothes on the rolling rack.  The studio is located in the 11th arrondissement and conveniently located in front of the metro Rue des Boulets (line 9) - a direct line to get you to such popular places like Galeries Lafayette, Grands Boulevards, République, Canal St. Martin and the popular Oberkampf district. (It is also very close to Nation and Faidherbe-Chaligny). There is a laundry mat and grocery store (Franprix, Bio C Bon) located just across the street, along with several cafés and great restaurants nearby (see below for more details)! space: This beautiful 2-bedroom 646 sq.ft (60 sq.m) apartment is typical for Paris with its high ceilings, wooden floors. It faces both North and South, therefore has a lot of light all day, it is quiet with its noise-proof windows, and has a small balcony with a nice view from the 5th floor.Master bedroom with double queen-size bed (160 x 200 cm), luxury bedding, bedside tables and lamps. Marble mantelpiece fireplace, access to the balcony.Second bedroom with double bed (140 x 200 cm), bedside table. Marble mantelpiece fireplace.Lively living room, wooden table with six chairs. A comfortable sofa turns into an additional two-person bed if needed. Antique stove.Separate kitchen fully equipped, with micro-wave + traditional oven, dishwasher, washing machine (no dryer, but cloth line provided), fridge, stove, coffee machine. Cutlery, knives, mugs, pans, and pots provided.Bathroom with bathtub. Mirror, sink, electric towel dryer.The corridor leading to all the rooms is also where two big closets
description: This 646 sq. ft 3-room flat, renovated in 2014, is typically Parisian and can host 6. Facing both North and South, it has high ceilings, wooden floors, and a balcony. Bathroom, separated toilet, kitchen. 5th floor with elevator. Central North Paris. This beautiful 2-bedroom 646 sq.ft (60 sq.m) apartment is typical for Paris with its high ceilings, wooden floors. It faces both North and South, therefore has a lot of light all day, it is quiet with its noise-proof windows, and has a small balcony with a nice view from the 5th floor.Master bedroom with double queen-size bed (160 x 200 cm), luxury bedding, bedside tables and lamps. Marble mantelpiece fireplace, access to the balcony.Second bedroom with double bed (140 x 200 cm), bedside table. Marble mantelpiece fireplace.Lively living room, wooden table with six chairs. A comfortable sofa turns into an additional two-person bed if needed. Antique stove.Separate kitchen fully equipped, with micro-wave + traditional oven, dishwasher, washin
transit: Easy access airports and train stations: - 1 hour from Roissy Charles de Gaulle airport. - 45 minutes from Orly airport. - 10 minutes from the Eurostar arrival at Gare du Nord train station. Ask me for directions.
access: You will have the exclusive use of the whole apartment for yourself. A set of keys will be given to you. Numerous shelves and closets will be left free for your luggage. The beds will be made for you and according to your needs the sofa will be converted into a two-person bed or not. Linen and towels will be provided. Household products will be provided.
interaction: When you arrive, you will find the keys under the door mat and be able to let yourselves in. A welcome book on the table will tell you how to get around the neighbourhood and where the good places are located (supermarket, bakery, restaurants, parks).   Travellers check out by simply letting the keys on the table and leaving.
house_rules: Non-smoking flat.Loud parties forbidden.When checking out, please empty the fridge and take down the trash.
host_about:
Hello,

I originally came on Airbnb to help my mom rent our family cottage house in Normandy. I loved the Airbnb experience, including when I tried it as a guest. So it was only natural that when I moved to live in Hong Kong I decided to rent my Parisian flat on Airbnb. I live back in it when I return to Paris.

I am a professional photographer. You can see my photos online by searching "Pictobank" on the Internet.

I love meeting people of all around the world.

Lucas

Bonjour,

Je suis venu sur Airbnb d'abord pour aider ma mère à louer notre chaumière de famille en Normandie. J'ai beaucoup aimé mon expérience Airbnb, y compris quand je l'ai essayée en tant que voyageur. C'est donc tout naturellement que quand j'ai déménagé à Hong Kong pour y vivre, j'ai listé mon appartement sur Airbnb. J'y habite moi-même souvent quand je retourne à Paris.

Je suis photographe professionnel. Vous pouvez voir mes photos sur mon portfolio en cherchant "Pictobank" sur Internet.

J'aime rencontrer des gens de tous les pays.

Lucas

space: Spacious Paris studio apartment ideally located in the heart of Saint Germain des Prés, just beside the lively place Saint André des Arts and the famous place Saint Michel. Easy walking distance to river Seine, Ile de la cité and Notre Dame Cathedral. Many good cafes and restaurants nearby to discover the rela Paris.  The studio is located on the 5th floor of 17th century building (without (Website hidden by Airbnb) is a loft of 40 square meters for 4 people, very bright with no vis-à-vis, very high roof and a fire place. You will stay in an historical place with a lot of "caché". It was tastfully renewed very recently : modern fully equiped kitchen area (fridge, owen, hotplate) opened on the living room, a beautiful bathroom with a bathtub, visible beams, a comfortable double bed and two single beds. The apartment is fully equiped with cable tv, wifi access.  It is really ideal for successful Paris vacation rental in a very cosy and typical place.  You can walk to every famous places

space: My lovely, quiet and charming apartment is ideally situated at 5 or 10 minutes walking from Sacré Coeur's garden.Situated at the first floor of an old and charming parisian building, it has a nice garden's view. It's very quiet and bright. The room is equipped of a very comfortable bed, king size, in a nice 2 bedroom apartment (35 m2 ), with wooden floor and many books and artworks. Be careful ! The two rooms are opening to each other (only a mid wall, as you can see on pictures) Separated WC and bathroom. Separated and full furnished kitchen Free WIFI and illimited phone. (in France !) The neighborhood is lively with many restaurants and shops in the nearby.  It is 2 min walking from metro with two lines crossing ( 4 and 12)  and numerous buses (85, 31, 38).  There is a very easy access from all train stations and from airports because the metro line 4 is going directly and quickly to the train station Gare du Nord and Gare de l'Est  It is also very close to Sacré Coeur and his square

space: Charming two room apartment for rent. Located in a 17th century 'hotel particulier' (a private historical mansion) in the heart of the Marais.  The area is extremely lively and is right in the center of Paris, within a few steps from museums [and other historical points of interest, lake Notre-Dame].  Apartment is on the 2nd floor and has beautiful views overlooking the peaceful cobbled courtyard of the building. The apartment sleeps 2 people comfortably, but could accommodate up to 4 people (using the fold out bed in the living room). The apartment is housed in a heritage protected building and is safely secured with an entrance door accessible via code from the street and a buzzer for the apartment.  The apartment is 40m2 and is newly renovated. It is made up of one bedroom with a double bed (160cm), a living room with a fold out bed and fully equipped kitchen (fridge, freezer, coffee maker, kettle, grill, microwave, oven, dishwasher, washing machine and 2 large closets). The fold up

Code sur rue A5927

space: A very central and nice apartment near from a great place like Louvre, Opera, Palais Royal, Tuileries, place Vendôme and a lot of fashion shop like Colette. I rent my apartment minimum four days. There is one bed room and a new sofa double bed in the living. It is  comfortable and you can have a break in the rush if you visit Paris : between Opera and the Louvre, you can walk around, then go home to have a lunch, a nap... and then go out again to explore the parisian night.  No need to take any transportation : a lot of places can be visited by walking. The area is very famous and "chic" : nice restaurants, perfect mood, a lot of shops... You can sleep in the double bed or in the couch in the living. Open it, it's for two people and it's comfortable.  I let you clean sheets and towels and you can feel home in my cosy place.  The flat is very secure : you'll need to know three codes to reach it.  Three metro station can be reached easily within five minutes : Opera, Palais Royal and Pyr

host_about:
Bonjour,
Nous sommes Nicolas et Olivier, nous sommes tous les 2 originaires de Paris.
Nous aimons beaucoup voyager, l'an dernier nous sommes allés à San Francisco, Rio, Barcelone etc... 
Nous prévoyons d'aller à Los Angeles cet été et de séjourner dans une maison grâce à Airbnb.
Nous aimons le cinéma, dîner entre amis, nous serons heureux de faire profiter de notre appartement à des voyageurs désireux d'être au coeur de la vie Parisienne.

space: Quartier MAILLOT /FOCH/CHAMPS ELYSEES: location 2 pieces,32 m2  , décoré dans un style simple et raffiné : une cuisine avec tous les ustensiles nécessaires, cafetière, four micro-ondes, frigo avec freezer, machine à café, bouilloire, linge de maison et vaisselle fournis. La salle de bain est équipée d’une douche, lavabo et sèche cheveux. Pour un confort optimal, un coin salle à manger avec table et chaises, table et fer à repasser. Ideal pour participe a tous les salons parisiens Un appartement  idéal pour une escapade en amoureux dans la magnifique ville de Paris. space: This cozy apartment of 54 m2 (54 square meters) is for 3 people maximum, situated on the 5th floor with elevator located in the XIth arrondissement (PARIS 75011) between Bastille and Père Lachaise and 10 minutes walking from the Marais. The neighborhood is quiet, many shops, restaurants, bars, brasseries nearby. Close to metro lines numbers 1,8 and 9.Many open-air markets (Alligre and Richard Lenoir) a few minutes walk.Very bright, with a terrace of 22 m2 with trees and furnished with lounge outdoor electrical barbecue and sun loungers.The apartment consists of a living room with sofa (as a single bed for the third guest), coffee table and a dining area with a table top (bar) for 6 people. Independent kitchen equipped with 4 ceramic hobs, refrigerator, washing machine, dishwasher, Nespresso coffee machine.A bathroom with (Website hidden by Airbnb) bedroom king size bed 160x200 cm. Home sweet home, double glazed windows in all rooms. A part of the apartment overlooks the street (quiet)
