house_rules: Casa K. est un lieu de lumière, de paix et de confort aménagé dans l'esprit du respect de soi et du voisinage. La remise des passeports est à prévoir à l'entrée sur les lieux en échange des clés. Attention : votre caution couvrira les frais concernant : dégradations, vandalisme, malpropreté, nuisances sonores et incidents avec le voisinage). Sauf demande expresse d'une femme de ménage (20€/2h), le locataire est tenu de veiller lui-même au soin et à la propreté des lieux. Évidemment, au moment de rendre les clés, vous êtes tenu de nettoyer parfaitement la maison et le linge ou payer en supplément un forfait de 100 € pour les services de nettoyage. *** Casa K. is a place of light, peace and comfort built in the spirit of self-respect and the neighborhood. Your passeport is to be planned to leave at the owner in the entrance in Casa K. in exchange for keys. The caution will cover : damages, vandalism, dirt, noise pollution, behavioural incidents.  You are expected to assure yourself the c
host_about:
I am a woman, 47, French born and raised in Paris. I have a 14 years old son. In few words : second degree hunour and sincerity. Independence and generosity. Familly and friends.
I like Jazz, Classical music ...if you are cool and very careful a turntable at your disposal. I am a Gardner ; I also I like many things as Books, Design, Photo, Collage, Tweaking ... 
I do sport : swimming and cycling. Walking near the beach, among trees, flowers and gardens .. make me feel happy.
I like to share ideas and passions. I am open minded : colors, religions, ... The very important thing is respect. So I am very attentive to the welfare of my guests and neighbors. 
I am very clean and perfectly careful with my belongings, my appartment and property of others.
I expect the same from you.
I will do the necessary for you to have the most pleasant stay in my house. I await with pleasure and I look forward to making your acquaintance. See you soon!
Best regards,
Kea


French, english and spanish spoken .

PS : The color blue is one of trust, honesty and loyalty. It is sincere, reserved and quiet. Blue seeks peace and tranquility above everything else, promoting both physical and mental relaxation. It reduces stress, creating a sense of calmness, relaxation and order.

space: Odile welcomes you in a charming, bright, self-catering flat, located in Le Marais, in the heart of Paris, minutes away from Notre-Dame and Centre Georges Pompidou. Le Marais is a very trendy, dynamic, historical area of Paris.  This ideally located flat is perfect for those looking to stroll around Paris. Nearby places of interest include Picasso Museum, Le Louvres, Ile St-Louis and the romantic river Seine bank. You can dine at typical French bistros of Le Marais and enjoy a great shopping experience in the many luxury and vintage boutiques. Night life is very exciting in Le Marais with many bars and clubs available for all tastes. The flat, situated on the 2nd floor at the back of the house overlooking a courtyard, can accommodate three people. It includes a large bedroom area with a queen size double bedand a single fold bed , a fully-fitted open-plan kitchen and bathroom, all fully refurbished. Amenities include TV,wireless Internet,  hairdryer, toweldryer, bed linen and bath towe

En cas d'arrivée tardive,il faut avertir l'hôte pour la remise des clés. Les départs doivent avoir lieux avant midi. En cas de nécessité ,l'hôte mettra à disposition un endroit pour les bagages .
host_about:
My name is Odile . And I live in right in the heart of Paris,France, very near Notre-Dame and the river Seine . I’m married and I have two children and also a grandson. I’ve been living in Paris for twenty years and before that I sent most of my life in Central Africa, working in the medical field .  My main interests besides making pictures are Archaeology,Paleoanthropology and History.  I enjoy travelling and meeting different people and different cultural worlds.
I'm a 3D hobbyist artist.

Mon nom est Odile. Et je vis dans en plein cœur de Paris, en France, tout près de Notre-Dame et de la Seine. Je suis mariée et j'ai deux enfants et aussi un petit-fils. Je vis à Paris depuis vingt ans et avant cela j'ai passé la plupart de ma vie en Afrique centrale, en travaillant dans le domaine médical. Mes principaux centres d'intérêt  sont l' archéologie, la paléoanthropologie et l'histoire. J'aime voyager et rencontrer des gens  et des univers culturels différents .
Je suis aussi une artiste 3D amateur.:)

space: Being a traveler myself, I try to provide you with a great accomodation and to help make your stay in Paris as great an experience as possible! The flat has been refursbished (walls have been painted, shower and bathroom re done completely during summer 2015) The flat, cosy and convenient, is 40m2 (420 sq ft.). The apartment is facing an interior courtyard, and is thus very quiet. The apartment has a  bedroom with a super comfortable bed for two (160cm large), as well as a pull-out sofa in the living-room part suitable for 2 people. (please note that the two are separated by a sliding door: my flat is a studio the size of a one bedroom flat - cf. pictures). The place thus fits up to 4 people cosily! It is fully renovated, with modern design and technology equipment. The flat is fully furnished, including a 40" flat screen TV, dvd player (and a large selection of DVDs!), Wi-Fi, LAN Internet, etc. The kitchen is modern and equipped with a washing machine, a microwave, a kettle, a dishwas
description: 42sqm bright and fully furnished studio, sleeping 4. Located in the heart of Paris, in a secure area, within walking distance of many tourist spots, and very well connected to public transportation. After having rented my flat on Airbnb in 2013 and 2014, I have decided to invest in its refurbishment to offer you a better experience in 2015. I Hope you will like it! (new bathroom / shower, flat painting redone entirely, rearrangement) Do contact me if you have any question :) Being a traveler myself, I try to provide you with a great accomodation and to help make your stay in Paris as great an experience as possible! The flat has been refursbished (walls have been painted, shower and bathroom re done completely during summer 2015) The flat, cosy and convenient, is 40m2 (420 sq ft.). The apartment is facing an interior courtyard, and is thus very quiet. The apartment has a  bedroom with a super comfortable bed for two (160cm large), as well as a pull-out sofa in the living-room part suit
transit: METRO :  - 1 minute walk away from the Champs-Élysées and Avenue Montaigne, core of luxury shopping in Paris - 50 yards from a major police station (the flat is close to the presidential palace - I can't think of a safer neighborhood in Paris) - 2 minutes walk to the metro Champs Elysées Clémenceau or Franklin Roosevelt, Metro lines 1, 9 & 13. There are 2 stations Velib within 100 meters, and a few taxi stations very close by as well - 2 minutes walk away from museum of Grand Palais - 5 minutes walk away from the Seine - 10 minutes walk away from the Eiffel Tower - Very easy to get from the airport (either the Air France car until Invalides, and then its a 5 minutes walk; or by RER and then direct with the subway to Franklin Roosevelt, a 5 minutes walk as well).
interaction: I will also provide you with a list of recommended restaurants (several very good ones with good value can be found within a 15 minutes walk, like Café Constant) and can even book you in a couple of those, like Colorova, my favorite brunch place in Paris, or for dinner, Galopin or Le Timbre (among many other possibilities), some of my favorites "bistronomic" restaurants (great food at good value, in bistro-type settings). I will be available should you have any question regarding your stay in Paris.
house_rules: Check out is 11 AM  Late check in (after 10PM) : 20€
host_about:
Hi! I am Meryem. I've been living in Paris for the past 8 years, where I've studied and now work, in a consulting firm. 

I love music, travel, good food and meeting new people! I would be glad to host you in my flat and to provide you with recommendations so that you can make the best of your experience in Paris!

Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any question :)

house_rules: The main rule is to be careful not to wake up the inhabitants of the bulding if you come home a bit late (do not show up totally drunk at 5 a.m. and sing, per exemple). Old appartments in Paris are beautiful but sound isolation is not perfect. We are very careful not to disturb the neighborhoods.  We do not allow our guests to bring strangers to the appartment, and no loud music. Apart from that, we will be happy to host clean, tidy and smily people. The apartment has now become totally NON SMOKER.

Antoine a vécu 3 ans a Londres, travaille dans la publicité et connait aussi bien les meilleurs bars de Paris que les expos a ne pas manquer!

Cheers :-)

space: Lovely little house in the heart of Paris, situated in a courtyard off a picturesque street, just a stone's throw from the Place des Vosges and the bustle of the Bastille. One bedroom duplex with open plan kitchen/living/dining on the ground floor that opens out on to green private terrace (15m2) and guest washroom with a washing machine. Beautiful stone staircase leads up to second floor which has small library loft, bathroom, with bathtub and a bedroom with a big closet. The entire second floor opens has a second private terrace (9 m2). Customized furniture offers a desk space and a tv with cable and wifi internet. The neighborhood is close to great shopping (even open on Sundays, which is rare for Paris), food and nightlife, as well as national museums and close to public transportation. Within 10 minutes walk, you can enjoy the Picasso Museum, or stand in front of the gorgeous Notre Dame. The kitchen is well equipped with everything you might need to pick up something at the wonder

space: Open-spaced studio 25 Sqm apartment is perfectly situated in the heart of Paris, in the pedestrian area of Montorgueil (referred to by some guides as Le Marais). Surrounded by multiple restaurants and cafes, the apartment is located in a quiet and historical area, made famous by D’Artagnan previously living on the same street. On the fourth floor of an authentic Parisian building by the stairs. Totally renovated and fully furnished, includes a living room equipped with a double convertible sofabed + a single one, an open kitchen with combined microwave, ceramic stoves, fridge, kitchenware etc., and is completed by a bathroom esuiqpped with italian style shower cabin + toilets. You will appreciate its well-organized layout and bright main room. This cosy Parisian apartment will be perfect for your stay, either short-term or long-term, and can comfortably accommodate two/three people total.
description: Very central studio in bustling Montorgueil, near les Halles underground hub, less then 10mn from Paris centers of interest. host_about:
Hi,
I am Italian and along with my team we manage properties for Italian and non-resident owners in Paris + some other European cities. 
All our flats are designed and fully furnished. They will be your perfect second home in Paris. The quality, locations and equipment are very good. We are foreigners and frequent travellers ourselves, so if you travel for business or leisure you will find the service, comfort and quality you need for a memorable stay. 
We will be more than happy to help you in italian, french, english, spanish, russian or swedish.
We will give you the best tips for your short or long parisian stay. I even run a leading event organization for international people coming to Paris; we hold events every week so you might find some nice meetup to join and mingle around.

If you need to be picked up at the airport we can send you a driver that we work with since a long time ago. From CDG to Paris it is 75€ and from Orly 55€. He take maximum 4 persons. 

We hope to welcome you soon!

space: République, Oberkampf, Le Marais, Bastille : a magical place if you want to live like a real Parisian or like to party. There is no better part of Paris to have a diner in typical little restaurants, have a drink and meet new people. This is a very typical and lovely neighbourhood!  A lot of restaurants in the street, 5 minutes walk from the Marais, a popular food market in the street twice a week, subway (lines 9, 5, 3 and 8) and a bicycle (Velib) station  right on the corner... Everything is downstair ! The apartment is located in a quiet street, at the first floor, with a beautiful patio. DESCRIPTION:  Capacity : 4 people, ideal for a family with 2 children. space: Located on one of the main avenues leading to Place de la Bastille and The Opera Bastille, and  1 block from the Marais, this apartment is on the 5rd (Lift) and last floor of a nearly 20st Century walk up building, in a very lively area, protected from overlook by a large central reservation, very quiet night and day. It has been entirely refurbished by an architect in 2011. You come in a very light and spacious flat; It has a large open space with high ceilings.The fully equipped kitchen is opened to a large living room. The double-glazed windows are facing trees, rooftops and Sacré-Cœur Basilica. You can access the circular private balcony with a spectacular 270° view of Paris from every room.   Continuing to the more private part:Bedroom, with double-glazed windows, a king size bed, a unique Art Deco chest of drawers  and armchair. Bathroom and toilet are independent, like the laundry with a washing machine.  Situated a few steps away from the Place des Vosges and its fine art galle

Gare de Lyon, Line 1 and 8 are also in walking distance.  From the Airports, I would recommend the shuttles if you are many, and the RER B to Gare du Nord if you are alone (50 mn).

Free phone calls to 100 different countries, including US mobile phones  Gay-Friendly No pets, except mine ;-)  No loud music, arguments or partying. Guests are expected to be well behaved and not to intimidate or offend any of the other residents. Flexible Check-in/ Check-out You will find a welcome book with all information about the apartment and points of interest in the neighbourhood.
host_about:
Hi! I'm sales manager in hospitality & digital marketing. I live in Paris, love it and know it quite well. I can help you plan your journey in this wonderful city and give you both tourist and non-tourist good addresses. 
I like to travel and visit cities: Living in an apartment instead of an hotel is the best way to feel the ambiance!  Decoration is very personal, so that you can really feel the typical parisian luxury but trendy style ! 
Not to mention "Luna", my lovely she cat. She will contribute to your memorable experience in my flat. 

I like my guests to take care of my apartment and I do the same when we travel in others houses.

Welcome home!

space: Amazing view of the Arènes de Lutèce! Large family-style apartment, very sunny and quiet, in the Latin Quarter. This apartment's exceptional location, steps away from the Jussieu Métro stop, will enable you to discover the heart of historic Paris: the Arènes of Lutèce, the Jardin des Plantes and its museum, the Panthéon, the banks of the Seine river, Notre-Dame, the Luxembourg Garden, the rue Mouffetard and its open-air market - all within an easy stroll. The apartment is located in a traditional Parisian building dating from 1840's. The apartment comprised of two levels: on the 6th floor (the last floor of the building) is a living room with a mezzanine, an open kitchen, a study with an upright piano, an office and a small bathroom. In the office, a staircase goes down to the 5th floor and the bedrooms (two connecting children's bedrooms and a master bedroom, all three with views of the garden) and a bathroom. In the study there is a fold-out couch that sleeps two. On the mezzanine, t

space: Maison 1400 is a designated landmark 15th Century townhouse that has been carefully restored and decorated in 2006 by a well-known architect/interior designer. One of the oldest houses in Paris (circa 1432), it is a robust structure of thick stone walls, many fine fireplaces, ancient wood-beamed ceilings and well-worn floors of terra cotta tile, oak plank and rustic limestone. It is located in the heart of the Old Marais, or 4th arrondisement, near Hôtel de Ville and Pompidou Center.  The neighborhood is teeming with restaurants, shops, museums and is considered the liveliest quarter in town, yet our street is very quiet.  Nearby Rue Rambuteau is the local market street with a variety food purveyors of all kinds, including award-winning bakeries. Very nearby is one of the finest spas in Paris, offering massage, beauty treatments & luxury hammam, frequented by celebrities.  The house features several living areas, four bedrooms, four and a half baths, two kitchens and two kitchenettes.
description: This unique, luxurious property is one of the oldest standing townhouses in Paris, built in 1432. It has been beautifully restored and decorated by an internationally-known interior designer, and stands on a quiet corner in the heart of the Marais. transit: Metro Stations "Hotel de Ville" & "Rambuteau" are within 4 blocks, bus service runs within 2 blocks, and Velib free bike system is across the street.
access: The townhouse has its own private entry on a quiet street.  All six levels of the townhouse are available to the guests, accessible by the circular staircase.
interaction: The owner, or the housekeeper will greet guests but will not reside at the property during their stay.
house_rules: As this is a very special property which is carefully maintained and beautifully appointed, we ask guests to respect the house and its contents accordingly.  No pets allowed. As the main entry has a digital-code keypad for access, it is imperative that this code is not to be given out to anyone other than guests staying in the townhouse. Since this neighborhood of narrow medieval streets means there is close proximity to neighbors, window curtains should be drawn as discretion dictates (at night). The lights in the main stairwell are set on a five-minute timer to conserve energy, and we ask that all lights and equipment be turned off when nobody is at home.
host_about:
I'm a lucky humanist living in the world's greatest civic achievement when not on a secluded pink beach.

I believe travel is the best education.

I enjoy nothing more than sharing my home with friends, family and the like-minded few who value grace.

space: Center of Paris, Le HAUT MARIAIS House on 2 floors (75M2) in the XIth district of Paris, just a step from the Haut Marais district, Casa K. is a life space bright and clean, where you can enjoy the atypical charm of a studio/loft and beautiful vibrations due to the plants for instance ;-). Ideal for the tourist or professional travels. Casa K. offers all the comfort and amenities you're looking for in 65m2: *  In the first floor you will find a bathroom (bathtub) and independent toilets + a private bed room (10m2) : 2 beds as a double bed (1.60 meters large) and a clothes cabinet, a chair, a desk. * And common areas in the the second floor which gives acces to a living room (Hi-fi and wifi) and a kitchen equipped with a refrigerator and freezer, a washing machine, a cooker, an oven and a micro-wave. Linen and towels, games are at your disposal.
description: Center of Paris - LE HAUT MARAIS  *** A charming place of comfort  when you travel to Paris. English spoken, Spanish also. access: All the apartment except my bedroom and my dressing room. The record player (turntable) and the records are very precious to me so I did not authorize the use in my absence.
interaction: I am totally available to discuss and share with my guests. If they have doubts, I'm here to advise and to best meet their expectations. If they request it and if I'm OK, I can help them in their visits. Everything is perfectly open in a spirit of understanding and mutual respect.
house_rules: K. Casa is a place of light, peace and comfort housed in the spirit of self-respect and the neighborhood. I appreciate the orderly environments, clean and fragrant. But if ever a perfume is not for you, thank you to let me know so that we choisissions one that suits us, together. The concept of cleanliness is important. Unless specifically requested a housekeeper (20 € / 2h), the tenant is obliged to ensure himself to the care and cleanliness in his room but also the common rooms (we recommend that you attach to it once a week at least, for sanitary and kitchen: after each use). As I myself do for our comfort and pleasure. Obviously, when giving back the key, you are required to clean the room perfectly, linen, bedding equipment (duvet, pillow, mattress topper for stays of one month at least). Or pay an extra fee of € 100 for cleaning services.
host_about:
I am a woman, 47, French born and raised in Paris. I have a 14 years old son. In few words : second degree hunour and sincerity. Independence and generosity. Familly and friends.
I like Jazz, Classical music ...if you are cool and very careful a turntable at your disposal. I am a Gardner ; I also I like many things as Books, Design, Photo, Collage, Tweaking ... 
I do sport : swimming and cycling. Walking near the beach, among trees, flowers and gardens .. make me feel happy.
I like to share ideas and passions. I am open minded : colors, religions, ... The very important thing is respect. So I am very attentive to the welfare of my guests and neighbors. 
I am very clean and perfectly careful with my belongings, my appartment and property of others.
I expect the same from you.
I will do the necessary for you to have the most pleasant stay in my house. I await with pleasure and I look forward to making your acquaintance. See you soon!
Best regards,
Kea


French, english and spanish spoken .

PS : The color blue is one of trust, honesty and loyalty. It is sincere, reserved and quiet. Blue seeks peace and tranquility above everything else, promoting both physical and mental relaxation. It reduces stress, creating a sense of calmness, relaxation and order.

space: Ideally located in the 3rd district, between the historic and beautiful Marais and the connected, cosmopolitan and lively 10th district, this family flat (80m2) would be perfect for visiting Paris. In a quiet street near the Porte Saint-Martin, this charming duplex can welcome from 2 to 4 people (even 6). At the 5th floor (no elevator) of a 18th century building, you will enjoy the amazing view, with the Pompidou Center, Notre Dame, the Montparnasse tower, and all the roofs of the city, and you'll benefit from the sun a big part of the day. Two independent levels with two bathrooms. Around 80 m2, the first floor is composed of an all equipped kitchen, a dining room and living room with two daybeds from the 50's, designed by Pierre Chapo (two people can sleep on them), a children bedroom with two single beds, (children or teenagers), an independent WC, and a bathroom with shower. Upstairs there is an office, a spacious and luminous bedroom with a queen size bed (160X200), a bathroom (tw

I am a photographer and mother of two boys. I speak English and a bit of spanish.
I know very well Paris and the neighborhood, the places where the food is good, museums and all the trendy places.
I rent my apartment out for people who apreciate vintage design and good taste - and who will take a good care of it. 
I travel a lot and like to make my space usefull to travelers in Paris.

space: Beautiful, light and spacious (860 square feet) apartment to let in the celebrated Montmartre quartier. Quiet residential neighborhood, very convenient transportation. Fully equipped and connected (cable TV and high speed broadband Internet connection), it should have special appeal for arts and music lovers with a taste for the village-like atmosphere of old Paris, as it features a (tuned) piano and several paintings. Sleeps up to five. Shops, restaurants and daily street market nearby. space: Charming little studio is situated near Montmartre and its Sacré-Coeur basilica, Tertre place and as well near Pigalle and it's famous Moulin Rouge and others.  Studio is a short walk away from Montmartre’s many attractions, boutiques, restaurants, galleries, artist workshop, café and bars. It’s also from 5 minutes away to all the shops, supermarkets and pharmacy.  2min walk from the studio, there is one of the best bakery in Paris - best fresh baguettes and croissants, perfect for french breakfast:) 3 metro stations at your reach will get you anywhere in Paris in less than 20 minutes. There are as well bus stops at less than 5min away.
description: This cozy & bright little studio it's a perfect cocoon for a couple or friends that want to enjoy a true parisian getaway! Charming little studio is situated near Montmartre and its Sacré-Coeur basilica, Tertre place and as well near Pigalle and it's famous Moulin Rouge and others.  Studio is a short walk away from Montmartre’s many attractions, boutiques, restaurants, galleries, artist workshop, café and bars. It’s also from 5 minutes away to all the shops, supermarkets and pharmacy.  2min walk from the studio, there is one of the best bakery in Paris - best fresh baguettes and croissants, perfect for french breakfast:) 3 metro stations at your reach will get you anywhere in Paris in less than 20 minutes. There are as well bus stops at less than 5min away.
house_rules: The studio is no smoking.
host_about: Hi, I'm D, I like to travel and I travel whenever the opportunity presents itself. I love meeting new ppl and experiencing new things. I live in Paris and I enjoy it a lot! Well there you go, a little bit about me;)

space: Ideal for a trip to Paris, the location of this apartment is in the Montmartre district of Paris, a few meters from the funicular of the Sacred Heart and less than 100 meters from Abbesses metro station (line 12). The functional apartment of 40 sqm, located in the second courtyard of the building is very quiet. The apartment can accommodate up to 4 people. Better equipped than a B & B, the apartment consists of a living room (with wall bed 2 places) with an LCD TV, a PC / Apple, internet, and free access to landline phone numbers of104 countries, with a room safe, a kitchen with a dishwasher, a washing machine, oven, 4 hotplates, a modern bathroom with a jacuzzi bath, shower that include multi-jets, and a hammam for your relaxation and well-being. The apartment is also equipped with air conditioning. Finally, the rental price of this Parisian apartment includes bed linen, blankets, towels, hair dryers irons ...

space: Beautiful apartment with exposed beams, building from 1700. Very bright, orientation South / Southwest. Old-style floating floor. Very quiet, living room on the street, other rooms on the courtyard.   Large living room with 4.5 meters high ceiling, cathedral structure. Fireplace, corner sofa/bed, sitting area, dining area, library corner. Separate room overlooking courtyard with private bathroom. The mezzanine (access with scale) has a large bed for 2 people + DVD player corner. Ideal for teenagers : limited height (max. 1,5meters). Separated WC. Fully functional and equipped : washing machine, dishwasher, dryer, iron and ironing boards, tables, desks, imac 27 ', etc.. Located on the 4th floor (no elevator, elegant stair with French tomettes) Location: Metro: 1 minute walk from Vaneau 3mn from Duroc, 6 minutes from Sevres-Babylone, 7 minutes from Montparnasse-Bienvenue, 8 minutes from Rennes, Saint-Sulpice and Saint-Placide Walking distance from famous places: 4 minutes to "Bon Marché"

space: 1 bed 140cm x 190cm Bed linens and towels are provided. The kitchen is practical, with window as well.  The bathroom is equiped with a shower, a washing machine is also available. Central heating when it is cold. The place is quiet and peacefull as you close the door yet situated in center of Paris. This spot offers you all the commodities you need as transports, shopping, leisures and cultures. You will appreciate movies, Opera de Bastille, Museum, sights seeing. Many restaurants and supermarkets nearby. Charming street market 2 times a week ( thursday and sunday from morning to 2 pm ) Fashion boutiques and designer clothes boutiques are steps walking. From CDG airport take RER B to Gare du Nord. From Gare du Nord or Gare de l'Est direct to Richard Lenoir station by metro line 5

house_rules: Respect the neighborhood. Avoid noise between 22h and 8h. Do not smoke in the apartment but on the balcony. no pets. Do not leave trash in public areas, there is a garbage chute near the elevator or bins in the basement.
host_about:
hello , I am French citizen with yellow skin. I quit China in childhood, and I live totally like French yet I understand both culture. I like travelling very much in Asia countries, in where I go pretty oftently to China , Thailande , Korea, and Philippine.
In Europe I like visiting South area for its climate like Spain, Italy, and lately Portugal. Maybe nextly if I have time I would like to discover north Europe as well. I had opportunity to stay in Germany recently that I enjoyed totally.
As I like travelling, I practice running , because I can train regularly anywhere, anytime as amator, sometimes it happens I join a race. 
I enjoy movies , and restaurants with friends and my two teenagers and husband. 
Very open minded, and helpful my husband and I will welcome you and assist you for any request.

space: This elegant and comfortable apartment in the centre of Paris is the ideal spot to really experience an authentic Parisian lifestyle and will allow guests the chance to discover its charming neighbourhood and walk around the many places of interest in the capital. Located on the border of the Marais close to the famous Picasso Museum and the popular Place de la Bastille, and near to the historical Place des Vosges, the busy shopping street of Bretagne, the beautiful Richard Lenoir market and the festive Cirque d’Hiver, this peaceful apartment will welcome visitors within the extremely quiet courtyard of a XIX century convent. The accommodation is just a 15 minute walk from the Île Saint Louis, Notre Dame Cathedral and the Centre Georges Pompidou. The nearest metro station Saint Sébastien froissard, on line 8, is just 150 metres away and leads directly to the l’Opéra Garnier, the Place de la Concorde and the emblematic Eiffel Tower. Moreover there is the additional option of metro line

house_rules: Appartement destiné à la location saisonnière. Les fumeurs sont acceptés a condition d'aller sur la terrasse ! Les animaux sont acceptées sous certaines conditions ... Une caution est demandée à l'arrivée en cas de dégradations eventuelles, et sera rendue si tout va bien !  Respect de l'habitation et du voisinage sont les maitres mots ... mais cela va de soi !! a très bientôt, Carole
host_about: Passionnée de voyages et de Paris, j'adore recevoir des visiteurs pour leur faire partager ma passion ! Parler de leur pays ... et de ma ville ! leur donner des infos, des petits trucs pour que le séjour soit plus agréable ... pour qu'ils soient comme chez eux à Paris !

space: 10 minutes walk from Montmartre, 3 minutes from metro lines 4 (Chateau Rouge), 12 (Marcadet-Poissonniers) and 2 (Barbès-Rochechouart), our appartment is located in a lively neighbourhood, with a bakery on the other side of the road, a theatre (Lavoir Moderne) next to it, and a bar next door that could serve you an apéritif, to enjoy in the small courtyard of the building... an ideal starting point for a stay in Paris, 10 minutes by metro of the Gare du Nord station.  The flat is on the second floor of a small, typically Parisian building. The fully equipped kitchen (with washing machine), bathroom and living room have everything you need for a comfortable stay in town. The beautifully decorated bathroom gives an oriental touch to the typically Parisian living room.  We're happy to host you and to give advice on places to visit in Paris, nice bars, restaurants.... Towles, soap, coffee, tea, sugar etc Are at your disposition.

transit: 15 Minuten von der Gare du Nord oder Gare de l'Est entfernt, ist man von der Wohnung schnell an den Metrolinien 4, 12 und 2. Eine Vélibstation (Fahrradvermietung) ist vor der Tür - Autofahren lohnt sich nicht.
access: Die Wohnung ist voll ausgestattet. Wir haben auch ein paar persönliche Sachen, Bücher u.ä., sollten aber nicht stören.
interaction: Die Wohnung wird ganz vermietet, d.h. wir sind nicht vor Ort - gehen aber gerne mit Gästen abends ein Gläschen trinken oder ziegen auch gerne, wenn es zeitlich, ein paar Orte in der Nachbarschaft und in Paris, die wir gerne mögen.
house_rules: Wir hängen an der Wohnung und an der Einrichtung - achtet darauf. Haustiere können nicht mitgebracht werden, rauchen ist kein Problem.
host_about: Je suis de Paris! Mes passions sont les voyages, les langues étrangères et la cuisine!

space: Family apartment 3/4 rooms, ideally located for visiting Paris, between Notre Dame and the Pantheon (5 min walk). Kid / baby super friendly: perfectly equipped for a family with 1 or 2 children and 1 baby. Secure building with caretaker residence, lift, very quiet (no noise). 2 bedrooms: one with double bed, another with single bed + cot (can install an extra bed on floor for a third child). 1 bathroom with shower and bath, washer dryer Kitchen with fridge, freezer, microwave, oven, stove, dish washer, babycook, etc.. Large living room / dining room. Cable TV and wi-fi available. Modern furnishings, design and functionality. The apartment is professionally cleaned before every visit, and we provide fresh bedsheets and towels so you can feel right at home. The apartment does not overlook the street and is very quiet, it is facing other apartments. Neighborhood very quiet and discreet. No animals.

space: Idéalement situé à Paris Est, dans le quartier Père Lachaise_Ménilmontant, l'appartement est au 6e et dernier étage d'un immeuble 1935, sans voisinage. Calme, donnant sur rue et sur cour, la lumière caractérise avant tout cet appartement atypique aux volumes étonnants, avec un salon ouvert sur un espace cuisine-salle à manger. L'appartement bénéficie d'une double exposition SudEst-NordOuest :  l'été, le soleil le traverse tout au long de la journée, avec de jolis couchers de soleil sur le Sacré Coeur (Montmartre) que l'on aperçoit de la cuisine. space: PARIS CENTRE (4 arr) : Metro Saint Paul-Le Marais Hotel de Ville. Dans un immeuble ancien ravalé, je loue studio de charme meublé, avec poutres apparentes, de 30mq. Il se compose d’une  Entrée; d’une Cuisine à l’américaine entièrement équipée (grand frigo, micro-ondes four, table cuisson en vitrocéramique, hotte aspirante, lave-linge); d’une Pièce Principale (avec canapé double convertible en 160 cm, grande armoire); d’une Salle de Bain (avec grande baignoire, bidet et chauffe-eau 100 litres); d’une Cave collective.  Au 1 étage ensoleillé. Les fenêtres sont avec double vitrage, la porte d’entrée est blindée. L’appartement est doté de TV, INTERNET, téléphone gratuit pour les numéros fixes, fer à repasser. description: PARIS CENTRE (4 arr) : Metro Saint Paul-Le Marais Hotel de Ville. Dans un immeuble ancien ravalé, je loue studio de charme meublé, avec poutres apparentes, de 30mq. Il se compose d’une  Entrée; d’une Cuisine à l’américaine entièrement équipée (grand frigo, micro-ondes four, table cuisson en vitrocéramique, hotte aspirante, lave-linge); d’une Pièce Principale (avec canapé double convertible en 160 cm, grande armoire); d’une Salle de Bain (avec grande baignoire, bidet et chauffe-eau 100 litres); d’une Cave collective.  Au 1 étage ensoleillé. Les fenêtres sont avec double vitrage, la porte d’entrée est blindée. L’appartement est doté de TV, INTERNET, téléphone gratuit pour les numéros fixes, fer à repasser. host_about:
Diplômée à l’université de Rome en Littératures, Je suis une femme passionnée d'art, d'histoire de l'Empire Romain, de musique classique Italienne (à part l’opéra j’adore Vivaldi, Marcello et Verdi). J’aime beaucoup aussi danser et skier avec mes enfants. J'aime voyager et découvrir de nouvelles cultures. J’habite entre Paris et Milano, à mon avis la ville la plus belle au monde. 
Sono anche una buona forchetta, mi piacciono i viaggi in giro per il mondo dove scoprire e provare anche le tradizioni culinarie diverse dalle nostre. Ma la mia piu' autentica e grande passione rimane quella per i miei bambini!
Ai miei futuri ospiti voglio dire che non saranno delusi e che troveranno un'accoglienza calorosa ma anche seria nelle case che affitto a PARIGI e sul litorale laziale a SABAUDIA. Vi aspetto con gioia e rimango a disposizione per qualunque chiarimento.
Please do not hesitate to contact me for further information. I would be glad to help you. Thank you,
Francesca

space: Carefully maintained, high-standard apartment located on a fourth floor of a 19th century Haussmanian building with a small but practical two people elevator. Apartment is situated between place de la Bastille, place de la Republique, the Père Lachaise Cemetery and only 15 minutes walk to the Marais district. The building lies in a central location, yet in a very quiet street in Paris’ 11th district. Renowned for its wooden furniture workshops and handicrafts school, the area boasts several nationally renowned restaurants, as well as a nightlife hotspot of Rue de Lappe. Traces of area’s vibrant rebellious history, its pre-revolutionary 18th century decadent lifestyle dotted with workmen’s bars can be easily spotted in a labyrinth of small alleys and narrow passages leading towards Place de la Bastille along rue de Charenton, rue de Faubourg Saint Antoine, rue de Charonne, and rue de la Roquette.  This neighborhood provides a bit out of ordinary yet genuine Parisian experience with its
description: Charming apartment with elevator in an historic building. Located in the very fashionable district 11th of Paris near Place de la Bastille and Gare de Lyon and just a stroll from the beautiful Place des Vosges. It is a trendy district where Parisians live and work while taking advantage of 30 green spaces open to the public. If you like walking, you can stroll along the Canal Saint Martin, famous thanks to the film (Marcel Carné, Hotel du Nord). Near Place de la Bastille, Gare de Lyon, the Père Lachaise Cemetery, and just a stroll from the Marais and its beautiful Place des Vosges. Pompidou Centre is 2.4 km distant, while Notre Dame Cathedral is 2.5 km away. If you like walking, you can stroll along the Canal Saint Martin, famous thanks to the film (Marcel Carné, Hotel du Nord). A great choice for travellers interested in monuments, museums and culture. access: The whole flat. Private parking space on site at an additional cost of 15 EUR per day, subject to availability. LINEN AND TOWELS   You will find 1 double-set consisting of:     - 1 large fitted bed sheet (for bed mattress);  - 1 large duvet cover sheet;   - 2 pillowcases;  - 2 large bath towels (please note that we don’t provide small hand towels);   - 1 bathmat;  - 1 kitchen cloth.   Should you need any extra double-set, please let us know in advance.  Each additional double-set is charged at 40 EUR.
interaction: During your stay we will be available anytime, through SMS, iMessage or WhastApp. To assure our Guests have the best possible holiday experience, we will be permanently available for any assistance request or need, advicing, fixing or supporting within our reach, on local informations and tips, or any unlikely urgent matter or emergency event.
house_rules: Please be aware that the apartment is located in a residential building and that the noise level (TV, music, conversations, laughing…etc…) must be kept to its minimum between 11pm and 6am. Check-in time: 10 am (or later) Check-out time: 4 pm (or earlier) Depending on possibility, it might be possible to do an earlier check-in or later check-out but this need to be agreed. Private parking space on site at an additional cost of 15 EUR per day, subject to availability.

space: Hello, I rent this nice five-room apartment for a family with young children or a couple (However, the apartment - despite its surface - is not suitable for more than 2 adults). The bright apartment is in the 17th district of Paris, in the very pleasant Batignolles neighborhood (this is a cradle of the Impressionists who were reunited under the name "group batignolles" - see photo), at the first floor of a traditional charming parisian building (wooden floor, shaft, mouldings).  We have a wide living room-dining room with a small balcony in every window. space: Charming 2 rooms near Montparnasse district - on a Courtyard, a typical parisian apartment.  Very calm this 45m2 flat is located in the south of Paris (14eme), close to the Catacombs, Tour Montparnasse and Parc Montsouris; 15mn from the center of the city (Notre Dame, Saint Michel, Musée du Louvre, Tour Eiffel, Musée d'Orsay, Musée du Quai Branly, Avenue des Champs-Elysées, Beaubourg/Centre Georges Pompidou......) - It's 5mn  from the subway station "Mouton Duvernet" (line 4) and "Pernety" (line 13) and buses 28, 38, 62 and 68, and 10min from RER B "Denfert Rochereau" (going to CDG Airport and Orly Airport) - Quiet street and the bedroom gives on the courtyard side - Bakeries, Grocery stores 50m from the appartment, lots of shops in the street - Safe neighbourhood The apartment is 45m² - 2nd floor (staircases) - 1 living room, - 1 bedroom with double bed, - a separate kitchen equiped with oven, hot plates, fridge, freezer, toaster, iron, washing-machine (washer dryer) ... - 1 bathroom

transit: Good transport connections:  - Line 4, station Mouton Duvernet:  direct to Saint Germain des Prés (10min), Saint Michel (10min), Chatelet (15min), Gare de l'Est and Gare du Nord (25min)  - Line 13, station Pernety:  direct to Champs Elysées (15min), Gare Saint Lazare and Department stores (20min)  - Line 6, station Denfert Rochereau:  direct to place de l'Etoile (25min), Eiffel Tower (20min), Gare Montparnasse (10min)  - Line RER B, station Denfert Rochereau:  direct to Roissy Charles de Gaulle airport (50min)  - Orly Bus, station Denfert Rochereau:  direct to Orly airport (25min) - Direct buses (Air France coaches) from Roissy-Charles-de-Gaulle & Orly Airports (5/7 min walk). Near Montparnasse train station (5/7 min walk) - Touristic sites located from 15 to 30 min by Metro or Buses : Notre-Dame de Paris, Musée du Louvre, Tour Eiffel, Musée d'Orsay, Musée du Quai Branly, Avenue des Champs-Elysées, Beaubourg/Centre Georges Pompidou...etc
access: - Sheets and towels supplied.  - Internet WiFi connection.
interaction: Je vous accueille dans la mesure du possible le jour de votre arrivée et vous fournis les clés, avec toutes les informations dont vous aurez besoin sur le quartier (les meilleurs restaurants, les meilleurs magasins, des conseils personnalisés selon vos désirs, etc.)
house_rules: - Smoking is not allowed inside. - Don't invite other people that planned travelers. - Please respect the neighborhood; don't be too noisy after 10pm. - When you leave the apartment, leave the dishes clean and tidy - Please remember to take out the trash; the waste bin is in the entrance’s small courtyard, on your left when you go out. Please keep us advise if something happens (breakage, etc.), in order to manage it quickly and easily with you and solve any problems for the next guests. Small things can always happen Thank you and have a very good stay!
host_about:
I'm from Paris. I am working in the Pharmaceutical Marketing industry.
I like travelling, experience new places, cultures and meet new people. Respectful of peoples and cultures, easy going, enjoying lively company as well as quiet moments, very fond of art, theatre, photography and nature.

host_about:
Je suis Françoise,  juriste retraitée, Je vis à Paris depuis très longtemps, mais je suis d'origine bretonne .J'ai d''ailleurs une petite maison au bord de mer en Bretagne où j'aime séjourner. J'aime beaucoup les voyages,l'art et les expositions, le cinéma et l'opéra, ainsi que les randonnées pédestres. 
je suis ravie de mettre mon appartement, lorsque je ne l'occupe pas, à disposition de ceux qui recherchent un lieu de séjour "très parisien" à Paris.

space: This studio apartment is situated between the Marais and Bastille, allowing you easy access the most touristic sites of Paris by walking or with the many metro lines available nearby.  Located on the first floor (with lift) of a traditional building in the Bastille district, it features a small hallway leading to the open living area, equipped with a convertible sofa-bed, filled with natural light from two well-oriented windows. The classically decorated main room has a lovely fireplace, wooden floors, double sofa-bed and amenities such as Wi-Fi internet connection / flat- screen TV , etc. The kitchen is compact and functional. The bathroom is equipped with a shower cabin and toilets. Whether here for business or pleasure, this is the apartment for you!
description: Nice studio with all the base amenities of a home, sofa bed for 2 persons, electric stove, small refrigerator, microwave, bathroom with shower and toilet, next to the Bastille, Gare de Lyon, excellent transport day and night. This studio apartment is situated between the Marais and Bastille, allowing you easy access the most touristic sites of Paris by walking or with the many metro lines available nearby. The classically decorated main room has a lovely fireplace, wooden floors, double sofa-bed and amenities such as Wi-Fi internet connection / flat- screen TV , etc. The kitchen is compact and functional. The bathroom is equipped with a shower cabin and toilets. Whether here for business or pleasure, this is the apartment for you! The apartm
transit: The apartment is conveniently located near subway lines 1, 5, and 8 (Bastille station) that allow you direct access to the eastern train stations, Lyon and North . Many buses, taxi stops and public bicycle "Velib" stations are nearby as well.
access: The apartment is located on the 1st floor (with elevator) of a classic building of the 19th century, in a busy street with a patchwork of restaurants, bars, and shops . It offers a large living room with a loft for added privacy during your nights, a sofa-bed in the corner for 2, a dining table with 4 chairs, a large wardrobe and plenty of storage. The bathroom has a shower, sink, toilet and washing machine. The kitchen is separate and functional with a fridge , stove, microwave and utensils. Stay connected with private internet and wifi, connect to the TV and flat screen which offer a wide range of programs. Linens and bath towels are provided.
interaction: You will be welcomed by the dedicated apartment manager, who will assist you in any way needed for you to settle in and will provide all of the necessary information and recommendations in your area.  Check-out will be organized with them, whether they will be present or not.
house_rules: Respect of the condominium rules and the neighborhood is required, the apartment being located in a residential condominium where the occupants live year-round, it's not an hotel. Guests must respect the apartment and what is put at their disposal, as this one is the habitual residence of a person like them. It is provided in good working order and cleaned, and it is expected that guests let the apartment in a similar state ( additional cleaning done by cleaning lady). Stricly non smoking and no pet allowed.
host_about:
Hi,
I am Italian and along with my team we manage properties for Italian and non-resident owners in Paris + some other European cities. 
All our flats are designed and fully furnished. They will be your perfect second home in Paris. The quality, locations and equipment are very good. We are foreigners and frequent travellers ourselves, so if you travel for business or leisure you will find the service, comfort and quality you need for a memorable stay. 
We will be more than happy to help you in italian, french, english, spanish, russian or swedish.
We will give you the best tips for your short or long parisian stay. I even run a leading event organization for international people coming to Paris; we hold events every week so you might find some nice meetup to join and mingle around.

If you need to be picked up at the airport we can send you a driver that we work with since a long time ago. From CDG to Paris it is 75€ and from Orly 55€. He take maximum 4 persons. 

We hope to welcome you soon!

space: Spacieux et très lumineux deux pièces de 40m2 au pied de la station métro Couronnes (L2) meublé et tout confort comprenant :   - Une chambre avec lit double et rangements,  - Un salon avec TV écran plat, table basse et table à manger,  - Une entrée avec rangements  - Une cuisine avec plaques de cuisson, micro ondes, frigo combiné et accessoires de cuisine,  - Une salle de bain avec baignoire et machine à laver - Un grand balcon avec table extérieure et ses chaises , des baies vitrées qui vous permettront d'admirer l'incroyable vue sur la Tour Eiffel, la Tour Montparnasse et la fameuse basilique du Sacré-cœur.
description: Appartement de 40m2 spacieux et très lumineux avec vue sur (presque) tout Paris :) Spacieux et très lumineux deux pièces de 40m2 au pied de la station métro Couronnes (L2) meublé et tout confort comprenant :   - Une chambre avec lit double et rangements,  - Un salon avec TV écran plat, table basse et table à manger,  - Une entrée avec rangements  - Une cuisine avec plaques de cuisson, micro ondes, frigo combiné et accessoires de cuisine,  - Une salle de bain avec baignoire et machine à laver - Un grand balcon avec table extérieure et ses chaises , des baies vitrées qui vous permettront d'admirer l'incroyable vue sur la Tour Eiffel, la Tour Montparnasse et la fameuse basilique du Sacré-cœur. appartement complet L'appartement se trouve dans un quartier très cosmopolite, branché et animé et qui garde un esprit convivial et parisien. Les quartiers de Ménilmontant, Belleville et République - respectivement à 2,5 et 10 minutes - sont connus pour leurs restaurants, cafés et bars tendances...
transit: Le métro Couronnes (ligne 2) et l’arrêt de bus 96 sont au pied de l'appartement
access: appartement complet
house_rules: respect des voisins et des parties communes, animaux interdits, il est interdit de fumer à l'intérieur de l'appartement mais l'accès au balcon est totalement libre
host_about:
Jeune femme de 27 ans qui aime recevoir et passer de bons moments entre amis. 
Ce  qui m'a le plus attirée chez Airbnb, c'est le caractère cosmopolite de sa communauté, j'adore voyager et découvrir de nouvelles cultures. 
Cette expérience me permettra de recevoir des personnes du bout du monde sans bouger de Paris :)

space: Enjoy your stay in Paris in this lovely and well situated 41 m2 appartment. Please take time to read the annoucement... You'll have two bedrooms, bathroom, living-room together with the kitchen, plus all necessary equipment like TV, DVD player, internet access, washing machine, hair dryer...  It's a family appartment, where 4 persons can sleep, maybe 6. (2, 1+1, 2). It's very quiet and just in front of a park, ideal for children. 80 euros for 4 persons. You will stay in a very charming and quiet area behind Montmartre. Just 10 minutes walk from the Sacré Coeur, Place du Tertre, Pigalle or Abbesses. And 5 minutes walk from différent metro stations (ligne 12 and 4 a bit further). You've got one of the best baguette in Paris 2 minutes walk and lots of restaurants, pubs, supermarket, cheese and food shops... It's a typical parisian district, "a small village" in the big city. You will feel like a Parisian. If you like music, there's plenty a places to hear some. Ask me, I'll help you. Pari

You've got one of the best baguette in Paris 2 minutes walk and lots of restaurants, pubs, supermarket, cheese and food shops... It's a typical parisian district, "a small village" in the big city. host_about:
Je suis enseignante sur Paris. J'ai vécu à l'étranger pendant longtemps, à une époque où j'étais ingénieur.
J'aime la culture au sens large, j'écris un feuilleton littéraire à mes heures perdues.
J'ai deux enfants de 9 et 11 ans. Parfois, pendant les vacances, nous louons notre petit nid montmartrois.
Nous sommes partis à Barcelone et Athènes avec Airbnb.

space: This recently renovated apartment , with its modern and refined style,  offers comfort and tranquility. It consists of a living room opened on a completely equipped kitchen, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom with both shower and bathtub, one separated toilets.
description: This charming apartment (77 sqm with 2 bedrooms)  is located in the hip 7th district of Paris, in front of the lovely market Rue Cler, treasured by locals and tourists, between the Eiffel Tower/Champs de Mars and Place des Invalides ( both 5mn walk), in the heart of the Left Bank and the prestigious and the most bourgeois district of Paris, the 7 EME arrondissement, 10-15 mn walk to Champs Elysées and Avenue Montaigne,  the river La Seine, etc... This recently renovated apartment , with its modern and refined style,  offers comfort and tranquility. It consists of a living room opened on a completely equipped kitchen, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom with both shower and bathtub, one separated toilets. The apartment is accessible by taxi and the public transportation. You have 2 elevators, including one for luggage. You have access to the whole apartment except our personal effects. You are of course asked to take care of its contents and return the apartment in the state you find it. Linen and t
transit: Metro stations TOUR MAUBOURG or ECOLE MILITAIRE or INVALIDES or ALMA-MARCEAU are 5-10 mn walk. Several lines of Metro , RER,  and bus nearby.
access: The apartment is accessible by taxi and the public transportation. You have 2 elevators, including one for luggage. You have access to the whole apartment except our personal effects. You are of course asked to take care of its contents and return the apartment in the state you find it. Linen and towels are provided. Free high speed Wifi, Broadband unlimited access included. flat screen TV Bang & Olufsen music CD player And radio
interaction: You can always contact me if you need anything
house_rules: Sheets, towels, dishes, dishwasher,hair dryer, etc...are provided. You will be a bit like home We expect our guests to take care of the apartment and leave it as is, in terms of storage and cleanliness. No need to wash our laundry. We prefer to do it ourselves, with the right products and at the right temperature, making sure to separate the white from the colors. For long stays ( longer than 1 week), we strongly recommend a housekeeping service with extra charge in order to make sure the apartment remains in an acceptable state.
host_about:
Executive and life Coach. I love Paris and am always willing to share my favorite places with my guests, to advise them on the practical aspects of their stay: visits, transportation, exhibitions, restaurants, shopping...
When I travel, I like as much running exhibitions as lengthening on a beach with a book.
I speak English and I like talking with my guests about their country, knowing more about their culture, their traditions, or simply listening to their impressions on Paris and France...
My guests are generally the ones who share my values: honesty, respect and cleanliness.

I like cooking, walking and discovering new places.

space: The apartment is only at two stations of Paris Center. It is situated on lines n°1 and 6 crossing all over Paris : Bastille, Chatelet Les Halles, Opera, Louvre Museum and Champs Elysees. The apartment is good standing and secured by an entrance code, there is a house-keeper. The studio is spacious and clear. It has a separate kitchen all equiped. The bathroom includes a shower and a bath tub. The "Coulee Verte" is specific of this district. It is situated on the Arts Viaduct, between Bastille and Porte Doree. This walk immerses onself in a bucolic scenery, among rose-trees, aromatic plants, water spaces. Paris is revealed on another side : Hausmannian frontages, high domes, sculptured banisters, the richnesses of the 12nd district are proudly exposed. If you wish an escapade from Paris, you can go to the Daumesnil Lake in the Vincennes wood and do some boating in summer. It is only at four tube stations. You can also bring your children to Euro Disnay, it is only at 45 mn  by undergrou

Navettes directes de l'aéroport Charles de Gaulle.
access: A toutes les parties communes de l'immeuble
interaction: Je serai présente pour la signature du contrat de location et pour les états des lieux d'entrée et de sortie. Pendant le séjour des voyageurs, je serai joignable par téléphone. Suivant les nouvelles directives de la Mairie de Paris, l'appartement ne pourra être loué qu'à partir d'une année complète : 1350 €/mois charges comprises ou 9 mois pour les étudiants. Le locataire ne sera pas redevable de la taxe de séjour mais il sera assujetti à la taxe d'habitation conformément à la législation française.
house_rules: Le locataire s'engage à utiliser les lieux et à en user paisiblement. Toute sous location ou mise à disposition même gratuite sont rigoureusement interdites. Le preneur ne pourra s'opposer à la visite des locaux si le bailleur en fait la demande. Il s'interdit d'apporter aucune modification aux installations existantes et s'engage à faire les réparations qui pourraient être rendues nécessaires par un mauvais usage.
host_about: Je suis une retraitée dynamique, j'aime les contacts avec des personnes de différentes cultures et je voyage régulièrement à travers le monde.

space: Typical large nice parisian apartment for 5 or 6 people (4th floor) located very near to Gare du Nord (direct access to Roissy Airport by RER, around 25 mn). The area is surrounded by a lot of metros, buses, RER and trains. It is near le Canal Saint-Martin, le Parc de La Villette and le Parc des Buttes Chaumont. You will need 15mn by metro or RER or bus to reach La Bastille, La République, L'Hôtel de ville, Chatelêt, Saint Michel, Le quartier du Marais, la Concorde, les Champs Elysées... The appartement is at the 4th floor (elevator) of a classical (beginning of the XX century) "Hausmanien" building. It is very bright. There are 3 rooms : a room with a double bed (160 X 200 cm) a room with two bunk beds a room with1 or 2 simple beds. a living/dining room (table and sofa) a kitchen a bathroom a toilet a large corridor The apartment is simple, confortable and easy to live in. It is perfect for a family.  Bakery, supermarket, restaurants in the very street.
description: Typical Hausmannien building with an elevator in a cosmopolite vivid area, with an easy access to many transport (metro, buses, RER...) Typical large nice parisian apartment for 5 or 6 people (4th floor) located very near to Gare du Nord (direct access to Roissy Airport by RER, around 25 mn). The area is surrounded by a lot of metros, buses, RER and trains. It is near le Canal Saint-Martin, le Parc de La Villette and le Parc des Buttes Chaumont. You will need 15mn by metro or RER or bus to reach La Bastille, La République, L'Hôtel de ville, Chatelêt, Saint Michel, Le quartier du Marais, la Concorde, les Champs Elysées... The appartement is at the 4th floor (elevator) of a classical (beginning of the XX century) "Hausmanien" building. It is very bright. There are 3 rooms : a room with a double bed (160 X 200 cm) a room with two bunk beds a room with1 or 2 simple beds. a living/dining room (table and sofa) a kitchen a bathroom a toilet a large corridor The apartment is simple, confortabl

space: small contemporary renovated house  of 60 m2 with a terrace and a pleasant garden in a private lane house, quiet, charming as in a country village; on the ground floor: living room (with TV, internet) and sofa bed (2 persons), , kitchen, comfort with washing machine, dishwasher, nespresso caftière, electric kettle, toaster, ..., on the floor, bedroom with large bathroom (bath and shower) space in a charming quiet neighborhood with many food  stores, restaurants, at the foot of the famous Père Lachaise Cemetery (Jim Morrison, Yves and Simone Signoret ...) transit: bus and metro,  bus line 76 direct Place du Louvre  in 20 minutes, the Buttes-Chaumont  (bus 26) in 10 minutes, perfect for jogging. house_rules: Respecter le calme environnant, la propreté du lieu. Respect the peaceful atmosphere, the cleanliness of the place Ne pas fumer à l' intérieur. Don' t smoke inside La cafetière est une nespresso , quelques cartouches vous sont offertes mai (Website hidden by Airbnb) n' oubliez pas d' en porter avec vous ou d' en acheter merci. the coffee maker is a nespresso , I offer you some cartridge nespresso but don' t forget to take or buy some . vous trouvez la couette et oreillers du salon dans le coffre du canapé (soulevez la partie meridienne )  You will find duvet and pillows of the sofa in the trunk of the sofa ( open the chaise part) MERCI DE METTRE VOTRE LINGE SALE, DRAPS, SERVIETTES DE TOILETTE ET TORCHONS dans la panière à linge sale de la salle d' eau Put your dirty laundry towels, linens in the laundry basket in the bathroom when you leave.  thanks
host_about:
Ophtalmologiste,  rétinologue et oncologue, mon métier me passionne ; je vis avec Jean Philippe, architecte et directeur d'une agence, artiste également. 
Nous aimons les grandes villes, en particulier Paris, leurs animations, les merveilleuses expositions, toutes les activitées culturelles proposées à l infini, et la bonne gastronomie au travers de lieux authentiques parfois reconnus, étoilés (Guy Savoy en particulier);  nous aimons donc nous retrouver dans cet havre de paix parisien, maison héritée de la famille de  jean Philippe, remise au gout du jour qui nous permet de profiter de cette richesse.
nous vous invitons à la partager.
Nous aimons également la musique avec l' opéra Garnier, l' Opéra de la Bastille par exemple, aussi la peinture  et le théâtre . 
 Toutes ces activités représentent notre bouffée d' oxygène, notre évasion, le jogging aux buttes de  Chaumont est également un moment privilégié, source d' équilibre.
 Nous espérons vous donner envie d' aller vers cela ....
"Il est 5 heures, Paris s' éveille, il est 5 heures, et je n' ai toujours pas sommeil..""
A vous PARIS ....

space: Hello,  I am renting my apartment, a lovely two room 35m2 flat, very luminous, at the 5th floor with no elevator. It is located in the heart of Paris in the 6th district, very close to Saint Germain Des Prés and Montparnasse. It is very well deserved by public transports, bus, subways and even bikes (velib stations, bike rentals). The bedroom is equiped with a 140x200 double bed, a wardrobe and a big shelf. The living room is equiped with a 140x200 sofa bed. A TV with a dvd player. And also a computer plugged to internet (wifi is also available). In the kitchen, you will find all the kitchenware you need, a coffee machine, a toaster, dishes, fridge, micro wave with oven mode. Bathroom and WC with shower stall, washbasin, electrical towel dryer, washing machine. You can also use the phone for free to call around 100 countries. See you soon :)

space: If you're looking for the real Paris feel, this is a great place to get it. You will be in the heart of the city in a pedestrian area, surrounded by a wide variety of places for food, shopping, people watching and sight seeing. In front of the building of the apartment you'll find: multiple coffee shops and restaurants; a handful of clothing boutiques (both vintage and new); chocolate shops; bakeries (with very good French bread); an upscale spa; the Tenement Museum; a laundromat; and a cozy wine bar where you may just spot a celebrity or two! The apartment remains pretty quiet. The bedroom has a queen-sized bed and the living room also has a dining room, a large television and wifi. The kitchen is fully equiped so you may cook whatever you want. The apartment is on the third floor, so not too many steps up.  5 minutes walk to Metro lines 3, 4, 8 and 9 and to RER A & B lines.  This makes the place very close to Opéra Garnier (10 min), grands boulevards (10 minutes' walk), le Louvre or

space: A spacious 450sq ft, light filled, fully furnished apartment in the heart of Paris. This is a great spot if you want to be in the trendy Northern Marais. The apartment is located on the top floor of an 18th century building. It offers charm and character : old wooden beams, nice wooden floors, a lovely balcony with great views over the roofs of Paris. It has been decorated with care with designer furnitures, and the bedroom and bathroom were recently renovated. You'll have easy access to all the major sights and will find subways, shops, supermarkets within 5mns walk, as well as great restaurants, coffee shops, art galleries and designer shops.  APARTMENT DESCRIPTION The apartment is comfortable for solo travelers and couples. No  extra travelers . No children. No pet. No party . No professional rental The large living room has 2 big windows leading to the terrace. Southern exposure that lets the the sun in all day long (southern exposure). It has a comfortable sofa and a large coffee

house_rules: Please respect my sweet little home as if it was your own place, and treat our apartment with proper care and leave it as you found it.   Thank you for following the few house rules below during your stay. -  No extra person allowed. Only sleeps two. Couch not intended as extra bed -No smoking in the appartment, at anytime, ever.  But there is a cute balcony for that - No shoes in the apartment. Japanese style to keep the floor nice and the downstairs neighbors happy - No party in the apartment . Thanks for being considerate of the neighbors well being and be and mindful with volume of conversations, music, TV - No professional activity in the apartment. Showroom, massage etc.. are strictly prohibited - No pets allowed THANK YOU FOR  - Watering my plants once in a while, so they stay happy - Respecting my personnal belongings  - Treating this appartment with love & care RESPONSABILITY - As guest you are responsible for maintaining the Apartment in good condition and take good care of a
host_about:
I am a Paris based yoga teacher and I love real people, good energy, travelling, sitting down with a good book, long walks in the rice fields, healthy food and discovering great eateries.
After spending many years in New York, I moved back to France and settled in Paris where I own a lovely apartment I rent thru airbnb when I'm travelling, which I love to do. 
As a yoga teacher I am often away from home to teach workshops or retreats. During that time,  I am looking for people I can trust being in my space. My apartment is situated on a pretty amazing street, in a quiet building and it is a place to enjoy some peaceful time, not a place to have parties or go crazy. There is many personal stuff in the apartment I love and I expect my guests to treat my place with care and respect. 
Whether as a guest or as a host I think you'll find me pretty easy going, responsible, and quite a bit of fun to be around

space: The apartment is located on the 1st floor in a small street near Ménilmontant. The area is popular and located near the Parc of Belleville, the Père Lachaise cemetery but also near Oberkampf street (street full of nice restaurants and bars). space: Très beau  loft avec mezzanine, au rez de chaussée dans un immeuble parisien du 17 ème ,  Situé au fond du cour pavée d'un immeuble typique de Paris . Il se compose d'une salle à manger ouverte sur une grande cuisine donnant sur une  grande pièce à vivre  sous 4 mètres de plafond , de 3 chambres,  la première  avec un lit de 120  et la seconde avec un lit de 90 , la troisième chambre est sur la mezzanine avec un lit de 160  et d'une salle de bain avec douche C'est un loft qui a le charme du vieux paris , avec ses poutres et son sol de terre cuite (surperficie est de 95 m2 , C'est un esprit de maison campagne en plein quartier Latin  Il est idéalement située à 100 m du  Boulevard Saint Michel et de la Sorbonne , entouré par le Panthéon , le Théâtre de l'Odéon sans oublier le jardin du  Luxembourg ,  Le boulevard Saint Germain , Notre-Dame de Paris et  les quais de la Seine sont à 10mn à pied .   Liaison direct avec Roissy CDG Airport avec le RER  station Luxembourg . Métro , bus et taxi
description: Très beau  loft avec mezzanine, au rez de chaussée dans un immeuble parisien du 17 ème ,  Situé au fond du cour pavée d'un immeuble typique de Paris . Il se compose d'une salle à manger ouverte sur une grande cuisine donnant sur une  grande pièce à vivre  sous 4 mètres de plafond , de 3 chambres,  la première  avec un lit de 120  et la seconde avec un lit de 90 , la troisième chambre est sur la mezzanine avec un lit de 160  et d'une salle de bain avec douche C'est un loft qui a le charme du vieux paris , avec ses poutres et son sol de terre cuite (surperficie est de 95 m2 , C'est un esprit de maison campagne en plein quartier Latin  Il est idéalement située à 100 m du  Boulevard Saint Michel et de la Sorbonne , entouré par le Panthéon , le Théâtre de l'Odéon sans oublier le jardin du  Luxembourg ,  Le boulevard Saint Germain , Notre-Dame de Paris et  les quais de la Seine sont à 10mn à pied .   Liaison direct avec Roissy CDG Airport avec le RER  station Luxembourg . Métro , bus et taxi

space: I sublet my beloved cosy appartment in the 9th arrondissement while I am travelling. The apartment is typical parisian XIXth century and is located in the heart of Paris, 5 minutes walking from Montmartre. It has a big living room, chimney, mouldings, and old-style parquet, one bedroom. And a beautiful balcony to take your aperitif over the Rue des Martyrs with sun during the whole afternoon.  The appartment is a 50 m2 studio with separate kitchen and bathroom, at the fifth floor with lift. Non-smokers only (you can smoke on the balcony). No TV but good Wifi. Dishwasher, Washing mashine, Microwave. What I love the most about my place: - the balcony!  - the calm bedroom  - a big living room with lot of light - the neighbourhood

space: Welcome to the heart of Paris, Located in the 6th arrondissement of Paris at 300m from the Luxembourg Gardens, this is a charming two-room apartment, very bright. Former artist studio completely renovated, it's located on the 5th floor with an elevator. Windows in every room and a glass roof in the main room brings light throughout the day. Whether traveling as a couple, with family or friends, you'll love this charming apartment. The apartment is in a quiet street while being at the heart of a lively area with many shops, grocery stores, bars and restaurants.
description: Welcome to the heart of Paris, Located in the 6th arrondissement of Paris at 300m from the Luxembourg Gardens, this is a charming two-room apartment, very bright. Former artist studio completely renovated, it's located on the 5th floor with an elevator. Windows in every room and a glass roof in the main room brings light throughout the day. Whether traveling as a couple, with family or friends, you'll love this charming apartment. The apartment is in a quiet street while being at the heart of a lively area with many shops, grocery stores, bars and restaurants. The kitchen is fully equipped: worktop, hob, fridge, oven, microwave oven. The dining room table can accommodate four covered, so you can share a meal with ingredients found in grocery stores and local markets including the famous Raspail organic market. There is a bed for 2 people in the bedroom and a sofa in the main room. The linen is provided (sheets and towels) You can enjoy the proximity of very good restaurants. From brewe
transit: The apartment is 5 minutes from the RER B, direct access to CDG and Orly airports and the Gare du Nord. Several subway lines are also accessible in 5 minutes: - M4 Vavin to get to Odeon Châtelet - M12 Notre-Dame-des-Champs to get to Montmartre Access to many bus lines (Gare de Lyon in 25 min) Velib station is 100m from the apartment, take the opportunity to visit Paris by bike!
access: The kitchen is fully equipped: worktop, hob, fridge, oven, microwave oven. house_rules: The parquet floor has been cleaned recently so please do not walk with your shoes all inside the flat. Moreover, thanks to empty the trashes when you leave Feel free to use all the cleaning products (that you can find in the toilets) as the vacuum cleaner if necessary. The food that you can find in the kitchen is our property, please do not use it. If you need to buy some food, you can find a minimarket 'Dia' at the end of street (3 min walk)

space: The apartment is near Gare du Nord (ten minute walk), Montmartre, Canal St Martin and Buttes Chaumont.Our apartment, quiet very bright (not overlooked), is a beautiful apartment in a brick building 30 years (5th floor without elevator) in a quiet (URL HIDDEN) was renovated in late 2011 by an architect and is very cozy.You enter the apartment through a hallway with a desk computer (at your disposal).The main room is a living-dining room with a table with four chairs, a sofa bed (sleeps 140-180, Bultex). you will find a flat screen HD TV 70 cm, a home theater, a dvd player and Apple TV as well as a library of books and dvds. The room consists of a true 180x140 bed (mattress Dunlopillos, linen included) with bedside tables and a wardrobe.The kitchen, bright and clear, is functional and fully equipped (oven, fridge freezer, ceramic hob, dishwasher, food processor, toaster, Nespresso Machine, kettle ...). The bathroom has a shower with two heads, a washing machine, a dryer and a hair dryer

Nous vous remercions donc d'avoir une utilisation d'internet respectueuse du droit d'auteur et ne procéder à aucun téléchargement illégal.Nous vous remercions de veiller au respect de notre voisinage (notamment s'agissant du bruit) et à respecter les parties communes (hall d'entrée, escalier, local poubelle).ENGLISHPlease indicate your expected arrival time when you have knowledge in order to reserve the best reception!It is not allowed to smoke in the apartment and in common areas of the building.We love our apartment, so please take care of it ! ;)We allow you to use our free wifi. host_about:
I'm a lawyer in audiovisual.

I have been living in Paris for 10 years and I really love this city. It would be a pleasure to give any information about my city et its best tips (restaurants, bars, exhibitions, museum, monuments...).

I like travels and meet new people! I also use airbnb during my holidays in  and it has been always a great experience.

I really like independant cinéma : Pedro Almodovar, Asghar Farhadi, James Gray, Jacques Audiard, Steeve Mc Queen, Ken Loach... In my flat, you could watch some of their films after a visiting day!

I like cooking. If you like too, you will find everything you need after shopping in our lovely market!
