space: A haven of peace in the lively heart of Paris.  Ideally situated at the heart of the historic center of Paris, this very quiet two rooms apartment is a real haven of peace for your stay in the city of light, at a walking distance from the main attractions of the city (the Louvre, the Marrais, the Montourgueil  area with it’s trendy shops and restaurants, etc.).  Far from the noise of cars, in the pedestrian district of les Halles, this quite equipped, comfortable and welcoming apartment, will allow you to get fresh ideas after your days of discovery.  In the heart of the 1st arrondissement, I’d love to welcome you to my cosy one bedroom apartment with all accommodations.  You will find renting an apartment is quite  an alternative to a hotel! With use of a kitchen, free WIFI internet, free long-distance calls home, music through airplay and more,  a hotel can't compare!  On the first floor (without elevator) on a quiet, standing and flowery courtyard of a 1820 typical and nice building
description: Fully equipped flat, tastefully decorated, quiet and private. As it is in a courtyard, you are shielded from the buzz of the street when you want to rest, whilst in the very heart of Paris when you feel the urge to mingle with the parisian ways. I wish you an excellent stay and see you soon A haven of peace in the lively heart of Paris.  Ideally situated at the heart of the historic center of Paris, this very quiet two rooms apartment is a real haven of peace for your stay in the city of light, at a walking distance from the main attractions of the city (the Louvre, the Marrais, the Montourgueil  area with it’s trendy shops and restaurants, etc.).  Far from the noise of cars, in the pedestrian district of les Halles, this quite equipped, comfortable and welcoming apartment, will allow you to get fresh ideas after your days of discovery.  In the heart of the 1st arrondissement, I’d love to welcome you to my cosy one bedroom apartment with all accommodations.  You will find renting an ap
transit: Paris is a gate open to the world… As such, Paris airports are very well connected to the heart of the city where my flat is.  You will find here all the information you need to get into downtown Paris and to reach my apartment from the 2 airports and also to leave the city at the end of your stay. The closest station from my place, “Châtelet – Les Halles", is the major commuter train hub in Paris and the largest underground station in the world. It is directly connected with the Paris Métro stations Châtelet and Les Halles.  From Chatelet les Halles you can come/go directly to both airports  Roissy Charles de Gaulle/ 45min   Orly/ 40min to the main four train stations in Paris Gare de l'Est/ 10min Gare du Nord/ 15min Gare de Lyon/ 15min Gare Montparnasse/ 20min
access: I trust you entirely to know what you would expect if you left your flat to good friends.  Well, you can do exactly the same at my place: read my books, listen to my music (very easy through the airplay system and the free and unlimited access to my deezer account), cook, enjoy a cocktail in the living room, use all appliances.  Apart from one side of the wardrobe that is privatized, you have access to all of the appartment.  I really want you to feel like at home! :o)
interaction: Beyond the moment of the check-in when i will provide you with lots of information, I'm trying my best to be as reachable as possible through whatzapp to give you great tips and ideas to get advantage of the city!
house_rules: It's a non-smoking apartment.  Even if it's extremely central, at a walking distance to tons of nice things to do and to see, the location of the flat upon the courtyard of the building brings absolute calm, in a very quiet neighbourhood. It's important that it remains like that. Your understanding and cooperation are much appreciated.  Calm and quiet after being in the hustle and bustle of Paris each day is really a luxury you will appreciate a lot! I wish you a wonderful stay in Paris.  See you soon.  Romain
host_about:
Hi, I’m Roman

Welcome to the community if you are a new comer on airbnb. 
I will be happy to welcome you in my place when you come to Paris.

I've been a host on airbnb since may 2013, and also a guest a couple of times. I deeply enjoy this new way to travel, to meet and share experiences. 
Hence my motto, welcome my guests as I would loved to be welcomed myself (when I’m travelling abroad). 
It never happened to me that way yet, but I do not despair ;0)

To tell you a few words  about myself, I’ve been living in this flat where I've spent the last 17 beautiful years. But I'm also spending some time in  the country side, on the lands of Marcel Proust (the famous French writer), an hour and a half away from Paris where I have my workshop.

After being for more than 12 years a fireworks display designer for one of the biggest French firm, I'm now still doing it as a freelancer, but most of all decided to focus on a more personal artistic expression and my love for drawing. 

I will always try to help you the best way I can to make you enjoy your stay in Paris! 

see you soon. 
Roman

host_about:
Français / english
______
Parisien de toujours. Racines bretonnes et picardes.
Médecin généraliste remplaçant, à travailler notamment en Ile-de-France et Finistère.
Une thèse en Histoire de la Médecine.

Musicien amateur, touchant machines électroniques, claviers, guitares.
Féru de théatre, danse contemporaine, expos, concerts. 
La chance de vivre à Paris. Possible de donner mes meilleurs "plans" du moment.

Heureux de croiser les voyageurs, l'étant moi-même. Un monde à partager...

______

Parisian of always. Breizh roots.
General practitioner, working in Ile-de-France and Finistère.
A thesis in History of Medicine.

Musician, with electronic machines, keyboards, guitars.
I do like théatre, contemporary dance, exhibitions, concerts. 
Lucky to live in Paris. 
Possible to share the address of the best places.

Happy to meet travelers, being one of them. 
A world to be shared...

______

I speak English.

space: We offer a charming apartment, sunny and quiet, decorated with fantasy and humour. We have 4 bedrooms, two this double beds, 2 single (one upstair with a view in the sky) and also a sofa where two people can sleep. The living room is continued by a open kichten. It's a typical Parisian apartment, with wooden floor, fireplace in the living room and decorations on the top floor. And outside? A typical little square, with trees, flowers and a statue. A sympatic cafe Parisien. On the other side, a privacy yard, ideal to resquiet, read a book or drink a glass with the neighborhood. By the way, the appartment is ideal for a family, it has just one bathroom with the toilets inside.

space: Wifi & large workspace provided. Kitchen & Washing fully equipped. Bedding & Linens provided. Great Transport Connections. Metro L4, L8, L9 are steps from front door. Arrivals: Gare du Nord (Line 4): 10 min Gare d l' Est (Line 4): 5 min Gare de Montparnasse: 20 min
description: Comfortable, large, clean, semi-private apt. In Historic Center Paris. Great option for short/ medium terms stays. I use a second area (not pictured), when in Paris for work. Wifi & large workspace provided. Kitchen & Washing fully equipped. Bedding & Linens provided. Great Transport Connections. Metro L4, L8, L9 are steps from front door. Arrivals: Gare du Nord (Line 4): 10 min Gare d l' Est (Line 4): 5 min Gare de Montparnasse: 20 min when I am in Paris for work.. This apartment has historical roots starting 14th century. The building foundation was the old guard tower of medieval Paris.  Excellent view onto Porte St. Denis, Entrance way to Historic Paris. The nightlife, dining & entertainment of Paris Grands Boulevard are steps away. Great transport anywhere in Paris & beyond.
transit: Great transport anywhere in Paris & beyond.
interaction: when I am in Paris for work..
house_rules: Welcome and Enjoy Your Stay Contacts: Andrew Lyons +(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) (EMAIL HIDDEN) Address: 29 Rue Ste Apolline, 75002 Paris Door Code 2010B, 4th floor left side Rules: No smoking in the apartment! If you have to smoke, please do it in kitchen with the window open. Please be very careful with the apartment key. Changing locks and key duplicates are extremely expensive for high security doors. A lost key will cost €100 and be taken out of security deposit. This is a private home, please be respectful of all personal items, food, drink, cloths, electronics, etc… Please remove your shoes in the apartment. The streets of Paris are very dirty! We will provide the cleaning service for €36, or less depending on the length of your stay. This amount to be paid in cash upon arrival. Please wash your dishes, we will take care of the rest. A security deposit of €200, or less depending on the length of your stay. This amount will be refunded if the apartment is returned in good condition. No
host_about: Hi Andrew from Pittsburgh, PA. Been living in Paris Since 2006. Work with French company that produces bullet trains and power generation infrastructure. Also have a listing on Costa del Sol, Spain.

space: Apartment for 2 people, subway Faidherbe-Chaligny station (line 8) or Reuilly-Diderot (line 1) or Nation (lines 1,2,6,9, RER A). Close to shops, subways, buses. 6th floor with lift. The building is very quiet and secure. The apartment consists of two rooms with an area of 485 square feet. One bedroom / bathroom seperated by a black curtain (not visible on the photos), separate water closet, living room / fitted kitchen. A food supermarket available next to the building.  Many restaurants in the area, many shops, lively. Famous Market Place (Aligre) at 0,3 mile. A sports hall is near the building with fitness classes and weight machines (25€ per day / 65€ per week / 95 € for two weeks / 195€ per month).  District very well served by public transports . Place de la Bastille, le Marais and Père Lachaise cemetery are 15/20 minutes walk.
description: 2 rooms flat (485 ft²) in the south of the 11th arrondissement, one of the oldest district in Paris, historic neighborhood of the french revolution, between Bastille and Nation squares. Many transports (6 subway lines (1,2,6,8,9, RER A), 3 buses). Trendy and shopping area, parisian life, known for nice bars and very good restaurants. Close to the famous Aligre market. Apartment for 2 people, subway Faidherbe-Chaligny station (line 8) or Reuilly-Diderot (line 1) or Nation (lines 1,2,6,9, RER A). Close to shops, subways, buses. 6th floor with lift. The building is very quiet and secure. The apartment consists of two rooms with an area of 485 square feet. transit: SUBWAYS • Line 8 at Faidherbe-Chaligny station. Line passing through the stations Bastille / Republique / Grands Boulevards / Opéra Garnier (and Galeries Lafayette) / Madeleine / Concorde / Invalides / Eiffel Tower (Ecole militaire station) etc.  • Line 1  (5 minutes walk) at Reuilly-Diderot station. Line passing through the Gare de Lyon, Bastille, St-Paul-Le Marais, Châtelet, Hôtel de Ville, le Louvre, Tuileries, Concorde, Champs-Elysees, Arc de Triomphe-Etoile, etc... Lines 1/2/6/9 and RER A   (8 minutes walk) at Nation station. • Line 2, going to Père Lachaise cimetery, Pigalle, Anvers (Montmartre), Blanche (Moulin Rouge), Parc Monceau...  • Line 6, going to Bercy, Place d'Italie (chinatown, butte aux cailles), Denfert-Rochereau (Catacombes), Gare Montparnasse, Bir Hakeim (Eiffel Tower)... • Line 9, going to Chaussée d'Antin-La Fayette (Galeries Lafayette), Gare Saint-Lazare, Iéna (Bâteaux mouche, avenue Montaigne), Trocadéro, Parc des Princes stadium, Roland Garros...  • The Train
access: Fully equipped apartment, Wi-Fi (fibre optic), washing machine, fitted kitchen (dishwasher, fridge, freezer, food processor, hob, oven, microwave, toaster, blender, nespresso coffee maker...), TV with international channels, DVD/BluRay player, hundred of DVDs, stereo compatible iPod / iPhone ( 1￫4S), sheets, towels and washcloths, hair dryer, iron and ironing board... The bed is very comfortable and is full size (55x75in).
interaction: I will be reachable by phone. A guide book will be available in the apartment with my recommendations about restaurants, bars and shops in the area.
house_rules: • The building is quiet . Thank you to respect the tranquility of the neighborhood . • Non-smoking apartment. • The shoes remain at the entrance. • I'll ask you to water the plants during long stays.
host_about:
Native of Cannes in the south of France, I lived in Paris for 20 years and this neiborhood for 18. Come and find out why !
I rent my apartment when I travel, but I'll always be available to answer all your questions and requests!

space: Charmant appartement Dans une cour très calme, ravissant studio avec terrasse à découvrir! Juste à côté du centre de Paris (10mn de Châtelet), lieu calme, dans un charmant hameau. Un grand studio (30 m²). Canapé convertible pour 2 personnes. Cuisine équipée (plaques, frigo, four micro-ondes, possibilité de four, machine à café, bouilloire, grille-pain, aliments de base, café, thé, sucre, huile, ...) Grande table pouvant accueillir 6 personnes. Accès Internet WiFi. Il n'y a pas la TV mais je mets à disposition ordinateur et DVD si vous voulez.  Salle d'eau (douche toilettes lavabo, mise à disposition du linge et serviettes de toilette). Une précision: le studio est une partie de notre maison mais totalement indépendante. Nous avons aussi une petite fille. La configuration est telle qu'on entend un peu les bruits venant de chez nous sachez-le.  Station de métro : Tolbiac (ligne 7), Place d'Italie (lignes 5, 7 et 6) et Olympiades (ligne 14) => traverse tout Paris en 20 minutes! Bus: 7 lig

house_rules: Des petites choses classiques, basées sur nos expériences d'hôtes : Ce studio est non-fumeur, mais vous avez un cendrier à disposition pour fumer dehors. Nous habitons une copropriété plutôt calme donc si vous souhaitez recevoir du monde, il est plus sympathique de nous prévenir! Ne pas oublier d'éteindre les lumières en partant (là aussi, basé sur notre expérience passée). Malheureusement la cheminée n'est pas utilisable pr de simples raisons de sécurité et d'assurance.
host_about:
Je suis originaire de Pau, dans le Sud-Ouest, mon ami est de Paris.
J'ai fait des études d'histoire de l'art et archéologie et suis arrivée à Paris il y a 6 ans pour travailler dans une maison d'édition. 
J'adore vivre à Paris, et dans ce cadre (petit hameau ambiance village, à proximité de tout puisqu'à 5mn à pieds de la place d'Italie), c'est top.
J'aime sortir, aller voir des expos, lire, cuisiner, jardiner, voyager...comme beaucoup ?
amenities: {Wifi,Kitchen,Heating}

space: This big 34 sqm studio is very quiet and luminous, with a great view from its 19th floor. Two comfortable couches welcome up to 4 persons. A large (10 sqm), very flowered, sunny (until noon) and unoverlooked terrace will allows you to take your breakfast or a glass in good weather. My own flat is on the same floor, you can easily contact me if needed, and get in late if your flight is a night one for instance. The bathroom has a big bath and quality plumbing, the kitchen is partly open on the main room and there is an electric barbecue on the terrace. Bed linen, towels, tea and coffee are provided. There is a big TV and a good internet access. Place de la République is 10 mn far from the place by metro (3 km) and the center of Paris 15 mn far. It takes about 20 mn to reach Musée du Louvre, 25 mn to Sacré-Coeur and 40 mn to Eiffel Tower and 1 hour to Disneyland. It will take you about 1h to come from Orly or Roissy and about 20 mn to come from Gare du Nord (Eurostar).
description: Spacious, quiet and comfortable studio up to 4 persons 19th floor, beautiful sight!). 15 mn far from the center of Paris, in a very lively and typical parisian district (food market 3/week, a lot of shops). Beautiful sunny and flowered terrace. This big 34 sqm studio is very quiet and luminous, with a great view from its 19th floor. Two comfortable couches welcome up to 4 persons. A large (10 sqm), very flowered, sunny (until noon) and unoverlooked terrace will allows you to take your breakfast or a glass in good weather. My own flat is on the same floor, you can easily contact me if needed, and get in late if your flight is a night one for instance. The bathroom has a big bath and quality plumbing, the kitchen is partly open on the main room and there is an electric barbecue on the terrace. Bed linen, towels, tea and coffee are provided. There is a big TV and a good internet access. Place de la République is 10 mn far from the place by metro (3 km) and the center of Paris 15 mn far. I
transit: Metro is 50 meters far from the apartment; taking the rue Compans issue of Place des Fêtes station, you find an escalator that climbs to the center of Place des Fêtes. Then you go straight on for about 30 meters, cross on your left, and rue des Lilas is at the angle of CIC bank (on the right of the big store Monoprix); number 3 is the first building, "Tour Orient". To come from the airport: BY TAXI will cost about 45 € BY PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION: - Take a ticket from Paris, and get it until the end of your trip (about 10,5 €/person) From Roissy-Charles de Gaulle: - about 1 hour - RER B direction St Rémy les Chevreuse to Gare du Nord - Metro line 5 direction Bobigny to Jaurès (2 stations) - Metro line 7bis direction Boztaris to Place des Fêtes (4 sttions) From Orly: - about 1 hour - RER C direction Montigny-Beauchamp to Gare d'Austerlitz - Metro line 5 direction Bobigny to République (6 stations) - Metro ligne 11 direction Porte des Lilas to Place des Fêtes (5 stations) FROM GARE DE L'EST
access: The apartment and the terrace are all yours, I just get the possibility, in consultation with you, to water the plants each 2 or 3 days if needed.
interaction: I personally welcome (except in the case of holidays) my guests, my apartment being very close. I remain available for all your stay if needed. No problem if you arrive late or at night. I do my best to be flexible about check in and check out hours. I also will provide you my best addresses in the neighborhood, and suggest you some ideas of walks in the district (you'll find all of these suggestions when you'll be there).
house_rules: Smokers are allowed but exclusively on the terrace (and please be kind to empty the ashtray before leaving). In summer, it is possible I ask you to let me access to the terrace in order to water the plants. You'll get a sheet with all the details you need for your stay (my details, addresses of some shops and restaurants around, suggestions of walkings and map of the district). This apartment is full of things I personally chose and often brought back from my travels, there is a lot of art books, so I will ask you to take care of them as if they were yours (but they're not :-) ).
host_about:
Je vis à Paris depuis 30 ans, et me suis installée voilà 12 ans dans ce quartier très vivant et populaire de la Place des Fêtes. Je ne me lasse pas du ciel dont j'apprécie toutes les nuances depuis mon appartement très en hauteur et très lumineux, situé en face de celui dans lequel vous logerez peut-être.
Je travaille la plupart du temps chez moi, ce qui peut vous être utile si vous avez besoin d'un renseignement, d'une aide quelconque. Vous pourrez également me joindre via (Hidden by Airbnb) ou Viber.
J'aime la littérature, les arts premiers et l'art en général, la cuisine (notamment à base d'épices et de mariages originaux), les voyages aussi bien sûr, et notamment l'Asie (Chine, Inde, Sri Lanka, Thaïlande, Vietnam).

space: Description : Studio moderne de 25 m2 avec petite terrasse. Lumineux. Dernier étage d'un immeuble récent. Avec ascenseur. Sans vis à vis. Entièrement refait à neuf.  Lit de 2 personnes. Wifi, drap, serviettes fournis.  Ménage fait. Transport : Quartier calme. Proche des transports et de Montmartre. 1 station (RER E) de St Lazare, 1 station (RER B ou D) de Châtelet, 2 stations (RER D) de Gare de Lyon. space: 35 m2 apartement with a bedroom, a bathroom, a living room with an open kitchen fully equiped ( dish washer, washing machine and dryer, new flat screen tv, internet, phone, wifi). Private entry Very well located for tourists (at 100 meters from le moulin rouge and 500 m from Montmartre), close to 3 metro lines (2, 12 et 13): view of the moulin rouge from the bedroom (very close to the large French departement stores such as Galeries Lafayette). This apartment was the office of the Architect Théodore BALLU who designed this building as well as the Paris city hall and the Trinity church in the 19th century.

host_about:
Jeune maman de 2 enfants j'accueille touristes, expatriés, tout type de voyageurs dans ce bel appartement très bien situé pour découvrir la ville lumière :-)
Ayant vécu aux Etats-Unis pendant plus de 4 ans, je parle anglais mais également italien et espagnol.
A très bientôt à Paris !
Marjorie

space: Séjour de vacance pour 1 personne. Artiste peintre partage son appartement / atelier et propose de vous faire découvrir le Paris artistique. Logé au cœur de Paris à proximité de l'Opéra et des grands boulevards. 2 pièces séparées par des étagères, pas de chambre individuelle. Petit déjeuner offert. Location pour 2 personnes possible à 90 € la nuit. Holiday just right for 1 person : Artist proposes to share her studio and take you to discover the artistic Paris. 2 rooms in one space separated with shelves. No door. located in the heart of Paris near Opera and Grands Boulevards. For 2 persons possible. 90€ per night Urlaub für 1 person. Künstlerin teilt ihre Atelier in Paris Centrum neben Oper, Grands Boulevards, Galeries Lafayette … Biete Besichtigung von Paris und Museum.  Malkurs, oder Französische Unterricht. Möglich die ganze Wohnung für 2 Personen mit 2 Einzelbett. 90 €
description: You are welcome to share my studio. I propose you to discover Paris and its museums. Guide tour, French course, drawing course everything but just not my computer You share my Studio with me. 2 rooms separated with shelves in one big space, so not a privacy room. I care about everything you might need or like to do.  I can cook for you I can take you visiting Paris and the museum I can help you improving your french ... You are staying in the very best part of Paris. You can walk or take easily all metro and buses direct from my place  to the most important places to visit, such the Louvres, Orsay, Montmartre ... There are parking places next to my place if you come by car. Coming from Charles de Gaulle airport you have a special bus (navette) direct to Opera  wich is next to my place. I'll be very pleased to share my studio and give you some time to make you comfortable.
transit: There are parking places next to my place if you come by car. Coming from Charles de Gaulle airport you have a special bus (navette) direct to Opera  wich is next to my place.

space: Ideal for a couple, this apartment of 30 square meters is composed of two cozy rooms: a bedroom with yellow walls and a living room with pink walls, the first being fitted with a double bed and storage, and the second one with a coffee table and a sofa. The kitchen is adjacent to the living room and has a fridge, a microwave, an oven, a hob and a washing machine. As for the bathroom, it is confined, but nice: the walls are covered with small blue tiles and welcome the toilet, a shower, a sink and a large mirror. Towels are provided.
description: Enjoy a cozy apartment in Belleville, for a weekend, holiday or longer journeys. Ideal for a couple, this apartment of 30 square meters is composed of two cozy rooms: a bedroom with yellow walls and a living room with pink walls, the first being fitted with a double bed and storage, and the second one with a coffee table and a sofa. The kitchen is adjacent to the living room and has a fridge, a microwave, an oven, a hob and a washing machine. As for the bathroom, it is confined, but nice: the walls are covered with small blue tiles and welcome the toilet, a shower, a sink and a large mirror. Towels are provided. The building is located in a quiet street, 150 meters from one of the most beautiful parks in Paris, the Buttes Chaumont. The area is still very lively, cosmopolitan, safe and friendly. Shops, restaurants and markets of various nationalities are everywhere. Bars not to be missed: Le Rosa Bonheur, Les Folies, Le Poulpe and Le Café Chéri(e)! Discover also in the area: the Place S
transit: There are three metro stops nearby: 5 minutes walk, the Pyrénées station (line 11) and the Buttes-Chaumont station (line 7bis), and 10 minutes walk, the Belleville station (lines 2 and 11) . The nearest bus stop is Botsaris - Buttes Chaumont (line 26). With the line 11, you will arrive in 10 minutes in the heart of the capital, Hôtel de Ville or Châtelet. With the line 2, Jaurès and the canal de l'Ourcq is 5 minutes and the butte Montmartre 15 minutes.
house_rules: Thank you to be discreet (no loud music after midnight!) and friendly with the neighborhood, and make me the apartment in the state where I have left.
host_about:
Je m'appelle Ariane, j'ai 29 ans et je suis journaliste. Je suis une grande cinéphile (Michel Gondry, Wes Anderson, Xavier Dolan...). Et j'aime aussi me perdre dans les rues de Paris, faire de la photo, manger des plats indiens et latino-américains, prendre des verres dans les petits bars animés de mon quartier...

---

My name is Ariane, I'm 29 and I'm a journalist. I'm a big movie buff (Michel Gondry, Wes Anderson, Xavier Dolan ...). And I love getting lost in the streets of Paris, taking photos, eating Indian and Latin America food, having drinks in small lively bars in my neighborhood ...

space: Welcome in our typical Parisian old style apartment, very centrally located, on an pedestrian, with exposed wooden beams : > Very NICE TERRACE (100ft²) with a BEAUTIFUL  ROMANTIC VIEW ON AN OLD ROMAN CHURCH (and the Pompidou Museum right behind) ; > Living room with a  LARGE COUCH (+ 1 airbed for 2 people used as extra bed), TV (hundreds of French & International channels), high-speed internet connection (WIFI). > Fully equipped Kitchen with oven, dishwasher, washing machine, dryer, microwave, rice cooker, teapot & Nespresso coffee machine ; > Quiet bedroom (on courtyard side) with loft bed with a comfortable thick memory foam mattress (one full dresser available for guests clothes) ;  > Bathroom with bath & shower (towels provided and one bathroom cabinet available for guests) ; > Our piano & guitar that can be played ! space: Located next to the Bercy expo area on the east side of Paris right bank, the apartment is a modern 800 sq. feet apartment with a breathtaking view of Paris: Pantheon, Eiffel Tower.  Great  for a late brunch on the sunny balcony or a romantic dinner by candlelight or simply to watch the changing Paris sky in the evening or its scintillating lights at night.  8th floor with elevators.  Close to all public transports: metro, bus, tram.  Excellent bakery, popular bistros and convenient stores nearby.  Quiet and safe neighborhood. 1 bedroom with a double bed, bathroom with walk in shower, toilet, and 2 double sofa beds in the living room and bookshelves-lined reading area. Fully equipped kitchen with large eatin counter open onto the living room. Dishwasher, washing machine, TV, telephone, wireless, printer, ... Nice neighborhood, quiet with popular restaurants / bars.  Close to the open air market of Dugommier. Bercy Village is a 15 minute walk away, with plenty of popular restaurants and
description: Large 800 sq. ft apartment near the Bercy expo area: 1 bedroom, large living room with 2 convertible couches, open kitchen with large countertop. transit: Great access to public transports.  The tramway T3 and the metro no 8 stops are all about 5 minutes away from the apartment.  Same for the bus 87 stop (great for a getting to the heart of Paris, Bastille, Montparnasse, Champ de Mars, etc.).  The Velib bike rentals are also conveniently close by.
access: The entire apartment is available to our guests! A large bedroom, large leaving room with 2 big convertible couches, great Paris views, a flowering balcony, open kitchen, fully equiped, modern Italian bathroom.  We simply ask our guests not to leave with our books (you're welcome to read them during your stay), and to replace whatever condiments, canned or frozen food they may have used from our kitchen.
interaction: During their stay, our guests can always contact us either by mails, or by phone.
house_rules: No cleaning up after your stay is required, but please do try to leave the apartment as clean as possible.  The vacuum and cleaning utensils are in the closet in the entrance facing the apartment's door.
host_about: je suis franco américaine, 53 ans, d'origine vietnamienne.  J'aime passionément ma partenaire depuis 8 ans, le golf depuis 9 ans, la lecture et la cuisine depuis toujours.

space: Fancy having coffee in your living room looking over the roofs of the Marais or on a Parisian balcony ? Well you've come to the right place... Une tasse de thé dans un salon parisien du Marais ou sur un balcon? Bienvenue chez vous ! THE FLAT Your Parisian home will be a nice 55 square meter flat (about 600 square feet) in the heart of “Le Marais”, the historical district of Paris. It is a 5 minute walk from Notre Dame, the City Hall, the Seine River, and 10 minutes away from Place des Vosges… Not only is it bright - the windows open on a lovely typical Parisian view over the roofs on one side, and on a street view from the balcony on the other side- but it is also quite quiet for the very centre of Paris. The apartment is on the 5th floor but without an elevator : the charm of Le Marais old buildings.  A fully equiped kitchen : oven, 4 fires, microwave oven, a refrigerator/ freezer, dish washer, washing-machine, toaster, kettle…. A living room.  There is a Kid room, a bathroom with toi

space: Magnificent haussmanien apartment in the 16è district, just a step from the Avenue Foch and 10 mn of the Place de l'Étoile and the Avenue of the Champs-Elysées. Family apartment any comfort with wooden floor, mouldings, fireplaces, large kitchen, marble stairwell, concierge, etc.  It account 7 main rooms, among which 3 bedrooms, 2 desks, 1 dining room, 1 lounge and 1 kitchen. There are also 2 bathrooms with bathtub, as well as a laundry for the linen. space: The apartment is bright with 2 rooms on the fourth floor without elevator. The bedroom is provided with a bed for 2 and the living room with a sofa-bed for 2. The kitchen is equipped and the bathroom includes a shower, a washbasin and toilets. You will find on the spot sheets, towels, and washing machine. As well as a (email hidden) system with a plug/jack to listen to your music, a WIFI internet connection, and a landline telephone for your freecalls in France, USA and some other countries.

transit: It's easy to come from Charles de Gaule (CDG) airport or Orly airport. It costs around 10€/15€ per person by subway (RER and Metro) : - From Charles de Gaule (CDG) airport, take the RER train to Paris. In Paris, at « Gare du Nord » station, change and take Metro line 4, direction « Porte de Clignancourt ». Stop 2 stations after, at « Château Rouge » station. Exit the station in the middle of the subway train with the escalator. The apartment is 3 minutes walk: when you go out of the escalator, go straight ahead on « boulevard Barbès » street, cross the « rue Poulet » street, then 100 meters after take « rue Doudeauville » street on your right, then 100 meters after take « rue des Poissonniers » street on your left, then 80 meters after take « rue d’Oran » street on your right. The building of the apartment is on the left after 30 meters. - From Orly airport, take the « Orlyval » automatic train to Paris. You arrive to « Antony » RER station. Take this RER train to Paris. In Paris, at «
access: The apartment is downtown. It's only an 10 mn walk to the Sacré Cœur basilica on the famous "butte-Montmartre" area, 2 min walk to « Marcadet-Poissonnier » metro station line 12 to go quickly to the Louvre museum, Opera area, or Champs Elysées area, or 2 min walk to « Château rouge » metro station line 4 to go quickly to "Notre-Dame" cathedral in the very central Paris and the Seine river. The Eiffel Tower is just 30 minutes from the apartment.

interaction: Thanks for your booking confirmation. We are currently out of Paris. It will be Julie or Stephanie, working at Abracadabra Paris, who will welcome you directly at the apartment. In order to organize your check-in at the apartment, you have to send to them an email from your personal email address (otherwise, they couldn't answer you with the new airbnb policy that hides emails). So, as soon as you know your travel details, at least 2 weeks before, please contact them on (please change it into a mail address): (EMAIL HIDDEN) Julie or Stéphanie will indicate you all details to arrive to the apartment (keys, address, explanations to reach the apartment...). Please ,note that arriving  or departure  the apartment before 8.00 am or after 8.00 pm ,Sunday or bank holiday, will be at your charge for 30 euros . We wish you a nice stay at our place, Best regards (EMAIL HIDDEN) Merci pour votre confirmation de location. N'étant pas à Paris, c'est Julie ou Stéphanie, de la société Abracadabra Pari

space: In the center of XVII arrondissement, 900 meters from Montmartre, I propose my brand new flat of 60m2. It is a very charming classic settled in an interior ancient courtyard. This apartment is easy to live: style, sun, calm and a lot of charm! It was designed by an architect, great volumes and luxury materials: old fashion style parquet on the ground, art paintings, fireplaces, colored bathroom, historical cornices and a lot of wood. It offers an excellent mix of old style and technology (High Definition Television, Audiophile HI-FI components, unlimited Optical Wifi Web Access) that gives a singular nice atmosphere and an idea of happiness and relax.

space: Bel appartement de 55m2 lumineux situé dans le 17ème SUD, entre les quartiers ternes - batignolles - lévis qui sont à moins de 10 mn et le parc monceau à 5mn. Ces quartiers/villages où il y a peu de touristes sont typiques et vous feront vivre comme un vrai parisien : restaurants, bars et rue piétonne pour le marché. Les métros les plus proches Wagram (2mn), Malesherbes (3mn) sont sur la ligne 3. Un train vous amènera directement à Saint-Lazare en seulement 2 minutes de la station Pont Cardinet (5 mn de l'appartement). Arrêt du bus 31 direct (5mn) pour la place de l'étoile et la gare de l'est. Une station Velib au pied de l'immeuble est bien pratique. L'appartement est situé au 5ème étage, sans ascenseur, mais les escaliers sont faciles :)La vue est très dégagée et apporte luminosité à l'appartement. Le voisinage est très calme. L'appartement se compose d'un salon / salle à manger / cuisine américaine, vaste et lumineux, avec tout le confort moderne : Four à micro-ondes, plaques, lave

space: It is very uncommon to find a house in Paris, specially in the neighbourhood it is in, which is very central. The beautiful courtyard ressembles an old cobbled Parisian street The house space is really charming, the ground floor is a big common area which is really comfortable for relaxing, eating or cooking while spending time with friends or family.  The second floor has two calm bright and airy bedrooms with double beds, the both have very high ceilings and wooden beams.  The bathroom has a comfortable tub and shower, it include the toilet. There are two staircases that each lead to very cute Parisian bedrooms with bright skylights and wooden beams. The whole house has hardwood floors.
description: An exceptional and perfect Parisian experience, mixing a colorful and hipster neighbourhood with a calm and homely environment. The house is on a private green courtyard contrasting with the lively and central area it is in. It has 3 floors, the first floor has a 50m2 open space with hardwood floors, it includes the living room space, dinning space and kitchen. The second floor has two big bedrooms and the bathroom. Two separate staircases lead to a smaller rooms (the third floor). It is very uncommon to find a house in Paris, specially in the neighbourhood it is in, which is very central. The beautiful courtyard ressembles an old cobbled Parisian street The house space is really charming, the ground floor is a big common area which is really comfortable for relaxing, eating or cooking while spending time with friends or family.  The second floor has two calm bright and airy bedrooms with double beds, the both have very high ceilings and wooden beams.  The bathroom has a comfortable tu
transit: The metro is just on the corner, one minute away by foot, there are a few other metro stations, 5 minutes away (including the very central Place de la Republique), there are also bus stops just a minute away. But many things are accessible by foot including the Le Marais neighborhood which is just on the other side of the Place de la Republique. I can't stress enough how central it is.
access: The entire house is for guest use.
interaction: I might be travelling but if I am, I will always be available and there will be a person in Paris to help you out with all your problems.
host_about:
Hi,we are a Franco-chilean couple.  I am Camila, I produce films with latin america, my husband is Nicolas, he is an urbanist and works mainly in Paris. We have a 14 year old son, Luca who studies and at the Lycée Français in Barcelona and plays Rugby.

We love living in Barcelona and we really like sharing evreything we like and love about this city. Enjoy!

space: SINGLE ROOM   Less than one-minute walk from the subway station Alexandre Dumas on line 2. Near Pere Lachaise, Parc de la Roquette, 10 minutes walk from Bastille, Nation and Menilmontant   The house is located on an artery of the capital between the 11th and the 20th arrondissement of Paris. You can reach : Line 1 in  5 minutes Paris Centre, Châtelet in 20 minutes Bastille 15 min République 15 min Ménilmontant 8 min Belleville 10 min Pigalle 25 min You can reach the main monuments in less than 30 minutes. house_rules: We simply invite you to make this place your own, and treat it with the same care you would of your home... You can smoke inside, but we don't, except for a cigar from time to time.
host_about:
Bonjour à tous, 

Je m'appelle Sebastian Missaglia et je suis musicien, chanteur de tango. Né en Argentine, mais venu en France tout petit avec mes parents, je valorise avant tout le partage, la découverte et les jolies rencontres !
Je joue avec un duo que l on peut écouter et contacter  
en cherchant sur internet à "smgotan" ;)

Passionné par la vie en général, j'ai quand même quelques préférences, notamment pour le bricolage, les vieux vélos que je retape à neuf pour leur donner une nouvelle vie, les brocantes, la pelote basque... 
Les voyages sont avant tout des aventures humaines pour moi, et j'ai eu la chance de vivre de belles expériences en Amérique Latine, aux États-Unis, en Asie (Thaïlande), à Madagascar...

Cette année je vivrais avec le chat et peut être Xavier un amigo, nous n'imaginons pas vivre autrement que dans la rencontre et le partage, notre maison est avant tout un lieu ouvert, convivial et naturel. Une ambiance douce et détendue très précieuse dans la capitale... Pour ainsi dire nous avons le sens de l'accueil dans le sang et nous aimons ça ! 

N'hésitez pas à nous contacter : nous sommes très disponibles et serions ravis de nous entretenir plus avec vous !

space: A SUNNY and AIRY space with HIGH CEILINGS and 4 WINDOWS overlooking a pleasant flowered courtyard. The 2-floors bricks, building is 2-CENTURIES OLD  and has a special feeling. The unit is COSY, and WELL APPOINTED. You will find: a gorgeous BATHTUB in the marble bath to relax at the end of the day, a COMFORTABLE KING-SIZED BED with a memory-foam top. The kitchen is FULLY EQUIPPED even for a long stay. The bedroom is large (19m2 / 204 sq ft.) and separate.  All bath and bed linen are provided, as well as coffe, tea, and spices. **SIZE ** of the apartment: 38m2 (410 sq ft) + mezzanine.  A georgeus space for 2, still perfect for a family! ** Floor:**  1 floor above the ground floor.
description: CENTRAL, full of LIGHT, 4 WINDOWS overlooking a calm courtyard, in  a charming property 2-CENTURIES OLD . transit: ********************** TRANSPORTS *********************** We are only 350 meters from  METRO/RER  station "Bibliotheque Francois Mitterrand", which is very convenient, as it has both Metro 14 and RER C. - RER C follows the left bank, and takes you DIRECT to Notre Dame (5'), Musee d'Orsays (10'), Tour Eiffel (18'), Versaille (43')... - METRO 14 is a fast authomatic line, which  runs every 2 minutes. It  takes you DIRECT to Gare de Lyon (4'), Chatelet-Les Halles (7'), Louvres (9')...  (at Chatelet-Les Halles you are  at  Hotel de Ville, and in the main hub of Paris metro system). Around the apartment there are also many bus lines  and several other metro stations (6,5,7)
access: whole loft
house_rules: - NO SMOKING apartment - NO PETS (sorry,  it is really not possible!) - please be considerate of the neighbors, by avoiding noise.  We are in  a small, peaceful residence, and I am sure you will find it easy to integrate in it! CHECK-IN Normally from 14h00 to 20h00. Late check-in possible by using lock-box CHECK-OUT Before departure, please follow these simple indications: -do your dishes (no worry: there is a DISHWASHER!) -empty the refrigerator,   -take out any garbage. You are not expected to vacuum or mop. However, I need your collaboration to keep the house in the good nice conditions it is! Thank you!

I am 32 years old and i am working as a public health doctor.
I am always willing to discover new places and other people. I did some couchsurfing and airbnb for the past few years and i really enjoy feeling a little bit at home when i am travelling. And i like that it is a good way to meet people from the place you visit. I hosted several times in my appartment in Paris as well.

house_rules: Entretien du logement: Nous sommes très attaché à notre chez nous et espérons sincèrement que vous vous y plairez. Nous espérons que vous en prendrez soin. Nhésitez pas à vous servir de l'aspirateur, de la serpillère, du CIF... Attention notre appartement est non fumeur.  Containers/Poubelles: Si vous souhaitez vider la poubelle, vous devez vous rendre dans la cour. 2 solutions; de façon cavalière en sortant par la fenêtre, ou demanière plus civilisé en utilisant la porte se trouvant dans la cage d'escalier commune vous devrez utiliser le pass Vigic ainsi que la clé "poubelle" présente sur le porteclé. Les containers/poubelles de l'immeuble se situent dans la cours sous un abri de jardin. La gardienne de l'immeuble se charge du reste! Animaux: les animaux ne sont pas tolérés dans l'appartement! Bruit: L'immeuble est très calme, car les propriétaires sont peu présents, vous pouvez donc utiliser faire un peu de bruit vous ne dérangerez pas grand monde. Veillez tout de même au repos des v
host_about:
Bonjour,
Nous sommes Marine et Charles-Marie, nous sommes originaires du bord de mer d'une jolie petite ville du Nord finistère, ROSCOFF.
Nous vivons à Paris depuis plus de 7 ans au sein de cet appartement. Nous adorons voyager, lire, faire la fête, les bonnes bouffes, le bons vins, la voile, la pétanque et cuisiner. 
Nous aimons rire, plaisantons beaucoup et détestons tout à fait ce genre d'exercice où il faut se décrire.

Comment recevons nous ? Il s'agit d'un appartement bien équipé et très confortable, nous préparons votre lit et votre linge de toilette. Laissons à votre disposition de la lecture, la télévision, internet... Malgré notre absence, nous restons joignables à tout moment en cas de problème. Vous disposerez de tous le confort d'un appartement haussmanien et pourrez profiter pleinement des joies parisiennes tout en étant au calme dans l'appartement.

space: We look forward to welcoming you to our beautiful duplex of 77 m2. Boasting an ancient feel, an unobstructed view, it is located at the foot of Montmartre (10 minutes). The apartment has a living-dining room (28m2) with original wooden floors and two spacious bedrooms. The kitchen is fully equipped (dishwasher, washing machine, stove, fridge, microwave). The bathroom has a tub and a shower. The building is quiet and safe protected by a digital lock. Close to public transportation (subway lines 4 and 12, bus), the apartment is close to numerous  shops (just minutes from the picturesque rue du  Poteau, a pedestrian street), bars and restaurants. space: L’atelier du Marais Ancien atelier transformé en un spacieux appartement familial et fonctionnel de 100m² en plein cœur du quartier du Marais à Paris . Situé  juste derrière le musée Pablo Picasso, entouré de galeries d’art et à 2 mn de la Place des Vosges. Idéal pour un séjour en famille (9 personnes),vous disposerez d’une entrée privative, donnant sur une cour intérieure pavée du 17 éme siècle , une partie des fenêtres donnent sur cette cour, ce qui en fait un endroit très calme, au centre de Paris A quelques pas du plus vieux marché de Paris, le marché des Enfants Rouges, la rue des Archives, la rue des Francs Bourgeois, la rue des Rosiers, la rue Vieille du Temple et beaucoup d’autres, vous êtes au cœur du vieux  Paris. A 10 mn à pied de l’île Saint Louis, du centre Georges Pompidou, de la place des Vosges, de la place de la Bastille. 3 stations de métro à proximité : Les filles du calvaire, Hôtel de ville, Saint-Paul L'appartement dispose d’une cuisine entièrement équipée ouverte

space: Nice bedroom (13m²) in a 100m² flat very close to everything. There is a subway station just right in front of the building (metro Mouton-Duvernet, ligne 4). The bedroom is quiet and pleasant. There is a brand NEW bed really comfortable (photos to come)! It is an Hausmannian building with an elevator.  You have free access to the bathroom and the kitchen and can cook what you want, when you want. You can also use the wifi and washing machines. The area is quiet but very nice to have a drink or a walk. There are restaurants and other markets. You can go to the famous Rue Daguerre (2min walk) or the Parc Montsouris, Port Royal (15min walk). The catacombes are also just right next.  We are available to indicate you where are the places to be ! Everything is very accessible : with the subway (line 4) you can go to Montparnasse (5min), Odeon (10min), Châtelet (15min), Gare du Nord, Gard de l'Est (20min)... You can also rent a bike at the Velib' stations. With the line 6 you can go to the Ei

space: Our apartment is right in the heart of Paris’ 19th district, only a two-minute walk from the famous Buttes Chaumont park. It’s an attractive neighborhood with many restaurants for all tastes and budgets. There are also many shops where you’ll find tasty food for moderate prices (a list will be at your disposal in the apartment). You can go to the cinema in 15 minutes on foot in a nice neighborhood next to the Seine. It’s ideally situated to reach the center of Paris via subway or bicycle (metro: Belleville, Pyrennées ou Buttes-Chaumont). For example, you are only 15 minutes away from Chatelet-les-Halles or Montmartre. Our light-filled apartment has old-world charm. Our street is very calm and quiet, a very pleasant place for family holidays. The apartment can fit six people in three available bedrooms, one with a bed for two persons, another with two single beds and one with sofa bed. There is also a big living room, a fully equipped kitchen and two bathrooms (one with a bathtub) for a

interaction: Nous pouvons répondre à toutes vos questions par le site Airbandb et bien évidemment par mail ou par téléphone lorsque vous avez loué notre appartement pour toutes les précisions pratiques pour que tout se passa au mieux entre nous;
house_rules: Nous attendons des gens relativement calmes parce que c'est le cas de notre immeuble où les voisins se respectent et vivent en toute amitié. Nous aimerions des personnes qui aiment le mélange ancien et moderne pour qu'ils ne soient pas décus et qu'ils se sentent bien chez nous!
host_about: Nous vivons à Paris, mon compagnon est d'origine algérienne et tchèque, je suis française d'origine corse, nous aimons Paris pour ce que cette ville offre de culturel, nous adorons le cinéma, le théâtre et l'art en général.Mon compagnon est enseignant et je suis comédienne, nous aimons silloner cette ville à pied , en vélo mais nous aimons en partir aussi, nous aimons voyager, découvrir d'autres façons d'envisager la vie, le faire découvrir à nos enfants, nous aimons rencontrer, partager avec les gens , nous aimons notre appartement, il a le charme de l'ancien, il est simple, c'est un appartement familial, sans prétention où il fait bon vivre...

host_about:
Je    musicienne , mère  de 2 enfants ( 6&8ans) accompagnée d'un papa post-producteur.
Nous avons avons choisi le 11ème arrondissement pour son côté branché, bobo et si parisiens!
Nous avons aimé cet appartement car il est très parisien : parquet , moulures et cheminée! Nous avons tout refait il y a 5 ans à notre goût plutôt design mais en gardant le cachet du parisien!
Nous y habitons depuis 5 ans et nous sommes comblés. Autant les endroits pour sortir ( restaurant , bar , boîte ... ) , pour les enfants ( parcs , manèges ...) et courir ( 10 minutes de la coulée verte ) sont présents au pied de l'appartement.
L'immeuble est très calme et il y a même une place de parking pour ceux que cela intéresse!
Le marché d'Aligre , place de la Bastille , rue de Charonne, Alain Ducasse Cyril Lignac,  le bistrot Paul Bert ... Tous ces incontournables dans le quartier!!!!

house_rules: Extra fees : - Check in after 7pm : 29 euros  - Check in after 9pm : 49 euros - Check in/out Sundays : 49 euros Our Charter  We believe that renting or exchanging one’s home is not only of great practical benefit for all involved, but also opens doors to understanding people and cultures. This requires trust, and that is why we think it is important for every member to adhere to our charter. As a traveller, I commit to:  • Providing accurate information about myself and those travelling with me  • Scrupulously respecting the property where I am staying, with special attention to the sentimental or symbolic value that someone else’s belongings may have  • Respecting the culture of my host by avoiding any behaviours that could be offensive to him/her or to his/her neighbors  • Submitting a review my stay with honesty and tolerance • No parties, no pets thank you • Leave the appartment  tidy (arrange dishes, glasses, throw garbages...) As a property owner or host, I commit to:  • Insuring
host_about:
Hi, we are Chea-Lie and Delphine !

We are a couple living and working in Paris for more than 15 years now, and taking care of our children (7 and 3 yo). 
I currently sell software for mid market companies and Delphine is purchasing products for her company.

We enjoy travelling and discovering new cultures and new people. 
As we travelled a lot in family (US, South america, Asia, Europe...), we found hotels difficult to handle and sometimes we are disappointed from some Airbnb properties.

We need to move in Paris for our work, so we now rent our "historical" appartement where we left a lot of our furnitures, so you will live in Paris, like we were ! 
Central, Quiet, near shops, near touristic attractions, ideal for families
We would also be glad to welcome and trying to point out places in Paris.

host_about:
Hello everyone, I am Aurore, 37 years old

As a freelance journalist, I am working from home. So I took a big care of making our house the most cosy and welcoming place as possible.

My husband Richard (43, copy editor) and I live in this apartment since 2010. 

We are used to swap and rent it.

We love our Belleville disctrict, wich is like a village in the city.
This is the perfect place to live with kids. 
The apartment is of course childproof (socket covers, gates to protect the stairways). 

A few of our favorites things ? 
- travelling (from the United States to China, Israël, Italy...)
- cooking for friends and discovering the best restaurants
- binge-watching TV shows...

We like to welcome warmly our guests. 
You will always find at your arrival a good map of Paris, all you need to know about the night and days facilities in the area and our favorites adresses.

We added a shower curtain in February 2015.  -Bed Linen and towels  provided - Hair dryer upon request -Separate toilet.  LOCA

transit: The apartment is located in the south of Paris near the Eiffel Tower and the Champs Elysées. A bus stop is located in the building front. With buses No. 22 and No. 72, it is easy to visit Paris. There are also two metro stops (Eglise d'Auteuil and Mirabeau) and a RER stop called Javel (fast train) near the apartment. There is also a port located in front of the Eiffel Tower where hop on and off boats stop along the Seine.
access: The whole apartment
interaction: IMPORTANT: I try to be available to welcome guests as often as possible but sometimes I am absent. I do not guarantee my presence upon your arrival. When I am absent, I warn you by email. In that case, You need to go to the concierge who will give you 2 sets of keys in a pouch. He is aware of the guests' arrival and know their family name for more security. There is a welcome book in the apartment giving you all the necessary information. You will find different phone numbers: my husband's (if you are unable to join me) and the housekeeper's. You can reach us easily.
house_rules: The apartment is NO smoking for up to 6 people We do not allow parties in the apartment Ask me if you want to bring your pet... space: Between Montmartre & les Batignolles, a cosy parisian appartement that could welcome 2 people in a quiet place. Situation : Ideally located between the famous districts of Montmartre and les Batignolles, encircle by parcs, near market, shops, restaurants, bistrot & terrasses you will enjoy the real parisian way of life. Very small walking distance from Place de Clichy, accessible by subway ligns 2 and 13, separate from 3 stations to the Place de l'Opera and the department stores districts (Galeries Lafayettes & Printemps). A bus stop located at the end of the street serves the famous different places de l'Etoile, de l'Hotel de Ville or du Châtelet in less than 30 minutes. house_rules: Les voyageurs s'engagent à être respectueux des affaires laissées à disposition.  Pour des questions d'hygiène et d'odeur, les animaux domestiques ne sont pas acceptés et il est interdit de fumer dans l'appartement. Le matériel nécessaire pour faire le ménage (aspirateur, produits et matériel d’entretien) est laissé gracieusement à la disposition des locataires, afin de rendre le logement propre. Cependant un budget ménage sera prévu ainsi qu'un état des lieux.   La box internet avec TV et téléphone sera laissée à la disposition des voyageurs. Si les locataires ont acheté des vidéos, passé des appels à des numéros spéciaux, des mobiles ou à l'étranger, le cout sera déduit de la caution (sur preuve du relevé de l'opérateur). Si tout objet est endommagé, les locataires devront en informer l'hôte et le remplacer à l'identique (même marque et même modèle) ou cela sera déduit de la caution.
host_about:
Originaire d'Amiens, je suis partie à 18 ans à Paris pour y faire mes études supérieures, puis j'ai déménagé à Lille, puis à Montpellier avant de partir 1 an aux Etats-Unis en Caroline du Sud et à New York pour finalement poser mes bagages à Paris.
Je suis donc parisienne depuis 8 ans et je travaille dans la communication.
J'adore sortir, flâner et me perdre dans les rues parisiennes que je découvre encore tous les jours.
Sportive, j'aime la plongée, les sports de glisse, le tennis et le running; j'ai d'ailleurs un petit parcours hebdomadaire qui me fait passer, par exemple, par le nouveau parc Clichy/Batignolles puis le fameux square des Batignolles pour finir la course parc Monceaux; avis aux voyageurs amateurs de running...une autre manière de découvrir Paris!

---

A native of Amiens (North of France, between Lille and Paris), I left at 18 to Paris to do my graduate studies, then I moved to Lille and Montpellier before leaving one year in the United States for my last year graduate studies in South Carolina and then for an internship in New York; to finally be back in Paris to settle down for a while.
So that I'm a Parisian since 8 years and I work in communication.
I love going out, hang out and get lost in the streets of Paris that I am still discovering every day.
Sportswoman, I love diving, snow or water skiing, tennis and running, besides I have also small weekly run-courses that makes me go, for exemple, through the new Clichy / Batignolles park, then trough the famous Batignolles square to end up to Monceau Park , for the traveler running fans ... another way to discover Paris!

transit: 3 metro lines in bastille (L1/5/8) with easy connexion to everywhere lots of busses taxi station, bicycle renting and car renting stations

Always here to help, or easy to join if needed, I will make the most to help you enjoy your stay I can even make home made dinner for you (not included in the price of the night 25 or 30€/person), french or Brazilian menus according to what you like, very appreciated, nice to have contact with locals ;-) Guided tour of Paris according to your wishes : 50€ for a 3 hours personalized tour
house_rules: quiet building and apartment, please respect the silence around you. Private access, with your own keys to give both side maximum independencies  Non smoking apartment, possibility to smoke on the balconies. Flexible time for breakfast (included in the price) between 7h15 and 10h, possibility to arrange a simple breakfast earlier if needed but without fresh bread (bakeries open at 7h) Linen changed every 4 or 5 nights (bedsheets and towels) be careful with the toilets SANIBROYEUR, no objects inside (no metal, no plastic, no linen, not even a wipe)
host_about:
Très communicatif, et adorant rendre service, je saurai vous conseiller et faire de votre séjour à Paris le plus agréable moment de vos vacances.
Paris, ville magnifique, je l'adore, et cela sera un plaisir de vous la faire partager, en étant dans un quartier central, vivant, animé où vous pourrez trouver de quoi satisfaire vraiment tous vos goûts à proximité.
Le plaisir de recevoir, de cuisiner, de faire partager ma ville, ses lieux magiques, son histoire, ses musées et ses nombreux théâtres.
Je pourrai vous orienter pour vos visites, les expos à voir (ou à ne pas voir ;-), les lieux à ne pas rater, les restau à tester ... et même vous accompagner si vous le souhaitez
Faisant partie d'une association de promotions de théâtres, je vous conseillerai et pourrais même vous aider à avoir des tarifs avantageux.
Si vous souhaitez de l'aide, des conseils, ou une soirée table d'hôtes, nous pourrons voir aussi cela au moment de votre visite.
Dans l'attente de vous rencontrer sur Paris, et de vous aider à apprécier ma ville.

space: The appartment is mine, which I rent sometimes. So you have all commodities from a real appartment, to cook, books, but also clothes of mine and some food in the fridge, as I do leave there the rest of the time. It's not meant to be unpersonal, like in an hotel. If you don't like it this way (going actually to someone) you should go to another place or to the hotel.  It's situated on the 5th floor without lift. It has windows on two sides which are upon two courtyards, so no street noise, just birds and it's sunny.  Parisian old style.  It's 10 min by feet from Bastille, 15 min from Oberkampf, 15 min from Père Lachaise, 20 min from the Marais.  By bike, about 5-10 min.  It's my appartment so you'll find the average convenience: Internet, Wifi, possibility to cook and I can give you tips about Paris.  I'm french, I do also speak german, spanish and english

host_about:
Hi, my name is Edith, french Parisian woman. I use to work at Marie Claire magazine in advertizing and i am now retired.

Beside dancing and playing the piano, I take care of my grand son and travel a lot (trekking in desert/ mountains).

host_about:
I've lived in Paris since more than 10 years and love this city. I am always very happy to welcome people in Paris and help my hosts discover the city.
I have lived in the United-States, in Belgium and in different parts of France. I now live in Versailles.
I also love to travel. I visit Berlin, Madrid, Rome, Barcelona, Copenhagen or other European cities as often as I can.
I like music, theater and good restaurants!
I always visit places by walking or riding bycicle as much as possible.
I work in the organic skin care industry and have an eco-friendly lifestyle.
I try to make every day a new adventure and to live in the present!

----------
BONJOUR, JE M'APPELLE CAROLE!
J'ai habité à Paris pendant plus de 10 ans et j'adore cette ville. Je suis toujours ravie d'accueillir des personnes à Paris et d'aider mes hôtes à découvrir la ville.
J'ai habité aux Etats-Unis, en Belgique, et dans plusieurs coins de la France. J'habite maintenant à Versailles.
J'adore également voyager. Je visite Berlin, Madrid, Rome, Barcelone, Copenhague ou d'autres villes européennes dès que je le peux.
J'aime la musique, le théâtre et les bons restaurants !
Je visite toujours les villes en me déplaçant à pied ou à vélo le plus possible.
Je travaille dans l'industrie de la cosmétique bio et j'ai un style de vie plutôt écologique.
J'essaie de faire de chaque jour une nouvelle aventure et de vivre au présent !

space: A large family flat in a court Yard with a 100 sqm private garden. A very quiet place, with 3 bedrooms, a 50 sqm living room with an american kitchen, a large bathroom and a fire place. There is a Washing machine, a dryer, a dish washer, a microwave oven and a 5 fire cooker. Very easy to reach: 20 meters only from the subway station Alexandre Dumas, RER at 2 subway stations. Disneyland Paris can be reached in 30 mns. Next door, is a bakery, a pharmacy, several restaurants, a supermarket opened until 10p.m, a library with english books and a sport club. The Père Lachaise cimetery is only 5 mns walking!  Bus 76, just in front of the door, brings you to Bastille in 10mns and to the Louvre museum in 20mns. There is a table and several chairs in the garden, that enable to have lunch or dîner outside.

space: Profitez d’un emplacement idéal pour découvrir Paris avec ce spacieux appartement de 2 pièces au 4ème étage avec ascenseur, situé dans le Village Suisse, au cœur du 15ème arrondissement. La cuisine séparée est entièrement équipée pour vous restaurer sur place. Bénéficiez d'internet en wifi, à noter qu'il n'y a pas de télévision. house_rules: CHECK IN  Your check in will be scheduled after 15:00. For a check in after business hours, you will be charged an extra fee of 50 €, to hand directly to your host. Business hours take place from 10 am to 7 pm on working days, 10 am to 7 pm on week-ends and holidays.  The appointment will take place at a rendez-vous point ; if your contact is not here at your arrival, please call him on his cell, as he might just be inside the apartment.  Keys will only be handed to you once you have paid the whole rent and security deposit, as well as presented your ID, and signed the inventory and general terms and conditions.  DEPOSIT  An amount of 3000€ will be handed over through Airbnb as a security deposit during the check in.  DELAY  Your host's cell phone will be given to you one week before your arrival. If you suffer any delay at your arrival, please contact him directly by phone, at least 1 hour before the meeting. If you are more than 45 minutes late and have not warned your host, you will

My name is delphine with my family we are owner of  PARIS SELECT
 de l'Europe, Paris.zerosixsixseptdixsept quatre vingt treize dix neuf,,

au revoir

house_rules: Merci de respecter la tranquillité des voisins, de ne pas fumer à l'intérieur et de faire attention aux tableaux. Les cheminées ne sont pas utilisables, elles sont fragiles. La porte d'entrée est blindée, une clé perdue sera facturée 150 euros. L'appartement est traversant, attention aux courants d'air et aux portes qui claquent! Merci de faire comme chez vous, en ne laissant ni la chaudière, ni toutes les lumières allumées quand vous sortez!

space: The apartment is located in the 18th arrondissement, quiet with a beautiful terrace and a beautiful view over Paris. Sunday in the Rue Lepic and Abesses that are 7 minutes from the apartment you can even make shopping in a busy area. Le cas échéant, le bailleur pourra refuser l'entrée dans les lieux. ASSURANCE Le locataire doit être assuré par une compagnie d'assurance notoirement connue, contre les risques de vol, incendie et dégât des eaux, tant pour ses risques locatifs que pour le bien mobilier donné en location, ainsi que pour les recours des voisins, et en justifier à première réquisition du bailleur.En conséquence, ce dernier décline toute responsabilité pour le recours que sa compagnie d'assurances pourrait exercer contre le locataire en cas de sinistre. space: At the heart of Paris in the 6ème arrondissement, this nice 2 room apartment (35m² = 377ft²) is located at just 2 minutes from the beautiful Luxembourg Gardens!  The flat is very central and very well connected.  The apartment is close to the many bars and restaurants of Saint-Germain-des-Près yet it is very peaceful as it looks down to courtyards in both the bedroom and the living room and has double glazing. It is located on the 3rd floor with a lift access. The apartment has wooden floor in both the living room and the bedroom, and a small decorative fireplace in the living room. For 1 to 2 people. The flat is usually smoke-free but we accept smokers.

house_rules: We want our hosts to feel as if they were in their own home :) > We will provide you with towels, sheets and so on. You can help yourself with all the stuffs you can find in the bathroom. > You can help yourself in the fridge and in the kitchen with food and drinks you will find. Same for coffee, for washmaschine tablets (you don't need to buy some :) ) In exchange, we thank you to respect the following rules : > You can eat in the kitchen, in the dinning room or on the balcony, but not in the rooms. > Smoking is prohibited in the flat, but you can smoke outside : you have a little balcony to do it so it will be nice :) > The presence of animals is prohibited.  > To return the flat clean at the end of your rental and of course to take good care of it as if it was your own flat :) All these house rules will allow us to install a real friendship based on mutual appreciation.  Please, feel free to contact us for more information!  Charles & Cécile
host_about:
Hi !
Me (Charles) and my wife (Cécile) are the parents of a 2 years old little boy.
That's why our flat is pefect for a family. Your children will have enough space to run inside ! Of course we will be pleased to welcome you even if you don't have children :)

Feel free to contact us !

space: Welcome to Paris !  Located in the 15th arrondissement of Paris, my charming apartment is less than 15min from the Eiffel Tower. A block from subways and bus stops Metro lignes : Metro10 et RER C, stop JAVEL-André Citroë (Website hidden by Airbnb) Ligne 8, stop Boucicaut  Bus 62, stops Javel / Saint Charles Just next to a nice shopping street with a viewpoint on the Eiffel Tower. space: In the heart of a very charming  and family friendly area of Paris, you'll have your own private room in my 105 m2 very luminous flat. Parquet floor. Quiet and typical. Great location convenient to restaurants, bars, shopping & transportations The neighborhood is full of nice places to eat or have a drink but if you feel like cooking a nice home-made dinner, you should find everything to suit your needs : gas cooktop, traditional oven, Nespresso, and all the equipments to cook, pans etc. There is a big bio market every Saturday mornings at 5 minutes walking from the flat.  Cinemas at at 5 minutes walking. Many shops and transportation all at 10 minutes walking maximum. All mains touristic areas of Paris (Champs-Elysées, Trocadéro, Tour Eiffel, Quais de Seine) less than  30 minutes by public transportation.  My home is warm and welcoming, very comfortable, perfectly convenient for you who want to visit Paris alone or with your partner or find a great place to stay for you have work to d

transit: From Roissy take the Roissybus (11€/pax) to Opera (expect 45' to 1h so you can either take a nap of finish the book you started in the plane) then the bus (line 68 or 61) to Place de Clichy (about 10') From Orly take Orlyval (fast train around 10€/pax) from the airport and if by day pay attention to the rabbits by the side of the railway. Change at Gare du Nord then take the metro, line 2 and 10' later get off at Rome or Place de Clichy and you've practically arrive, just 5' walking and you're home. From there you can choose whatever transportation mode you like, from buses (line (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) or 95) to Velib (city bikes). As for the metro, 3 lines (2, 12 and 13) will take you pretty much everywhere.
access: 1 bedroom Wifi access and television in the room (but that's not why you're here are you ?) Full access to shower and bathroom. Full access to the big kitchen and all equipments (Fridge, freezer etc.) Access to a washer dryer. You can enjoy the living room mornings and evenings for it's the room I'm working in during the day..
interaction: If I'm in Paris, I'll be personally checking you in and out. I'll be available at any time to answer your questions and provide the necessary tips to navigate my favorite neighborhood In case of emergency please have a working cell phone or access to your e-mails.
house_rules: I'm a smoking person so you can smoke in the common areas of the flat but the rooms are non smoking. If I'm away a person will be in charge of checking you in and out. Her name is Sylvina. She's also the cleaning lady.
host_about: Love travelling and meet new people. Welcoming you at home is another way to experience this.

space: Sunny, quiet and beautiful apartment with a very nice view, 2 rooms, located in the heart of Paris 10th arrondissement. Within walking distance of Canal Saint Martin, Oberkampf, and Place de la République (largest pedestrian plaza in Paris), the apartment overlooks a charming little square with coffees and terraces, restaurants, shops… Twice a week, you can get your fresh groceries directly from the neighborhood market… le vrai Paris! The République – Oberkampf – Canal Saint Martin area is thriving with quality artisan shops (baker, butcher, cheese maker, supermarkets...). It offers all kind of public transportations to take you all over the city (3 subway stations, 2 buses, lots of public bicycle stations...) The flat is on the 3rd floor, and is fully equipped:  - A big and sunny living room with a coach, a dining table, a desk, unlimited Wifi, cabled tv, dvd player, hi-fi system, unlimited phone for France and many countries such as USA, Canada...  - A separated bedroom with a queen

space: A quiet and secured studio available for one person (or couple) located right across the street from Parc des Expositions de Versailles / Metro station Porte de Versailles.
description: It is a well-lit, fully-furnished 40m2 studio with a balcony suitable for one person or a couple. It is located in a quiet area of Paris (15th) right across the street from Parc des Expositions de Versailles, about 2-min walk from the metro/tram. A quiet and secured studio available for one person (or couple) located right across the street from Parc des Expositions de Versailles / Metro station Porte de Versailles. The guest may access the studio, the balcony as well as all equipement included and available in the studio as well as the equipment inside the building ie. the lift from the groundfloor to the 6th floor and the staircase. The guests will not be able to access the basement. I will be present on the first day of your stay to welcome you so that we can make a quick inventory which will be signed by both parties as it is mentioned in the House Rules. I will also remain in touch with you throughout your stay by phone or email. French, English and Spanish spoken. Quiet neighborh
transit: Metro, bus and tram stations are all less than one minute-walk away from the studio ! You won't find closer than that !  How to commute to/from the town centre ? Metro Porte de Versailles (ligne 12). That's 10 min to Montparnasse. 25 min to get to Châtelet-Les-Halles (change at Montparnasse for Châtelet-Les-Halles and then take Line 4 calling at Porte de Clignancourt). How to get to La Défense ? Take Tram T2 in Porte de Versailles (direction Bezons). 30 min. How to get to La Tour Eiffel ? First, take the Tram T3 in Porte de Versailles and change at Pont de Garigliano. Then take REC C to reach Tour Eiffel/Champ de Mars (calling at St Martin d'Etampes). 30 minutes. How to get to Parc Montsouris ? Take T3a in Porte de Versailles and get off at Parc Montsouris (calling at Porte de Vincennes). 20 min.
access: The guest may access the studio, the balcony as well as all equipement included and available in the studio as well as the equipment inside the building ie. the lift from the groundfloor to the 6th floor and the staircase. The guests will not be able to access the basement.
interaction: I will be present on the first day of your stay to welcome you so that we can make a quick inventory which will be signed by both parties as it is mentioned in the House Rules. I will also remain in touch with you throughout your stay by phone or email. French, English and Spanish spoken.
house_rules: The rules of the studio are clearly displayed on the ground floor of the building. For rental periods of 7 days or less, clean bedding & linen are provided by the host. For rental periods exceeding 7 days, clean bedding & linen fall to the expense of the tenant. In addition, smoking is prohibited (tobacco, narcotics and any kind of drugs). The e-cigarette is allowed inside the studio & on the balcony. The commercial use of the studio is forbidden. It is  forbidden to use the studio for prostitution, drug trade and any trade in general. Please do maintain a sound level with respect to the neighbours' quality of life, i.e. esp. between 8pm and 9am. An inventory of the equipment will be checked, agreed and signed between the host and the tenant during the ckeck-in and during the check-out.
host_about:
Hello !

I'm Tom. I'm an outgoing Frenchman and I love music, languages and I enjoy travelling. I used to work in different countries in Europe and now I live & I work in graphic design & event planning in Paris.

Looking forward to meeting you !

Tom :-)

space: We are a family of antique dealers and interior designer. Our apartment has 4* equipments with the charm of antique furniture and beautiful objects. The dining room can accomodate up to 8 guests. Very quiet on a beautiful courtyard with trees and flowers, absolutely zero noise.
description: Cosy and very quiet one bedroom apartment (sleeps 2 or 3, 55m2). Discover the left bank, the Eiffel Tower, Notre Dame, Tuileries. Apt fully equiped, kitchen and dining room. Ground floor in a private courtyard with trees and flowers all year long.  We are a family of antique dealers and interior designer. Our apartment has 4* equipments with the charm of antique furniture and beautiful objects. The dining room can accomodate up to 8 guests. Very quiet on a beautiful courtyard with trees and flowers, absolutely zero noise. Full usage of the apartment, TV, telephone, Wifi, iron and iron board... kitchen (fridge, freezer, oven, microwave, dishwasher, boiler, toaster...)  and bathroom with italian style shower fully equiped. Linen provided. Nespresso coffee machine. If you are traveling with a baby, we can provide a baby cot upon demand. The apartment is next to our antique shops so we are here to help you for anykind of information, help you might need. In the apartment you will find our
transit: The metro station Rue du Bac (line 12) and the RER C station are just 3mn away from the apartment. The RER C takes you directly to the Versailles Palace. Many buses are available in the area along the Bld St Germain and Bld Raspail. There is a public parking just 2mn away from us. From CDG airport: RER B takes you to station St Michel and switch to RER C, one more station, and you get to Musée d'Orsay station, 3mn walk to the apartment.
access: Full usage of the apartment, TV, telephone, Wifi, iron and iron board... kitchen (fridge, freezer, oven, microwave, dishwasher, boiler, toaster...)  and bathroom with italian style shower fully equiped. Linen provided. Nespresso coffee machine. If you are traveling with a baby, we can provide a baby cot upon demand.
interaction: The apartment is next to our antique shops so we are here to help you for anykind of information, help you might need. In the apartment you will find our Welcome Book with all the necessary information for you to be confortable and find everything you need in the area.
house_rules: Our property is in a small buiding built at the end of the 16th century. It is very quiet and we kindly expect from our guests to respect the privacy and calm for the other tenants. Of course you can access the apartment 24/24.

space: I would be happy to welcome you in my very charming and stylish flat of 50m^2 with a great confortable living room. space: Located in the centre of Paris, in the historical area of Le Marais. We offer a 4 room flat in an 18th century building : - Living room 40 m² - A bedroom with a double bed - A bedroom with a single bed (90x190) - A bedroom with a single bed (90x190) an additional bed is possible - A fully equipped kitchen - A bathroom with shower and bath - Sheets and towels are provided  free of charge Ideal to discover Paris: walking distance from Pompidou Center, le Louvre, Picasso Museum, Latin Quarter, Notre Dame, the Seine river, Tuileries, the Marais district which is one of the oldest part of the city with its designer boutiques, wonderful sunday brunches and gorgeous Place des Vosges, Jazz clubs rue des Lombards, Opera etc.. We love our home and neighbourhood; it is a great place to live, a perfect place to be in order to appreciate the Parisian life.

space: Large apartment (969 sqm/90 m2 ) on the 3rd floor of a Haussmann building with an old wooden floor and moldings. Decorated with care, bathed in light, it is very close to the "Grands Boulevards" and its famous theaters. Please send in inquiry first to avoid disappointment. - Check-in starts from 3:00PM. Late check-in fees apply after 7:00PM (see below) - Checkout is by 10:00AM.   - Smoking.  All of our apartments are strictly non-smoking.   - Pets. Unfortunately furry friends are not allowed in any of our homes.   - Parties, Events, Photoshoots. The apartment is NOT suitable for parties, specials dinners, photoshoots or other events and the maximum number of guests should not exceed the maximum number of people allowed. Regarding a late check-in (after and including 7:00PM) Please remember that you are booking an apartment, not a hotel. We try to be as accommodating as possible. However, in the instance that you arrive between 7:00PM and 8:59PM there will be a 30 € late check-in fee, if you arrive even later, between 9:00PM and 10:59PM the check-in fee will be 50 €.
