host_about:
Hello! My name is Paul, I work in financial markets however I also enjoy all things creative! I take great pleasure in being able to share the wonders and hidden treasures of Paris and London with you. 

Please always message me to confirm availability before you make a reservation request to introduce yourself and the people you are traveling with, as well as the purpose of your visit, thanks! 

We offer fully-furnished, private apartments, located in the very heart of London and Paris. These apartments are carefully selected by me so that you will experience a true Londoner or Parisian lifestyle in luxury and comfort, close to great shops, bakeries, restaurants and all the famous sights in this beautiful city.

We will also provide you with everything you need for your stay in your fully furnished, fully equipped apartment including towels, bed linens and 24-hour assistance in case you should need anything.

It would be a pleasure to meet you and have you stay in one of our many apartments! You'll see all of them on Paris London Apartments. 

Cheers!
Paul's Paris London Apartments

space: Welcome to Montmartre! I put at your disposal my apartment in the heart of this beautiful area. Conveniently located you can enjoy all the delights it has to offer. Discover the Sacré Coeur (5 min walk), give you a crazy night at the Moulin Rouge (7 min walk) or visit the painters of the Place du Tertre (5 min walk). You can also stroll in the rue des Abbesses to meet the many small traders and make stops in the many restaurants. My apartment is typically Parisian, it is a 2 bedroom, the living room and bedroom are separated. There are wooden floors, I'm in the 5 th floor apartment is very, bright, there is double glazed windows so it is quiet. space: Our appartement is really large and the space organisation is perfect. You have totally isolated spaces : bedrooms are far from the living room so you can have different rythms. The ktichen is open on the living room. The whole place has been renewed : paintings, floor, design furniture... it is absolutely outrageous. From our home, you can go everywhere in Paris in 30 minutes, it is linked to so many subway and buses lines. In our home, you can also find everything you need for entertainment : lots of music and films, for adults and children. The perfect place !

space: *** Description of the apartment *** The flat is a beautiful and classic Parisian style apartment (60m2) with high ceilings, traditional mouldings, lovely French "pointe de Hongrie" parquet floors, marble Prussian stove. The apartment is calm and well located, all rooms are overlooking the courtyard from the 2nd floor. The apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living/dining room, a kitchen, a bathroom, separate toilets. There is plenty of closet and drawer storage for guests. The building has a lot of character, it is a Typical 19th century 6-story Parisian building. It is secured with coded entry. Bedrooms Description:  - Bedroom 1: one queen size bed for 2 persons ( 160 x 200 ) on the mezzanine, a desk and a drawer for clothes. - Bedroom 2: A crib/baby bed and a changing table. a drawer for clothes. - Living room: a Sofa bed for 2 persons ( 140 x 200 ) Common space rooms description: - The kitchen is equipped with all you need, including: oven, microwave, Fridge, Dish Washer, Radio-toa
description: In a central area, charming Parisian style apartment (60m2), steps off of Montmartre & Opera, in a village-like neighborhood. The apartment is calm and overlooking a courtyard. The neigborhood is really lively and home to many local shops, stylish restaurants and trendy nightlife spots. In this area, you will discover the real exciting parisian life! The guardian:"the latest trendsetting neighbourhood" We will make you feel at home and would be happy to give you advices! *** Description of the apartment *** The flat is a beautiful and classic Parisian style apartment (60m2) with high ceilings, traditional mouldings, lovely French "pointe de Hongrie" parquet floors, marble Prussian stove. The apartment is calm and well located, all rooms are overlooking the courtyard from the 2nd floor. The apartment consists of 2 bedrooms, a living/dining room, a kitchen, a bathroom, separate toilets. There is plenty of closet and drawer storage for guests. The building has a lot of character, it is a
transit: *** What's nearby & Transportion *** The apartment is well located between Opera and Montmartre (Sacré Coeur). - 4 min walk to rue des Martyrs - 10 min walk to Sacré Coeur, Abesses, Montmartre or Moulin Rouge, Opéra Garnier, Grands Boulevards, The "Passages Couverts", Galeries Lafayette or Printemps - 10 min by subway will take you to the the Louvre and Palais Royal (Comédie Française) Nearest Subway stations are: - Anvers (Line 2) ; Cadet or Poissonnière (Line 7), are only 5 min walk away - St Georges/ Notre Dame de Lorette (Line 12), are 8 min walk away Velib & Autolib stations are right downstairs! (Paris' public bike & auto hire services)
access: The entire apartment except some drawers.
interaction: We usually live in this flat, we should most probably be out of town during your stay. Anyway we would be happy discussing with you, if you feel like it. If you're here on Leisure, we would be happy hearing about your plans to visit and giving you some tips. Finally, we encourage you to contact us, whenever you need, on your arrival or during your stay (i.e: What's App, SMS, Voice call). Just a tip based on past experience, please don't forget to bring with you the phone you registered on AirBnB as we may need to contact you for check-in, in case of urgency.
house_rules: First, Thank you very much for choosing our place to stay !!!! We hope you'll enjoy Paris as much as we do! - You're free to use all available appliances (Dishwasher, Washing machine, Hair dryer). - Please be respectful of our neighboors & mind the noise late at night. Please also avoid walking in the flat with high heel shoes on - Please also be respectful of our home & furnitures. Broken objects may be charged back  - No cigarette inside, please use the courtyard - If you stay a week or more, please be kind to the plants.
host_about:
We are a couple & have been living in Paris for 9 years now.
We live in this 60 sqm apartment and would love welcoming you here.

We love hanging out with friends, going to theatre, movies, visiting Paris as tourists, go to picnic and when the weather allows it: spending all day out!
We love traveling too, our most recent trips where Vietnam (2015) and Jordan (2014). 

We're very easy going and talkative (or not, depends on you!)
We love meeting new people and want you to feel at ease in our home: our place is yours during your stay.

We're also very excited when it comes to share our favorite spots & neighborhood’s best hidden secrets to make your stay as Parisian as can be :-)

space: Welcome in my flat, located in Paris 19ème close to La Vilette area. My appartment has one kitchen, a living room, 2 rooms and one bathroom. In the first room there is a double bed, and in the second room (which is my daughter's room), there is a single bed, with possibility to add a second mattress on the floor. In the living room, there is a sofa-bed for 2 people, and an eletronic piano. You'll be able to go to  Gare du Nord or Gare de l'est in 10 minutes and 25 min for Chatelet, 30 minutes to Saint-Michel.

space: L'appartement se situe quartier bastille. C'est un 3 pièces typiquement parisien avec parquet et moulures, situé dans le 11e arrondissement, quartier Voltaire, agréable et animé. Le salon est très lumineux et la chambre est coquette. Nous avons un balcon bien garnis (vigne vierge, bambou, olivier, cerisier, lavande...) avec une petite table et deux chaises pour les petits déjeuners au soleil ! Le lit de la chambre de Lola peut accueillir un grand enfant et peut servir de lit d'appoint pour un adulte léger. L'appartement est idéal en amoureux ou pour un couple avec 1 ou 2 enfants. À savoir : Il est situé au 5ème étage SANS ASCENSEUR. Toutes les fenêtre sont dotées de double-vitrage.

host_about:
Je vis à Paris et à Buenos Aires. 
J'adore cuisiner, danser le tango, lire (surtout des romans), aller au cinéma, recevoir des amis. J'aime rencontrer des gens, échanger des impressions, connaître des cultures. 
Mes gouts sont éclectiques, simples, mais parfois aussi très sophistiqués. 
Je ne fume pas et j'aime les gens indépendants et responsables, curieux et ouverts. 
Je parle Français, anglais et espagnol. 
J'ai voyagé pendant six mois à travers l'Amérique latine et je suis tombée amoureuse de la ville de Buenos Aires ou j'ai décidé de venir y vivre.

space: (Please note, in the summer, I'm looking for several weeks bookings) Here is a 35 sq/m flat on top of a 30s building with elevator. A balcony terrace goes all around the flat, looking like a little house cabine on top of a parisian liner, giving an outstanding view above Paris, Montmartre, sacré-Coeur and Eiffel Tower. As featured on pictures you'll be able to relax after a good touristic day in a cosy living-room or on the terrace while watching a rarely visible landscape of Paris. Montmartre hill and Eiffel tower sparkling at night will make you feel all the amazing aesthetic magic of Paris. There's a bluetooth connection on the hi-fi system for listenning to your favourite music from your smartphone for example. The room is calm and bright, warm in the winter with central heating and cool in the summer with the big french windows. Bed is 140cm with a solide comfort mattress (high quality latex). There's a nice living-room with a dining table. The kitchen has got pretty much everythi

transit: Line 4 is very praticle to get in the center of Paris in 20min and I'll indicate you also nice bus line for some sight-seeing in Paris if you want. If you arrive frome Roissy Charles de Gaulle (RCDG) airport, take RER B to Gare du nord and line 4 to Porte de Clignancourt (north). It should be an hour and a half maximum. If you arrive at Beauvais (BV) airport, a shutle will bring you to Porte Maillot. From there, you'll have to take the PC3 bus to reach Porte de Clignancourt.
access: You'll access to an entree with bathroom and kitchen on the right, then to the bedroom at the back and the living-room on the left. Another room (wardrobe) will be locked and you don't have access to this but all the rest is yours including terrace of course :)
interaction: I'm always happy to share good addresses, from the neighborhood or the whole city, for shops, restaurants, bars etc so feel free to ask for any tips or advice for and during your stay in Paris !
house_rules: No candles. Smoking only outside thank you.  Please close every windows and french windows before going out.  During summer, terrace plants can have water every evening if that's something you're happy to do :) Pets are not excluded, but check that with me please.
host_about:
Hi! Lyonnais and parisien here, curious of the others, hungry for discovery, contemplation, inspiration. I'm a costume designer, I teach at university. 
Passionate by visual arts + all forms of culture. And also by nature, people, sport, food, wildlife, nightlife...

space: Central Paris holiday apartment mycosyflatlemarais lease located in the heart of the historic Marais district in middle toutistic places. On Rue de Poitou and is within walking distance to the metro Temple, Notre Dame Church, musée Picasso, and places des Vosges. This charming, bright and intimate apartment was recently renovated. It is situated on the 3 floor (without elevator) of a magnificent walkup building built in 1840. This flat is very quiet with a view on a yard with trees. The amenities include bedroom with queen size bed, full bath with shower, fully equipped kitchen (small refrigerator, washing machine, 2-burner hot plate and microwave, Nespresso machine...), free wifi, TV, air conidtiooning.... host_about:
Bonjour à tous,

Je m'appelle Christophe et je suis architecte.
Je suis ce que les gens appellent un bon vivant.
J'aime les expositions, aller au théâtre et visiter les musées. C'est la raison pour laquelle j'ai décidé d'habiter dans le centre de Paris.
J'aime également voyager: je suis déjà aller aux Etats-unis,  en Chine, en Afrique du sud...
J'espere vous recevoir très bientôt!

space: Very nice, modern, 200 ft2 studio with parket floor, located on the first floor of a beautiful, safe, modern left bank building (av. host_about:
Founded in late 2012, Venture2Paris specializes in luxury apartments. Our clients come from all over the world to experience our unique homes in unique parts of Paris. 

Venture2Paris's global management team has more than 20 years of professional experience in Paris, offering a highly personalized experience from the booking process until checkout. ​We work to ensure our guests receive the most unique and memorable way to experience Paris.

If you have any further questions please don't hesitate to contact us!

space: I will let this 56msq charming apartment, decorated in a simple parisian way. It is situated on the 4th floor of a building in a quiet dead end street close to the Manufacture des Gobelins. In the heart of a lovely and attractive neighborhood of Paris, it is ideally situated. You will have access to the Place d'Italie in a few seconds (restaurants, cafés, shops, very big mall, supermarkets, etc.) and you can also walk to the rue Mouffetard, very famous pedestrian street, lovely parisian ambiance guaranteed. The appartment includes : - a living-room with a very confortable couch that you can easily use as a bed - a bedroom with a double bed, a tv, and a chest of drawers - a bathroom with a bathtub - a fully-equiped kitchen Concerning equipment : TV, Wifi access, combo washer dryer, dish-washer, micro-wave, oven, flatiron, kettle. Sheet and towel supply. Please don't hesitate to call me for more information or for a first contact.

You will be able to fully experience the diversity of the cultural life of Paris and mainly  the historical Le Marais district. Located in the triangle drawn by the Metro Arts et Métiers, Reaumur Sebastopol and  Republique. It can comfortably accommodate four people on two floors (ground floor and basement -. allowing a pleasant temperature in summer )Many storage spaces have also been provided to make your stay enjoyable. The apartment has a kitchen equipped with everything needed to prepare meals, which opens to the main room. space: Our 2 bedrooms appartment is 5 minutes away from the Eiffel Tower (Champ de Mars) by foot. The subway stop, Bir Hakeim, is just down the street, 2 minutes away. The RER C train is also just around the corner (5min) to take you directly to Versailles! 2 buses take you to the Luxembourg Garden, Quartier Latin, Champs Elysées and Hopital Pompidou. Our building faces a ministry, so the street is nice and quiet. There's a café and a pharmacy at the "subway" end of the street.  It's a classic parisian apartment, recently renovated : hardwood floors, old decorative fireplaces, decorated ceilings and windows (double glazed to keep noise and heat out!) in every room. It has a nice living room with a dining table for 4, a sofa, coffee table, TV and DVD, wifi. The kitchen is fully equipped : fridge, freezer, oven, microwave, washer, dryer, coffee maker, kettle, toaster, , dishwasher, gas burner, extractor hood and all kitchen utensils. transit: L'immeuble  se trouve à 2 mn du métro aérien (que l'on n'entend absolument pas, heureusement!), ligne 6  (Etoile - Nation) et de la ligne C  du RER. Les taxis sont à quelques dizaines de mètres, de l'autre côté du boulevard de Grenelle et il y en a beaucoup, les touristes qui n'en trouvent pas au pied de la Tour Eiffel viennent les chercher ici! Il y a un parking de stationnement au mois sous le métro aérien, j'y ai souvent garé ma voiture lorsque je quittais Paris en transport en commun. Sinon, on peut se garer dans la rue, mais cela impose de mettre des tickets.  Il y a aussi, à proximité (quelques minutes) 2 bus très pratiques, l'un, le 42, passe rue Desaix et permet d'aller à une autre piscine et au centre commercial Beaugrenelle (3 arrêts. A pied, on coupe par le quai ou par le jardin sous les grands immeubles) puis il continue à travers le 15ème arrondissement jusqu'à l'hôpital Européen Georges Pompidou. Dans l'autre sens, il va jusqu'à la gare du Nord, en passant par le rond Poi
access: Tout sauf un placard à droite de la cuisine et les 2 valises anciennes et décoratives posées dessus.
interaction: Lorsque je ne suis pas à Paris, je laisse le numéro de téléphone de la personne qui gère les entrées et sorties, pour les cas d'urgence ou les renseignements. Ana, la gardienne de l'immeuble, est une jeune femme très efficace et affable, elle peut aussi donner des indications et renseignements. Elle parle français et espagnol.
house_rules: L'appartement doit être correctement entretenu car il le mérite! L'immeuble est très bien tenu, tranquille et sympathique, la cage d'escalier est toute neuve, la gardienne est charmante et efficace. Pas de cigarettes dans l'appartement, sauf à la rigueur dans la cuisine et en aérant ensuite, si un invité y tient!

space: *Modern Studio 25 m² Ideally located rue des Martyrs, famous Parisian street, between Montmartre and Notre Dame de Lorette, famous for its name, its history and small businesses: restaurants from over the world, all services.  Located on the ground floor with windows in a patio, there is a main room with a sofa-bed for 2 people, 1 dressing, 1 desk and a fully equipped kitchenette (hotplates, small oven, fridge, toaster, coffee machine, a kettle and a basic kitchen set tools). 1 private separate bathroom with shower. toilet and washbasin & Towels included. *The neighborhood: You will find everything you need during your stay on the 600m Rue des Martyrs: 3+ cafe Parisian, 2+ bakeries, 2 drugstores, 5+ restaurants French, Italian, Japanese, Chinese... 4 banks, 1 wines & champagne specialized store, bio food, 1 butcher, 2 fishmongers... 2 supermarkets with good prices (Monoprix and Carrefour City). Don't miss the traditional market on Sundays where the street is close for pedestrians and P

space: Loue mon appartement de 80m2 situé dans le nord du 11è (entre Oberkampf, Ménilmontant et Belleville): avec double séjour, cuisine américaine une chambre futon 2 personnes. Une chambre avec 2 lit simples dont un en hauteur. Un lit bébé parapluie est à disposition. Appartement très lumineux et aéré. 5è étage, grand ascenseur, vue dégagée par grande baie vitrée sur tous les toits. On voit jusqu'au sacré-coeur! Idéalement situé entre le métro Belleville à 2 min : Ligne 11 (4 stations de Beaubourg/Les Halles), ou ligne 2 (directe pour Pigalle, Montmartre, L'Arc de Triomphe L'étoile), le bus 96 qui descend sur le Marais ou Saint Germain des Prés. Ou encore le métro Parmentier (Grands Boulevard, Opéra, Grands magasins) De nombreux bars, restaurants à 2 minutes à pied (Quartier Oberkampf/Saint Maur) et commerces à proximité. Vie nocturne animée.  Pour flâner, le canal Saint Martin et le Parc des Buttes Chaumont sont à moins de 20 min à pied. La piscine Nakache, à 5 min à pied, très agréable et

Confort idéal pour un couple avec enf. Quartier très vivant. interaction: Logement laissé en entier. 2è chambre mise à dispo uniquement si besoin. Echanges par téléphone, email. Remises de clés en direct ou par un tiers.

Les placards fermés et identifiés comme tels ne doivent pas être ouverts. Rassemblements et fêtes interdits. C'est un appartement dans un immeuble résidentiel: pas de bruit après 22h en semaine et 23h le week-end. Les dîners tranquilles entre amis sont autorisés. Laisser l'appartement dans le même état de propreté et de rangement qu'à la remise des clés. Les clés sont remises à l'arrivée et ne doivent pas être remises à d'autres personnes. En cas de perte de la clé et du bip les frais de remplacement seront facturés. INTERNET : Acceptation de fait des règles d'usage (réglementation) d'internet en France. CASSE ou DETERIORATION: Si vous cassez ou détériorez des objets ou appareils, merci de nous le faire savoir. Ceci afin d'en assurer le remplacement ou la réparation en bonne intelligence. space: Nous vous proposons un spacieux et lumineux  appartement de 50m², entièrement renouvelé (2013), meublé avec soin, qui donne sur cour privée très calme et bien fleuri   Avec 2 chambres à coucher, l’une avec un  lit double, l’armoire et commode de rangement l’autre avec un lit superposé, l’appartement est donc parfaitement adapté pour 4 personnes.  Un grand salon avec le canapé, fauteuil, télévision HD, lecteur DVD … Wifi à haut débit. Une vraie cuisine totalement équipée : micro-ondes, four, frigo avec compartiment de congélation, des électro-ménagers, et les ustensiles nécessaires pour  préparer vos repas. Une machine à laver le linge est à votre disposition dans la salle de bain.  Les draps et les serviettes sont très soigneusement  fournis. Vous serez au coeur d'un des quartiers vivants de Paris, lieu idéal pour découvrir une vraie vie parisienne avec ses restaurants, ses bars,  l’espace verte et un grand parc à 200m. Vous pourrez rejoindre les quartiers touristiques de la capitale e

space: Hello ! My appartment is located at the foot of Montmartre. In less than 10 mn walk, you can go in every famous spot of the area : Sacré Coeur, Place du Tertre, Pigalle or the Flea Market. There are many buses and metro stations around, they will take you anywhere in Paris in less than 30 mn. There is also a Velib' station ( Bicycle service) at the foot of the building, and a taxi station a few blocks away. My flat is around 40m2, with full confort : A huge bed, a big flat screen, a washing machine and everything you need to cook like a true Parisian !   I live in a very nice and lively area, with many shops, restaurants and bars. But don't worry you'll sleep quiet, my flat is not on the street. I'll give you a few tips to go to the best spots in town ! See you soon !
description: My 40m2 flat is very calm, clean and well linked by the public transports. Within 10mn walk, you can be visiting the Sacré Coeur, la Place du tertre or the Flea Market. interaction: I've been living in this area for more than 30 years, so i will be glad to help you with any question you might have on the area or the flat. I will be available every day in case you might need some help.

space: Located in the heart of the 9th district, this charming apartment has been decorated with an eye for detail. It comprises a lobby, a  living room with a comfortable double sofa bed, a single foldout bed, a dining table and chairs, a bedroom with a double bed and closets, a small but fully equipped kitchen, a small bathroom with a shower, a separate wc.  Despite being located in one of the "bohemian-bourgeois" hotspots of the city, the apartment is very quiet at night as it overlooks a private courtyard and not the street.  You can park nearby (less than 5 minute walking) in a secure parking (charges apply): Parking Saint Georges, 20 Rue Clauzel. The keys will be handed to you directly at our apartment. Towels and bed linen are provided. WiFi and cable TV. Dishwasher and washing machine. Please read the numerous comments from our previous guests!
description: This modern 46 sqm apartment will accomodate up to 5 people in a bedroom and a double living-room.  Located in a quiet street, just near the trendy rue des Martyrs, it's close to many tourists attractions and a short walk from Gare du Nord. Located in the heart of the 9th district, this charming apartment has been decorated with an eye for detail. It comprises a lobby, a  living room with a comfortable double sofa bed, a single foldout bed, a dining table and chairs, a bedroom with a double bed and closets, a small but fully equipped kitchen, a small bathroom with a shower, a separate wc.  Despite being located in one of the "bohemian-bourgeois" hotspots of the city, the apartment is very quiet at night as it overlooks a private courtyard and not the street.  You can park nearby (less than 5 minute walking) in a secure parking (charges apply): Parking Saint Georges, 20 Rue Clauzel. The keys will be handed to you directly at our apartment. Towels and bed linen are provided. WiFi and cab
transit: Direct access (by RER train) from CDG airport to the nearby Gare du Nord. Let me know if you need to be picked-up at the airport, I negotiated a flat rate with Armand (professional driver) for up to 5 people (by car or van). It's barely more expensive than the train and saves you time and hassle. It's a great and affordable service, ask me about it! Armand can also pick you up upon departure and drop you to any airport and train station. The nearest Metro stations (Notre-Dame-de-Lorette and Anvers) are 2 mn away. The Gare du Nord (Eurostar for trains from England, Belgium and Holland /Thalys) is only a 10/15 minute walk away. The Gare de l'Est (Ice fromLuxembourg and Germany) is a 10 minute taxi ride away (or a 20 minute walk away). The Gare de Lyon (Switzerland and Italy) is 30 minutes away by subway. The Gare Montparnasse (Spain) is 20/25 minutes away by subway (and direct to Notre-Dame de Lorette Metro station). .
access: Guests have access to the whole apartment. Closets in the bedroom and the living room are available.
interaction: I make every effort to welcome all my guests in person on arrival. During the length of each guest's stay, I can be contacted by phone, text messages and mail and will always be happy to answers to any questions or requests.
house_rules: The fewer the rules, the better the stay!  However try to keep the apartment as clean and tidy as you found it and respect the neighbours' quietness. I try to be as flexible as possible regarding arrival and departure time!  However a good organisation between us beforehand is vital to make everybody happy. Paris is a big city and of course there are scams that target tourists. While none of my guests have experienced any problems and the neighbourhood is safe, please take reasonable precautions for your security. DO NOT let anyone enter the apartment even if they claim the right to do so (for example for electricity or from any alleged authorities) without contacting me first. I will always be glad to help you out if you have any questions during your stay and will answer in French, English, German or Spanish. You trust me...and I trust you!...
host_about:
After university studies (and a degree in marketing), I always found time to travel extensively and for long periods of time. 
I realised then how one appreciates to find a place where you feel at home, live as locals do; a place where you can enjoy breakfast with your choice of music in the background, where you can shop the local food stores and cook a beautiful diner for everybody; Well, even better if this place costs you roughly half what a hotel would cost you (for a fifth of the space)! 
I love literature and art, which probably reflects in the modern decoration and the many books on the bookshelves.
Travelling in many parts of the world made me quite laid back I guess; I just expect my guests to have a wonderful time in Paris and just want to come back as soon as possible....

host_about: Marie-Catherine, j'habite à Montmartre depuis plus de 20 ans. Cadre pour le Groupe Figaro, je vis dans ce bel appartement avec Lionel, chef opérateur de cinéma. Nous aimons les voyages, les sorties culturelles, les bons restaurants et nous profitons pleinement de tout ce que peut nous offrir Paris.

space: The whole flat will be yours * Cleaned before your arrival * Fresh sheets and towels
description: Lovely appartment in the cosmopolitain area of Belleville! You would enjoy the neighbourhood.  Quickly in the center of the city with the tube at 5 minutes walk! My home it's perfect to have a rest after a long day of visiting the city of light. There is a room for a little kid. The whole flat will be yours * Cleaned before your arrival * Fresh sheets and towels The guests will have access to the all apartment A friend of mine or I will welcome you.  Please send me your hour of arrival (in Paris) when you can.  I may be abroad but I will stay available by phone or through Airbnb message system should you have any problem or need any suggestion as to where to go ! You have the métropolitain at 2 minutes walk (line 11 from Chatelet).  So you gonna be able to be in the center in 10 minutes

house_rules: Le règlement est très simple. La première chose et la plus importante est de profiter de l’appartement et de votre séjour à Paris.  Merci de faire très attention à l’appartement, c’est quelque chose de très précieux pour moi. Il est tout à vous pendant votre séjour alors traitez le comme votre propre maison. Lors de votre départ merci de laisser l’appartement aussi propre que possible et de descendre les poubelles si possible. J’apprécierai beaucoup ! Si vous avez besoin de quoi que ce soit pendant votre séjour, n’hésitez pas à m’envoyer un message ! Ce serait un plaisir pour moi de vous aider.  Bon séjour !  Dear Guest The first rule it’s enjoy Paris and the flat.  Please be careful with my home, it’s precious to me. It’s yours during your stay but be careful as if it was your own house. At your check out, please leave the flat tidy as possible and take the garbage out. I’ll appreciate it a lot.  If you need something during your stay please contact me.
host_about:
We are Maud and Vladimir working in the cinema and music (producer and presse relations). 
We have a little girl of 2 year old. 
We love our neighbourhood

space: 20m2 studio (suitable for an individual or couple) A main room with sofa bed, TV, coffee table, kitchen (fridge, 2 hotplates, worktop, microwave, toaster, kettle ...), two windows overlooking the courtyard on the 1st floor. Internet access by Wifi. Bathroom with bath, toilet, sink and mirror. Access to the apartment by a very cute little bridge. The only drawback is that, like all small Parisian apartments, the walls are not very thick, so you can hear the neighbors ... But they are very friendly! Located in the heart of Montmartre, you will have access to all the businesses in the area (open for most same time!), Tourist sites (such as the Sacred Heart), theaters, restaurants etc. ... The area is pedestrian Sundays and holidays, which is nice. It is still mostly pedestrian the rest of the time, with frequent events on the Place des Abbesses. The main boulevard Rochechouart famous for Moulin Rouge's many clubs, sex shops and theaters is 2 minutes, passing through the street of the Mart

transit: Le métro Abbesses (ligne 12) est à 2 minutes, et le métro Pigalle (ligne 2) à 7 minutes. Vous pourrez donc vous balader dans tout Paris à votre guise par ce biais. Les bus et stations de vélib sont aussi très nombreux dans le quartier.Vous êtes alors à environ 15 minutes en transports de plusieurs grandes places de Paris comme Châtelet, les Champs-Elysées, Opéra, République..
access: Situé en plein coeur de Montmartre, vous aurez accès à tous les commerces du quartier (ouvert pour la plupart même le dimanche !), aux sites touristiques (comme le sacré coeur), théâtres, restaurants etc... Le quartier devient piéton les dimanches et jours fériés, ce qui est très agréable. Il est tout de même principalement piéton le reste du temps, avec de fréquentes animations sur la place des Abbesses. Le grands boulevard Rochechouart célèbre pour le Moulin Rouge, les nombreuses discothèques, boutiques érotiques et théâtres est à 2 minutes, en passant par la rue des Martyres, tout aussi célèbre.Le métro Abbesses (ligne 12) est à 2 minutes, et le métro Pigalle (ligne 2) à 7 minutes. Vous pourrez donc vous balader dans tout Paris à votre guise par ce biais. Les bus et stations de vélib sont aussi très nombreux dans le quartier.Vous êtes alors à environ 15 minutes en transports de plusieurs grandes places de Paris comme Châtelet, les Champs-Elysées, Opéra, République..

host_about:
Bonjour à tous, 
Je m'appelle Colline, j'ai 24 ans, je fais beaucoup de danse, et cette passion me fait voyager. Je combine aussi des études de psychologie clinique et un boulot de serveuse dans un bar sympa que vous découvrerez peut-être si vous venez dans mon quartier.
Ayant été très satisfaite de ce site pour trouver une chambre pendant mes voyages, je mets maintenant la mienne à disposition par ce biais lorsque je pars.

house_rules: Please respect the apartment, building and neighbors, we are looking for tenants who are responsible adults and will be respectful of the apartment. That said, a reasonable level of respect for the apartment, the building, and the neighbors is expected.  •Please no additional guests in the apartment.  •Please do not make any noise after 10 pm.  • Garbage MUST be disposed of in the garbage room (ground floor) and NOT in the street  • Please DO NOT leave food or garbage out  • Please TURN OFF the lights and equipments  when not in the apartment • Please do not throw anything BUT toilet paper in the toilet.  • No smoking in the apartment!  • Please be careful with the keys, if you lose it, you will be charged 150€ fee  • Please DO NOT disturb the neighbors at any time, in case of an emergency please contact us directly.  • No PETS • Late check-in are allowed but are charged : 50 € after 9 pm, 30 € after 8pm. Payment must be settled in cash upon arrival. • Check-in on Sunday are charged :

space: Welcome to Paris ! Nice flat located right next to the Canal de l’Ourcq ! Ideal for single or couple. The apartment (33 square meters) is calm and bright.  The bedroom is furnished with a double bed and a spacious desk.  The kitchen is fully equipped (fridge, micro waves, hot plates, washer-dryer)  The living-room offers Cable, Wi-Fi and comfortable sofa and “fauteuil club”.  I provide pillow, bed sheets and towels. In this charming neighborhood, you will find all the shops you need, Parisian cafés, restaurants, movie theaters and the lovely Parc des Buttes-Chaumont and the modern Parc de la Villette. You reach the metro station in 5 minutes Ourcq (line 5) or Crimée (line 7) where you can quickly reach the center of Paris (Republique, Bastille, Opera, Châtelet). You can also reach Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports in less than an hour.  If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact me. Bonjour et bienvenue, Je mets à disposition un joli deux pièces de 33 m2 idéal pour un coup

space: Charming family apartment of 70 m2, at the 4th and last floor of a typical Parisian building. Very quiet and sunny with a view of the roofs of Paris, the artist studioes, and the Eiffel Tower. Three independent bedrooms, among which two mansard-roofed (1,70 m of maxi height). The bathroom is adjacent to the parental room. The apartment is equipped up to 6 persons and carefully furnished.   The apartment does not suit to people with reduced mobility (4th floor without elevator) Located in the South of Paris (14th), in a safe, lively and very trading area, near numerous places of interest and in 15 minutes in subway of the historic center of Paris. .  Tapering rates according to duration. Thank you for contacting us to know the availability.

transit: L'appartement est au pied du métro Pernety (ligne 13) qui vous conduit au centre de Paris en 10-15 minutes.
access: Vos déplacements depuis :  Gare du Nord : 30 min. en métro Aéroport Orly : 15-20 minutes en taxi Aéroport Roissy CDG : +/- 1h en taxi. 1h15 en RER et métro.
interaction: Je suis joignable par téléphone ou mail durant toute la durée du séjour pour répondre à toute question.
house_rules: Appartement non-fumeur. Animaux non admis. Nous demandons à nos locataires de respecter la tranquillité du voisinage (pas de bruits excessifs après 22h00) et de respecter le nombre maximum d'occupants. Une caution de 400€ (chèque non encaissé, ou espèces) est demandée et est restituée après votre départ (sauf en cas de dégâts majeurs ou de perte des clés)
host_about:
Originaire de Normandie,  je vis à Paris depuis 30 ans. J'ai étudié à la Sorbonne, travaillé quartier Opéra...
Aujourd'hui maman de deux enfants (11 et 15 ans), je peux vous aider à organiser votre séjour en famille, vous conseiller dans vos itinéraires, vous donner des astuces !
A très bientôt !

Hi there,
I've been living in Paris since 30 years. I've studied in La Sorbonne, I've worked near Opera area... 
Now I have two children (aged 11  and 15) and I can help you to organize your family trip. I can give you some advice and good tricks.
See you soon !

space: Very nice flat, like a little house on a garden courtyard (ground floor). Double living room with a diner area with a large table for 4 people and and the other area with a sofa bed for 2 people, 3 armchairs, a cheminee and a flat screen TV with cable. Very nice fireplace, nothing better for evening winter. The independant and cosy room has a 2 people queen bed. A fith and sixth person can be host on an air bed. Wooden floor and cosy atmosphere. You can have enjoy the courtyard for breakfast and lunch, there are outdoors furnitures (1 table and 2 chairs) Nice kitchen fully equipped and bathroom with a bathtub. Towels and sheets will be ready for your arrival. There is a big wardrobe where you can hang your close. The neighborhood is very nice and quiet, between "le Jardin du Luxembourg" one of the nicest park in Paris and Montparnasse. Lots of restaurants, bars and cinemas around 2 minutes walk to the subway Vavin or Notre Dame des Champs and also not far (6min) from the RER train dire

space: If you like historical buildings, tiny little streets full of buzzing cafés and art galleries you will love our small, cosy, comfortable flat ! It is located in Le Marais, the most trendy and glamour district in Paris, in a peace and quiet little street, just few steps away from the Seine river. This is the perfect Parisian romantic retreat with one bedroom and one open kitchen under amazing 17th century exposed beams. History is all around here ! You will find lots of excellent food shops just down by the street. So you can either cook at home or you can go to one of the stunning restaurants and cafés. The flat is just walking distance from Place des Vosges where the great poet Victor Hugo used to live (you can visit his house). The Picasso Museum and Notre-Dame are also walking distance. There's a lot to see around because here you are, in the heart of Paris ! And Le Marais is the only district in Paris where shops are open on sunday. Le Marais is definitively the place to be ! Bon v

space: Paris 3rd arrondissement, in the Haut Marais. Loft style 60 m2 apartment overlooking a quiet courtyard. It comprises a 32m2 living room with a contemporary fire place, a bedroom, bathroom and well equipped kitchen. Beautifully designed by an architect the apartment combines light (7 windows) and high ceilings to create a modern and elegant retreat in a well restored and cared for period building.  The location, by trendy Marais and canal Saint Martin, close to Beaubourg and countless Paris attractions is very enviable.  Metro lines are (Website hidden by Airbnb) -11 - 5 Bus lines ARE  (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  City car hire (Autolib) and bike hire (Velib) as well as taxis are all steps away.  4 nights booking minimum

space: Why compromise? Dominate Paris from this 7th floor apartment, with beautiful views over the city (Montmartre; Eiffel Tower) on the northeast-facing patio... But when you get tired of the bustle, move to the other, southeast-facing patio, which overlooks a unique, quiet greenbelt, and relax to the birdsong in the giant century-old trees. There aren't many places in Paris where you can disconnect from the noise and bustle, and reconnect with nature, without having to be far from the action. This is one of them. Hop on the metro (lines 8 and 12) or the new Paris tramway (lines T2 and T3), to zip on over to the eiffel tower (10 minutes away), the Champs-Elysées (14 minutes), the Louvre (15 minutes), Notre-Dame and the latin quarter (17 minutes), or the shopping district (16 minutes). If you're traveling by car, the Boulevard Périphérique (Paris beltway) is two blocks away: easy to reach, yet just far enough that you don't have to hear it. Park Andre Citroen is just 4 blocks away. space: Nice 23 sqm studio in the center of Paris. Calm (courtyard), completely furnished (WIFI, TV, Hifi system (+Airport), Micro-wave...), next to Boulevard Saint Germain, Notre Dame, Le Louvre, Odéon, you can find grocery stores, a market with french food products, laundry service, bars and restaurants.  Perfect to discover the city, you can stop there between two visits to change or rest. Extremely close to Metro 4 and 10, RER B and RER C, buses and public bikes. It consists of 1 living/dining room with bed (120x200) ,TV ,sofa, one fully equipped kitchen, (refrigerator, oven, crockery, vacuum cleaner etc), and one bathroom with washing machine, shower and toilet.  Internet Access & unlimited WiFi .  Linen & towels provided. Utilities included.

host_about:
Chanteur lyrique, je voyage beaucoup pour mon travail, mais aussi pour mon plaisir! Quand je suis loin de chez moi, mon appartement est le vôtre!

Traveling a lot for my job and for pleasure, curious and joyful, I like music, food and culture in general. 
When I'm far away, my apartment can be yours!

space: Ground floor/ 1st floor duplex loft with a back yard in the 10th. Ground floor : 1 bedroom (single bed) + bathroom (shower), living room with open kitchen. First floor : 3 bedrooms (1 double with queen bed, 2 children with double beds), family room, bathroom (shower + bath), extra restroom. Near Gare du Nord, Gare de l'Est, Canal St Martin. 5 minutes walk to Canal St Martin that goes from Stalingrad to République (tons of restaurants, shops, cafés on both sides of the river…) Public swimming pool around the corner  Marché Secrétan for food lovers  MK2 Quai de Loire et Quai de Seine for movie goers,  Point Ephémère for those who like music and concerts by the water Parc de la Villette and Parc des Buttes Chaumont 15 minutes walk The neighborhood is not fancy but very convenient  Direct train to Opéra (15'), Bastille (15'), République (10'), Montmartre (5')… What else… No air conditioning but ground floor is cool and there are ceiling fans in each room, sweet and helpful neighbours + We

space: Please note that this is a private room for GIRLS ONLY for stays for a month or more. The room is situated in a big typical Parisian Haussmanien building. It is calm and cosy. The bathroom is complete and has a spacious shower. You can also use the kitchen where everything is well organized to cook the best foods. The living room is also very spacious with brand new media. You can watch french TV in the huge couch. I will be able to advice you on your trip and maybe show you aound if I am available. The neighborhood is very "BOBO" as Parisians would tell you. The canal is 5 min away and is full of the parisian youth during summer time and events, actually almost always! The restaurants are quite good and not too expensive. You will also find trendy boutiques along the canal st martin and rue de marseille, rue yves toudic, and rue de lancry...etc Republique is litterally 5 min walking and is brand new since June! You will attend many events on the "plaza". The location is one on the bes

house_rules: No guests allowed to stay over the night. HOUSE RULES for renting one month and over:  This is a ROOMMATE SITUATION: cleaning is done by each person who lives in the apt. This is a 3 bedroom apt: the master bedroom is taken by Amelie is works part time and the other big room is empty but is sometimes hosting Amelie s family members or friends. Common utilities are shared: meaning cleaning products are to be bought by each roommate taking turn. Cleaning weekly one taking turns Cleaning: Floor of entire apartment (except personal rooms)= Vaccum+Mopping Kitchen= cleaning table, cooking area, all dished back in cabinet  Toilets= Fully cleaned antibacteria Bathroom= has to be sparkling Lost Keys= The entire doorlock of the apartment will need to be changed and therefore will need four more doorkeys

space: My apartment is located in the center of Le Marais, the most historic as well as one of the trendiest neighborhoods in Paris. It is a one bed-room apartment of 35 square meters, on the third floor with an unobstructed view of the historical Saint Paul church and a beautiful cobble stone courtyard. The apartment has a lot of historical charm, with high wood-beamed ceilings, traditional terracotta tile flooring and a fireplace. The apartment is equipped with a bed that sleeps 2, a kitchen with a microwave/owen, a 2 plate stove and espresso machine, and a tiled bathroom with a full-size bathtub. In the apartment you’ll find an iron, hairdryer, high-speed WIFI and a variety of English/French/Swedish books.  Linen and towels are provided. Located on Rue Saint Paul, my apartment is only a short walk away from of the following sites:  -Cathedrale Notre Dame (10-15 min):  -Ils Saint Louis (5 min) -Place Vosges (5 min) -Place de la Bastille (5-7 min) -Hotel de Ville (10 min) -Museum of Pablo Pi

host_about:
Bonjour,
Je suis une suédoise qui habite à Paris depuis 2006, après d'avoir passé quelques années à Vancouver et à Bruxelles. J'aime des gens sympathiques, des voyages, des bons vieux films, des belles histoires et toutes les autres choses qui rendent heureux.

Hi, 
I'm a Swede who lives in Paris since 2006, after having spent a few years in Vancouver and in Brussels. l like friendly people, travels, good old movies, beautiful stories and all other things that makes you happy.

space: Double bed,  two working desks, a comfortable bar, a full equipped kitchen, a washing machine, two big windows (lot of light!), the calm of an internal courtyard (the flat is at the ground floor and faces the courtyard, not the street), the charme of an ancient brick wall... all theses details make of this apartment a cozy nest where to stay in Paris, in the exclusive 7th arrondissement.
description: This cozy apartment has been designed paying attention to optimize every single corner and the difference of level between the living and the kitchen make the space "dynamic". Double bed,  two working desks, a comfortable bar, a full equipped kitchen, a washing machine, two big windows (lot of light!), the calm of an internal courtyard (the flat is at the ground floor and faces the courtyard, not the street), the charme of an ancient brick wall... all theses details make of this apartment a cozy nest where to stay in Paris, in the exclusive 7th arrondissement. The whole appartment If you have any questions, feel free to contact me. It will be a pleasure to inform or help you! Welcome in Paris! Between the Invalides and the wonderful Luxembourg garden, not far from Saint Germain de Près ( the famous “Cafes Literaires”, the church of Saint Sulpice, the Quartier Latin, the Odeon theater and plenty of narrow delicious streets…), Close to the famous Beaumarché, la Grande Epicerie de Paris,
transit: Close to the famous Beaumarché, la Grande Epicerie de Paris, this rich area has plenty of different atmospheres... up to you to discover them with nice walks!
access: The whole appartment
interaction: If you have any questions, feel free to contact me. It will be a pleasure to inform or help you! Welcome in Paris!
house_rules: Electricity is invoiced separately according to real consumption. A deposit will be required at the check-in for the utilities. Bed linen and towels are provided. Late arrivals (after 8 pm) will be invoiced 50 euros to be paid cash at the check-in. All along your staying you will be well assisted by someone. I will provide you with the relevant information to get to the place and if you wish with tips about what to do and what to see around the area.
host_about:
Hello! Myself, together with my friend Stefano, we manage apartments in Paris on behalf of some other friends who are not living in this wonderful city.
We look forward to have you as a guest in one of our apartments and we'll do all our best to make you feel comfortable like at home!

space: Mon grand studio entièrement meublé comprend un coin cuisine, une salle de bain, un coin bureau, un bar, et un séjour. Un canapé lit deux places ainsi qu'un lit une place permettent le couchage de trois personnes maximum.  Le studio est situé au sud de Paris, entre le 14ème arrondissement à proximité de la cité universitaire ainsi que du parc Montsouris et la ville de Gentilly. Vous êtes donc à 5 minutes d'un des plus grands parcs parisien. D'autre part, la cité universitaire, elle aussi riche en nature, est un coin très animé le soir comme la journée, en semaine comme en week end.  Vous trouverez plusieurs commerces à proximité: plusieurs restaurants, une boulangerie, une épicerie dans la rue et un supermarché à 3 minutes à pied. (Et même une boîte de nuit à une dizaine de minutes pour les intéressés.) L'appartement est situé à 50mètres de la gare RER de Gentilly dans une zone résidentielle et calme.  La ligne du RER B est directe vers les deux aéroports de Paris, Orly et Charles de G

host_about: Bonjour, je m'appelle Rachel, je suis conférencière dans les grands musées de Paris et je parle couramment sept langues (anglais, espagnol, portugais, italien, français, hébreux et bulgare). Je suis une grande voyageuse ayant vécu dans plusieurs pays de divers continents, je tiens aujourd'hui à rester en contact avec les gens du monde entier, c'est pourquoi je suis contente de commencer l'aventure AIRBNB !

space: Completely renovated by an architect, this apartment is close to the city center (10 mn by metro) or Montmartre (15 mn). Between " Little Chinatown" and the bohemian neighborhood of Canal St Martin, a typical Parisian apartment with necessary comfort (equipped, washing machine and dryer room, dishwasher, tv, wifi, etc.) can accommodate two people. The famous rue Sainte Marthe with trendy restaurants allow you to make gourmet walks just crossing the street! A nearby within walking diverse cultural scene: Maison des Métallos, Point Éphémère, gallery Suzanne Traverse etc ... Transport: Metro Line 2 directly to the Sacred Heart and Direct Line 11 to Chatelet Les Halles Direct bus 26 to the Gare Saint Lazare

space: Nice and comfortable apartment, ideal for a couple. You'll be renting the entire studio of 34 sqm. composed of a main room with a comfortable double bed, a sofa bed, a small kitchen open on the living room and a bathroom.  Two large windows makes this flat bright and nice to live in.  A hostess will give you the keys in case I'm not in town. Located in a calm, mostly residential and traditional Parisian neighborhood, the apartment is placed near the metro Charles michel (Line 10), Commerces (Line 8) and Dupleix (Line 6) . And once the reservation is confirmed, I will send you an email with all the details you need to know, my personal advices and a "welcome guidebook" to enjoy the best restaurants and bars in the neighborhood..tested & approved!
description: Cosy studio with everything needed for a perfect stay. Close to metro station lines 10, 8, 6. Excellent location to enjoy and discover Paris. My name is Amina. I will be delighted to host & help you discovering the most charming Parisian sites. Nice and comfortable apartment, ideal for a couple. You'll be renting the entire studio of 34 sqm. composed of a main room with a comfortable double bed, a sofa bed, a small kitchen open on the living room and a bathroom.  Two large windows makes this flat bright and nice to live in.  A hostess will give you the keys in case I'm not in town. Located in a calm, mostly residential and traditional Parisian neighborhood, the apartment is placed near the metro Charles michel (Line 10), Commerces (Line 8) and Dupleix (Line 6) . transit: Located in a calm, mostly residential and traditional Parisian neighborhood, the apartment is placed near the metro Metro Station  Charles Michels - 2 minutes walking, Commerce - 5 minutes walking and Dupleix - 7 minutes walking.  There is a many supermaket, bakery,  bistrots & restaurants, and nice pubs and cafes in the area regularly and mostly frequented by tourists, artists and young people. All the best places to be seen in Paris are reachable by bus or metro: Le Louvre, Eiffel Tower, Arc de Triomphe, Les champs Elysees, Orsay museum, The Grand Palais.. Etc
access: The apartment will be all yours during your stay. It comes with everything needed for a smooth journey: Located in a very quiet building, this brand new flat on courtyard is provided with an open kitchen with a bar, and a shower room.. At the 1rst Floor, the building provides an elevator. . Fully equiped kitchen :  micro-wave, toaster, Glass ceramic cooktop, Kettle, kitchen utensils.. . Bathroom with a bath, hairdryer  . High speed internet access Wi Fi, TV set HD  . Comfortable bed + sofa-bed . Vacuum cleaner, ironing table & ironer  . Wardrobe, closet - LED flatscreen - Nespresso coffee machine - Washing machine - dryer - Umbrella etc. And of course clean towels and sheet.
interaction: The apartment is all yours. So hope you ll feel like home.  As soon you'll confirm your reservation I'll send you an email including a "welcome guidebook" with all the information you need for a smooth stay. Of course if you need something or have questions I will always be happy to help!
house_rules: The apartment is located in a friendly small building. I ask my hosts to behave like friends and to be quiet and respectful. The place is a non smoking apartment.
host_about:
I spent most of my childhood exploring the world. I love experiencing new cultures and meeting new and diverse people. I

Having travelled a lot, I know the importance of feeling connected to the place you are visiting and to feel comfortable to enjoy your stay.

As a host, I hope to ensure that all my guests feel connected to the place they are visiting and have a true, local experience of the city. I can provide lists of all the best places to eat and drink  as well as key attractions. I also send to all my guidebook I prepared collating all the details they need to know and providing local tips.

I love healthy cooking, yoga,  scuba diving, and the arts! I enjoy theatre and life drawing and am always open to new adventures.

As apart of my education I would be always available polite and respectful with people.

Looking forward to host you!

space: I rent my flat just next to the great park of the Buttes Chaumont in the 19th arrondissement of Paris. With a lot of space, it gets 2 rooms : a living room with a sofa which can be transformed into a comfortable bed (I can swear : I tested it myself !) ; a large bedroom for two people.  This flat has a kitchen with everything you want : oven, induction cooker, fridge and freezer, washing machine... There is also a bathroom (with a shower), and toilets separated from the bathroom. The Buttes Chaumont park area is a very nice place to live. With many shops, you'll find everything you want by walking less than 10' : bakers, butchers, grocers, supermarkets..., and restaurants or bars too. Two cinemas are very close from this place, ten minutes walking, just on the Canal de l'Ourcq, a very sweet place to spend time walking, biking, drinking a glass of beer or wine... Finally, the Buttes Chaumont park is one of the biggest and most famous parks of Paris : you can picnic, go running, take the

host_about:
Bonjour !
Je suis musicien professionnel. A part ça je suis passionné de couture et de tricot (je sais c'est pas courant mais ça arrive) ; j'adore aller au restaurant, au cinéma, courir aux buttes chaumont...

space: Charming self-contained Townhouse (130 square meters), at equal distance from the Eiffel Tower and Saint Germain des Prés. Very rare product in that area of Central Paris!  The house has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and sleeps up to 6 people. On the ground floor, you find the living room, kitchen, dining room and the masterbedroom (with ensuite bathroom with tub and dressing room).  All rooms on the ground floor overlook a large garden terrace of 60 square meters (with a seating area, a garden table for dining outside ) . On the first floor, two other rooms (both with queen double beds, and a second bathroom with shower). The house is very quiet ( you can sleep with the windows open ) . Yet it is located close to a busy shopping street, typically Parisian . The Champ de Mars and the Eiffel Tower are within 10 minutes walk. Families welcome . We have 3 children ourselves .
description: Fully self-contained city house. Two storey.  Very quiet . Garden terrace , away from the noise of the city. Ideally located. Can easily accommodate 6 people . Ideal for families. space: Studio of 30m2 in the center of Paris, at 10 min walking from the Eiffel Tower. Really easy to travel by metro with the station La Motte Picquet (3 lines of metro) at 5 min, and Dupleix at 1 min. The studio, on the 4th floor, has a balcony upon a very clam garden. There is a kitchen, a large bathroom, and in the major room with : a double bed (a mattress is available to have a 3rd person sleeping, and a 4th person could sleep on the coach with is big enough), a table and chairs, a coach...  A washing machine is available, TV, hi-fi system... The neighborhood is really pleasant : in my street are many food shops, it's calm and safe...

space: Beautiful and calm apartment, at the third floor of an ancient building, with one separated bedroom and two single sofa-beds (that can be put together) of the living, it can easily host four people. It has been renovated with taste and attention to the details: the kitchen is functuonal and quite spacious considering the size of the apartment and is "almost" separated from the living. The bathroom has a comfortable shower and nice italian "mosaique" tiles. Many wardrobes make life easy even with four guests. house_rules: Appartement fait pour des personnes soignées car les murs enduits de chaux et certains meubles construits en carreaux de plâtre recouvert de chaux, le tadelakt et le stuc de Mantoue sont très fragiles et nécessitent une attention toute particulière… Merci de vous déchausser dans l'appartement  et profitez de votre séjour :o) Please be respectful and clean ! No shoes inside is greatly appreciated. Enjoy your stay :o)
host_about:
J'ai toujours aimé voyager et j'en ai d'ailleurs fait mon métier puisque je suis organisatrice de voyages et d'événements pour les sociétés.

Mes livres : Amin Maalouf , Amma et les 4 accords Toltéques 

Le Jazz et la musique classique

Les restaurants végétariens !

Ma devise : Sois le changement que tu veux voir dans le monde !
Mes autres devises : Ne fais pas aux autres ce que tu ne voudrais pas qu'ils te fassent !
Paix, Joie et Amour (j'aurais envie d'ajouter TOLERANCE) !

space: Nice room in a building from the 30s with a double bed. Charming old 59m2 apartment recently renovated, furnished, quiet, with parquet floors, central heating, bright, on the 6th floor. Night guardian in the impasse, bicycle parking, private driveway to park resident's cars. The capacity of the room is 2.
description: This three-room apartment, in a building from the 30's, can accommodate two persons and is centrally located, in a calm street, within 2 blocks of the "Jardins du Luxembourg". Enjoy the nice district, and an easy access to all major subway lines ! Nice room in a building from the 30s with a double bed. Charming old 59m2 apartment recently renovated, furnished, quiet, with parquet floors, central heating, bright, on the 6th floor. Night guardian in the impasse, bicycle parking, private driveway to park resident's cars. The capacity of the room is 2. Guests will have full access to :  A shared bathroom with separated toilet A dressing  A fully equipped kitchen with fridge (a shelf can be, on request, dedicated to you), freezer, dishwasher, washing machine. A balcony is also at your disposal. I'll probably be away during your stay, but the apartment is to be shared with 2 other roommates who will answer any of your questions. They both speak fluent english. However, they may also be away.
transit: If you have a car, parking your car is FREE :  - at night from 8:00pm to 7:00am (the following day)  - on Sunday (from 8:00pm on Saturday to Monday 7:00am). Otherwise, it's 0.60€/15min to be reloaded every 2 hours. The apartment's 10 minutes away from "Montparnasse" by bus, the apartment is in Paris XIIIth district between the metro station "Glacière" (L6) and the RER B station "Port Royal" (2 minutes away from "Saint-Michel Notre-Dame", 4 min away from "Chatelet" and in direct connection to Paris CDG & Orly Airport).
access: Guests will have full access to :  A shared bathroom with separated toilet A dressing  A fully equipped kitchen with fridge (a shelf can be, on request, dedicated to you), freezer, dishwasher, washing machine. A balcony is also at your disposal.
interaction: I'll probably be away during your stay, but the apartment is to be shared with 2 other roommates who will answer any of your questions. They both speak fluent english. However, they may also be away. TO BE NOTED : The room door can't be locked.
house_rules: 1) Paris is full of nice bar and terrace so.... no private party in the apartment ! 2) All devices in the kitchen are at your disposal. A shelf is also at your disposal in the refrigerator (on request) but please do not consume any other stuff. 3) It's absolutely FORBIDDEN to smoke inside the apartment. You may smoke on the balcony. 4) Please let us know AS SOON AS POSSIBLE at what time you expect to arrive (either at the apartment or at the airport/train station). It's for organisation matters.

space: This is a big one bedroom gem in the very best neighborhood of Paris: St Germain. Its on a cobbled street, found behind a big old wooden gate, so quiet and away from the street. It has a charming courtyard. The apartment is set on 2 floors with an indoor staircase so feels big. Bonus- the entire apartment was renovated last year so everything is totally new; floors, kitchen, appliances, furniture, bathroom etc. Which is very rare for Paris! Open plan kitchen- all new and modern. Also modern bathroom, bath is big. Fully Furnished. Flat screen TV Wooden floors, old wooden beams on the ceiling make it super charming....a real love shack! Neighborhood is one of the most rocking in terms of cafes, shops, subways etc. This is a very special place. I'm looking for someone to rent for 6months or more.  Sorry, no short term rentals.

The kitchen is fully equipped, oven and microwave, dish machine, induction cooker, hood. Comfortable bedroom, dressing, and a big bed. Very nice bathroom with large shower and separate rest-room. Conveniently situated, 500m away from the tram T3, close to the subway station Marx Dormoy (line 12), only 3 stops away from Abesses (or 20 minutes walk if you prefer), which is the startpoint to visit Montmartre. Bus stop nearby (line 65), easy way to go to gare du nord where you can take the RER to Paris Charles de Gaulle Airport, you can also choose to go to the airport by bus (line 350) just beside the Tram station. space: Bienvenue in my 2-bed apartment in a typical Parisian building, with a little cute balcony. You'll be on the front row of the Eiffel Tower's lightings, perfect for a journey "à la française".  You will stay in a quiet 2-bed apartment (1 living and 1 bedroom) of 59 square meter (635 sq ft) with a kitchen (and a new espresso machine!), a bathroom, a separated toilet and a little cute balcony with a view on the Eiffel Tower. There is one bed (for two, 140 cm wide) in the bedroom and a pull-out sofa in the living (for two, 180 cm wide). Fresh bed sheets are provided. International adaptor plug available. SUPERMARKETS, RESTAURANTS, SHOPS: There are some supermarkets and restaurants near the building open till late: Daily Monop till 9pm, Franprix till 9pm. There is a Lebanese and a Japanese restaurant too. You can find some very good bakeries in the surroundings where to buy croissants and pains au chocolat for breakfast. La Motte-Piquet Grenelle and rue du Commerce are approximately 10min a

transit: The nearest metro station is Bir Hakeim - 30 seconds away from the appartment. Line 6 brings you to Champs Elysees (Charles de Gaulle-Etoile stop) to the East, and to Gare Montparnasse to the West. The RER C train brings you to either the Chateau de Versailles (45 minutes away) or to Saint-Michel Notre Dame.
house_rules: • No smoking inside the apartments please, you can smoke outside on the balcony • No pets please • Please leave the apartment clean, as I always excessively dirty Be kind, be respectful and enjoy your stay.
host_about:
Born in sunny Nice, I lived 2 years in Paris before moving to London early 2015. When I'm not in Paris or London, I love discovering other cultures and other ways of life : recently been to Brasil, Croatia, Andalusia, Armenia, Portugal, Sweden, and Jerusalem, living among locals and experiencing their habits.
Respect, adaptability and curiosity are my assets.

space: It's a tiny appartment on the second floor of  building from the begining of the 20th century with a view on a Japanize garden, nearby Belleville area.  Across the street there is the Parc de Belleville with a stunning 180 degrees view on Paris and on Eiffel tower.  All kinds of shops and a lot of restaurants nearby.  It's very well connected with the center of Paris : 15 minutes only from home to the entrance of Pompidou. The appartment can host 4 people max.
description: Nearby Belleville Parc, view on the Eiffel tower, well connected with the center of Paris. One room with a small double bed and a double sofa bed, a living room/kitchen and a big bathroom. Second floor, full of light! It's very well connected with the center of Paris : 15 minutes only from home to the entrance of Pompidou. The appartment can host 4 people max. Couronnes or Belleville on line 2. It takes 10 minutes to the Sacré Coeur and 20 minutes to the Champs-Elysées.  Number 26 bus goes to Gare du Nord and Gare St Lazare.  Number 96 bus goes to the Marais and Gare Montparnasse.

space: Situé entre la Gare de Lyon et la place de la Nation
description: Appartement cocooning de deux pièces avec balcon donnant sur un espace vert dans une résidence de standing, au cœur d'un quartier commerçant. Proche transports (RER A - métro lignes 1, 2, 6, 8 et 9).  Place de parking fermée et surveillée en option (payante) Situé entre la Gare de Lyon et la place de la Nation Situé entre les arrêts Reuilly-Diderot (lignes 1 et 8) et Montgallet (ligne 8) et à 5min à pied de la place de la Nation (RER A, métro lignes 1, 2, 6 et 9) Il y a également les lignes de bus 57 et 46 Nous serons là pour vous accueillir et vous laisser les clés de notre appartement. Nous répondons par mail à toutes vos questions ! Un supermarché Monoprix, pharmacie au pied de la résidence. Tous les dimanches matin un marché juste de l'autre côté de la rue avec des producteurs de la région. Plusieurs boulangeries, un boucher, Picard et une biocoop Ligne 1 et 8 au Métro Reuilly-Diderot à deux minutes à pied. Bus 46 et 57 à deux minutes à pied. Le second couchage qui est dans le salo
transit: Ligne 1 et 8 au Métro Reuilly-Diderot à deux minutes à pied. Bus 46 et 57 à deux minutes à pied.
access: Situé entre les arrêts Reuilly-Diderot (lignes 1 et 8) et Montgallet (ligne 8) et à 5min à pied de la place de la Nation (RER A, métro lignes 1, 2, 6 et 9) Il y a également les lignes de bus 57 et 46
interaction: Nous serons là pour vous accueillir et vous laisser les clés de notre appartement. Nous répondons par mail à toutes vos questions !
house_rules: L'appartement est non fumeur (mais possible sur le balcon sans laisser les fenêtres grandes ouvertes ;) ) et nos amis à poils, plumes ne sont malheureusement pas acceptés Notre appartement est un appartement convivial et n'est pas dédié à y faire des fêtes Avant de partir : Les poubelles sont à vider et à descendre au niveau -2 Le recyclage se trouve également au niveau -2 Les draps sont à défaire
host_about:
Marion et moi sommes de grands amoureux de Paris. 
Marion a grandi en région parisienne, dans l'Essonne. Elle travaille comme CPE dans un collège de Juvisy. Elle aime la Reine des neiges, les petits restos entre amis, partir en week-end en Normandie, les bijoux fantaisies, les colonies de vacances, les guirlandes lumineuses, le Body Pump, la littérature jeunesse et le chocolat. 

Je travaille comme ingénieur de réalisation dans une SSII. J'aime chausser une paire de running pour aller courir avec Marion jusqu'au parc de Vincennes le week-end, la côte atlantique, le festival Solidays, les voyages, le vin rouge, les moments cocooning à la maison, les parties de poker, la charcuterie de mes copains bouchers en bas de chez nous et le chocolat.

Nous sommes deux grands amoureux de Paris et serons très heureux de vous laisser les clés de notre cocon lors de nos escapades en amoureux.

space: Apartment situated in the heart of Saint-Germain des Prés, quartier is an ideal place to stay and discover this beautiful city. If you are a tourist or a business traveler this apartment is a perfect location for your stay in Paris and experience la "Vie Parisienne".  This 40 square meters (400 square feet) apartment is situated on the first floor of a building on the Rue Bonaparte. It is a stone's throw away from the famous Boulevard Saint Germain bustling with its fashion boutiques, typical Parisian bars, the famous french brasserie (The LIPP) great cafés like Café de Flore and Les Deux Magots. Just behind the house are magnificent gardens of Luxembourg and if you wish you can take a short walk to go visit the Latin District (Saint-Michel), Notre Dame church, have the famous Berthillon Ice-cream and then walk across the river to visit the most visited museum of the world The Louvre. The apartment is in a nice and calm courtyard.    Studio on 2 floors. house_rules: Merci de fumer à la fenêtre, de régler vos communication téléphonique non incluses dans mon forfait et si vous le voulez bien retirer vos draps le jour de votre départ et les mettre dans la machine à laver, je m'occupe du reste. Je viens de faire d'important travaux et c'est mon appartement personnel, je compte sur vous pour en prendre soin.
host_about:
Je suis moi même une grande voyageuse et sais combien c'est important de se sentir bien après une longue journée. J'ai l'habitude de dormir chez l'habitant et de faire des échanges d'appartements, je me ferai un plaisir de vous aider à organiser votre séjour ici à Paris. :)
J'aime partager mes bonnes adresses et faire découvrir un Paris un peu moins touristique, plus intimiste, représentatif de la vie des parisiens.
Dans la vie, aujourd'hui je suis hôtesse de l'air et j'en ai marre de dormir à l'hotel ;)

Arrival/Departure: You are already in Châtelet les Halles with the RER B to/from CDG and Orly airports. 4 stops away from the train station Gare du Nord that counts the Eurostar to London, the Thalys to Brussels and Amsterdam. 1 stop away from the train station Gare de Lyon, RER A : trains from/ to the South, Geneva, Spain, Italy and for the ones who would like to discover the south of France. Ex globe-trotter, enthusiastic, I like as much the intense and surprising meetings as the magnificents moments of solitude!
Now that I have a family, we settle down in a new flat in Paris not far from my cosy wooden hut.
I wish the person who will stay in it, will have as many great parisian moments as I could have during so many years.

Everything you could need (restaurants, bars,...) is nearby, including several supermarkets.  Sheets and towels are provided.

space: Live in Paris one week, for visit and know the life of Parisian family. We live in « Quartier Latin », between Notre Dame, Le Pantheon, and Le Jardin des Plantes (two minutes walk away) and we like it!  Also you can go to the Louvre, the Eiffel tower, the Louvre or the Cite des Sciences by metro (the metro station Jussieu is 3 minutes walk away down the street), bus, bicycles or boat very quickly. Your apartment is just next our ‘s . It is sunny, calm with its independent entrance and located on the first floor (French, second in America) without lift. The studio was completely redone in November of 2010. It is 20sq meters (215 sq feet); there is a double size bed, a table with armchairs, a small kitchenette with sink and microwave. The bathroom is functional with shower, sink and lavatory. Around your flat you can find little French bistro, cafés and very good restaurants. In the morning the openair market in the Mouffetard is calling you. We‘ll show you and we are sure you will like

interaction: Every morning, i will help you start you day : i will offer you a French breakfast (croissant and baguette) :) If you want, you can also share a dinner with my  family or a  glass of wine.
host_about: Je suis l'heureux père d'une famille de six enfants et nous vivons dans le cinquième arrondissement de Paris depuis maintenant une trentaine d'années! J'aime toujours autant cette ville (particulièrement ses concerts et ses musées) et ça sera donc un plaisir de vous accueillir. Je suis également un passionné de montagne.

space: Located in a historic building dating from the late 18th century, and just around the corner from  Marche des Enfants Rouges, this loft lets you relax in comfort. With exposed brick, terra cotta floor tiles and original wooden ceiling beams, the apartment has a real charm.  Whether travelling as a couple, a family or with a friend to see Paris, there is space to unwind,dine and sleep comfortably. The salon is furnished with a large oak  dining table, sofas and chairs. A new couch pulls out into a comfortable double bed measuring 140/200. There is a roomy armoire for clothes and suitcases. Wifi, an old TV, DVD player and some  films as well as unlimited calling to North American cell and landlines as well as landlines in one hundred other countries to stay in touch.  The small kitchen is  equipped with a fridge, oven,  electric stove top, kettle, toaster, espresso and drip coffee pots, cooking utensils, dishes and all you need for breakfast or to prepare a meal.  Tea, coffee, sugar and

transit: Metro stops St Sebastian Froissart, Filles de Calvaire and Republique are minutes away. There are bus stops for the 65, 20 and 96 in the vicinity.  Velib bike  racks are  around the corner on rue des Archives.  If taking the train from Roissy,the apartment is an easy transfer from Gare du Nord. The fixed fare for a taxi from CDG is 50 euro and from Orly is 35 euro. UberX from CDG is 45 euro. Booking a taxi ahead at g7partage is 35 euro to CDG for two people. Otherwise the RERB and metro is 10 euro per person.  I would be happy to reserve a taxi for you on departure day. If you arrive by car, the parking lot Barbette-Marais is nearby and a reasonable price.
access: Guests will have the apartment to themselves. I will meet you for the check-in as self check-in is not possible for the apartment.
interaction: I am a longtime Paris resident. I will meet you in person to show you the apartment, help with any bags and to give you the keys but also to provide you with maps,guide books and tips in order to make your stay in Paris as enjoyable as possible. I can be contacted during your stay should any question or problem arise.
house_rules: • Check-in time is from 2PM. It is sometimes possible to have a check-in before 2pm. While not guaranteed, please ask before booking. Guests must send me their arrival time a minimum of 24 hours before their trip begins to ease with scheduling. Guests should enjoy Paris but be respectful regarding noise.Late night music, parties, pets and smoking are not allowed. Please be quiet in the building's stairwell. Whether very young or just young at heart, the reservation  must include all children and adults staying in the apartment.  Third party reservations cannot be made without prior agreement. The apartment is not suitable for events or receptions. Please leave the apartment as you found it. Dishes need to be washed and garbage and recycling taken to the courtyard before departure. Keys must be returned on departure day. Failure to return the keys will result in replacement charges. Telephone calls to landlines are free as well as calls to cell phones in the US and Canada. Calls made to
host_about: I am a long time Paris resident. I am fluent in English and French. I enjoy travelling and have been throughout eastern and western Europe, China, South America, Russia....I have often rented apartments or houses during my trips and prefer the value and the 'lived in' feeling over the annonymity of a hotel.

space: Ideally located in the Latin quarter, at the foot of the Panthéon, and St Etienne du Mont,  within  walking distance from Notre Dame Cathedral, Saint Germain des Prés, in  the historical heart of Paris on  the left Bank. The flat is on  the fifth floor with a lift, a long balcony and a nice sight on the Pantheon Dome. It’s very bright and exposed to the East and South. It has been renovated quite recently (a new bathroom and a kitchen ) and  it has all the charms of the past with its oak wooden floors and black marble fire place. It combines both ancient and contemporary furniture in the living room and bedroom. Sleep up to 3 people ( a double bed and a convertible couch) Digital code Secure door Double glazing Fully equipped kitchen  Dining room for four Italian rainshower Bedsheets and pillows, towels are provided You are expected to leave the flat as clean as possible. host_about: I'm a librarian in a school. I'm very fond of culture  and literature : exhibitions, theater,  and music. I like to stroll in Paris and meet foreigners.  There are lots of old cinemas in my district and I specially like the cultural atmosphere of the Quartier Latin, with the Sorbonne, the College de France, the various libraries, the bouquinists along the Seine. I also like all the different restaurants all around my place, the old typical cafés of Paris, like the one in Amelie Poulain, or those of the rue de Oberkampf.

transit: A 2mn à pieds de la Station Jourdain ou place des Fêtes. Ligne de métro 11 (marron) : Châtelet direction Mairie des Lilas (12 mn en métro).  En arrivant de l'aéroport Roissy Charles de Gaulle : le moins cher (10€50 part personne) est de prendre à le RER B sud en direction de Paris et de vous arrêtez à Châtelet les Halles puis de prendre le métro ligne 11 (marron) direction Mairie des lilas et de vous arrêter à la station Jourdain. Sinon le trajet de taxi coûte un forfait de 55€ bagages compris jusqu'à 4 personnes.
access: Toutes

space: EXCEPTIONAL LOCATION : THE BEST & SAFEST AREA OF PARIS AT 5 MINUTES BY WALK FROM THE EIFFEL TOWER You are located very centrally, in the nicest & safest area of Paris, really at the feet of the EIFFEL TOWER (5 minutes by walk), a very lovely & very safe neighborhood where you can safely walk alone at night. The EIFFEL TOWER is located in the park Champs-de-Mars and the apartment is located at its edge This is a perfect location to visit Paris main tourist spots by walk or metro. The most important tourist spots are nearby so you do not need a car or to take taxis So, if you want to access quickly to the main attractions of Paris you will definitely choose this place!
