space: Very nice fully renovated 75m2 flat on the 4th floor (with elevator) at the heart of Paris in the 2nd "arrondissement", in Montorgueil.  There is a large sunny living room with a small balcony. The kitchen opens in the dining room and is fully equiped. There are 2 rooms, one with a queen size bed and the other one with a single bed. There is a bathroom with tube and separate WC.  The flat is in a pedestrian area, rooms are very quiet and the balcony full of sun all day long. There is high broadband internet connection in the flat, no TV but plenty to do in the neighborhood.  Montorgueil is a fashionable area, at the very heart of Paris. Most of the area is car free and you will find all the best restaurants and shops you are looking for. The neighborhood is lined with great restaurants, quaint cafés, bakeries (including La Maison Stohrer), fish stores, cheese shops, wine shops, produce stands and flower shops,... typical parisian life!

host_about:
We are a couple of travelers: Hélène works in the humanitarian sector and Guillaume is a photographer; travel, discovery, curiosity and open mindedness are part of our lifestyle. There is always a luggage being packed or unpacked at home; we have lived abroad a lot and still travel very frequently but Paris is the place we call home.
We love music, theatre, good books and good food hence our home is a TV free zone! We love and know Paris very well and will be happy to share tips and our favorite places in the city with you. 
If you want to know more do not hesitate to get in touch.

space: A one room appartment in Paris for short or medium stays.  Recently rehabilitated and furnished, 17sqm, with a high ceiling that allows for a « real » concrete mezanine with a double bed mattress and storage space (see photos). Set in the « Jourdain » quarter, a few steps away from the Buttes-Chaumont park, 15 minutes from the center of Paris by metro. The area is lively with shops, cafes, restaurants, and a wonderful market. The street itself is quiet and the studio  opens on a small yard with a table and two chairs, for morning coffee or late afternoon drink when the weather is nice. No TV, but a wifi connexion, 2 electric plates, washing machine, micro-wave, a refrigerator, an italian coffee-maker, an electrical kettle... The place is nice and usually quiet, with morning sun, a perfect place from where to visit Paris, or an cozy retreat for studying or writing. I ask dwellers not to smoke inside, but you just have to open the door to enjoy the small yard.

space: Planning a trip to Paris?  Want to experience the real Parisian life?  Come and stay in a comfortable all furnished studio in the fashion and chic part of Paris: Saint Honoré/ Tuileries Gardens/ Louvre... It is a cute studio on last floor of nice old parisian building right in the center of Paris, just near rue Saint Honoré, the Tuileries Garden, Louvre Museum, the Opéra etc... The main room under the roofs has a kitchen/living room corner, and a real double bed.  The windows offer a beautiful view : from there, you can see the Eiffel Tower, the Opéra, and the charming and famous parisian roofs.  Fully furnished. Equipped kitchen with cooking hardware, nespresso, boiler, toaster, bathroom with bathtube and toilets, washer/dryer etc...). host_about:
A Parisian at heart…
I was born in Paris 38 years ago (not so easy to find a Paris native in Paris!) and grew up in a milieu where French art de vivre is key. 
I love Paris, where I have my habit but  where I always keep room for surprise. 
I’m the one, friends have always kept calling asking « where could I take my parents for dinner » « what would you suggest for an anniversary  », « It’s so sunny today, where can we have a brunch ?
Just  like you…
I love travelling, discovering new parts, going out to concerts, movies, exhibitions, partying or spending quiet times with family and friends by the fire place in a sunny park .
I love good food, good wine, and I feel truly sorry when I see disoriented tourists sitting in a tourist trap where I wouldn’t go even if paid.
I decided it was time ! 
After studying in HEC management school and working for 10 years in big advertising agencies, I left the top management position I had achieved, deciding  that it was time that I launched my own business, make something that I really liked. That's how I founded my own business, with this ambitious project of making you experience Paris like only a Parisian can. 
Looking forward to seeing you in Paris ! :)

space: In the historic center of Paris (1st district ), the apartment is located on the same street than the famous “Pont Neuf” (the oldest bridge of Paris). As a central location, this is hard to beat! (by definition, the “First” district is the center of Paris, then the districts increase in number in a kind of a “snail” structure). It is: -	1 min walking distance (WD) from Rue de Rivoli -	Less than 5  min WD from metro ( I, IV, VII, XI, XIV), RER A, B (direct for the airports and many train station (Gare du Nord, Gare de Lyon, Montparnasse...)) (Chatelet/ les halles) -	5 min WD from le Louvre/ Palais Royal, Beaubourg / centre Georges Pompidou, Hôtel de ville, Ile de la Cite -	Less than 10 min WD from Notre Dame, le Marais, Saint Michel, St Germain des Prés, Jardin des tuileries The apartment is located at the 4th floor of an old and charming Parisian building, and is fully furnished. transit: The station is served by lines A, B, and D of the RER, and is therefore directly accessible from many stations in Île-de-France. It forms a large underground network with the Châtelet and Les Halles Métro stations. This network brings together three of the five RER lines and five Métro lines, and is the central node of the network of transit of the Ile-de-France metropolitan area. Every day, 750,000 travelers pass through Châtelet–Les Halles, including 493,000 just for the RER. At peak hours, the station can see 120 trains in just one hour. Châtelet–Les Halles is also the station where the second stage of the RATP-managed IMAGE project was installed. It consists in 10 flat screens which provide local traffic information (next trains, traffic conditions, delays, etc.) from all carriers (RATP, SNCF, etc.) and will eventually replace the information systems of the individual carriers. The southern end of Châtelet – Les Halles is connected to the Métro station of Châtelet, and the northern

space: This apartment is located just in the center of Paris, in the Marais district.  At a strategic crossroad, just 4 minutes walking distance from Centre Pompidou, not far from Place des Vosges, Place des Victoires , Musée Picasso or Notre Dame de Paris. You can enjoy the shopping in rue des Francs Bourgeois, rue Vieille du temple or rue Charlot with its trendy boutiques just near the apartment… You would share a real French life in shopping your fresh vegetables and fruits at “Les Enfants Rouges" market on rue de Bretagne. There is a lovely park with a playground to entertain your kids just nearby. This 70 square meters, two bedrooms apartment is charming, comfortable and very cozy. It has been lovingly decorated with taste, beautiful paintings, old pictures, sculptures and wooden floors. You will really feel at home because nothing is missing for your comfort. The wood beams in the kitchen and the old stones are keeping all of its old character. You can appreciate some antique pieces gat

house_rules: -Respect your neighbors and avoid making noise in communal areas when carrying luggage in the stairs or when walking down the stairs ... – -This is a no smoking apartment. -No pets allowed  -No parties are allowed. -You cannot use this place for professional purposes. - Do not make too much noise in the apartment by too high volume on the music or TV  -Do not smoke, or crush cigarettes in public areas of the building.  -Throw your garbage in the appropriate garbage bins  -Do not leave the heating on whilst also opening windows. - Do not throw your cigarette butts out of the windows. –  -Do not leave the windows wide open and verify that all taps and the oven top rings are turned off, when leaving the apartment. –  -Do not use candles. -Do not use high heels and please take off your shoes once in the apartment to keep the wooden floor in a good condition.

space: The apartment is located right in the center of Paris, in a pedestrianized area, in the historic neighborhood of le Marais. space: It is close to all conveniences. It is well equipped with an attractive balcony. You will be close to the subway, shops and also to popular tourist attractions such as Montparnasse and the Eiffel Tower. The apartment has a lounge with a sofa, cable TV, and a comfortable bed. There is a separate well-equipped kitchen (there is an oven, microwave and a cooker/hob) All utensils and cooking equipment are free for you to use. There is a bathroom with a washing machine.

space: Un charmant petit nid douillet composé d'une chambre, un coin repas, un coin salon, une cuisine américaine et une salle de bain avec douche et toilettes. Situé au pied du sacré coeur, il vous offrira la possibilité en seulement quelques minutes de marche de découvrir le quartier historique de la butte Montmartre. Du sacré coeur jusqu'au moulin rouge vous découvrirez le quartier des Abbesses avec ses petites rues commerçantes et ses nombreux bistrots typiquement parisiens, la place des Abbesses avec ses cafés, son église, la rue des Abbesses avec ses boulangeries parmi les meilleures de paris, la rue Lepic avec son marché permanent et le désormais célèbre café d'Amélie Poulain !!! La place Blanche vous dévoilera son moulin, LE moulin rouge que des milliers de touristes photographient tous les jours... 20 petites minutes de marche supplémentaires vous emmèneront flâner dans les allées des grands magasins parisiens, admirer la fabuleuse façade de l'opéra de paris... Vous serez ravis de re

transit: Métro ligne 2. Métro ligne 1 et RER A à Nation. Bus 57 direct Gare de Lyon et 56 direct République et Gare du Nord à 5 min. Velib

house_rules: En premier lieu, merci de garder à l'esprit que vous êtes dans un immeuble d'habitation et non dans un hôtel. En conséquence,  veuillez à faire le minimum de bruit dans l'escalier (en particulier avec les valises) et une fois dans l'appartement d'avoir un comportement respectueux de la vie des voisins. Merci! - les condiments (sel, poivre, huile, vinaigre) sont en libre service à condition de renouveler un élément que l'on finit. - la nourriture présente dans le frigo et dans le meuble d'angle ne doit pas être consommée. -L'alcool sur le bar ne doit pas être consommé. -Les lits doivent être défaits et les draps déposés dessus. - les livres d'art peuvent être consultés à condition de le faire avec des mains propres - les romans peuvent être lus. - le placard dans l'entrée est privé ainsi que les 3 caissons supérieurs de la chambre. - l’appartement doit être rendu dans l'état de propreté où il a été trouvé. Cela veut notamment dire que la vaisselle doit être propre ET rangé. - les animau

space: Enjoy your stay in Paris like real Parisians by choosing a luxury equipped apartment rental in the heart of Paris.  Perfect for a family or a couple , this beautiful 25 M² completely renovated studio will provide you the privacy a home and the comfort of hotel suite. On the 1st floor in a very quiet street, facing the shortest street of Paris (5m), fully equipped with : - a living room with a convertible sofa, TV, DVD player, internet access, wifi - an open equipped kitchen (oven, hotplates induction, dish washer)  - a bathroom (shower, toilets, washing machine, iron set, hair dryer)  - an open sleeping area (one double bed, storage cupboard) Included services :  - Bed sheets and towels housework  - Starter kit : Basics like toilet paper, salt, sugar, olive oil and vinegar are provided , as well as a Breakfast starter kit (coffee, tea, chocolate, )
description: Nice and quiet totally renovated 2013 studio for 2/4 people, in the strategic center of Paris, between  Montorgueil /  Grands Boulevards area.  The place can be extended with the neighboring other studio to welcome up to 8 people Enjoy your stay in Paris like real Parisians by choosing a luxury equipped apartment rental in the heart of Paris.  Perfect for a family or a couple , this beautiful 25 M² completely renovated studio will provide you the privacy a home and the comfort of hotel suite. On the 1st floor in a very quiet street, facing the shortest street of Paris (5m), fully equipped with : - a living room with a convertible sofa, TV, DVD player, internet access, wifi - an open equipped kitchen (oven, hotplates induction, dish washer)  - a bathroom (shower, toilets, washing machine, iron set, hair dryer)  - an open sleeping area (one double bed, storage cupboard) Included services :  - Bed sheets and towels housework  - Starter kit : Basics like toilet paper, salt, sugar, olive oi
transit: Getting there : Train stations to the east, the north and airports are only 10mn away : - Gare du Nord (trains from/to London, Belgium, Netherlands and Roissy/Orly Airports) is only 10mn away by direct Metro at Strasbourg St Denis (line 4)  - Gare de l'Est (trains from/to Germany, Austria, and Eastern Europe) , also is only 10mn away . Just take the direct bus Airports (Roissy and Orly) are both at 45 mn of public transport : just take the direct Metro at Strasbourg St Denis (line 4) to Gare du Nord, then hop in the RER B that will bring directly you to Roissy or Orly in only 25mn - Closer subways stations :  + 50 meters far from Bonne Nouvelle & Strasbourg Saint Denis (lines 4, 8 et 9)  + 200 meters far from Réaumur Sebastopol (lines 4 and 3)  + 500 meters far from Châtelet (lines 1, 4,7, 1, 14) and RER A et B)
access: Tout le logement
interaction: All our family lives in the area since the 80's, and I work at 30mn from the apartment. I know very well Paris, and the neighborhood, so feel free to ask any information to better prepare your stay, I'll be glad to help.
house_rules: Feel yourself comfortable, and like you would when staying at a friends house. Simply respect our place, our neighbors, and the following guest, by :  - No smoking - Not bringing pets - Not having loud parties Checkout cleaning is already included, so just leave the place normally in order, the way you would at home :  -no dirty dishes (start the dish-washer on before leaving) -no food left over or rubbish (please empty the garbage bins before leaving) -shut off the lights, the heaters, etc.
host_about:
Hi,
I'm a 50 years old franco-italian/true parisian traveller, snowboarder, paraglider, & father of 2 girls.
Since I was 15, I spend all my holidays (and in France we've got lots of them)  visiting the world, staying in rented houses or apartments, so I know how important the quality of the place you stay during a trip is.
I like meeting people from different cultures, (thats why I travel a lot), and I'm always happy to share my experience with my guests, and help them to enjoy their stay in Paris like a real Parisian.

space: The flat is located in the lively neighborhood of Belleville. It s a 1 bedroom calm appartment. I have payed a great attention to decoration and equipment.  My typican parisian flat is fully furnished (Internet wifi, Hi-fi, cleaning machine, dish washer...) and just renovated. I don t have Tv but I ve got a cinema projector with many DVDs you could used. The living room is large and calm, the bedroom is cozy with a double bed. It s very easy to access, I m located between the Metro Station Belleville (line 2 & 11) and Colonel Fabien (line 2), at 45 minutes from Charles De Gaulle airport and 15 minutes to Gare du Nord train station. There is a lot of bus lines and velib stations.  You will find a lot of coffees, bars and restaurants and if you wanna cook yourself, there is everything you need at  walking distance and street market every wednesdays and saturdays down the street.  It s also located at 10 minutes walk from Canal Saint-Martin with plenty of trendy coffees, bars, restaurants

space: 70m2 apartment in a well looked after residence.  The apartment is as follows : - We are on the 3rd floor with a lift.  - 1 double bedroom - 1 child bedroom with a baby's bed  + a single mattress  - A living room with a sofa bed. In the living room are two french windows giving an access to the balcony. - A kitchen with all fittings : fridge, freezer, oven, microvawe, dishwasher ... - A large bathroom The apartment is located 5 minitues walk from the "parc Georges Brassens" and all its surounding bistros, restaurants and bakeries. Every Tuesday, Thursday and Sunday the market is held on "la rue de la Convention". You can also do your shoping in the closest supermaket only a minute away from the apartment. Bus 62, 95 and 89 : 5 minutes walk Metro Plaisance: 8 minutes walk  Metro Convention: 10 minutes walk Tramway (Brancion): 10 minutes walk which give an easy access to "le parc des exposition" in Porte de Versaille.

space: Ideal location to visit Paris: close to Montmartre, Madeleine, Place Vendôme, direct access tby bus to the Louvre, the Champs Elysées. Plenty of restaurants nearby, supérette, cafés, etc.
description: This small and cute flat close to Moulin Rouge and Montmartre  and St Lazare train station newly furnished, quiet and comfortable is ideal for a  a couple to visit Paris and cocooning! Ideal location to visit Paris: close to Montmartre, Madeleine, Place Vendôme, direct access tby bus to the Louvre, the Champs Elysées. Plenty of restaurants nearby, supérette, cafés, etc. The flat is on the third floor without elevator.   It's non smoking. Animals are not welcome. I try to meet guests upon their arrival to give the keys and the recommandations. At 100m, le Musée de la Vie Romantique, at 200m, the lovely Place Saint Georges; at 2 blocks, the famous Moulin Rouge, rue Lepic with its wonderful fook markets, rue des Abbesses leading to Montmartre. Plenty of  theaters in the neighborhood. Laundermat close by. Easy to reach via RER and metro or bus from airports. Closest metro stops: Blanche, Liège, St Georges, Trinité

Voyager forme la jeunesse et pas seulement!

space: Appartement haussmannien d'environ 90 m² qui a beaucoup de charme grâce ses tomettes de l'époque, son parquet ancien, ses jolis plafonds, sa belle cheminée et la grande luminosité qui s'y installe en partie grâce à sa hauteur (4ème étage). Il se constitue :   - d'une grande chambre avec un lit King size,  - d'un grand salon très aéré avec un canapé lit d'angle 2 places,  - d'une salle à manger semi-ronde (original !),  - d'une salle de bain avec baignoire,  - d'une bibliothèque/bureau contenant également un canapé,   - d'une cuisine (lave-vaisselle à disposition) accompagnée d'une buanderie avec grand réfrigérateur et lave-linge.  L'appartement est équipé d'un triple-vitrage et d'un binôme volets/rideaux occultant apportant un confort optimal pour s'y reposer la nuit. Sa situation est idéale : à deux pas de la rue des Martyrs avec ses nombreux commerçants tous intéressants et différents les uns des autres, à peine à 10 minutes à pied de Pigalle, des grands boulevards, de l’Opéra, de la

space: This 130m² (approx. 1,610 sq. ft.) and furnished loft is part of an ancient factory built at the end of the 19th century.  The apartment is on two levels. On the ground floor : the main room, the open kitchen, the office and the toilets. The bathroom and the two bedrooms are on the mezzanines. One of the bedroom and the bathroom are very charmfull with their bay windows.  The open kitchen is fully equiped. There is an open bathroom with a very large bathtub surrounded by many plants ; blinds all around allows to close. The nearest metro station is République.

access: Guests will be provided a welcome manual with all the necessary informations (internet access, door code, telephone, etc ...), neighborhood stores, shops, restaurants and their menu, interest points, instructions of the elements of the apartment, the best places to visit in Paris, ect... You will find also tour guides in several languages as well as the famous Michelin Guide.
interaction: Nicolas will be happy to assist guests, advise or assist them according to their needs, make reservations on their behalf, or to share a good meal ! Traveling for business, tourist purposes, or a romantic getaway, do not hesitate to contact Nicolas ! in Paris everything is possible ! He will indicate you the right places to visit, where to accommodate your business partners, the places not to be missed, places of celebrations and events, good restaurants, where to do sports, find shows and live music concerts, ...
house_rules: Pets and parties and/or receptions business/commercial presentations are forbidden, smoking is not allowed inside the apartment, no sleeping in the couch of the living room. The host is available 7/7 and 24/24 hours for guests by phone or sms. Respect the tranquility of building and neighbours and do not contact with the concierge of the building (she is wild !). Towels and bed linen are quality ones, any deterioration (demakup, solvent, creams, oils, etc ...) will be charged at the rate specified on the rules available inside the apartment. By reading this you irrevocably accept withholding payment on your security deposit on the indicated rates of bed linen and towels. Thank you to respect the traveler numbers announced at the reservation within the limit of 6 maximum during your stay. The owner reserves the right to adjust the rate if the number of tenants do not comply. Rates penalties irrevocably accepted by the guests in case of damage: -------------------------------------------
host_about:
Hi every ones, my name is Nicolas and i was born in Paris. The city don't have any secrets for me, and it will be a pleasure to help you having the best time ever there ! 

Don't hesitate to ask me anything you need during your stay, you will always have the best advice ! Need to have a business time ? meeting ? A good restaurant ? A romantic night ? Something to buy ? Find something late at night ? Live music ? Make party somewhere ? Want a touristic cruise ? Something to visit ? I will make you feel as a "real Parisian" and your pleasure will be mine !

space: On the banks of the Seine, with jaw-dropping views of the Notre-Dame Cathedral, this apartment is a Parisian fantasy come true. Combining modern luxury with historic charm, the property, which was totally renovated last year, is truly a gem. The air-conditioned apartment is composed of two bedrooms, a modern American kitchen, and a living room with a sofa bed and plasma TV. The master bedroom features a king-size bed, a full bathroom (with a washer and dryer machine), a TV, and its own private patio. It's perfect for watching the boats pass on the river below. The second room has two single beds (which can be converted into a double bed), a full bathroom, and a door to the main terrace, which is also accessible through the living room.  Wireless internet is included! The terrace is one of the apartment's best assets. With table and chairs that seat up to eight people, it's great for entertaining as well as for a quiet respite above the bustling metropolis below. The apartment comes wit

Taxis: The Boulevard Saint Michel, directly in front of the apartment, has plenty of them.  Train: The RER A train will take you to Disneyland Paris.  Airport: The Air France Shuttle, located at Porte Maillot and Invalides, goes straight to the airport. Parking: If you have a car, you can park it in a private lot about 150 meters away from the apartment.
access: The unit is private and self-catering. You'll have access to all kitchen equipment, television, wifi, and telephone (including free calls to the USA, Canada, France...).

host_about:
I founded GLAMAPARIS (Gestion Location Appartements Meublés A PARIS) in 2008 after having discovered short term rental in Barcelona. 
The agency GLAMAPARIS is a licensed real estate agency specializing in property management specifically in the 1st, 6th, and 8th arrondissements. With over 700 reviews on renowned websites such as Airbnb, TripAdvisor and others, we always do our best to ensure the high quality of services in all the properties we manage. 
Our team works with dozens of individual property owners who trust us . We aim to make the renting process simple and secure, facilitating the reservation process, and providing support throughout your stay. 
Our services include on-site check-in, maintenance, and professional cleaning services. We also create rental contracts and accept credit card payments.

space: Situated on the ground floor of a Haussmann building, the apartment overlook a flowery courtyard. You'll find a dining room, a spacious bedroom, a lounge, a kitchen fully equipped, a bathroom with shower and separated WC. The apartment is totally decorated with antique furnitures. In the living room, you'll find a sofa bed (160*200cm), a flat screen TV, a Louis Philippe writing desk and a Prussian faience stove (not working but so charming!). The bedroom is spacious with a queensize bed, a wardrobe and a decorative black marble fireplace. The kitchen is fully equipped (fridge and freezer, combinated gas and electric stove, dishwasher and a combinated microwave-oven). In the bathroom there is a towel-dryer, an hair-dryer and a washing machine. You'll find a iron in the wardrobe! If you are looking for a quiet and authentic place in this lively area, this apartment is for you!  You'll stay 10min walk from St Germain, 10min from the Eiffel Tower, and 15min by train from Versailles!
description: Leave your suitcases in this cosy 3 rooms apartment (60m²). Totally renoved in a typical parisian style, you'll stay in the heart of Montparnasse. Situated on the ground floor of a Haussmann building, the apartment overlook a flowery courtyard. You'll find a dining room, a spacious bedroom, a lounge, a kitchen fully equipped, a bathroom with shower and separated WC. The apartment is totally decorated with antique furnitures. In the living room, you'll find a sofa bed (160*200cm), a flat screen TV, a Louis Philippe writing desk and a Prussian faience stove (not working but so charming!). The bedroom is spacious with a queensize bed, a wardrobe and a decorative black marble fireplace. The kitchen is fully equipped (fridge and freezer, combinated gas and electric stove, dishwasher and a combinated microwave-oven). space: BIENVENUE CHEZ NOUS ! Dans notre agréable appartement, nous vous recevons en amis et vous proposons une très jolie chambre romantique d’une propreté (Website hidden by Airbnb) d’un vrai lit (literie neuve), avec de beaux meubles anciens, baie vitrée. Vous disposerez d’une salle de bains privative avec une grande baignoire ; les WC sont séparés et à proximité de la chambre. Possibilité de connexion Wifi. Un petit déjeuner très copieux avec des produits frais et confitures maison vous sera servi, à votre convenance, dans notre grande cuisine ou dans la véranda où vous sentirez comme dans un petit jardin. Le quartier est très calme et pourtant à proximité de toutes les commodités. Vous pourrez : -Vous aérer ou courir dans le très beau parc des Buttes Chaumont à 10mn -Faire la fête dans les cafés branchés avec concerts -Si vous aimez le cinéma, le MK2 est à 10mn -Stations Velib et Autolib à proximité SITUATION : -20 mn en métro de Notre Dame et de l’Ile de la cité (ligne 11) -25 mn de l’Op

space: 2 room apartment, 34 m2, bathroom and kitchen. 1 room with a double bed, the other with sofa/bed and fire place. In the kitchen there is all you need and even a washing machine. The windows open to the sunny side (South), and you can even see Montmartre hill. No street noise. The apartment is very well situated between  the beautiful parc Buttes Chaumont on the left hand, and on the right hand the Canal St. Martin with ships, péniches for opera, theater and concerts, bars and restaurants, cinemas and plenty of young people. It's also near to "Cité de la Musique", the concert hall "Zénith", "Cité des Sciences" and "la Géode" with plenty of events going  on. It's a very lively area with open market every day, and all the shops you need. 2 metro stations are neaby: Jaurès and Bolivar. Cleaning fee: 25E when you get the keys

host_about:
Je suis Européenne parlant français, allemand et anglais. Professionnellement je suis journaliste, grand reporter. J'ai vu pas mal de pays et j'aime les villes comme Londres, Zurich, Pétersbourg, Berlin, New York, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Buenos Aires, Budapest, Prague, Cracovie... J'aime recevoir des gens de tous les pays. J'aime aussi partager mon enthousiasme pour Paris qui est ma ville d'élection.
J'habite le quartier du 19ème arrondissement de Paris depuis bientôt 40 ans et j'ai vu  sa transformation de zone artisanale en quartier "bo-bo", où les petits artisans ont cédé la place aux restaurants, aux boutiques, aux cinémas et bars à concerts, où des arbres, espaces verts et pistes cyclables longent maintenant le Canal devenu aire de loisirs.
Ma devise de vie est "FAIRE ET EN FAISANT SE FAIRE". et la vôtre?

house_rules: Le jour de l'arrivée nous vous accueillerons directement à l'appartement , c'est pourquoi il est essentiel que vous nous communiquiez le plus tôt possible votre heure d'arrivée à Paris   S'il vous plait soyez calme et respectueux du voisinage. En cas d'appartement laissé sale, nous vous demanderons des frais supplémentaire de 50 € HT  The day of your arrival, you will be met directly at the apartment, So it's very important to let us know well in advance at what time you plan to arrive in Paris. Please be quiet and respectful to neighborough and leave the place as clean as possible ( we will charge you 50 € HT if you leave a dirty apartment).

space: Ideally located in Rue Cler, a pedestrian street, you will enjoy a very special atmosphere between caterers, flower stands, fruits and vegetables stands, wine shops, and other bakeries. The studio, located on the 4th floor with a (tiny) elevator is ideal for a traveler on their own but it may possibly accommodate an extra (close ;-) person. It has an entrance with a small coocking area (induction hob and extractor, refrigerator, crockery, etc), a bathroom with shower, sink and toilet, separated by a closing door from the main room which is equipped with a very comfortable sofa bed, cupboards and a desk corner. fresh bed linen and towels are provided internet wifi Nespresso machine hair-dryer Please note that the studio is NON smoking. No pets allowed. There is no washing machine in the studio, however a public laundry is available in the corner of the street as well as 2 laundry shops.  Metro : Line 8 - Ecole Militaire Bus : lines (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) and 92 Vélib' bike stat

transit: From Charles-de-Gaulle (CDG) airport, 3 options : 1- taxi : 30-45 minutes ; 50-70€ ; 2- Roissy Bus (RATP) until Opéra, then subway (métro) line 8 - exit Ecole Militaire ; 3- RER B until Saint-Michel, then RER C until Invalides, then metro line 8 - exit Ecole Militaire or 5-10 minutes walk ; From Orly (ORY) airport : 1- taxi : 30 minutes ; 40-60€ ; 2- Orly Bus (RATP) until Denfert-Rochereau then métro ligne 6 until Motte-Picquet-Grenelle then métro ligne 8 - exit Ecole Militaire. From Gare de Lyon :  métro ligne 14 until Madeleine, then métro line 8 - exit Ecole Militaire. From Gare Montparnasse :  1- métro line 6 untill Motte-Picquet-Grenelle then line 8 - exit Ecole Militaire ; 2- bus n°92 until Ecole militaire or Bosquet-Grenelle station. From Gare du Nord : 1- bus n°42 until Rapp-La Bourdonnais station ; 2- métro line 4 until Strasbourg-Saint-Denis, then métro line 8 - exit Ecole Militaire.
access: guests have access to the whole studio.
interaction: emails, texts, (Hidden by Airbnb) ', viber
house_rules: All the facilities are included ( cleaning , towels , bed linen , heating , WIFI) .
host_about:
I am French and I love to travel, either for work or pleasure. I have visited or lived in many cities in the world, such as New York, Dubai, Cairo & Luxor, Ashgabat, Namibia, Petra, Mascate, Monaco, Moscow, Lisbon, the (underwater) Maldives and many more to come :)

I would be very happy to welcome you in my "cute little studio in Paris". 
Your comfort is essential to me, as well as your feelings and impressions about Paris. Therefore, I would be happy to help to make your stay a great souvenir !

As I am out of town very often, I might not be able to welcome you personnaly, but I promise everything will be all set for your comfort :)

space: I rent an apartment of 86 m2 with 3 beautiful rooms in a very nice neighborhood of the capital. Apartment very bright with large windows and 2 large balconies with unobstructed view vis -à-vis . The apartment has an entrance , a beautiful fully equipped kitchen (dishwasher , washing machine , oven , fridge, freezer , hob ) opening onto a living room of 30 m2 . The bathroom is with bathtub. The apartment is very quiet and surrounded by greenery. All rooms except 1 bedroom, open to balconies ! Internet access , fiber broadband box . A 2 minute walk from the subway Telegraph . A 5 minutes walk from Jordan subway. The Telegraph subway is located 10 minutes by metro from Chatelet , center of Paris. Shops , bars, restaurants , Olympic swimming pool , cinema, theaters nearby. Parc des Buttes Chaumont and Parc de Belleville nearby. Bed linen provided. Bath towels provided .

transit: The apartment is right next to the metro and is on a direct line that goes up to Chatelet, central Paris, in 10 minutes. There are also several bus lines and the tram just next door to explore Paris and its surroundings. It is quite simple to park in the neighborhood.
access: Travelers have access to the entire apartment
interaction: We will be delighted to give you tips on the different districts of Paris, good restaurants, nice places to have a drink or to stroll. Do not hesitate to ask us questions!
house_rules: No smoking : people smoke on the balconies ! Respect the neighborhood. Thank you to water the plants that are our friends ! :-)
host_about:
Bonjour je m'appelle Sophie, je suis une personne curieuse, accueillante, j'aime les voyages, le théâtre, la musique, la peinture et la littérature.
Mon compagnon s'appelle Patrice et il aime le cinéma, l'écriture et les légumes verts.
Nous serons heureux de vous accueillir chez nous, au coeur de Paris.

host_about:
My fully-equipped 3 room's apartment is located in the heart of the heart of Paris and at a very good price! It offers everything you really need to enjoy good vacations in Paris : good wifi, hot water, heaters, comfy beds, kitchen and balconies (to smoke cigarets or only watch the scenery of the "Aristocats" on the roofs of Paris).
I love to help my guests as you can read so many advises on my ad (and much more when you'll book!) as technical details about transportation and also the good places to eat/drink/visit/shop.
I would say that my place is perfect for the following type of guests :  Young or middle-age (couple(s), friends, colleagues, relatives) who are thirsty to visit the city all day long, come back home to relax on the balcony for sunset with a glass of fine wine, then crash on my comfy beds until the next morning to go walking along the river ’s shore (la Seine is only 10mn’s walk from my place).  You can start by Les Tuileries (the king's playground), Le Louvre's courtyard (pyramide), join Notre-Dame (the back view is the best!), follow the flow to Le Marais' fashion shops, then (for the most courageous) enjoy a night concert on a "péniche" boat and come back home riding a time-share bicycle (for the most inconscients if they survive the paris driving ;-)  But of course, if you are 60 year’s old willing to spend all day writing your script at home on an old typewriter like Woody Allen drinking sparkling mineral water, this is also allowed... Strange to me (specially about the mineral water) but allowed...  Welcome to the Old Good Paris ! :-)
Finally, if you have been diagnosed OCD, uptight or maniac about sterilized cleaning and total silence... You should choose an other apt, surely an other city and maybe an other planet. I'm helpful but I don't want to deal with heavy cases in my house ;-)

space: The apartment is located in Marx Dormoy aera, near Montmartre and La Chapelle. It is one of the last neighbourhood of Paris which has kept his popular, multi-ethnic and typically parisian spirit.. DESCRIPTION OF THE APPARTEMENT : The apartment is 35 square meters (380ft2), bright, with a wooden floor in a 1920's brick building, secured with digicode. It has a bedroom (140x200 cm bed) and a living room (with a convertible sofa, a TV with CNN, BBC and a DVD player), an equiped kitchen (washing machine, oven, vitro-ceramic stove, micro-wave). Wifi Internet is provided, as well as sheets and towels. It is on 4th floor without elevator. NEIGHBORHOOD AND PUBLIC TRANSIT :  The neighbourhood is like a village, within walking distance (500 meters) of the Marché de l'Olive, a recently renovated quality food market open every day where you can find everyting you want (butchery, deli meats, cheese, vegetables, fish shops as well as oriental, italian or greek food). space: Gorgeous two rooms flat very closed to the typical village of Montmartre. Flat completly restaured with beautiful materials as parquet, italian marble, beams, new furniture and new electronic devices. - a living room with american kitchen, TV cable, WIFI - a bedroom with a 140/190 bed  - a bathroom with a big italian shower, a towel warmer, a hair dryer, a new washing machine Miele. - an american kitchen with a fridge, a freezer, a cooker Hood, toaster, a blender, a kettle, an oven with microwave option and induction cooker. SHEETS AND TOWELS PROVIDED. Good surprise you'll find a bakery at the ground floor, perfect for your breakfast! The area of Montmartre is very typical of Paris and full of nice place as the Rosie a bar (Le Rosie 3 Rue Muller (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Paris (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)  And for clubbing "le blue" (12, rue Muller)

host_about:
J'aime beaucoup sortir avec mes amis : prendre des verres dans nos bars préférés, aller au cinéma, partir en week-end à l'étranger pour visiter des capitales encore inconnues. Partir à l'improviste en week-end, se faire proposer un super plan de sortie en dernière minute.... Se faire un week-end à la campagne chez mes parents au bord de la cheminée au chaud avec un bon verre de wisky, un gros pull chaud et un jean.... 
Ecouter de la musique et de genre différent : House deep, minimale, electro, rock, classique...
J'adore lire Alexandre DUMAS tout comme Tom CLANCY bref...
Mes films  : Le dernier samouraï mais je vais éclater de rire devant : l'Age de Glace...
J'adore ma vie, mon boulot, mon appartement...même si souvent on se retrouve face au sempiternel : No pain no gain...
J'aime recevoir mes amis et qu'ils aient tout à disposition, le but étant qu'ils se sentent chez eux.
Aussi, j'espère de tout cœur que vous vous sentirez bien chez moi !

Antoinette

space: Welcome to my cosy flat!  this 32 m2 flat is located in a very clam street on the 3rd floor of a typical Parisian building, overlooking the St bernard church. Fully furnished, equipped: wooden floor, open kitchen, fridge, oven, expresso machine, washing machine, bath towels and bed sheet are provided. Internet and wifi, telephone (free) "landline only " domestic and international. One double bed  and one sofa bed in the living room. The flat is located in "La Goutte d'Or" 'the Golden Drop', the African neighborhood of Paris. It is an amazingly lively neighborhood, with markets and cafés. There is also an open air traditional food market close by the flat 2 days per week. 5 min to all conveniences: supermarket and transportation... Métro line 4 (Barbès and Chateau rouge) and métro line 2 ( Barbès) which connects hole Paris. You can enjoy the Montmartrebus which will take you around montmartre and "Sacré coeur". 15 minutes walk to" Moulin Rouge" and "Pigalle". 10 mn walk from Gare du Nor

space: Double glass roof terrace + very nice house in comfort Paris 16 Close to Roland Garros, the Parc des Princes, Parc des Expositions at Porte de Versailles. host_about:
Hello, 
I live in this big house that I built in 2010.
I live theire with my family, Romain is 20, Marine is 18, Anne Charlotte is 16 and Antoine is 14. We enjoy having guest on the second flor. We like music (we play flute, piano and saxo), we like climbing.  Romain likes mechanical and physics, he studies to become ingineer. Marine likes modern Art. Anne Charlotte likes to read, and Antoine likes to play football and rugby.

space: Une oasis de paix en plein coeur du quartier le plus branché de Paris, centre historique, avec ses musées, ses églises, ses rues étroites datant du moyen âge... C'est l'endroit le plus branché de la capitale. Toutes les visites peuvent se faire à pieds : Notre Dame ; le quartier Latin, le Louvre... Idéalement situé pour le shopping.  Toutes les boutiques de mode sont ouvertes le dimanche. Vous trouverez de nombreux restaurants, bars...  et tout un tas d'informations laissées à votre attention dans l'appartement
description: This fully furnish apartment is located right by "Beaubourg" , area of the Marais, the historical heart of Paris. The most trendy part of the city. Lots of restaurants, cafes, good shopping. Most of the shops open on sundays.
transit: Depuis les aéroports parisiens prendre la ligne du RER B jusqu'à Châtelet les Halles, Métro station : Châtelet (ligne 1 Métro station: Hôtel de ville (ligne1)
access: Mes hôtes ont accès à la Wifi, TV. Ils peuvent téléphoner  partout dans le monde à condition d'appeler uniquement des numéros de  téléphones fixes.
interaction: J'accueille personnellement mes hôtes pour leur remettre les clés, leur expliquer le fonctionnement des appareils ménagers et leur rappeler le règlement. Ensuite, on peut me joindre à tout moment sur mon téléphone (URL HIDDEN) suis toujours disponible pour apporter mon aide,  donner des renseignements à mes hôtes afin de rendre leur séjour inoubliable.
house_rules: Il est interdit de jeter : Tampax ; mégots de cigarettes et autres objets inappropriés dans les toilettes.Utiliser uniquement du papier toilette, sous peine d'inondation. Un dépannage coûte 500 euros. Cet appartement est non fumeur, mais vous avez la possibilité de fumer sur le balcon. Le téléphone fixe est à la disposition des voyageurs mais il est uniquement réservé aux appels sur un autre téléphone fixe n'importe ou dans le monde.
host_about:
Mon appartement est calme, lumineux, plein sud, sans vis-à-vis, un vrai nid dans le ciel, idéal pour un séjour en amoureux.

Dans ma rue, si vous aimez la cuisine traditionnelle française, vous pourrez vous restaurer dans l'un des derniers vrais bistrots parisiens, le fameux restaurant gastronomique "Chez Benoit", repris par le grand chef Alain Ducasse. 
Ce restaurant, devenu une véritable institution, existe depuis 1912.

Plus branché : "Le Georges", un établissement tout en haut du centre Georges-Pompidou. Vous dînerez dans un décor raffiné et extrêmement moderne avec vue à couper le souffle sur  tout Paris. 

Plus cool, le "Café Beaubourg" en bas de la maison. C'est le lieu idéal 
pour prendre un petit déjeuner, un verre, un lunch et même dîner. C'est le rendez-vous chic des artistes branchés. Vous aurez la chance d'y croiser des personnalités.

Le Marais, est le seul quartier  de Paris ou l'on peut faire son shopping le dimanche dans les boutiques les plus branchées de la capitale. 
Les parisiens adorent s'y retrouver pour un brunch. La rue des Rosiers, est un lieu emblématique de la communauté juive, ou vous pourrez déguster leurs fameuses spécialités culinaires.

A l'heure du Tea time, je vous recommande le salon de thé "Mariage Frères". Maison de thé parisienne depuis 1854. Le décor est magnifique, le thé est raffiné et d'excellente qualité. 30 rue du bourg Tibourg Paris IVe

Découvrez le grand magasin préféré des parisiens, le mythique BHV Rivoli, ouvert tous les jours sauf le dimanche.

De chez moi, vous pourrez visiter Paris à pieds, L'Ile St Louis et Notre Dame; le quartier Latin ;

transit: The best metro is Jules Joffrin on line 12 (direct to Montmartre, Galeries Lafayettes/Printemps, St Lazare train station, Ave des Champs-Elysees, St-Germain quarter, Montparnasse...) Simplon (line 4) is also extremely close (direct to Paris Nord train station, Notre Dame, Latin Quarter...) Bus 80 from Jules Joffrin will take you direct to Champs-Elysees, Eiffel Tower.  Bus 31 from Jules Joffrin will take you direct to the Arc de Triomphe.
access: Guests will have access to the entire apartment. Please note that we have a 2-year old cat Willow who may be sharing the space with you! If so we just ask that you feed her twice per day.
interaction: I or one of my dear friends will check guests in and out of the apartment. We'll walk through any specifics (using washer, oven, door buzzer & intercom, extendable table, convertible couch, etc.), details about the cat, and answer any questions. We will be reachable by phone or email during your entire stay.
house_rules: Smokers: please smoke on balcony only. We want this to be home for you, so treat our apartment as if it were your own (but please be respectful).  And of course... ENJOY PARIS!
host_about:
I had a slight obsession with the movie ‘Moulin Rouge!’ and then 'Amelie' so about 4 and a half years ago I decided to move to Paris from Chicago. I thought I'd only be studying abroad for a semester, but now it's been over six years...

I absolutely adore Paris and I work for a tourism company so part of my job is learning more about it! There are some fascinating stories and legends (have you heard of the demonic doors of Notre Dame?!).

Sometimes I contemplate moving back to Chicago but then I think of baguettes and almond croissants, cheese shops, daily markets, museums, Sacre Coeur and the view over the city, walking in the parks and along the Seine... and I know my time here is not yet finished.

I haven't had as much of a chance to travel around Europe as some of my friends, though I have loved Brussels, Bruges, Amsterdam, Cadiz, London, Budapest... but for all of my long vacations I go back to Chicago to visit friends and family.

space: Located on one of the main avenues leading to Place de la Bastille and The Opera Bastille, and  1 block from the Marais, this apartment is on the 5rd (Lift) and last floor of a nearly 20st Century walk up building, in a very lively area, protected from overlook by a large central reservation, very quiet night and day. It has been entirely refurbished by an architect in 2011. You come in a very light and spacious flat; It has a large open space with high ceilings.The fully equipped kitchen is opened to a large living room. The double-glazed windows are facing trees, rooftops and Sacré-Cœur Basilica. You can access the circular private balcony with a spectacular 270° view of Paris from every room.   Continuing to the more private part:Bedroom, with double-glazed windows, a king size bed, a unique Art Deco chest of drawers  and armchair. Bathroom and toilet are independent, like the laundry with a washing machine.  Situated a few steps away from the Place des Vosges and its fine art galle

Gare de Lyon, Line 1 and 8 are also in walking distance.  From the Airports, I would recommend the shuttles if you are many, and the RER B to Gare du Nord if you are alone (50 mn).
house_rules: Maximum 4 guests. All clean linens and towels are provided. Free phone calls to 100 different countries, including US mobile phones  Gay-Friendly No pets, except mine ;-)  No loud music, arguments or partying. Guests are expected to be well behaved and not to intimidate or offend any of the other residents. Flexible Check-in/ Check-out You will find a welcome book with all information about the apartment and points of interest in the neighbourhood.
host_about:
Hi! I'm sales manager in hospitality & digital marketing. I live in Paris, love it and know it quite well. I can help you plan your journey in this wonderful city and give you both tourist and non-tourist good addresses. 
I like to travel and visit cities: Living in an apartment instead of an hotel is the best way to feel the ambiance!  Decoration is very personal, so that you can really feel the typical parisian luxury but trendy style ! 
Not to mention "Luna", my lovely she cat. She will contribute to your memorable experience in my flat. 

I like my guests to take care of my apartment and I do the same when we travel in others houses.

Welcome home!

space: Situated within one of Paris chicest and safest areas, the 16th Arrondissement, and close to the eiffel tower, this studio which is very calm and comfortable will give you the perfect spot from which you can explore all of Paris. It's located on the groundfloor and has a separate entrance,so you'll have your full privacy. Fully renovated in 2012 the Studio consists of one main room (20m²) with two windows, one coach which can easily be turned into a real bed for two persons, a working corner with a desk and a computer. You will have free Wifi access all times. A shower and a toilet can be found in the separated bathroom. You'll also have a small kitchen corner, which is fully equipped and allows you to prepare your breakfast and dinner. The neighboorhood, in which the studio is located, is very charming and you'll have everything you need just around the corner: the famous french boulangeries where you can buy your croissant in the morning, a lot of small cafes, restaurants, shops and

space: Entrée avec WC séparé, salon avec cuisine américaine et canapé-lit double, chambre côté cour avec lit 160 et espace bureau, salle de bains avec douche italienne, accès internet, linge fourni. Au pied de l'immeuble, bar restaurant, station vélib. In a 5 mm walk range there are several places for food-shops and groceries, rue du Poteau, rue Ordener with an open market two times a week, around metro station Guy Moquet with a number of different quality shops, bars with Sunday brunch in a typically Parisian atmosphere away from purely touristic places.  15 mm walk will take you to the bus climbing on la butte Montmartre. The famous Clignancourt greatest Marché aux Puces is 15 mm walk also.

host_about:
Notre métier d'archéologues nous a amenés tous les deux à beaucoup voyager surtout en Europe, Orient et Asie Centrale et sommes très habitués à recevoir des amis étrangers, de cultures diverses. Nous avons des liens familiaux avec la Pologne, la Norvège, la Suède et l'Angleterre. Nous apprécions les relations simples, attentionnées et basées sur la confiance réciproque. Nous aimons faire la cuisine, les huîtres, le vin et le cognac, la musique (classique et musique du monde), les livres, les balades à vélo, le jardinage............ 

Our profession,archaeologists, led us both to travel a lot, mostly in Europe, the Middle-East And Central Asia and we are thus used to welcoming foreign friends from different cultures. We have family links with Poland, Norway, Sweden and Great Britain. We appreciate simple relationships based on mutual trust. We like cooking, oysters, wine and cognac, books, music, bike trips, garden.....

space: Located in the charming « bo-bo » ( Bourgeois-Bohème) neighbourhood of Canal St Martin, situated in central Paris, this two rooms apartment will offer you a real Parisian expérience. The Marais historical area is within walking distance, and the subway will get you easily around Paris. Métro station Republique ( 3 mns from the apartment ) Lines : 3, 11, 9, 5, 8 Station Gare de l’est (10 mns from the apartment ) Lines : 5, 7, 4 Station Gare du nord ( 15 mns from the apartment)  Eurostar, Thalys terminals and RER B which leads to Roissy-Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports. The Canal st Martin area is well known for its upcoming fashion boutiques, traditional local grocery stores including one of Paris’s best Boulangeries (bakery ) and many delicious restaurants and bars. The apartment is situated on the 4th floor of a typicaly Haussmanian 19th century building. Very Bright and calm it offers a nice living room with a comfortable double sofa bed, a bedroom with a double bed, a large bathr

To get to the apartment from Airports ( 45/50 min): -CDG Roissy Charles de Gaulle and Orly airports: Take RER B train to Gare du Nord staion (30/40min) then you can either walk to the apartment or take the subway in Gare du Nord station: line 5 ( direction Place d'italie ) stop at Jacques Bonsergent station (2nd station ) you will exit in Rue de Lancry, take it on the left, take the 2nd on your right : Rue Yves Toudic, then 2nd on you left it is Rue Beaurepaire! Go at Number 18 of the street ! -From Beauvais airport (1h30min): You have to take a bus from Beauvais airport to Porte Maillot ( 1 hour ), from porte Maillot take the subway: Line 1 ( direction Chateau de Vincennes ) stop at Bastille station , change to Line 5 ( direction Bobigny ) and stop at Republique station. Take the Exit Rue du Faubourg du temple. When you exit take Ru
interaction: I will welcome you in the apartment, explain how to use all the features offered, answer all your questions and also recommend good places in the area. I will also be reachable during your stay to answer any questions you might have!
house_rules: I will be pleased to welcome you in my apartment, and would like you to spend a great time in Paris. Of course i want you to feel at home and on the other side it is normal to treat the apartment as if it was yours. Leave it as clean as possible and treat it right! Please respect the following instructions for the tranquility of the neighborhood.  ⎫Respect your neighbours and try to be ingood terms with them (courtesy and discretion). ⎫Avoid making noise in common areas when carrying luggage in the stairs, slamming the front door, running in the stairs, ... ⎫Do not make too much noise in the apartment which would disturb the neighbours: music or TV volume too high, slamming doors, talkingloudly with the windows open... )Respect the common rule in France to avoid making noise after 10pm. ⎫Follow the instructions and regulations posted in the building. ⎫Do not smoke or throw cigarettes in public areas of the building. ⎫Do not leave rubbish, paper or cigarette butts in public areas (stair
host_about: Travel, music, food ! I am looking forward to welcome you, if you have any question, feel free to ask.

host_about:
Hello, 
I live in this big house that I built in 2010.
I live theire with my family, Romain is 20, Marine is 18, Anne Charlotte is 16 and Antoine is 14. We enjoy having guest on the second flor. We like music (we play flute, piano and saxo), we like climbing.  Romain likes mechanical and physics, he studies to become ingineer. Marine likes modern Art. Anne Charlotte likes to read, and Antoine likes to play football and rugby.

space: This 48m² (516 ft²) apartment will comfortably fit 4 people: - Calm and quiet bedroom (no street noise), with double bed (190x140cm). Large collection of books, including books about Paris and books in English. - Spacious living room with futon (190x120cm), flat screen TV, large area to eat and plan your trips, and even a private bar, to make yourself a cocktail after a long day of sightseeing ! - Modern, fully equipped kitchen, with induction cooktop, oven, microwave, fridge, freezer, toaster, Nespresso, blender, orange juice maker... - Bathroom with shower, double sink (his & hers), large mirror, hair dryer, iron board, etc. Towels are provided.
description: The perfect place for your next stay in Paris ! Central location (Eiffel Tower - 7th district), 2 min away from Métro (Ecole Militaire) and Rue Cler (restaurants & shops), this fully equipped flat comfortably hosts 4 people. transit: - Parking: plenty of street parking around Ecole Militaire and Champ de Mars. Street parking is free on Sundays, evenings (8pm to 9am), and bank holidays. In addition they are two outdoor and one underground paying parking in front of the building ('Vinci Parking') - Métro: 2 stations: "Ecole Militaire" (line 8) and "La Motte-Picquet - Grenelle" (lines 6, 8, 10). - Bus: lines 28, 80, 82 and 87, and 92. - Vélib (bike share): 4 nearby stations. - Metro & Bus maps in the flat. - Roissy and CDG airports shuttle stop is located 10min away. Search online 'Le Bus Direct'
access: - You'll have everything you need : Washer, Dryer, Wi-Fi, even a private bar ! - We provide you with sheets, blankets, towels, and shampoo... If there's anything else you need in preparation for your visit, please don't hesitate to ask!
interaction: The flat will be all yours during the stay, you'll have the keys. I will be available to answer any questions you may have.
house_rules: Please keep the appartement clean, be nice with the neighbors by avoiding noise, and avoid smoking in the bedroom, there is a smoke/monoxyde detector!

Bonjour !
Paris is a great city, and I hope you will have a great time here.

A bientôt !

Excellent public transport links provide easy access to the main business and leisure locations (metro Anvers). The flat is very clean and comfortable, very charming with original old ninetheen century stones and red bricks walls. The flat is 35m2, one bedroom with quality bed, one living room with open kitchen and a 2 people sofa-bed. Nice white terracotta metro like bathroom. Fully equipped kitchen: a coffee grinder, kettle, oven, refrigerator. The flat has internet wifi connection. From two to four people can be accomodated. The bedroom is very calm and so you can rest after a exciting day! space: Ideal for holidays in Paris : the flat is wonderful and perfectly located.  The apartment is  central, making it the perfect base location for visiting Paris. With 3 Metro lines (strasbourg saint denis) and a lot of bus lines right at the doorstep, you're within reach of any touristic site in Paris . There are a lot of fine and popular restaurants, trendy cafés, boulangeries, grocery stores (discount, upscale & organic/vegetarian), and a very famous and typical yard full of barsright down the flat (cour des petites écuries).  There is  a luminous and very spacious and fully equipped kitchen ( oven, microwave, vitroceramic burners, coffee maker, toaster, all kitchen utensils). The living room is full of light  It's perfectly peaceful. space: This two-room apartment is very clean and well equipped, making it very comfortable. Ideally located in the historic Marais district, one of the finest and oldest in Paris, it is extremely quiet. This is perfect for a small family. Very close to the Centre Pompidou, the Seine, the Louvre, the Place des Vosges, the Carnavalet Museum, the Cathedral of Notre-Dame de Paris, etc.. Shops, restaurants, pharmacies, banks, bus and metro, everything is within walking distance. One bedroom with one  bed that can be a double bed or separated into 2 individual beds. The apartment has a kitchen, dining room, and bathroom (shower, sink and toilet), and is furnished with a sofa  and double bed. Also provided in the apartment is a television, DVD player and wi-fi. Upon request, we can add a cot. Clean bedsheets and towels are provided. Closest subway station is Hôtel de ville. This is a great place in the heart of Paris. Very clean and safe.

space: The flat is entirely renovated, at the 3rd floor. It is fully equiped. When you enter you have at your left the confortable room with a bed and good matress for2 people which can be converted in a sofa if you want a living room. You have everything for arranging/tidy up your stuff. At the right you have the toilets. Then you have a modern kitchen fully equiped (fridge, microwave, little oven, etc.), you can even do your laundry as there is a combined washing machine and dryer. The bathroom is at the right of the kitchen : small but very nice, good shower.
description: Lovely apartment, new, modern, clean, with everything inside, located in the best and most fascinating area of Paris :in St Germain des Prés in a well known street with many art galleries, french restaurants and bars, nice shops, etc... Please put your bin/garbage downstairs : downstairs there is a door which gives on a small courtyard and the bins.  Merci!

space: Verrière en toit et mur de pierres donnent à ce chaleureux studio de 35m² rénové un charme incontestable ! Sur cour arborée, très calme, proche Marais, Bastille et République, il peut accueillir deux personnes et un bébé (mais pas de lit parapluie fourni ni table à langer).  Vous disposez d une baignoire pour vous délasser après vos balades, ainsi que d'un grand dressing pour vos vêtements. Une machine à laver séchante et une machine Nespresso sont à votre disposition. Le quartier permet de se déplacer très vite dans Paris, à pied (Marais à 5 minutes à pieds), à vélo ou en métro (3 lignes de métros : ligne 5 Richard Lenoir, ligne 8 Saint-Sébastien-Froissart, ligne 9 Saint-Ambroise). Shopping, boulangeries, supermarché ouvert jusqu'à 22h, magasin bio, restaurants de qualité, bars animés, le quartier offre tout cela !  Les voitures trouveront des places payantes aux alentours. Appartement situé au 1er étage, très facile d accès (pas d ascenseur).

interaction: Ma proche amie Claire sera disponible pour vous accueillir et accompagner votre départ. Elle sera joignable par téléphone en cas de besoin durant votre séjour.
host_about:
Bonjour, j'ai conçu ce joli studio moi-même, il me ressemble. Après une vie dans la finance, dans le cinéma, je suis aujourd'hui professeur des écoles. 
A quelques pas du Marais et de la rue Oberkampf, dans une belle copropriété entretenue et harmonieuse, j'espère que mes hôtes se sentiront bien. C'est un endroit apaisant, préservé du tumulte parisien, qui donne sur une cour arborée et pavée. Il est baigné par la lumière de la verrière en toit, au premier et unique étage d'un escalier en bois. La salle de bains se compose d'une baignoire, des toilettes et d'un grand dressing avec machine à laver. Il a été entièrement refait à neuf en 2013 avec parquet. 
N'étant pas toujours disponible pour votre accueil, c'est ma proche amie Claire qui vous ouvrira les lieux. A bientôt j'espère, à Paris ! Marie

space: The master bedroom has a queen size bed and a flat screen TV. The second bedroom has a queen size sofa-bed.
description: You'll love staying in our apartment in central Paris! Our large (80 square meters), bright and comfortable 2-bedroom apartment is ideal for 2 couples or a family of 4. The master bedroom has a queen size bed and a flat screen TV. The second bedroom has a queen size sofa-bed. The living room is equipped with a sofa, a flat screen TV and a DVD/Blu-Ray player. Should you wish to cook, the fully equipped kitchen includes an oven, dishwasher, washing machine, Nespresso... and a small dinning table.  Hi-speed free wifi is available throughout the apartment The neighbourhood is incredibly convenient: metro and bus stops, a grocery store, an organic produce market, a bakery (with yummy croissants!) ...are located near the apartment Popular tourists attractions are only minutes away: - Bastille and République squares (5 mn walk) - Eiffel Tower (25 mn by métro) - Musée du Louvre (20 mn by métro) - the famouus Galeries Lafayette (15 mn by métro) We have included everything to make your stay comf

house_rules: Check in / out As long as you arrive during working hours, we will do our best to welcome you personally and explain you all the functional details of the flat. We will ask you to let us know as soon as possible your approximative desired check in time (or email us your flight/train details so that we can check if it is on time) and if possible your approximative desired check out time. Please also make sure that your cellphone works in France so that you can call or text us when you are approaching the apartment. Standard Check in time is (phone number hidden) pm)  Standard Check out time is (phone number hidden) am) However we are flexible on times as long as we do not have any back to back check in/outs that conflict. No guarantee unless we have your precise arrival and departure details. For arrivals after 7:30 pm (19:30) and during the weekend, there are 3 options : ● You can book a driver who will be waiting for you at your arrival at the airport or train station and will help yo
host_about:
Professional real estate agency registered in Paris.

Specialized in short term Paris vacation rental, we propose apartments in the heart of the capital with a large panel of prices.

We offer you an unique travel, closer to Parisians' life style and where you can feel like home. A business trip ? A romantic week-end in the city of love ? A family journey ?

We intend to meet all of your needs, all of your desires. Furnished and design apartments, but also customized services promise you a warm experience in Paris. We select with care charming studios in trendy neighborhoods or luxury and quiet apartments. 

Our rentals are located in every Parisian area. The apartment allows you to cook and enjoy your trip like a Parisian. 

Our team is available before, during and after your trip to make your life easier.

Je pratique régulièrement l'escalade et le trekking et voyage régulièrement dans ces espaces de pleine nature en France et à l'étranger.

space: ★In the tradition of "True Parisian" charm, this studio with exposed wooden beams throughout and an exposed stone wall is the essence of the Paris of yesteryear. Though recently renovated, the apartment has a hint of 'modest luxury' without giving false impressions. It's a cosy, comfortable space with a high ceiling that gives you space to breathe and relax. Apartment is on 1st floor on pedestrian street (no elevator).
description: This central apartment is perfect for whatever the reason may be for your stay in Paris. A cocoon of 23sqm but with all necessities included (bathroom, kitchenette...). ★In the tradition of "True Parisian" charm, this studio with exposed wooden beams throughout and an exposed stone wall is the essence of the Paris of yesteryear. Though recently renovated, the apartment has a hint of 'modest luxury' without giving false impressions. It's a cosy, comfortable space with a high ceiling that gives you space to breathe and relax. Apartment is on 1st floor on pedestrian street (no elevator). ★ This will be your very own apartment in one of the oldest arrondissements in Paris - Montorgueil.  In the apartment you will have WI-FI access, digital TV and a phone line with free calling to 100 countries land lines.  In the kitchen, you will find everything you need from tea, coffee & sugar to cutlery, plates and glasses. There will also be milk and water in the fridge ready for you to use and cookwa
transit: ★ Getting to the apartment from the 2 major airports is easy as the RER B services both Roissy Charles de Gaulle and Paris Orly. The RER B brings you to the centre of Paris, Chatelet Les Halles, then you can either walk from there or take line 4 to the closest metro station Réaumur Sébastopol. Paris really is a city for those that love to walk, and this location is perfect to do just that. However, there are vélib rental bikes just outside the apartment as well as the metro station around the corner. Wherever you wish to visit, you have many choices in finding a way to get there. Tourist attractions like the Louvre, Notre Dame, la Seine, Opera Garnier, Galeries Lafayette, Jardins des Tuileries, Concorde and Avenue des Champs-Elysées are all accessible from here.
access: ★ This will be your very own apartment in one of the oldest arrondissements in Paris - Montorgueil.  In the apartment you will have WI-FI access, digital TV and a phone line with free calling to 100 countries land lines.  In the kitchen, you will find everything you need from tea, coffee & sugar to cutlery, plates and glasses. There will also be milk and water in the fridge ready for you to use and cookware should you feel the urge.. Or if you manage to resist the many great cafés and restaurants literally at your doorstep. The bathroom has a shower/bath and toilet and you will have an ample supply of towels for your use.  You will also find the usual toiletries, and yes there is even a hairdryer.
interaction: ★ We've enjoyed meeting every one of our guests who have stayed with us at the Love Nest by the Canal, and this won't be any different.  On arrival, we will be there to welcome you in and take you through the necessary details of the apartment, the building and the area. Depending on your energy level, we would be happy to take you on a quick tour of the neighbourhood to get your bearings.. But we totally understand if you just want to kick back, relax and prepare for the following few days. If you need anything while you're here, we are just 3 stops away on the metro so we're close by.
house_rules: Not a big list as we're sure it's common sense to everyone. Basically: - no smoking inside the studio. It has just been renovated but more importantly Duncan is asthmatic and his nose knows.  - no pets allowed in the apartment. Duncan has allergies so once again his nose will know. - respect and treat the apartment as you would expect us to respect and treat your own.  - soiled towels or linen (makeup, blood, wine...) will need to be replaced and will be charged against the security deposit. - please communicate with us as soon as possible, should something go wrong (soiled or broken items) during your stay, so we can try to fix it as soon as possible. There is access to the outdoor rooftop area from stairs should you need a cigarette fix. When making a booking, please have a verified email address and phone number on your airbnb.com account first. Unfortunately we cannot offer a late check-out or early check-in. Also, you will not be able to leave your bags at the apartment after chec
host_about:
Hi there,

Been doing AirBNB since Feb 2013 and what I've seen so far I have loved! This is a great way to meet people and I can't wait to take my own trip using this site. It's certainly a good option if you're after something a little different during your holiday.

Enjoy your travels wherever they may take you and maybe we will see you some time.

Cheers,

Duncan & Pierre.

space: Our appartement is a beautiful duplex decorated by true Parisians. Our huge living room (40m2) is really bright with a small balcony to enjoy sitting outside during the sunny days.  The loft has AC, a home cinema and stereo system.    The open kitchen is fully equipped with dishwasher, microwave, oven etc. The dining table for 6 can be extended to fit 8 persons. The bathroom has a separate toilet with washing machine and dryer.  We have 4 bedrooms (master bedroom for 2, mezzanine for 2 and 2 bedrooms for 1) fitting 6 people. 1 additional guest (kid or teenager) would be possible on an additional futon or on the 3 seats sofa in the living room (max. 7 guests). Everything to make your stay super nice. please send a message before making your reservation, it is always better to check that evtg is ok for your group.
description: Live like a Parisian in the center of Paris (Place Monge), a few minutes away from the Rue Mouffetard, the Panthéon, the Sorbonne University, the Luxembourg Garden, Notre-Dame de Paris, the Seine, the Odeon cinemas and cafés and Saint Germain des prés. Our top floor sunny duplex will charm you with its location and decoration. Our appartement is a beautiful duplex decorated by true Parisians. Our huge living room (40m2) is really bright with a small balcony to enjoy sitting outside during the sunny days.  The loft has AC, a home cinema and stereo system.    The open kitchen is fully equipped with dishwasher, microwave, oven etc. The dining table for 6 can be extended to fit 8 persons. The bathroom has a separate toilet with washing machine and dryer.  We have 4 bedrooms (master bedroom for 2, mezzanine for 2 and 2 bedrooms for 1) fitting 6 people. 1 additional guest (kid or teenager) would be possible on an additional futon or on the 3 seats sofa in the living room (max. 7 guests). Eve
transit: Subway: Place Monge on Line 7 (1 min. walking) or Cardinal Lemoine on Line 10 (7 min. walking) Bus 47: Place Monge  Orly Airport: 30 min. by taxi  Roissy CDG Airport: 45 min. by taxi  Gare de l'Est: line 7  20 min by metro Gare du Nord: line 4 + line 7 30 min by metro Gare de Lyon: bus 63 + 47
access: The whole house except my office on the 6th floor Is available. The piano is also not for guests.
interaction: We will be there if possible to welcome you and give you all the information you need about the apartment and help you organize your visit in paris : museums, restaurants, cafes, bakeries etc.
house_rules: no shoes inside no piano playing, no pets, no smoking, no late noise.
host_about:
Bonjour
Je suis passionnée d'opéra mais aussi de cinéma et de voyages et maman de trois enfants. J'aime me sentir chez moi à l'étranger et j'espère que vous aurez ce même sentiment en louant mon appartement. 

Hi, 
I am an opera singer, fan of art and travels. I am often traveling for my job and really like to feel at home in foreign countries. I hope you will feel the same at our home.

description: Our lovely and comfortable family house with a private garden in a court, located 5mn walk from the Eiffel Tower, makes you fell in the same time "in the countryside and in The heart of Paris" . It comfortably fits 5-7 (4 bedrooms) and is very quiet. The house is independent in a court, where 5-7 people can comfortable live. It's really quiet, but close to a lively and very safe area the "rue du Commerce" You will get access to our house, as if you were at your home; all commodities are available.  We'll welcome you and give you ideas and tips to enjoy your stay in the neighborhood and in Paris in general with the addresses we love...  the Neighborhood is daily very lively with all proximity shops you should need (bakery, butcher, supermarket, pharmacy...) and quite central with access to 3 main metro lines: number 6 to Trocadero and Champs Elysee, number 8 to Invalides, Concorde, Republique, number 10 to Saint Germain des Prés... the public transit is very easy and we do have a parkin

Merci de respecter les lieux et le matériel. Laisser l'appartement dans l'état de rangement et de propreté tel que vous l'avez trouvé. Leave the flaps and the small window open when you are not in the apartment. For smokers, please smoke outside on the balcony and put your butts in the ashtrays. Please respect the place and equipment. Leave the apartment as you found it.

Jeune parisienne passionnée de musique et de voyages.

host_about:
Bonjour :-)

I know very well this feeling when you arrive in an unfamiliar place, to be the prey of "tourist trap" or coming across lousy service shops for lack of knowing the right addresses as a local .
That is why I think it is very important to welcome you by myself, to show the environment, to tell where to go, what to do, to take advantage immediately of your stay, saving you from disappointment and waste of time .

It is also an opportunity for me to share with people I would never meet otherwise!
In my opinion, Human relationships are the greatest wealth in life.
In my host experience, guests profile were really interesting to discover, and I have learned so much thanks to this special contact.
I feel grateful for this enrichment.

Living nearby, you can be reassured of my availability when querying before and during your stay.

Contact me! And I'llsee you soon in the most beautiful city in the world! :-)

Proposer un logement est une opportunité de partager avec des personnes que je n'aurais jamais rencontré par ailleurs!
Les relations humaines sont selon moi la plus grande des richesses.
Les profils des guests qui ont séjourné ici furent très différent. J'ai beaucoup appris à leur contact, et je suis reconnaissante de cet enrichissement.
Vivant à proximité, soyez assuré de ma disponibilité si besoin est, avant et pendant votre séjour.

Contactez-moi! Et au plaisir de vous accueillir sur place :-)

space: This double room, welcoming flat can comfortably accomodate 2 persons. The kitchen is fully equipped with microwave and coffee machine. (of course : plate, glass, pot, spoon, fourks...) Tea, coffee, oil, vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper....(all basic condiment) are available in the cupboard. You can eat the chocolate too :-) In the little shower room, you'll find soap, shampoo and clean towels.  There is a real bed for 2 people (1.40X1.90m). Of course, sheets are provided. Internet wireless (wifi) is available.
description: This double room flat is very charming and perfectly clean.  It's very easy to go everywhere in Paris because the station Stalingrad is the node of 3 metro lines. (2, 5, 7) This double room, welcoming flat can comfortably accomodate 2 persons. The kitchen is fully equipped with microwave and coffee machine. (of course : plate, glass, pot, spoon, fourks...) Tea, coffee, oil, vinegar, sugar, salt, pepper....(all basic condiment) are available in the cupboard. You can eat the chocolate too :-) In the little shower room, you'll find soap, shampoo and clean towels.  There is a real bed for 2 people (1.40X1.90m). Of course, sheets are provided. Internet wireless (wifi) is available. It's on the first floor and there is no elevator. The area is popular but totally safe. There is a grocery shop (Franprix) where you can find everything you need just in the front of the building. It's only 2 minutes from the Stalingrad station. So it's direct for Opéra, Louvre Museum, Triumph arch, Montmartre, P
transit: It's only 2 minutes from the Stalingrad station. So it's direct for Opéra, Louvre Museum, Triumph arch, Montmartre, Père Lachaise Cimetery, Bastille or for the shopping in the "grands magasins". There is only one station from Gare du Nord and two from Gare de l'est. So it's easy to come from Roissy-CDG or Orly Airports.
access: It's on the first floor and there is no elevator.
house_rules: No animals (even if i like them) and no cigarettes please. And be clean, thanks.
host_about:
Bonjour ! 

Je suis prof et je loue mon appartement pendant les vacances scolaires et parfois le week-end.
J'aime le cinéma, le sport... et les desserts ! ;) 
Pour le sport : course à pied (2H42 au marathon ! pas mal non ?), natation et volley.
Pour le cinéma : sautet, cassavetes, chaplin...
Pour les desserts: les glaces avec Roman, les tiramisu de Roland, les tartes au citron de Théo et mes crèpes à moi.
