space: Cet appartement situé RDC d'un immeuble (avec digicode) donnant sur une petite rue calme, vous ravira, vous vous y sentirez comme chez vous et comme de vrais parisiens. Idéal pour un couple.
description: In a convivial Parisian area, at the groundfloor of a peaceful building, this large studio offers an open kitchen, a dining area, a comfortable double bed and a bathroom (tube bath). All is NEW. An individual service is provided at your arrival. Cet appartement situé RDC d'un immeuble (avec digicode) donnant sur une petite rue calme, vous ravira, vous vous y sentirez comme chez vous et comme de vrais parisiens. Idéal pour un couple. Vous y trouverez en entrant un coin salle à manger (avec table et chaises, pouvant servir aussi de bureau) ouvert sur la grande pièce à vivre avec un coin salon (table basse et fauteuils) et un coin chambre avec un lit double, rangements, WIFI  gratuit. Ce coin salle à manger donne aussi sur la cuisine moderne entièrement équipée (plaques vitro céramiques, four, frigo, cafetière, grille-pain, ustensiles et vaisselle, grand plan de travail). Petit dressing. Salle de bain avec baignoire, lavabo, WC, rangements et lave-linge. La personne en charge de l'apparte
transit: Les transports : Porte de Vanves ligne 13 (à 4 stations de la gare Montparnasse)/ Tramway 3a (à 10mn de la Porte de Versailles) et les bus : 95, 89, 62 …vous transportent en moins de 20 mn dans le centre de Paris (Montparnasse, St Germain des prés, Champs Elysées, Opéra, le Louvre, la Seine…gare Saint Lazare, d'Austerlitz…)

transit: *** 10/15 mins BY TRAIN from Paris/Gare du Nord/Montmartre,  The flat is only 5mn on foot (500m / 1600ft) from the train station (Deuil-montmagny). You'll need to take only one train to go to Paris (Gare Du Nord station). The train-ride to Paris lasts for only 10/15 mins. Trains run every 15 mins. Last train from Paris center : 00:49 (one of the last train/metro in Paris at night). *** 10 mins away from Enghien-les-bains by bus (25mn walking) : lake, casino, mineral baths, spa, racetracks, swimming pool . Very beautiful city, see photos. ***5/10mn train ride to Saint-Denis Station (Close to Stade de France).
access: You have complete access to the rest of the flat (kitchen, dining room, living room, bathroom, toilets). Included in the price :  water, electricity, internet/wifi, clean sheets, phone (Free to call to almost every country. There are only a few exceptions so just ask me) Basic breakfast : tea & coffee. There are supermarkets, bakeries, pizzas, kebabs near the place. I'll show you where. You can put your stuff in the cupboards, and in the fridge of course :) Bathroom products are not included.
interaction: I will help you as much as I can! You can ask me any questions about Paris, and I'm always available on my phone if you get lost or need anything!
house_rules: There are other people staying in the flat, so please don't make too much noise if you come home late, or wake up early. Stay clean, clean after yourself. No smoking in the flat. Check-out at 12, if you want you can leave your bags after in my living room, keep one set of keys, but clear your bed before 12!
host_about:
In a cute and safe city, just outside Paris Center, I rent two private rooms and four beds in a shared room.
You can consider it as a small hostel, with one bathroom and one toilet, one kitchen and one living room, all shared.
Fantastic way to meet people all around the world !

I am a 28 years old girl, and I'll be available 24H/24 to help you before, during and after your stay !

space: Extremely central location, walking distance from shops, restaurants, bars, the city center, and the historic city. Les Halles is two minutes away by foot, the Centre Pompidou, the Marais is 10 minutes away and the Louvre is at 15 minutes. The neighborhood Châtelet les Halles is a central neighborhood; as for the Forum des Halles, it's an immense underground shopping mall.  You also have two renowned theaters: the Théâtre de la Ville and the Théâtre du Châtelet. Heading West by foot, you have the Pont Neuf, which leads you directly to Saint Michel, and if you continue on you'll arrive at Saint Germain des Prés. The Eglise Saint-Eustache is found just behind the Forum des Halles, not far from the Rue Montorgueil, one of the hippest streets of Paris where a number of artists live. This neighborhood is ideal because of its location, it's an vibrant area at night, perfect for having a drink, eating a crêpe, shopping, or listening to jazz... It's the most accessible and serviced area of Par

Les Halles is two minutes away by foot, the Centre Pompidou, the Marais is 10 minutes away and the Louvre is at 15 minutes. space: Beautiful modern apartment in the trendy, up&coming 11th arrondissement, right next door to historical Pere Lachaise cemetery .  Centrally located and tucked away from over-crowded, over-expensive tourist areas, the 47meters squared apartment consists of a cozy bedroom, a large bathroom with a bathtub, a fully-equipped kitchen, and a spacious living room.  The apartment faces the co-op's charming courtyard, which guarantees absolute silence and tranquility.
description: Our bright and open 47 square meter apartment with a courtyard view is on a charming traditional street, in the heart of the 11th arrondissement. Enjoy a calm chill space in one of the most "branché" areas of Paris! Beautiful modern apartment in the trendy, up&coming 11th arrondissement, right next door to historical Pere Lachaise cemetery .  Centrally located and tucked away from over-crowded, over-expensive tourist areas, the 47meters squared apartment consists of a cozy bedroom, a large bathroom with a bathtub, a fully-equipped kitchen, and a spacious living room.  The apartment faces the co-op's charming courtyard, which guarantees absolute silence and tranquility. We have a queen-sized artisan-crafted mattress which was made specifically to support and form to the shape of the body, while retaining ultimate softness and plush.  Not too hard, not too soft…just right!   The couch in the living room easily transforms into a comfortable queen-sized bed, large enough for two people.
transit: The advantage of being next to the metro line 9 and line 2 is that it takes you directly to Paris must-sees, like the Eiffel tower, the Champs-Elysee, Les Galeries Lafayette, or the red light district in Pigalle.
access: We have a queen-sized artisan-crafted mattress which was made specifically to support and form to the shape of the body, while retaining ultimate softness and plush.  Not too hard, not too soft…just right!   The couch in the living room easily transforms into a comfortable queen-sized bed, large enough for two people.   You'll also find at your disposal: -a washing machine -a heater in every room  -sheets and blankets for 4 people -towels for 4 people -Kitchen for people who love to cook (stove, oven, fridge, freezer, microwave, cooking accessories, spices, sauces, cutlery, toaster, coffee-machine)  The apartment building has automatic doors (helpful when hands are full of baggage or goodies from the market!) and a new elevator.  There is guardian on duty from monday-friday.
interaction: We are always happy to get to know our guests, and talk with new travelers!
host_about: My name is Maya, I'm American and have been living in Paris for the past 3 years.  I live with my boyfriend, Dimitri, who is Parisian and has lived in Paris his entire life.  We are a young couple who both work/study in the arts.  We love Paris, and are lucky to live in a trendy, up and coming area with lots of cool galleries and restaurants.  We look forward to giving you our recommendations!

space: Our early 20th century property with beautiful high mounded ceilings, original fireplaces and typically large windows was completely renovated in early 2014 and provides 39 m2 of bright living area in two rooms, a bedroom with large double bed (140 cm) and a lounge with sofa bed (125 cm), a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with bath and shower. The apartment is equipped with Wifi.
description: A beautifully appointed apartment on the 6th floor of a typical Haussman designed building in a vibrant Parisian neighberhood just 20 meters from the Place Gambetta and very close to the Père Lachaise. Our early 20th century property with beautiful high mounded ceilings, original fireplaces and typically large windows was completely renovated in early 2014 and provides 39 m2 of bright living area in two rooms, a bedroom with large double bed (140 cm) and a lounge with sofa bed (125 cm), a fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with bath and shower. The apartment is equipped with Wifi. Access is via the elevator to the 4th floor and then a pretty covered exterior staircase to the 6th floor and your romantic and comfortable nest, the starting point of your romance with Parisian life. You will be very close to the famous Pere Lachaise cemetery ( tombs of Edith Piaf, Oscar Wilde, Jim Morrison, Chopin, Molière and many more). There is a cinema close by, near to the Théâtre de La Colline and ma
transit: The area is extremely well served by public transport, the building is just 20 meters from the Metro and then just 5 minutes or so to the heart of Paris, the Notre Dame, Le Opera. Galleries Lafayette, Printemps and the many fashion, antiques and arts & crafts shops. There are direct bus lines to nearly all the major places of interest and a taxi rank and bicycle hire stand in the Place Gambetta.
access: Access is via the elevator to the 4th floor and then a pretty covered exterior staircase to the 6th floor and your romantic and comfortable nest, the starting point of your romance with Parisian life. You will be very close to the famous Pere Lachaise cemetery ( tombs of Edith Piaf, Oscar Wilde, Jim Morrison, Chopin, Molière and many more). There is a cinema close by, near to the Théâtre de La Colline and many notable restaurants including The Chantefable, Aux Petits Onions, Chez Charlotte, Mama Shelter.....

space: Appartement situé au 1er. étage avec ascenseur. Toutes les fenêtres sont en double vitrages ce qui vous assure d'une tranquilité totale.
description: - En plein cœur de Paris entre quartier "Des Halles","Beaubourg" & "le Marais",un très bel appartement, entièrement refait à neuf, tout confort.  Dans le Paris historique, un immeuble du XIXème siècle, au premier étage avec ascenseur,lumineux,entièrement insonorisé (double-vitrage).  Vous êtes au Centre de la Capital, où vous trouverez tous les commerces (traiteurs, boulangerie, pâtissiers, ...) et services (Parking sous-terrain gardé à 50m, banques, transports, sortie nocturnes etc.…..). Les principales lignes de Métro, Bus et RER sont à proximité immédiate (150m).  Ne gâchez pas vos dernières heures à Paris, nous faisons le ménage pour 40.-€ et pouvons garder vos bagages si vous le désirez.  Appartement de prestige,literie de grande qualité (160cmX200cm et 90cmX200cm ou 180cmX200cm), beaux volumes, cuisine équipée, 2 WC dont un séparé. - Téléphone gratuit vers Fixes (100 pays); - Support pour votre"I.Pod ou I.Phone" Appartement situé au 1er. étage avec ascenseur. Toutes les fenêtres

It consists of a large dining room with a fully equipped kitchen with all appliances ( 4 ring gas hob, electric oven , fridge- freezer, dishwasher, washing machine dryer, and all necessary utensils for cooking ) and a table for 4 people. The bathroom with shower is one side of the bedroom and the separate WC on the other. The bedrom has hanging space and a double bed. There is also a workshop area to work in peace.
description: Fantastic Artist apartment in Belleville,  (60 m2) in the picturesque neighborhood of Belleville. Studio flat, glass, stone and brick, full of charm and comfort, with the option to dine in a courtyard. Located 300 metres from the Buttes Chaumont Park Comfortable one bedroom apartment with double glazing on the inner courtyard and no traffic noise. It consists of a large dining room with a fully equipped kitchen with all appliances ( 4 ring gas hob, electric oven , fridge- freezer, dishwasher, washing machine dryer, and all necessary utensils for cooking ) and a table for 4 people. The bathroom with shower is one side of the bedroom and the separate WC on the other. The bedrom has hanging space and a double bed. There is also a workshop area to work in peace. With its windows , its stone and brick , this studio flat benefits from the bustling picturesque Belleville along the quiet courtyard . A wide selection of restaurants nearby. Supermarket, café, restaurant, wine cellar  and bakery
transit: Il est à 3 minutes de la station de métro Pyrénées (ligne 11) vous êtes ainsi à 10 min en métro du Châtelet, le cœur de Paris (Centre Pompidou, Quartier du Marais, la Seine, Notre-Dame de Paris). 20 mn de la gare St Lazare direct par le Bus 26.
access: With its windows , its stone and brick , this studio flat benefits from the bustling picturesque Belleville along the quiet courtyard . A wide selection of restaurants nearby. Supermarket, café, restaurant, wine cellar  and bakery within fifty metres as is the Pharmacy. Located 3 minutes from the Parc des Buttes Chaumont and just 5 minutes from Parc de Belleville. Several points of view on Paris, the esplanade overlooking the Parc de Belleville on the Sacré cœur, and the Eiffel Tower illuminated.  It is 3 minutes from the station Pyrénées Metro (line 11) and you are 10 minutes by metro from Chatelet, the heart of Paris (Centre Pompidou, the Marais, the Seine, Notre-Dame de Paris).  Live 20 minutes from St Lazare station by Bus 26.
house_rules: Appartement non-fumeur. Merci de laisser l'appartement dans l'état dans lequel vous le trouverez (propre et rangé). Merci également de penser que des gens habitent dans l'immeuble. Evitez de faire du bruit la nuit ou d'organiser des fêtes. Les visiteurs autres que ceux qui voyagent avec vous ne sont pas acceptés.  Rappels de bon sens : le vin rouge tache, utilisez une soucoupe sous le verre. Il y a des planches pour découper la nourriture, ne pas laisser les radiateurs allumés quand vous êtes absents, a fortiori les fenêtres ouvertes. Eteignez les lumières quand vous quittez l'appartement. Si vous renversez un liquide ou si vous avez laissé les fenêtres ouvertes et qu'il a plu, prière d'essuyer. Thank you in advance for leaving the flat as you found it (clean and tidy).  Don't forget that people live here so refrain from making noise at night and organizing parties.  Visitors outside your group are not accepted.  Common sense remarks : red wine leaves stains, so use a coaster (or simpl
host_about:
Bonjour,
je suis Dominique, la propriétaire de cet appartement-atelier. Artiste peintre, je vis et travaille à Paris mais je voyage beaucoup, essentiellement en Asie, ce qui se ressent dans la décoration et l'ambiance de mon appartement.

space: The flat is located in a nice city just outside Paris, called Deuil-la-Barre (it only takes 10mins by train to get to the center of Paris, in Gare du Nord station). *The nearest station (5mn on foot) : Deuil-Montmagny. *The address : rue Charles de Gaulle, 95170 Deuil-la-Barre. ***5/10mn train ride to Saint-Denis Station (Close to Stade de France). ************ My name is Cindy, I'm a 27 year old girl and I'm always available by phone to help you. I rent another room for 2 on the same floor, so if it's rente

transit: *** 10/15 mins BY TRAIN from Paris/Gare du Nord/Montmartre,  The flat is only 5mn on foot (500m / 1600ft) from the train station (Deuil-montmagny). You'll need to take only one train to go to Paris (Gare Du Nord station). The train-ride to Paris lasts for only 10/15 mins. Trains run every 15 mins. Last train from center Paris : 00:49 (one of the last train/metro in Paris at night). *** 10 mins away from Enghien-les-bains by bus (25mn walking) : lake, casino, mineral baths, spa, racetracks, swimming pool . Very beautiful city, see photos. ***5/10mn train ride to Saint-Denis Station (Close to Stade de France).
access: You have complete access to the rest of the flat (kitchen, dining room, living room, bathroom, toilets). Included in the price :  water, electricity, internet/wifi, clean sheets, phone (Free to call to almost every country. There are only a few exceptions so just ask me) Basic breakfast : tea & coffee. There are supermarkets, bakeries, pizzas, kebabs near the place. I'll show you where. You can put your stuff in the cupboards, and in the fridge of course :) Bathroom products are not included.
interaction: I will help you as much as I can! You can ask me any questions about Paris, and I'm always available on my phone if you get lost or need anything!
house_rules: There are other people staying in the flat, so please don't make too much noise if you come home late, or wake up early. Stay clean, clean after yourself. No smoking in the flat. Check-out at 12, if you want you can leave your bags after in my living room, keep one set of keys, but clear your bed before 12!
host_about:
In a cute and safe city, just outside Paris Center, I rent two private rooms and four beds in a shared room.
You can consider it as a small hostel, with one bathroom and one toilet, one kitchen and one living room, all shared.
Fantastic way to meet people all around the world !

I am a 28 years old girl, and I'll be available 24H/24 to help you before, during and after your stay !

space: This studio is located on 1st floor in a quiet street in the heart of Paris.  Charming, newly renovated, fully equipped, it can accommodate up to 3 people as there are a double bed and a single bed in two different rooms.  In the main room, in addition to the double bed, there is an american kitchen, a sofa and a big TV screen.  In the little room/the entrance of the studio, there is a single bed and a closet.  There is also a small bathroom with toilets and shower inside.  The price includes free & unlimited WIFI, TV, charges, bed linens, towels, kitchen tools... Please note that the apartment is located above a (delicious) restaurant. It may occasionnally make some noise until 11pm/midnight, but the doble gazed windows make it very limited. Please check the reviews from my guest to ensure it won't disturb your stay!

host_about:
Hi!
I am Bastien, a 26 years old French living in Paris after a few years travelling around the globe: Canada (3 years), Chili (6 months), England (6 months), plus many short stays in South & North America, Europe and Africa! 
I am looking forward to meeting with you and welcoming you!

space: Charming family house of 150 m2 on 3 floors with a garden of 30 m2. Sunny and quiet.  On the ground floor, kitchen and living room opening onto the garden.  1st floor, 3 bedrooms and 1 bathroom.  Please note that all beds at first floor are single and high from the floor (1,50m).  2nd floor, large living room with piano, with a mezzanine /4th bedroom (matrimonial bed with a shower room). The house is ideal for a family.  This house is located in the heart of Pernety, pleasant, lively, with many shops. Near the center of Paris. For the anecdote, it was the artist studio of Diego Giacometti, Alberto's brother.

host_about:
Parisiens depuis quelques années, nous aimons profiter de notre maison à Paris. Cosy, chaleureux, lumineux. Lieu calme où l'on profite l'été du jardin et l'hiver du coin du feu. Grand salon, bibliothèque. La maison comporte plusieurs espaces partagés. 
Quartier animé, familial avec des commerces, des restaurants, à 5 mns de Montparnasse. Le centre de Paris est à 10-15 mns en métro.

space: Ce logement est très ensoleillé, sans vis-à-vis. Le petit balcon permet de prendre un petit-déjeuner ou une petite pause lecture dans un bain de soleil, à l'abri des regards. Rare à Paris!
description: Situé à Paris 15ème, à mi-chemin entre la Tour Eiffel et la Tour Montparnasse, au 5ème étage avec ascenseur, 4 lignes de métro à 8 mn à pied. 2 chambres, salon, coin cuisine, 1 sdb peuvent accueillir 4 personnes Très lumineux, avec balcon Sud Ce logement est très ensoleillé, sans vis-à-vis. Le petit balcon permet de prendre un petit-déjeuner ou une petite pause lecture dans un bain de soleil, à l'abri des regards. Rare à Paris! La situation de cet appartement est optimale :  - 10 à 15 minutes de métro ou de bus pour atteindre les Champs Elysées, le Louvre, l'Ile de la Cité ou le quartier Montparnasse et ses cinémas;  - 10 minutes de marche pour rejoindre les bords de Seine, pour aller visiter la Tour Eiffel;  - 5 minutes à pied d'un charmant square pour profiter d'un banc au soleil. - A 5 minutes à pied, se trouve une station de taxis. Emplacement idéal pour visiter Paris de long en large! Draps fournis Serviettes de toilette fournies Lave-vaisselle

space: Our apartment is very sunny and calm, away from the noise of the city. Situated on the top floor (6, no elevator), all the rooms offer stunning views over the rooftops of Paris, and sunlight to every hour of the day. You can enjoy four separate rooms, and a large kitchen. Our apartment (80m2) has two bedrooms: one room with a double bed, and a children's bedroom with a single bed. There is also a convertible bed in the living room. Each furniture and lighting is contemporary design. Plants adorn each window. Notre appartement est très ensoleillé et calme. Il donne à la fois sur une rue et une cour à l'abri du bruit de la ville. Comme il se situe au dernier étage (6e, pas d'ascenseur), toute les pièces offrent une vue agréable sur les toits de Paris, et un ensoleillement optimale à toute les heures de la journée. space: A typical old & charming parisian apartment with a great view on the Amélie Poulain's grocery on a side and the roof of the Sacré Coeur on the other side.
description: 38 square meters, 2 rooms apartment in the heart of Montmartre (Paris). Charming apartment in a trendy street of restaurants, bars and cafés. On the 6th floor with elevator, this charming apt has one seperate bedroom with a bed for 2 persons. A typical old & charming parisian apartment with a great view on the Amélie Poulain's grocery on a side and the roof of the Sacré Coeur on the other side.  The apartment is located in a charming & quiet dead end next to rue des Abbesses, the trendy street of Montmartre. It is also very close to Moulin Rouge, le Sacré Coeur & Pigalle (5 minutes by feet). And there is also the best bakery in town down the building ! (Coquelicot) :) :) :)  The apartment is fully at the disposal of travelers, I won't be around during their trip. However, I would be available for any additional info they need. It is really easy to move by feet, bike, bus or metro. The neighborhood is full of restaurants, shops, bakeries, groceries, cinemas, bars & cafés. A very lively
transit: There are two different metro lines next to the apartment. Line 12 that goes from the North to the South of Paris & Line 2 that goes from North West to North East of Paris. Buses are extremely well served  from Pigalle to go in the center of Paris.

space: Located on a quite street, on the 2nd floor of a traditional Parisian building, it is your perfect nest after a long day of sightseeing. 20 Sq m decor from the fifties, wooden floor and very warm feeling. The living room is furnished with 100% French and Italian furniture from the 50s.  The sofa bed, made in Italy with Iroko wood, is great while watching TV, and becomes a very comfortable french double bed for the night. On the ceiling a modern Boffi fan will refresh you in the summer. The kitchenette, equipped with 2 induction hobs, will allow you to cook when too tired to go out, and to prepare a delicious french breakfast.  The bathroom is covered with natural Italian stone imported from Italy.  The Boffi shower has a chromotherapy lighting system that will relax you at night and will wake you up in the morning. Free speed internet and Cable Tv with many channels to use, but I am sure you won’t need it. There is enough to see in Paris!

space: This apartment is located on the Boulevard de Sebastopol,right in the center of Paris near the metro station Etienne Marcel. So you can walk to the Louvre in 15 minutes, 5 minutes to the Centre Georges Pompidou, the Marais is just accross the street. The neighbourhood is filled with lovely cafes and restaurants and also new designer shops. So you'll have great food, great atmosphere, culture and fashion just around the corner! It is on the 4th floor of a nice Parisian building, with no lift (positive side of it is that it's a great workout and you'll be able to eat all the croissants you want). And just across the street (rue du Bourg L'Abbe) you can find the famous and legendary "Bains-Douches" - the club which hosted a lot of crazy parties in the 90's and 2000's and saw the beginnings of famous DJ's like David Guetta. It is now a very nice hotel, restaurant, lounge and club.  The apartment is 42m2 big and has a great layout with 1 bedroom, 1 living-room, 1 kitchen (where you can eat)
description: Convenient, comfortable, sunny and bright apartment in the heart of Paris, in Montorgueil and Marais areas.  Location is so central that you can walk to most of the main Parisian attractions. Great place for a great Parisian experience! This apartment is located on the Boulevard de Sebastopol,right in the center of Paris near the metro station Etienne Marcel. So you can walk to the Louvre in 15 minutes, 5 minutes to the Centre Georges Pompidou, the Marais is just accross the street. The neighbourhood is filled with lovely cafes and restaurants and also new designer shops. So you'll have great food, great atmosphere, culture and fashion just around the corner! It is on the 4th floor of a nice Parisian building, with no lift (positive side of it is that it's a great workout and you'll be able to eat all the croissants you want). And just across the street (rue du Bourg L'Abbe) you can find the famous and legendary "Bains-Douches" - the club which hosted a lot of crazy parties in the 90's
transit: The location is very central so you can walk to a lot of Paris attractions : 5 minutes away from Centre Georges Pompidou, 15 minutes away from Louvres, 20 minutes away from Notre-Dame-De Paris. The nearest metro station is Etienne Marcel, 1 minute away. But you are also very close to Chatelet - Les Halles, 3 minutes away. Being the most central station in Paris it is well connected with all the different metro lines, as well as the airports and train stations.  The RER station of Chatelet Les Halles is 3 mins walk and from there you can catch the train which goes straight to Charles de Gaulle Airport or to Eurodisney.
access: Acces a l'ensemble de l'appartement
interaction: And if you have any questions, please feel free to ask at any time. I can also provide you via email with a list of places to check out in Paris (not limited to the neighbourhood) and I can help you out with any booking at a restaurant in Paris.
house_rules: No smoking inside the apartment No big parties No pets allowed
host_about:
Hey!
I love Paris and I just hope that I will get a chance to share with you all of my tips and addresses to make your stay in Paris a great experience.
So about  me  :  I have lived in Paris for 7 years, I love travelling, food, meeting new people, music, cinema and outdoor activities ( walking, swimming in the ocean and SUP yoga).

space: The apartment features a loft bed and a convertible couch. space: Wonderful location. A peaceful haven close to the huzz and buzz of one of the liveliest neighborhoods of the city (Faidherbe, Bastille...) away from tourist crowds yet so close to everything Paris has to offer. Take a glimpse into everyday life of Parisians.The appartment is very close to two metro stations (Reuilly-Diderot and Nation), with most of Paris tourist sights (Louvre Museum, Champs Elysees, Opera, Madeleine,...) less than 20 minutes away. Euro Disney is only 40 minutes away by RERThere is also a Velib (city bike rental) station directly outside the building. There is a small supermarket in the building next door and a large one 3 minutes away. All sorts of good bakeries, street markets, cafes and restaurants nearby (we'll be happy to give you suggestions on where to go!), everything you need  to make your Paris experience unique. Bed linens and towels are provided. Check in and check out times can be flexible if there is no other guest before and after your stay.
description: Relax and enjoy the quiet of this place after a busy day discovering Paris. If you want to live like a Parisian family, in a great neighborhood, close to metro and markets, restaurants, and everything Paris has to offer, this is the place to go.  Wonderful location. transit: Metro Reuilly Diderot (Lines 1 and 8) is just a 2 or 3 minutes walk. Metro Nation is also at walking distance and has lines 2,6, 9  and RER A.
access: If you have a car with you, you can have access to a parking underneath the building. Just let us know in advance if you need it.
house_rules: Smoking allowed only in terrace and balconies. Please be respectful of neighbors, it's a quiet building.
host_about: We are a couple living in Paris with our 3 kids. We love travelling and meeting people. Mike is originally from Boston, Laia is from Barcelona, we moved to  Paris 15 years ago. Our kids grew up here and we all love to enjoy everything the city has to offer. Couldn't imagine living anywhere else ....

space: Take the elevator up to the 3rd floor. As you put your bags down, you will immediately feel at home in Paris. The city’s culture, history, art, and all that you have dreamed of is now yours to explore. An unforgettable stay is about to begin. There is so much to do but first, take a breath and sit down on the sofa bed of the living room. You will notice a modern and tastefully decorated apartment nested in a charming ancient Parisian building. The sunlight coming through three large windows makes it even more beautiful. While you have seen pictures on the net, these cannot describe how pleasant the apartment is during the day and night being in the middle of a pedestrian street. Relax, rest, the ingredients are here for you to enjoy your holidays. In one click, you are connected to your close ones and to the world. You can access your Whatsap, mail, IP phone via a perfect hi-speed cable connection. Take advantage of the generous closet space for your clothes and your purchases. For you

transit: The access are numerous and practices. - Gare du Nord station is 2 minutes walk. - Gare de l'Est Station is 10 minutes walk. - 2 subway lines and a bus station in front of the building will allow you to travel around Paris. However, if you enjoy walking, no strategic location is far from the apartment. You can arrive by: - Roissy Charles de Gaulle airport     Taxi 30 mn      RER 30 mn      Bus (Opera arrival) 50 minutes - Orly Airport      Taxi 45 mn       RER 30 mn       Bus (arrival Porte d'Orléans) 30 min. - Gare du Nor(URL HIDDEN)min walk Les accès sont nombreux et pratiques. - La gare du Nord est à 2 mn à pied. - La gare de l'Est est à 10 mn à pied. - Shuttle pour EURODISNEY au 183, rue de Maubeuge. - 2 lignes de métro et une station de bus en bas de l'immeuble vous permettront de sillonner Paris. Cependant, si vous aimez la marche à pied, aucun lieu stratégique n'est loin de l'appartement. Vous pourrez arriver par : - L'aéroport Charles de Gaulle Roissy    Taxi 30 mn     RER 30 m
access: Vous aurez accès à tout l'appartement durant votre séjour.
interaction: Nous resterons à votre disposition pour toutes demandes et renseignements.
house_rules: IMPORTANT : Suite aux mauvais comportements de certains voyageurs, nous avons eu des problèmes aves nos voisins. Nous vous demandons donc d'éviter d'être trop bruyants durant votre séjour, de respecter les heures matinales ou nocturnes et d'éviter le bruit lors de vos déplacements avec vos valises. Nous vous demandons également de faire votre vaisselle, d'éteindre les éclairages ainsi que le chauffage (l'hiver) avant votre départ. IMPORTANT: Due to the bad behavior of some travelers, we had problems with our neighbors. We therefore ask you to avoid being too noisy during your stay, to respect the morning or nocturnal hours and avoid noise when traveling with your suitcases.  We also ask you to turn off the lights and the heating (winter), to wash your dishes before your departure. The usual rules of decorum for the apartment and the neighborhood. Do not make night parties. Do not make noise after 10pm. Respect the calm of the building in the common areas. Late check in after 10PM......
host_about:
Nous sommes des amoureux de Paris.
Cet amour nous donne envie de partager avec vous la découverte de la plus belle ville du monde.

space: The apartment is really comfortable, you'll share the living room and kitchen with my 3 roommates : Iris, Clément, and Simon. They are really nice but busy with their own occupation so you'll have your privacy, and they might not be there during the day. We have 2 bathrooms and 2 toilets, and you can use the bathroom just next to the room, that you'll share only with Iris. The apartment is in a residence with a small garden, in a quiet neighborhood but with all facilities close by, the metro Michel Bizot (line 8) 3 mins walking, supermarkets, and the market twice a week on sundays and thursdays. You also have the Bois de Vincennes at 5 min walking, with a really nice park, wood and a lake where you can rent small rowing boats. There is a Velib station to rent city bikes that is really convenient if you don't want to take the metro to see a bit more of the city. It's free the 1st 30min and then you have to pay unless you return it every 30mins in which case you can cycle all day. But we

transit: Metro 8 : Michel Bizot
access: You'll have access to the kitchen if you want to cook, I'll make space in the fridge for you if you want to buy food, and we have a dishwasher and whashing machine.  The living room might be all yours during the day, and in the evening depending on my roommates schedule I don't know how much they'll be there but you're welcome to stay !
interaction: If I am around I'll be glad to welcome you and show you around. Otherwise my (Hidden by Airbnb) can show you where to go have dinner, or a drink, and also some guides we have at home !
house_rules: It is a non smoker apartment but it happens that someone smokes a cigaret by the window in the living room only, so it never smells in the rooms area. We try to clean after ourselves, wash our dishes (but we have a dish washer !) and respect the stuffs of every one, so we just expect you to do so !

space: The decoration and furnishings will make you feel at home in Paris, while also sending you on an imaginary journey thanks to the collector Cole & Son wallpapers, one depicting Rome and the other a stylized mountain theme. The furnishings are an eclectic blend of contempory and vintage.  The amenities reflect a contemporary spirit, featuring extensive use of varnished resin in the bathroom and kitchen. Each room has it's own feel, some with bold color themes and others more subdued.

space: Do you like large spaces and industrial style apartments?  If so, you'll love this loft!  It can sleep up to 6 people.  In addition to two bedrooms, each with a double bed, it also has a sofa in the loft that folds out into a third double bed (1.30 m loft-to-ceiling).  It opens onto a courtyard, and therefore extremely quiet.  It is also very bright thanks to the natural light streaming in through the sky light in each room.  Plus, it has a very open feel that adds to its charm!  The bathroom, made of polished concrete, includes an Italian shower that fully opens onto the master bedroom!  It is of course possible to close the adjoining bay window for complete intimacy :) It comes fully equipped, including wireless internet, DVD player, oven, microwave, refrigerator/freezer, dishwasher, washer-dryer, iron, hair dryer, toaster, air conditioning and more.  It also comes with bed linens and towels ! update : a bathtub has been added to the bathroom. The small room is now bigger, and some w

transit: The apartment is conveniently located between metro lines 12 (Marx Dormoy) and 2 (La Chapelle).  The Eurostar and the Gare du Nord are less then a 10 minute walk away.  The neighborhood is also served by several bus lines.  Line 65 goes to République, Bastille and the Gare de Lyon, while Line 45 leads directly to the Buttes Chaumont in one direction, and to the Louvre in the other.
house_rules: La location doit se dérouler dans le respect du voisinage (pas de fête :))
host_about: Je m'appelle Julien, j'ai 37 ans, et je suis parisien depuis plus de 10 ans maintenant. Je travaille dans une agence de publicité sur internet. Ce lieu m'a immédiatement séduit : riche d'histoire, cette imprimerie fut détenue par le petit fils de Charlie Chaplin, James Thierrée (à l'affiche de "Chocolat" dernièrement), un comédien et acteur incroyable. J'espère qu'il vous plaira tout autant !

space: Perfectly organised, this appartment is very convenient and charming for a daily use. Bedroom separated from the main room where's kitchen (with all things needed for cooking). Large screen in the bedroom (connected to the computer : no TV, but internet). Unlimited wifi is granted, with my personnal IMac (you are free to use on visitor's session).

It sleeps 4 people. Toilets separated from bathroom (shower). Perfectly organised, this appartment is very convenient and charming for a daily use. Bathroom is separated from toilets.  Large screen in the bedroom (connected to the computer : no TV, but internet). transit: The apartment is on the main railroad knot and hul of Paris' metro and RER trains : Châtelet-les-Halles. It is not possible to park any car because the district is pedestrian. You can easily use the city bicycle service, "Velib'", that will cost you 5 euros for the week.
access: Guest can access to everything. I leave the wall cupboard empty to store suitcases and clothes. You can also use my Imac on the guest session, and your own cumpter or any device with wire or wifi (unlimited high speed internet).
interaction: According to your arrival schedule, I'll welcome you personally, or one of my friends will do it. Staying more than 4 nights is appreciated.
house_rules: No animals and no smoker (my curtains are magnificent). I leave all my books in the apartment, as well as my kitchen utensils.
host_about:
Bonjour,
Je pars en vacances en août et je souhaite louer mon appartement.
Il y a tous mes livres et l'appartement est parfait pour un séjour calme dans Paris, à pied ou à vélib', car tout est à proximité (restaurants, commerces, musées, etc.).
L'appartement est parfait pour un couple, avec un ou deux enfants, ou deux ami(e)s qui dorment dans des lits séparés. Deux couples risquent de manquer d'espace, mais d'aucuns l'ont fait sans se plaindre.
Je fais une réduction à compter de la 6ème nuit :-)

Hello,
I'm going on holiday in August and it would be great to rent my home.
My apartment is perfect for a couple, even with one child or two children. It's also good for single friends who don't share a bed, but I would say to small (30m2) for two couples.
You will have a discount on the price after 6 nights :-)

space: The flat is located in a nice city just outside Paris, called Deuil-la-Barre (it only takes 10mins by train to get to the center of Paris, in Gare du Nord station). *The nearest station (5mn on foot) : Deuil-Montmagny. *The address : rue Charles de Gaulle, 95170 Deuil-la-Barre. ***5/10mn train ride to Saint-Denis Station (Close to Stade de France). ************ My name is Cindy, I'm a 27 year old girl and I'm always available by phone to help you. I speak french and english, and I'm easy to get along with, I'll help you as much as I can. description: Entire apartment for 8 people Airbnb map is wrong ! In the quiet and peaceful suburbs, in Deuil-la-Barre city. *10/15mn by train from Paris Center.  *10mn train ride to Saint-Denis Station (Close to Stade de France). Breakfast included (tea and coffee). CHECK-IN : 1PM - 9PM CHECK-OUT : BEFORE MIDDAY. The flat is located in a nice city just outside Paris, called Deuil-la-Barre (it only takes 10mins by train to get to the center of Paris, in Gare du Nord station). *The nearest station (5mn on foot) : Deuil-Montmagny. *The address : rue Charles de Gaulle, 95170 Deuil-la-Barre. ***5/10mn train ride to Saint-Denis Station (Close to Stade de France). ************ My name is Cindy, I'm a 27 year old girl and I'm always available by phone to help you. I speak french and english, and I'm easy to get along with, I'll help you as much as I can. I rent a 2 floors (duplex / approx. 100m² / 1000 sqft) .  --- on the 1st floor :  - entrance  - big room with the kitchen and the dining room (oven, micro
transit: *** 10/15 mins BY TRAIN from Paris/Gare du Nord/Montmartre,  The flat is only 5mn on foot (500m / 1600ft) from the train station (Deuil-montmagny). You'll need to take only one train to go to Paris (Gare Du Nord station). The train-ride to Paris lasts for only 10/15 mins. Trains run every 15 mins. Last train from Paris center : 00:49 (one of the last train/metro in Paris at night). *** 10 mins away from Enghien-les-bains by bus (25mn walking) : lake, casino, mineral baths, spa, racetracks, swimming pool . Very beautiful city, see photos. ***5/10mn train ride to Saint-Denis Station (Close to Stade de France).
access: Included in the price :  water, electricity, internet/wifi, clean sheets, phone (Free to call to almost every country. There are only a few exceptions so just ask me) Basic breakfast : tea & coffee. There are supermarkets, bakeries, pizzas, kebabs near the place. I'll show you where. Bathroom products are not included.
interaction: I will help you as much as I can! You can ask me any questions about Paris, and I'm always available on my phone if you get lost or need anything!
house_rules: There are other people staying in the flat, so please don't make too much noise if you come home late, or wake up early. Stay clean, clean after yourself. No smoking in the flat. Check-out at 12, if you want you can leave your bags after in my living room, keep one set of keys, but clear your bed before 12!
host_about:
In a cute and safe city, just outside Paris Center, I rent two private rooms and four beds in a shared room.
You can consider it as a small hostel, with one bathroom and one toilet, one kitchen and one living room, all shared.
Fantastic way to meet people all around the world !

I am a 28 years old girl, and I'll be available 24H/24 to help you before, during and after your stay !

space: Modern apartment, bright, spacious 48m2 to rent for a minimum of 6 month in Paris at the foot of Subway Couronnes  in the popular Ménilmontant/Belleville. 15 min by subway City Hall, close to the Pere Lachaise and the place of Republic. It consists of a bedroom with double, a fully equipped kitchen (oven, washing machine, fridge etc ...), a lighty living-room with modular sofa (2 places) Internet access, a bathroom and WC. All utilities,sheets and towels included Underground parking All shops, restaurants and theaters. availability: from the 19th november 2012 Thank you to contact me by email. Best regards

transit: L'appartement est doté d'un parking sous-terrain directement relié à l'appartement avec un ascenseur. La ligne 2 du métro à 50 m traverse Paris d'est en ouest, et il suffit de marcher 5 mn pour prendre la ligne 11 qui arrive en plein centre de Paris en 10mn! Le bus 96 au pied de la maison traverse Paris vers le sud jusqu'à la Gare Montparnasse. Des vélibs sont à disposition sur le boulevard. Sinon tout se fait à pied ! Prenez le temps de marcher !

host_about:
Français / english
______
Parisien de toujours. Racines bretonnes et picardes.
Médecin généraliste remplaçant, à travailler notamment en Ile-de-France et Finistère.
Une thèse en Histoire de la Médecine.

Musicien amateur, touchant machines électroniques, claviers, guitares.
Féru de théatre, danse contemporaine, expos, concerts. 
La chance de vivre à Paris. Possible de donner mes meilleurs "plans" du moment.

Heureux de croiser les voyageurs, l'étant moi-même. Un monde à partager...

______

Parisian of always. Breizh roots.
General practitioner, working in Ile-de-France and Finistère.
A thesis in History of Medicine.

Musician, with electronic machines, keyboards, guitars.
I do like théatre, contemporary dance, exhibitions, concerts. 
Lucky to live in Paris. 
Possible to share the address of the best places.

Happy to meet travelers, being one of them. 
A world to be shared...

______

I speak English.
Ich spreche Deutsch ein bisschen.

space: The decoration and furnishings will make you feel at home in Paris, while also sending you on an imaginary journey thanks to the collector Cole & Son wallpapers, one depicting Rome and the other a stylized mountain theme. The furnishings are an eclectic blend of contempory and vintage.  The amenities reflect a contemporary spirit, featuring extensive use of varnished resin in the bathroom and kitchen. Each room has it's own feel, some with bold color themes and others more subdued.
description: On the saunny 4th floor (with elevator) of this Marais apartment, you will enjoy views over Paris rooftops as well as a charming courtyard. The furnishings are an eclectic blend of contempory and vintage.  The amenities reflect a contemporary spirit, featuring extensive use of varnished resin in the bathroom and kitchen. space: Hello, if you're coming to my apartment, that means that it is AVAILABLE during your dates. If you're looking for a quiet apartment which is ideally situated for discovering Paris, then this is the right place!! It's a very large apartment located on the last floor (with elevator). It has a small balcony with a entirely clear view of the Eiffel Tour. It is very quiet and luminous. Renovated and entirely equipped with a large living room, 2 bedrooms (of which a double, a separated office, a bathroom with bathtub, a shower, independent toilet and a fully-equipped kitchen (over, fridge, coffee machine, gas stove...) space: Top floor (6th and 7th), spacious 65 sqm, very bright.  Big bathroom with tub and separate shower. Very small elevator up to 5th floor then a few steps to the 6th.  Building style : typical parisian small building,  inhabited by families, very calm and safe. Very comfortable for 4 to 5 guests. In Le Marais / Enfants-Rouges/ Musée Picasso area. Great for walking, food shopping. Lots of good restaurants, bakeries, bars and cafés ... and new art galleries every month.  10 minutes walk to Place des Vosges, 20 from Notre-Dame.  Subway stations at the corner. Easily accessible from Orly or Roissy CDG airport. Only 20 mn from Gare du Nord (Thalys, Eurostar).
description: Just-renovated apartment on 2 levels : first level (53 sq.m.) with big living room with kitchen fully equipped including dish washer, big dinner table, convertible sofa bed comfortable for 2 people in the living room, separate bedroom with king size bed, and big bath room. On top floor level : small additional bedroom with 1 person futon mattress, and small rooftop garden with nice view on Paris roofs. VERY QUIET at night (only courtyard windows) and very sunny. Top floor (6th and 7th), spacious 65 sqm, very bright.  Big bathroom with tub and separate shower. Very small elevator up to 5th floor then a few steps to the 6th. access: Whole  apartment
interaction: I live next door in the same building  (but often at my country house in Le Perche) My niece also lives in the same building and neighbors are friendly and unobstrusive.
house_rules: We welcome responsible guests.  We can help with pretty much everything: additional furniture or ustensils, basic information about Paris, etc. We have recent guidebooks about Paris so no need to bring yours... You will get a welcome package and a booklet with all useful information. Please tell us if you are here for business or for tourism and we can adapt our services to your needs. Dogs allowed under exceptional conditions. (depends on animal size and species, and requires an additional deposit and some cleaning fees). Cats not allowed because of potential allergy issues.
host_about: We live in Central Paris (Le Marais) and in the same building we have redesigned a quite nice 50 sq.m. flat, top floor, very sunny, that we keep at the disposal of friends and family for short stays, applying the  concept of "chambre d'hôte".

space: Located on the  la Cite Island, Notre Dame at the foot of a Haussmann building, this small studio with direct view of Notre Dame and the rooftops of Paris offers for your stay a privileged location, romantic and very practical. Each part of the flat very well insulated. Located on the top floor without elevator the studio will be more suited to young and sportive travelers.
description: If you dream to spy Esmeralda, to track the aristocats or simply and romantically admire the stained glass windows of Notre Dame by night... it's here! My charming studio is situated in the historic and very center of Paris on the Cité Island. house_rules: - Be respectuous with the flat and the neighbors.  - Music is OK till 9 a.m to 9 p.m, till 9 p.m you can play it but not loud.  - No party. - No pets - No smoking - Throw your trash in the garbage can in the yard - Wash your dishes - Keep the WC clean - Close everytime the window of the room when you leave the studio.
host_about:
Hello,
I'm Grégory, 33 year old, and I'm designer in Paris. My ideal way of traveling is to live the place like a citizen of it. Airbnb Is for me the perfect way to discover a place and people who living there.

About me :
I'm a freelancer, and so… I realy love freedom.
My principles and outputs values ​​are respect, the well-monitoring and openness. I love nature and I protect it. I love to discovering new things, places and people. And for me there is no better way to learn more than in traveling.

Regards

space: Venez séjourner chez moi, dans notre joli et très agréable appartement parisien. 70m².  Un séjour lumineux, une grande chambre claire avec un grand lit, une chambre enfant, et une fantastique mezzanine avec deux matelas lit pouvant accueillir deux adultes ou enfants en plus.  A noter : pour accéder à la salle de bain/WC, il faut passer par la grande chambre. Cuisine ouverte très bien équipée, salle de bain avec grande baignoire avec de nombreux produits à tester... PC et WIFI disponible lors de votre séjour.  Exceptionnel à Paris, une terrasse privative d'environ 18m² sera très agréable en été comme hiver, accessible depuis le séjour et la chambre parentale.  Située rue du Faubourg Saint Martin, métro Gare de l'Est (3 lignes de métro, de nombreux bus, et surtout point de départ pour de nombreuses balades à pied). Très central.  Dans le quartier trendy et bobo mais néanmoins calme du Canal Saint Martin (il suffit de traverser le joli jardin Villemin pour arriver sur le Canal, à 2 minute

space: Lovely one bedroom flat With 2 bed. 1 bedroom, 1 living room, 1 bathroom and 1 kitchen. Internet, Tv, washing machine... Bus in front of the flat, tube station at 3 min by walk !  Supermarkets, restaurants, and bars in the street ! In the quarter, you can visite the parc " les buttes Chaumont", "la cité des science", and "le canal St. Martin"

space: This lovely duplex is set in the ultimate location in Paris, on the top floor (with elevator) of a listed 17th century townhouse, three minutes walk from the Seine. 180 sq Meters (1950 sq ft), four bedrooms all with queen size beds, two bathrooms and all the amenities expected in a modern luxury apartment (optical fiber internet, use of only organic detergents and soap for the linens). The location is possibly the last quiet and unspoilt block in central Paris (village st Paul), and yet you have access to three different metro lines a few minutes away. As you can see from the photographs, this is a home, it is not designed for the sole purpose to rent. (Not a single bolt from Ikea.) I limit the number of tenants and require a minimum length of stay because this place is more like a country house than a shelter, albeit a luxurious one... The building is extremely secure since a full time concierge lives in the building. If you like light, the sun and to sleep with windows open and wake

space: A separate 180 sqft room, with wooden floor and a full size bed, in a shared 550 sqft apartment. Quiet building - for quiet people.
description: A private room in Belleville/Menilmontant area.. all you can expect from Paris' most popular district is right here at the corner! PLEASE CONTACT ME FIRST to check availability before booking! A separate 180 sqft room, with wooden floor and a full size bed, in a shared 550 sqft apartment. Quiet building - for quiet people. Kitchen is fully equipped, Bathroom  with separate restroom I'm the one staying in the other room! Close to parc des Buttes Chaumont and Père-Lachaise cemetery. Any shop you'd need is around the corner - including cheese shop, wine shop and the best bakery in town! Very nice neighbourhood in a popular district, with lots of bars and restaurants within a short walking distance
access: Kitchen is fully equipped, Bathroom  with separate restroom
interaction: I'm the one staying in the other room!
house_rules: no smoking inside - but there's a tiny balcony in the kitchen you might use no pets no parties no extra guests linen and towels are provided there's no cleaning fees but you're welcome to contribute to housework, especially if you stay longer than a week!
host_about:
studying cinema, partly working as a freelance photographer. sometimes dancing forro or tango, climbing rocks, playing badminton.
i've always been a big fan of my neighborhood (belleville/menilmontant) - i may be able to show you some spots hidden from touristic maps!
